body.text: samādhipādaḥ

yastyaktvā rūpamādyaṁ prabhavati jagato'nekadhā'nugrahāya prakṣīṇakleśarāśirviṣamaviṣadharo'nekavaktraḥ subhogī। sarvajñānaprasūtirbhujagaparikaraḥ prītaye yasya nityaṁ devo'hīśaḥ sa vo'vyātsitavimalatanuryogado yogayuktaḥ ॥ 1 ॥
atha yogānuśāsanam ॥ 1 ॥
athetyayamadhikārārthaḥ।

vivaraṇam
yasminna staḥ karmavipākau yata āstāṁ kleśā yasmai nālamalaṅdhyā nikhilānām । nāvacchinnaḥ kāladṛśā ya: kalayantyā lokeśastaṁ kaiṭabhaśatruṁ praṇamāmi ॥ 1 ॥
yaḥ sarvavit sarvevibhūtiśaktiḥ vihīnadoṣopahitakriyāphala: । viśvodbhavāntasthitiheturīśo namo'stu tasmai gurave gurorapi ॥ 2 ॥
[athe] tyādipātañjalayogaśāstra[sūtrabhāṣya]vivaraṇamārabhyate । tatrānākhyātasambandhapraye.ājanaṁ na puruṣapravṛttinivṛttibhyāṁ paryāpnotīti, sūtrakārābhiprete puruṣapravṛttinimittabhūte sambandhaprayojane pūrvaṁ prakaṭīkriyete ॥
tatra prayojanaṁ tāvat - cikitsāśāstre taccaturvyūhatvapradarśanadvāreṇa vyākhyātam । tadyathā-cikitsāśāsraṁ caturvyūhaṁ, rogaḥ, rogahetuḥ, ārogyaṁ, bhaiṣajyam iti । vidhipratiṣedhaniyamadvāreṇa [ca tat] caturvyūhāviṣayavyākhyānaparam । evamihāpi “pariṇāmatāpasaṁskāraduḥkhairguṇavṛttivirodhācca duḥkhameva sarvaṁ vivekina:“ ityārabhya caturvyūhatvaṁ śāstrasya pradarśitam । tadyathā-duḥkhapracuraḥ saṁsāro heyaḥ । tasyāvidyānimitte draṣṭṛsaṁyogo hetuḥ । vivekakhyātiraviplavā hānopāyaḥ । vivekakhyātau ca satyāmavidyānivṛttiḥ, tannivṛttāvātyantiko draṣṭṛdṛśyasaṁyogoparamo hānam, tadeva kaivalyamiti । ārogyasthānīyakaivalyaprayuktatvādasya tadeva kaivalyaṁ prayojanam ॥
nanu ca heyataddhetū na prastotavye, niṣprayojanatvāt । hānaprayuktaṁ hi śāstraṁ, tadupāyabhūtā vivekakhyātireva vaktavyā । na hi kaṇṭakaviddhacaraṇatalasya tadapanayanaṁ muktvā duḥkhataddhetū codyete । naitadevaṁ-heyatatkāraṇāpekṣatvāddhānopāyasya । yāvadidamanenopāyena hātavyaṁ saṁsāracakram asya cāvidyānimitto draṣṭṛdṛśyasaṁyogo hetu: iti nākhyāyate, tāvannāvidyāpratipakṣabhūtā vivekakhyātirākhyātuṁ śakyate । heyataddhetumato hānopāyārthino rogiṇo bhaiṣajyārthitvadarśanāt । na hi rogaṁ rogahetuṁ cānapekṣya cikitsāśāsramupadiśyate ॥
sambandho'pi-vivekakhyāterhānameva phalaṁ sādhyaṁ hānasyāpi vivekakhyātireva sādhanamiti sādhyasādhanayoritaretaraniyama eva, nānyasaṁbandhaḥ । tadyathā-bhaiṣajyasyārogyameva phalam ārogyasyāpi bhaiṣajyameva sādhanamiti itaretaraniyamaḥ, sa ca śāstrāditi । tasmāt sasaṁbandhaprayojanaṁ yogānuśāsanam ।
nanu ca yadi hānaṁ prayojanaṁ tadupāyaśca vivekakhyātiriti, tatra vaktavyam ‘atha vivekakhyātyanuśāsanam‘ iti । kimartham 'atha yogānuśāsanam‘ iti sūtritam ?
tadupāyatvādyogasya । upāya eva vaktavyaḥ syāt । upeyopapradarśane hi upeyamupāyaṁ prati sākāṅkṣamevetyupāyaḥ sāṅgakalāpaḥ punarapi vaktavyaḥ syāt । tasmiṁścābhihite sarvamabhihitamiti । ﻿
kathaṁ tadupāyatvam ? yata āha sūtrakāraḥ-- ‘yogāṅgānuṣṭhānādaśuddhikṣaye jñānadīptirāvivekakhyāteḥ‘ iti । ‘nirvicāravaiśāradye'dhyātmaprasādaḥ‘ ‘ṛtaṁbharā tatra prajñā‘ iti ca । tathā bhāṣyakāro'pyāha--‘yastvekāgre cetasi sa bhūtamarthe pradyotayati‘ iti । bhūtārthāvagatiśca vivekakhyātiḥ । tasmādyuktaṁ tadupāyayogānuśāsanamevādau sūtritamiti ॥
nanu ca yogāṅgānuṣṭhānādvivekakhyātiḥ, tatra vaktavyaṁ 'atha yogāṅgānuśāsanam iti-na-phalenopakramāt । yogāṅgānuṣṭhānasya hi phalaṁ yoga iti tadupakramo yuktaḥ ॥
yadyevaṁ hānenopakramyeta-na-tasyopeyatvāt-upeyameva hi tat । yogaḥ punaḥ svāṅgānāmupeyaśca, upāyaśca vivekakhyāteraṇimādiprāpteścetyabhyarhitataraḥ । phalatadupāyarūpatvāt (phalapayanimittatvāt) ॥
uttarasūtrārthavācca । na hi 'atha yogāṅgānuśāsanam । ' ityukta ‘yogaścittavṛttinirodhaḥ' iti yuktaṁ vaktum । tadā hi ‘yamaniyayama'disūtrameva paṭhitavyaṁ syāt ॥
atha tadeva paṭhitavyamiti cet-na-yogope(pā)yayā hānopāyabhūtāyā vivekakhyāte:, phalasya ca hānasya, saṁbandha[pra]darśanārthatvāt ‘yogaścittavṛtinirodhaḥ‘ ityasya ॥
(sa)kathaṁ punaretatsaṁbandhapradarśanārtham ? yāvatā nirbījasamādhilakṣaṇābhidhānametat । satyamevaṁ, tathāpi hānatadupāyasaṁbandhamavadyotayadeva sūtraṁ nirbījasamādhilakṣaṇatāmāpadyate ॥
na hi nirodhalakṣaṇāt samādherarthāntaraṁ hānam । kiṁ tvetāvatā viśeṣa:, nirodhalakṣaṇasamādhai (dherne) punaḥ pravṛtiḥ, hāne tvātyantitikī nivṛttiriti । samādhyavasthāyāṁ tu hānāviśeṣa eva । tathā cāha-‘‘tadā draṣṭuḥ svarūpe'vasthānam‘‘ [iti] ॥ ‘‘svarūpapratiṣṭhā ca citiśaktiḥ kaivalyam‘‘ iti svarūpapratiṣṭhatvaṁ(ṣṭhaṁ) hi kaivalyamāha । tataśca nirbījasamādhinā kaivalyameva śāstrārthapratyayadraḍhimne sākṣākriyate ।
tasmādyaducyate kaiścit sabījasamādhiḥ kaivalyasādhanamiti-tanna ! kiṁ tarhi? khyātireva sādhanamavidyānivṛtidvāreṇa । avidyānimitto hi bandhaḥ । tasmādyadyapi yogānuśāsanaṁ sūtritam, tathāpi khyātyarthavādyogasya taddvāreṇa khyātihānasaṁbandhamapi darśayatīti, suṣṭhūcyate uttarasūtrasaṁbandhārthaṁ ca yogānuśāsanamiti sūtrayitavyamiti ॥
yadyapi phalārthināṁ tatphalasādhanaṁ pratyutpannākāṅkṣāṇāṁ sādhanopadeśo'pyāsti । tathāpi na tatprayojanam , sarvasya phale.oddeśena pravṛttestadeva prayojanamiti ॥
[yogānuśāsanamiti] । yathā-śiṣyo'nuśiṣyate viśiṣṭapravṛttinivṛttiniyamadvāreṇa, tathā viśiṣṭasādhyasādhanatadaṅganiyamamātrasādṛśyādantevāsyanuśāsanavadyogānuśāsanamityucyate । anuśiṣṭiranuśāsanaṁ, yoge'nuśiṣyate'nenāsminniti vā yogānuśāsanaṁ śāstram ॥
[athetyayamadhikārārthaḥ] । adhikāra ārambhaḥ prastāvaḥ, artho'bhidheyo'sya ; śiṣṭasmṛtiprāmāṇyāt । nanu cānantaryārthasyāthaśabdasya smaranti śiṣṭāḥ । tathā cāha-“vṛttādanantarasya prakriyārthe dṛṣṭaḥ” iti । na-sarvatrārambhārthatvāt । ānantaryasya ca gamyamānatvāt । yathā putra ityukte pitā gamyate, na ca putraśabdasyārthaḥ pitā, tathehāpyārambha evābhidhīyate, ānantaryaṁ tu pratīyate ॥
ata eva ca ‘vṛttādanantarasya prakriyārtho dṛṣṭaḥ‘ ityucyate । yadi cānantaryārtho'bhaviṣyattadā ‘vṛttādānantarye'rthe prakriyāyāḥ‘ ityavadiṣyat । anantarasyeti cānantarabhāvina evābhidhānam ।
api caivaṁ hi smṛtiḥ-‘‘kiñcidavyaṁ vibhaktyarthapradhānaṁ kiñcitkriyāpradhānam । ucainīcairityādi vibhaktyarthapradhānam, hiruk pṛthagilyādi kriyāpradhānam' [iti] । na caitadvyatirekeṇāvyayānāmarthoṁ vidyate । tatrāthaśabdasyānantaryārthatve sati vibhaktya(kti)śravaṇamayuktam, sattvapradhānatvāt । ārambhakriyārthatve tu na vibhaktyartha)śravaṇamayuktam, asattvapradhānatvāditi ॥
tasmādathaśabdaḥ prastāvārthe eveti yuktamathelyadhikārārthe iti । svarūpāvadyotanārtha itiśabdaḥ । yathā gaurityāheti । prasiddho'pyathaśabdārtho'dhikriyamāṇaviṣaye śiṣyabuddhisamādhānārtha kīrtyate । siddhe hyayaṁ nyāyaḥ śrutau ‘vyākhyāsyāmi te vyācakṣāṇasya tu me nididhyāsasva' iti ॥

yogānuśāsanaṁ śāstramadhikṛtaṁ veditavyam। yogaḥ samādhiḥ। sa ca sārvabhaumaścittasya dharmaḥ। kṣiptaṁ mūḍhaṁ vikṣiptamekāgraṁ niruddhamiti cittabhūmayaḥ। tatra vikṣipte cetasi vikṣepopasarjanībhūtaḥ samādhirna yogapakṣe vartate।

vivaraṇam
[yogaḥ samādhiriti] ॥ samādhigrahaṇāt 'yujiyoge' iti nivartya, 'yuja samādhau' ityayaṁ gṛhītaḥ । yogaḥ samādhānam । nanu ca ‘yogaḥ samādhiḥ‘ ityevamantena vyākhyāte sūtre ‘sa ca sārvabhaumaḥ‘ ityādibhāṣyamasaṁbandhaṁ dṛśyate । naiṣa doṣaḥ । iha samādhirityukte, samādhīyamānāpekṣatvāt, samādhīyamānānāṁ ca bahutvāt, kimātmā samādhīyate ? thā kiṁ vā śarīram, āhosvidindriyāṇi, iti bahu(vidāṁ)dhā vipratipate:, svaviśeṣaṇākāṅkṣatvācca samādhe:, kasyāyam? kiṁviśeṣaṇakaḥ? ityanuṣakte praśne, idamāha-
[kṣipta mūḍhamityādayo bhūmaya] iti । kṣiptamiti karmakartari niṣṭhā । yathā bhinnaḥ kusūlaḥ svayameveti । kṣiptamaniṣṭaviṣayāsañjanena stimitam । mūḍhaṁ nirvivekam । vikṣiptaṁ nānākṣiptam । karmakartaryeva । vivekākṣamaṁ ca vikṣiptatvādeva । ekāgraṁ tulyapratyayapravāham । niruddhamiti pratyayaśūnyaṁ cittam ॥
nanu ca bhūmiṣu dharmeṣu vivakṣiteṣu, kimarthaṁ kṣiptamityādinā dharmyucyate ? naiṣa doṣaḥ, dharmiṇā dharma evopadiśyate । dharmāṇāṁ dharmiviṣayatvāt । yathā gotve kiṁ liṅgamiti pṛṣṭe, viṣāṇī kakudmān prāntavālādhiriti dharmiṇā dharma evopadiśyate । tasmāt kṣepādayaścittasya bhūmayo dharma ityarthaḥ ॥
nanu ca bhūmīnāṁ cittadharmatve samādheśca, kathaṁ bhūmibhiḥ samādhirādhāratvena viśeṣyata sārvabhauma iti ? sāmānyabhūtatvāt samādheḥ । bhūmīnāṁ ca viśeṣatvāt । yathā kṣiptaṁ tiṣṭhati, mūḍhaṁ tiṣṭhati, vikṣisamakāgraṁ ceti, kṣiptādibhūmiṣu sthitiranuvartate sāmānyam । sthitiśca samādhiḥ । tasmāt sāmānyarūpaṁ sarvāsu bhūmiṣu prādhānyena vartata iti । ‘sarvabhūmipṛthivī' ityaiśvaryārthīyo'ṇpratyayaḥ । anuśatikāditvādubhayapadavṛddhiḥ ॥
anye punarbāhmādhyāmikān saṁyamaviṣayān bhūmaya ityācakṣate । teṣāṁ ‘vikṣipte cetasi‘ iti sāmānādhikaraṇyānupapattiḥ । svavacanavirodhaśca katham ? kṣipyate'sminniti kṣiptam , muhyate'sminniti mūḍhaṁ, yadā caivaṁ na tadā saṁyamaviṣayatā । tatra kṣepādyasaṁbhavāt । ekāgrāvasthāyāṁ hi saṁyamo bhavati ॥
kiṁ cānyat-kṣipeśca dhrauvyādyarthābhāvādadhikaraṇe niṣṭhāpratyayābhāvaḥ । kiṁ ca-niruddhe cetasi saṁyamasyāpi tatrābhāvāt vṛttiśūnyatvāt saṁyamaviṣayābhāvaḥ । na hi nirodhe viṣayaviśeṣe cittaṁ nirudhyate । tadā hi viṣayitvānnivartate । parigaṇanānupapattiśca । na hi kṣiptādayaḥ pañcaiva saṁyamasya viṣayāḥ । teṣāmānantyāt ॥
nanu cānyathā yogaṁ kecidicchanti । tathā cāhuḥ--‘‘indriyamano'rthasannikarṣāt sukhadu:khe, tadanārambha ātmasthe manasi, saśarīrasya sukhadu:khābhāva: prāṇamanevinigrahāpekṣaḥ saṁyogo [yoga] iti‘‘ । taditi prakṛtāpekṣam । yo'sau sukhaduḥkhayorātmendriyamano'rthasannikarṣo hetuḥ, tasyānārambhaḥ tadanutpattiḥ । sa kathaṁ bhavati ? ātmasthe manasi, nendriyasthe । saśarīrasya aviśīrṇaśarīrasya । tadā kāraṇābhāvāt kāryābhāva iti, sannikarṣābhāve sukhaduḥkhayorapyabhāvaḥ, tasyāmavasthāyāṁ yo'sau vibhorātmano manasā saṁyogaḥ sa prāṇamanovinigrahāpekṣaḥ saṁyogaviśeṣo yoga iti ।
atrocyate-ātmasthe manasītyayuktam, sarvadā atmasthatvānmanasaḥ । indriyādisanniṣkarṣānārambhāpekṣayā ātmasthe iti cet, tadanārambha ityeva siddhatvādātmasthe manasītyanarthakaṁ syāt ॥
kiṁ cānyat-muktasyāpi manasa ātmasthatvādindriyasannikarṣābhāvācca yogaḥ prāpnoti । tasyāpi hi sarvagatatvāt manasaśca nityatvāt sarvadātmasthatvameva ॥
kiṁ ca-ātmanaḥ pradeśābhāvādātmastha ityayuktam । na cāpyupacaritātmapradeśasaṁyogaḥ paramārthasya yogasya hetuḥ syāt । upacaritasya mithyātvāt ॥
kiṁ cānyat-mano'rthasannikarṣābhāva ityeva siddheḥ(ddhaṁ)indriyagrahaṇamanarthakaṁ syāt । athendriyairvinā mano'rthasannikarṣābhāvāttadanārabhbha iti prāptyabhāve pratiṣedho na yukta iti cet । naitadevam, vinendriyairmano'rthasannikarṣo nāstītyarthātsannikarṣapratiṣedhaṁ kurvatā viṣayaprāptirindriyadvārā pratipāditā syāt ।
kiṁ cānyat-sarvaprāṇabhājāmindriyamano'rthasannikarṣāt sukhaduḥkhapratilambhasya prasiddhatvādātmanaḥ sambandhasya ca nityatvāt sukhaduḥkhābhāvo yoga ityeva siddheḥ, tatra [sūtra] śeṣo'narthakaḥ syāt ॥
athāpi syādindriyamano'rthasannikarṣagrahaṇādṛte sukhaduḥkhābhāva ityetāvati sati muktasyāpi sukhaduḥkhābhāvādyogitvaprasaṅga iti tannivṛttyarthaṁ sūtraśeṣagrahaṇamiti । tacca na, muktasya sukhaduḥkhaprāptyabhāvāt, prāptipūrvapratiṣedhasya nyāyyatvāt, yasya sukhaduḥkhaprāptiḥ, tadviṣayaḥ sukhaduḥkhābhāva eva yoga iti sūtraśeṣapratyākhyānaṁ yujyate ॥
kiṁ cānyat – upātte'pi saśarīragrahaṇe muktādvinivṛttirna śakyate kartum, niṣprayojanatvāt । sukhaduḥkhābhāvaścedyogaḥ, vidyamānamapi śarīraṁ kāryākaraṇādanarthakaṁ syāt । kāryānapekṣāyāṁ hi muktāmuktayoraviśeṣa eva ॥
kiṁ cānyat – prāṇamanovinigrahāpekṣa ityapi na ghaṭate । vidhārakasya prayatnasyātmasamavetatvādavidyamāne'pi manasaḥ kriyāvattve indriyeṇāsaṁjya manaḥ prāṇa [mano]nigrahau na kartuṁ paryāpyate । indriyasaṁyoge ca manasaḥ, tadanārambha ityayuktam । manasaśca prāṇanigrahe vyāpṛ(vṛ)tatvādanārambhānupapattiḥ ॥
[sa ca sārvabhaumaścittasya dharmaḥ‘ iti ॥] 
[vikṣipte (anavikṣipte) cetasi vikṣepopasarjanībhūtaḥ samādhirna yogapakṣe vartate iti] ॥ kṣiptādyanugatasya yogapakṣe'nabhipretatvāt । na hi kṣepādyanugataḥ samādhirbhūtārthāvadyotanādikṣamaḥ, kṣepādipradhānatvāt । vikṣepaniṣedhenaiva hi pradhānamallanibarhaṇanyāyena kṣaptamūḍhayorapi niṣedhaḥ kṛtaḥ । pradhānatā ca vikṣepasamādheradhikārayogyatvāt । vikṣepasthaṁ hi cittamapakṣapātādiṣṭaṁ viṣayamupanetuṁ śakyate । na hi viṣayāsañjanādinā kṣiptamiṣṭaviṣayaviyogādinā vā mūḍhamanyathāpanetuṁ pāryate ॥
[yogapakṣa iti ॥] samādhitve satyapi kāryākaraṇāta pakṣa ityucyate । yathā gacchataḥ pratipadaṁ vidyamānāpi sthitiḥ sthitikāryākaraṇānna sthitirityucyate । vikṣepopasarjanībhūtatvaṁ vikṣepasthaikasamādhivyaktyabhiprāyeṇa । sārvabhauma iti tu prādhānyaṁ, sāmānyena sarvabhūmiṣu vṛttaḥ ॥

yastvekāgre cetasi sadbhūtamarthaṁ pradyotayati kṣiṇoti ca kleśānkarmabandhanāni ślathayati nirodhamabhimukhaṁ karoti sa saṁprajñāto yoga ityākhyāyate। sa ca vitarkānugato vicārānugata ānandānugato'smitānugata ityupariṣṭānnivedayiṣyāmaḥ। sarvavṛttinirodhe tvasaṁprajñātaḥ samādhiḥ ॥ 1 ॥

vivaraṇam
[yastvekāgra] iti । naikāgratāyāṁ bhūmyupasarjanatvam । kutaḥ ? kleśakarmāprabalatvāt । kleśakarmāprabalatve na hi vikṣepādīnāmudayaḥ ।
ekāgratābhūmau samādhiryaḥ sa bhūtamarthaṁ yathātmānaṁ pradyotayati avagamayati । ayogyathaijñānamayathābhūtatvagandhitameveti bhūtagrahaṇam । kṣiṇoti, kṣapayati, pañcaparvaṇo'vidyādīn kleśān । karmabandhanāni, karmāṇyeva bandhanāni, dharmādharmavimiśrakarmajātāni janmādinibandhanāni, ślathayati, śithilīkaroti, nirodhamāmukhīkaroti, abhimukhīkaroti । sa samprajñāta ityākhyāyate ācārye: ॥
[sa ca vitarkānugato vicārānugata ityādibhāṣyam] । samprajñātasya prāthamyāllakṣaṇābhidhāne prāpte, abhyarhitatvādasamprajñātasyaiva lakṣaṇaṁ yuktamiha vaktumiti samprajñātamupariṣṭāt pravedayiṣyāma ityucyate ।
itaścāsamprajñātasya lakṣaṇamihaiva vaktavyaṁ, samprajñātanirapekṣo'pyasamprajñātaḥ para(prakṛṣṭa)vairāgyavirāmapratyayābhyāsābhyāṁ sidhyatītyetatpradarśanārtham । iha samprajñātalakṣaṇābhidhāne taduttarakāle cāsamprajñātalakṣaṇābhidhāne samprajñātāpekṣayaiva asamprajñātasamādhāvadhikāra ityāśaṅkā syāt, tasmādupariṣṭāt pravedayiṣyāma ityāha ॥ 1 ॥
tasya lakṣaṇābhidhitsayedaṁ sūtraṁ pravavṛte-
yogaścittavṛttinirodhaḥ ॥ 2 ॥
sarvaśabdāgrahaṇātsaṁprajñāto'pi yoga ityākhyāyate। cittaṁ hi prakhyāpravṛttisthitiśīlatvāttriguṇam।

vivaraṇam
[sarvavṛttinirodhe tvasaṁprajñāta] iti । tuśabdo'vadhāraṇārthaḥ ।
nanu ca tasya lakṣaṇamabhidhātumetat sūtraṁ pravṛttaṁ, tathā ca sati ‘yogasya cittavṛttinire.odhaḥ‘ iti vaktavyaṁ, sāmānādhikaraṇyaṁ na yuktam । na hi lakṣyameva lakṣaṇaṁ syāt । cittavṛttinirodhalakṣaṇa iti vā vaktavyam । naiṣa doṣaḥ । lakṣye । lakṣaṇādhyāsāt । yathā'yaṁ piṇḍo devadatta iti lakṣye lakṣaṇamadhyasyate (pratyasyate) ॥
nanu ca sarvavṛttinirodhe tvasamprajñātaḥ, tasya cedaṁ lakṣaṇaṁ, tataśca ‘yogaḥ sarvacittavṛttiniredhiḥ‘ iti vaktavyam । na coktam । ato'tivyāpi lakṣaṇam । sarvaśabdāgrahaṇe tāvatkāraṇamucyate-yadi sarvagrahaṇaṁ kriyate, tadaikadeśanirodhanimittasya saṁprajñātasya yogatvaṁ nivartitaṁ syāt । tanmābhūditi sarvaśabdāgrahaṇam ॥
astu tarhi saṁprajñātāsaṁprajñātayoḥ sāmānyalakṣaṇaṁ, viśeṣānupādānāt । naiṣa doṣaḥ । yoge prakṛte punaryogagrahaṇāt । viśeṣāvivakṣāyāṁ hi yogagrahaṇaṁ nārthavat syāt ॥
nanu cānuśāsane nyagbhūtatvādyogasya iha yogagrahaṇe asati cittavṛttinirodha ityukte'nuśāsanārthatā bhavet sūtrasya-naivaṁ-yogānuśāsanasya prastutatvāt । ye.āgānuśāsanaṁ hi prārabdhaṁ, nāyogānuśāsanaṁ, tallakṣaṇābhidhāne hyatiprasaṅgaḥ, . padārthāsaṅgatiśca । na hi cittavṛtinirodho yogānuśāsanamiti padārthaḥ saṅgacchate ॥
evamapi yogagrahaṇāt kuto'saṁprajñātasyaiva lakṣaṇaṁ, na punaḥ saṁprajñātasya lakṣaṇaṁ syāt, yogagrahaṇasyāviśiṣṭatvāditi ?
﻿ ucyate--avyabhicārāt । vyabhicarati na tattasya lakṣaṇaṁ, nirodhastvasaṁprajñāte'pi vartata iti saṁprajñātaṁ vyabhicarati । na hi viṣāṇitvaṁ gorliṅgaṁ, mahiṣyādibhirvyabhicārāt ॥
nanu cāsaṁprajñātamapi vyabhicarati, saṁprajñātasyāpi heyavṛttinirodhatvāt । satyamevaṁ, kiṁ tu na nirodhādanyena lakṣayitumasaṁprajñātaḥ śakyate । nirodha eva tu tasya lakṣaṇam, anyasyābhāvāt । saṁprajñātasya tvasādhāraṇavitarkādilakṣaṇalakṣyatvāt । yathā sparśalakṣaṇamityukte vāyurevāsādhāraṇyāllakṣyate sparśavatvena, atha ca vidyata eva sparśavatvaṁ tejaḥ:prabhṛtiṣvapi ॥
evaṁ ca sati yogagrahaṇamanuvādamātram । ata eva ca sarvagrahaṇaṁ na kṛtaṁ sūtre । nirodhagrahaṇenaivāsaṁprajñātalakṣaṇatve siddhe yadi sarvagrahaṇaṁ kriyeta, tatsaṁprajñātasya yogatāṁ nivārayet । tasmādasaṁprajñātasyaivedaṁ lakṣaṇam । tathā copasaṁharati bhāṣyakāraḥ-’na tatra kiṁcit saṁprajñāyate ityasaṁprajñātaḥ, sa yogaścitavṛttinirodha' iti ।
[cittaṁ hi prakhyāpravṛtti.āsthitiśīlatvāt triguṇamiti] । tatra cittaṁ triguṇamiti vyākhyāyate, prakhyāpravṛttisthitiśīlavāditi hetuḥ । prakhyā prakhyānaṁ prakāśanaṁ, sa hi । sattvaguṇasya dharmaḥ । pravṛttiḥ pravartanaṁ vyāpāraḥ, sa hi rajodharmaḥ । sthitiḥ sthānaṁ varaṇaṁ pratibandha iti, sa ca tamodharmaḥ । evaṁśīlāḥ hi sattvādayo guṇāḥ, cittaṁ ca prakhyādiśīlaṁ, tasmāt trayāṇāṁ guṇānāṁ pariṇāmaścittaṁ bhavitumarhati ।

prakhyārūpaṁ hi cittasattvaṁ rajastamobhyāṁ saṁsṛṣṭamaiśvaryaviṣayapriyaṁ bhavati। tadeva tamasā'nuviddhamadharmājñānāvairāgyānaiśvayopagaṁ bhavati। tadeva prakṣīṇamohāvaraṇaṁ sarvataḥ pradyotamānamanuviddhaṁ rajomātrayā dharmajñānavairāgyaiśvaryopagaṁ bhavati।

vivaraṇam
[prakhyāsvarūpaṁ hi cittasatvamiti] । hiśabdaḥ prasiddhāvadyotanārthaḥ । prasiddhaṁ hi loke śāsre ca sarvavabhāsakatvaṁ cittasya । cittameva satvaṁ cittasatvaṁ sattvapradhānaguṇapariṇāmatvāt ॥
[prakhyāsvarūpaṁ hi cittasattvamiti] ॥
[rajastamobhyāṁ saṁsṛṣṭaṁ] samapradhānābhyāṁ yadā saṁsṛṣṭaṁ tadānīṁ
[tattamasānuviddhaṁ ॥] tadeva prakhyāsvarūpaṁ cittaṁ yadā guṇabhūtarajaskenodbhūtena tamasānuviddhaṁ, tadānīmadharmadicatuṣṭayaviṣayā vṛttayaḥ kliṣṭā jāyante ॥
[tadeva prakṣīṇamohāvaraṇamiti ॥] nyagbhūtatamaskaṁ tamaḥkṣayādeva jaladharāpagamādiva (pari)ravibimba sarvataḥ pradyotamānaṁ

tadeva rajoleśamalāpetaṁ svarūpapratiṣṭhaṁ sattvapuruṣānyatākhyātimātraṁ dharmameghadhyānopagaṁ bhavati। tatparaṁ prasaṁkhyānamityācakṣate dhyāyinaḥ। citiśaktirapariṇāminyapratisaṁkramā darśitaviṣayā śuddhā cānantā ca sattvaguṇātmikā ceyamatoviparītā vivekakhyātiriti। atastasyāṁ viraktaṁ cittaṁ tāmapi khyātiṁ niruṇaddhi। tadavasthaṁ saṁskāropagaṁ bhavati। sa nirbījaḥ samādhiḥ। na tatra kiṁcitsaṁprajñāyata ityasaṁprajñātaḥ। dvividhaḥ sa yogaścittavṛttinirodha iti ॥ 2 ॥

vivaraṇam
[rajo[leśa]malopetaṁ svarūpapratiṣṭhaṁ] kevalena svena prakhyārūpeṇāvasthitaṁ, tadā
[prasaṁkhyānamityācakṣate] , dhyāyino yoginaḥ ॥
[cittaśaktirityādi] ॥ citireva śaktiḥ
['pariṇāminī ।] vyavasthite dharmiṇi dharmāntaratirobhāvena dharmāntaraprādurbhāvaḥ pariṇāmaḥ । na pariṇamituṁ śīlamasyā ityapariṇāminī । ata eva
[darśitaviṣayā] darśito'ntaḥkaraṇena viṣayo'syā iti । tenaiva
yadi vā khyātyā saṁbadhyate khyātiḥ sattvaguṇātmiketi । ata: citiśakteruktalakṣaṇāyā viparītā vilakṣaṇā vivekakhyāti: pariṇāmādimatī ॥
[tasyāṁ viraktaṁ] aparaktaṁ
[tadavasthaṁ] nirodhāvasthaṁ,
tadavasthe cetasi viṣayābhāvādbuddhibodhātmā puruṣaḥ kiṁsvabhāva iti –
tadā draṣṭuḥ svarūpe'vasthānam ॥ 3 ॥
svarūpapratiṣṭhā tadānīṁ citiśaktiryathā kaivalye। vyutthānacitte tu sati tathā'pi bhavantī na tathā ॥ 3 ॥

vivaraṇam
[tadavasthe cetasītyādi ॥] 
[tadavasthe] -nirodhāvasthe ।
[vyutthānacitte tu sati tathāpi bhavantīti ।] [anena] anyatrāpi svarūpapratiṣṭhatvaṁ darśayati ॥
na tathetyanena tadeti viśeṣaṇasyārthavattvaṁ khyāpayati ॥ 3 ॥
kathaṁ tarhi, darśitaviṣayatvāt –
vṛttisārupyamitaratra ॥ 4 ॥

vyutthāne yāścittavṛttayastadaviśiṣṭavṛttiḥ puruṣaḥ। tathā ca sūtram – “ekameva darśanaṁ khyātireva darśanam” iti। cittamayaskāntamaṇikalpaṁ saṁnidhimātropakāri dṛśyatvena svaṁ bhavati puruṣasya svāminaḥ। tasmāccittavṛttibodhe puruṣasyānādiḥ saṁbandho hetuḥ ॥ 4 ॥

vivaraṇam
[kathaṁ tarhi] iti ॥ itara āha--
[vyutthāna] iti ॥ nirodhādanyatra yāścittasya kliṣṭādayo vṛttayaḥ tābhiraviśiṣṭā sadṛśī vṛttiḥ svarūpamasya, cittavṛttivyatirekeṇa svarūpavyatirekeṇa ca puruṣasya vṛtyabhāvāt sadā jñātaviṣayatve pariṇāmānupapatteśca ।
[ekameva darśanaṁ] -buddhipuruṣayoḥ । kiṁ tadityāha--
[na tatsvābhāsaṁ dṛśyatvāt] ' ityatraiva pariharaṁ vakṣyāmaḥ ।
nanu ca yadi cittaparivijṛmbhitamevedaṁ sarvaṁ puruṣaścedudāste kathamasau bhokteti ? na-kārakavaicitryāt । kānicidvyāpriyamāṇāni kārakāṇi, kānicidyāpārādṛte sannidhimātreṇa kartṛtvaṁ pratipadyante ॥
yathā pacatītyadhiśrayaṇādiṣu vyāpriyamāṇaḥ puruṣaḥ kartetyucyate । sthālī sambhavadhāraṇābhyāmavyāpriyamāgaiva pacatītyucyate । tathā sthālīmadhyagatamākāśamavakāśe dadāti, na tasya vyāpāraṁ pratīmaḥ । ।
[cittamayaskāntamaṇikalpamiti ॥] 
yasyāpyātmamanassaṁyogāt jñānamutpadyate, tasyāpi jñānena jñeyaṁ vyāpnuvannātmā jñātetyucyate, na vyāpriyamāṇaḥ । jñānama(syā)pi guṇatve sati niṣkriyatvādātmana evārthaṁ darśayati । nāpi kriyānabhyupagamāt jānātītyādi nopapadyate । jñānena hi jñeyaṁ vyāpnuvan jānātītyucyate ॥
kiṁ cānyat–ātmamanassaṁyogādapūrvajñānotpattau satyāmātmanastajjñānaṁ, na manasaḥ । ātmaiva jānāti, na mana iti ko heturbhavet ? athāpi syāt ātmanaḥ samavāyikāraṇatvāditi । naitadevaṁ, asiddhatvāt । yathaiva jñānamātmana iti sādhyaṁ, evamātmana eva samavāyikāraṇatvaṁ na manasa iti sādhyam, anātmasvarūpatve satyubhayasaṁyegajatvābhyupagamāt ॥
athāpi syāt-jñānāhitasaṁskārasyātma[naḥ]smṛtyekakartṛtvena pratisandhānadarśanāditi-na-tasyāpi sādhyatvāt । tatrāpi jñānasaṁskārasmṛtipratisandhānādīnyātmana eva, na manasa iti sādhanīyāni । phalena samānāśrayavādicchādīnāmiti cet-na-tatrapi tulyatvāt । saṁyogajatve satyātmanaḥ phalecchādīni, na manasa iti duḥsādhameva ॥
kiṁ cāsya jñānasyāpi jñeyatvābhyupagamādanavasthāprasaṅgaḥ । na hi jñānamanyena karaṇabhūtena jñānena vijñātuṁ śakyaṁ, tadapyanyena tadapyanyenelyaniṣṭaprasaṅgāt ॥
athānavasthāprasaṅgaparihārāya dūramapi gatvā kiṁcijjñānamādyaṁ vā jñānāntareṇa na gṛhyate svayamātmanaiva gṛhyata iti, tathā jñānavadarthasyāpi svayaṁ grahaṇaprasaṅgaḥ ॥
atha dīpavat svayamavabhāsate cāvabhāsayati ca avabhāsātmakatvāt, arthasyānavabhāsātmakatvādadoṣa iti cet-tathāpi prakāśasvarūpeṣvartheṣu vijñānenāgrahaṇaprasaṅgaḥ ।
atha jñānasyātmasamavetatvābhāsanarūpābhyāṁ svayaṁ grahaṇaṁ, bahiḥprakāśātmakānāṁ tu jñānaviparītadharmatvādadoṣa iti cet-tacca na-yadi cātmasamavetatvaṁ prakāśātmakatvaṁ ca jñānasya svayaṁgrahaṇe hetuḥ syāt sarve sarvajñāḥ prāpnuvanti ॥
atha grāhyākāratvamapi kāraṇaṁ cet---tacca na ; anyasya jñānasyānyākāratayā karaṇatve yathā, tathā jñānasyapi grāhyasyānyākaraṇānyadeva jñāne karaṇaṁ syāt, tathā cānavasthā duṣpariharaiva ॥
kiṁ cānyat---na hi kaścit svayaṁgrāhyagrāhakatvaprasādhanāya dṛṣṭānto vidyate, pradīpasyāpi cakṣurādigrāhyatvāt । na cāpyaṁśadvayamasti jñānasya, niravayavatvāt । satyapi cāṁśadvaye tayoḥ prakāśātmakatvānnānyonyagrāhyagrāhakabhāvaḥ pradīpayoriva dvayoḥ ॥
kiṁ cānyat-jñānasya grāhyagrāhakatvābhyupagame satyātmasadbhāvo'pi dussampāda eva । tasmādarthākārajñānasmṛtipratisandhānaprayatnecchādīnāmanātmadharmatvaṁ grāhyatvāt rūpādīnāmiva । parārthatvācca saṅghātāśrayatvaṁ rūpādinidarśanenaiva । tathā āśrayavattvādanityatvācca prayatnapūrvakatvāccetyevamādibhyo'nātmadharmatvasiddhiḥ ॥
[ayaskāntamaṇikalpam ॥] ayaskāntamaṇiriva । yathā ayaskāntamaṇirayasaḥ svātmavyāptiṁ pratyupakaroti sannidhimātreṇa, tathā cittamapi citsvarūpasyātmanaḥ svātmavyāptiṁ pratyupakaroti dṛśyatvena ॥
[cittamayaskāntamaṇikalpamiti ॥] atha cittavṛttīnāṁ bodhe ko hetuḥ puruṣasyeti ? ucyate - yasmādevaṁ
tāḥ punarniroddhavyā bahutve sati cittasya –
vṛttayaḥ pañcatayyaḥ kliṣṭākliṣṭāḥ ॥ 5 ॥

kleśahetukāḥ karmāśayapracaye kṣetrībhūtāḥ kliṣṭāḥ। khyātiviṣayā guṇādhikāravirodhinyo'kliṣṭāḥ। kliṣṭapravāhapatitā apyakliṣṭāḥ। kliṣṭacchidreṣvapyakliṣṭā bhavanti। akliṣṭacchidreṣu kliṣṭā iti। tathājātīyakāḥ saṁskārā vṛttibhireva kriyante। saṁskāraiśca vṛttaya iti। evaṁ vṛttisaṁskāracakramaniśamāvartate। tadevaṁbhūtaṁ cittamavasitādhikāramātmakalpena vyavatiṣṭhate pralayaṁ vā gacchatīti। tāḥ kliṣṭāścākliṣṭāśca pañcadhā vṛttayaḥ ॥ 5 ॥

vivaraṇam
[tāḥ punarniroddhavyāḥ bahutve] 'pi
[pañcatayya] iti । yadyapi kliṣṭākliṣṭā vṛttayo'nantāḥ, tathāpi
[khyātiviṣayāḥ] -khyātyāspadāḥ ।
[kliṣṭacchidreṣvapyakliṣṭāḥ] akliṣṭā eva
[saṁskarai] rapi
pramāṇaviparyayavikalpanidrāsmṛtaya ॥ 6 ॥
tatra
pratyakṣānumānāgamāḥ pramāṇāni ॥ 7 ॥

indriyapraṇālikayā cittasya bāhyavastūparāgāttadviṣayā sāmānyaviśeṣātmano'rthasya viśeṣāvadhāraṇapradhānā vṛttiḥ pratyakṣaṁ pramāṇam। phalamaviśiṣṭaḥ pauruṣeyaścittavṛttibodhaḥ। pratisaṁvedī puruṣa ityupariṣṭādupapādayiṣyāmaḥ।

vivaraṇam
[pramāṇaviparyayavikalpanidrāsmṛtaya iti ॥] 
[pratyakṣānumānāgamāḥ pramāṇāni ॥] pramāṇākhyā vṛttistridhaiva bhidyate । tatra pramāṇākhyāyāścittavṛtteḥ prathamo bhedaḥ pratyakṣam । atastallakṣaṇamevābhidhīyate । tatpūrvakatvāt bhedadvayasya ॥
atha svaviṣayasāmānyaviśeṣāvabhāsanasāmarthye śrotrādīnāṁ cittasya ca kiṁkṛtaṁ viśeṣāvadhāraṇaprādhānyamiti ?
ucyate-viśeṣapratibandhatvāt hānopādānādīnāṁ viśeṣāvadhāraṇapradhānanateti (tetyāha) । na sāmānyaṁ nāvadhāryate, guṇabhūtaṁ tu gṛhyata eva । yathā nīlaṁ rūpamiti nīlāvadhāraṇaprādhānye satyapi rūpameva nīlamiti guṇabhūtamavadhārayati । tathā du:khaśabdaḥ sukhaśabdo mūḍhaḥ śabda iti । tathā ca viśeṣāvadhāraṇapradhānā vṛttiriti hyupapadyate ॥
kiṁ ca-saṁśayaviparyayanimittatvācca sāmānyopalabdhe: । sāmānye hyupalabdhe bubhutsitaviśeṣasya saṁśayo jāyate, samupalabdhasāmānyānyasmṛtervā viparyayaḥ, samadhigataviśeṣasya tu saṁśayaviparyayau na sthitimupāśnuvāte, iti viśeṣāvadhāraṇapradhānatecyate ॥
yatrāpi sāmānyamevāvādidhārayiṣitaṁ gairiti vā aśva iti vā, tatrāpyanyataraparityāgenānyatarāvadhāraṇeti viśeṣāvadhāraṇapradhānataiva । sarvameva hi vastu vastvantarāpekṣayā sāmānyaṁ viśeṣaśca ॥
yasya punaḥ sāmānyamavastvadhyāropitamevoṣarāmbuvat, nendriyaviṣayāmiti, tasya pratiniyatasāmānyādhyāropaṇānupapattiḥ । na hyanupalabdhapūrvamukhye saṁbhavatyadhyāropaṇā, smṛtyasaṁbhavāt । na kadācidadṛṣṭamukhyodakasya salilādhyāropaṇamūṣareṣu vidyate । athāsmaranpyadhyāropayet rūpasvalakṣaṇe śabdatvādyāpyadhyasyet । athendriyāntaraviṣayavādrūpasvalakṣaṇe śavdatvādyadhyāso viruddha iti cet-na - avastutve satyaviśeṣāt । viśeṣābhyupagame ca vastutvaprasaṅgaḥ । śabdasvalakṣaṇādiva rūpasvalakṣaṇasya ॥
kiṁ cānyat-deśakālānyaviśiṣṭapratyakṣā [na] bhyupagame samastalokavyavahāravilepaḥ syāt । na hīdamahamamuṣminnavakāśe kāle cāsminnādrākṣametasmānnimittādevaṁviśeṣaṇamiti ca smṛtyupapattiḥ । na ca pratyakṣādṛṣṭeṣu viśeṣyavadviśeṣaṇeṣu smṛti: saṁbhavati । na ca kalpanāpoḍhena vyavahāragocarātītena vyavaharamāṇo dṛśyate । tasmāllokaprasiddhapratyakṣānusaraṇameva nyāyyam ॥
[phalaṁ tadaviśiṣṭaḥ pauruṣeyaścittavṛttibodha] ' iti ॥ evaṁ ca sati sukharāgādijñānasya kliṣṭākliṣṭarūpasya tadaviśiṣṭapuruṣapratyayaphalāvasānatvāt pratyakṣatā siddhaiva ॥
*atredamavadheyam---
ādarśakaśe 20 “pranāḍī” ityetadupari 25 ‘napekṣya sambandhaḥ sambandhatāmiyāt । yadasau prasiddhavaccocyate ya’ iti ityupakramya 34 ‘smṛtyavasānā hi sā, yataḥ pramā ityantagranthaṁ daśābhiḥ puṭairvilikhya, tadupari 20 ‘‘pūrvatvāt pramāṇāntaratvamabhyupetavyaṁ, pratyakṣatvaṁ vā vaktavyam” ityupakramya 25 ‘‘tasmāt pramāṇaphalānabhijñānām abhimānamātrameva kevalaṁ paṇḍitaṁmanyānāmityupekṣaṇīyamiti” ityantaṁ ṣaḍbhiḥ puṭairvilikhya, tataḥ 25 ‘‘anumānamathocyate” ityādi 25 ‘‘kaḥ sambandhaḥ, kayorvā, na hi sambandhināva” ityantaṁ vilikhya paṅkticatuṣṭayena, tataḥ 34 ‘‘rṇena prabādhyate, abhūtārthādiviṣayatvāt” ityādivākyaṁ likhitaṁ dṛśyate । kośāntarañca na labhyate । yathāmātṛkaṁ mudraṇe ca vākyānāmananvayaḥ-na hi 20 ‘‘pranāḍī” ityanena 25 ‘‘napekṣya sambandhaḥ sambandhatāmiyāt ?” ityanveti । na ca 25 ‘‘kaḥ sambandhaḥ kayorvā, na hi sambandhināva?? ityanena 34 ‘‘rṇena prabādhyate” iti cānveti । evaṁ pratyakṣapramāṇānarūpaṇamupakramya tadaparisamāpyaiva madhye'numānāgamapramāṇayornirūpaṇaṁ, tato viparyayanirūpaṇaṁ, punaḥ pratyakṣapramāṇanirūpaṇaśeṣaḥ, tataḥ anumānanirūpaṇopakramaḥ, tato viparyayanirūpaṇaśeṣaśca iti kramaḥ ādarśakośe dṛśyate । na cāyaṁ kramaḥ śobhate ॥ ‘‘anindriyapranāḍī pūrvatvāt pramāṇāntaratvamabhyupetavyam” iti; daśapuṭavyavāhitavākyadvayasya mitho yojane, ‘‘na hi sambandhināvanapekṣya sambandhaḥ sambandhatāmiyāt” iti, ṣoḍaśapuṣṭavyavahitavākyadvayasya mitho yojane, ‘‘smaryamāṇātadvastupratiṣṭhatvānna pramāṇaṁ, smṛtyavasānā hi sā, yataḥ pramāṇena prabādhyate । abhūtārthādāviṣayatvāt” iti ca ṣaṭpuṭavyavahitavākyadvayasya mithe yojane cānveti । yathākramaṁ pramāṇatrayanirūpaṇaṁ, tato viparyayānarūpaṇamiti ca sūtrānusārī bhāṣyānusārī ca kramo'nusṛto bhavati, iti paryālocya mahatā prayāsena mātṛkāgranthavākyānāṁ sanniveśaviparyāsaḥ kṛtaḥ । tatra sūkṣmekṣikayā guṇadoṣau pariśīlanīyau । “pranāḍī” ityāderadhaḥ aṅkitāḥ (20-25-34) iti puṭasaṅkhayāḥ mudritaitatkośānusāriṇyaḥ ॥
[tārakaṁ sarvaviṣayaṁ sarvathāviṣayamakramaṁ ceti vivekajaṁ jñānam’] iti । tasmānnāvadhāryate indriyapranāḍikayaiveti ॥
[bāhyavastūparāgāditi] viparyayanivṛtyartham । viśeṣāvadhāraṇapradhānatvena saṁśayanivṛttiriti ।
tatra keṣāṁcit phalaṁ tadeva pramāṇam । apareṣāṁ tu pramāṇādanyat(tra) pramāṇavyaktyantaram (re) । yathā ghaṭavijñānasya pramāṇasya hānopādānepekṣābuddhayaḥ phalamiti । guṇade.oṣatadubhaya(vadabhava)śūnyatvaviṣayatvādupādānādibuddhīnāṁ pramāṇabhūtaghaṭa- vijñānādatyantabhedaḥ । tataścānyaviṣayasya pramāṇasya anya(prameyasya)viṣayapramāṇa(ṇe)vyaktyantaraṁ (re)phalamiti ॥
na hi khadiracchedanasya khadiropādānaṁ tatparityāgo vā phale bhavituṁ yuktam । vi(api)yogasaṁbandhaphalatvāt tyāgopādānayoḥ । na ca phalasya phalaṁ sambhavati । dvaidhībhāvaphalavyavahitatvāca ॥
kiṁ ca-phalasya cet phalaṁ kriyānapekṣāprasaṅgaḥ । phalārthaṁ hi kriyāpekṣyate । taccetphalaṁ vināpi kriyayā phalādapi sidhyati, (atohya) tato na hyanekāyāsāpekṣitaniṣpattikriyāmanutiṣṭhet । sādhanānveṣaṇānupapattiśca । kriyāyā abhāvāt ॥
nāpi kriyaiva phalaṁ, kriyānuparamaprasaṅgāt । phalāvasānā hi (pi) kriyā । kriyāyāśca phalatve phalānabhilāṣitvaprasaṅgaḥ । tasyā duḥkhatvāt ॥
[phalaṁ tadaviśiṣṭa ityādi । tadaviśiṣṭaḥ] tayā pramāṇākhyayā vṛttyā aviśiṣṭa: tulyaḥ tadākāratvena,
nanu ca bhavato'pyupacaritameva phalam vṛttyaviśiṣṭatāyāḥ phalatvenābhyupagamāt , puruṣasya ca śuddhatvāt, tadākāratāyā anṛtatvam । na hi sphaṭikamaṇeralatakopadhānākāratā satyā ॥
bāḍham-tathāpi tvetadeva phalaṁ mukhyam, dṛṣṭatvāt । mukhyaphalāntarādarśanāt । sarvasyaiva kriyākārakajātasyaitatphalārthatvāt । etadavasānaṁ hi tatsarvam । tathā ca pradarśitam ॥

yeṣāmamithyā phalaṁ, teṣāṁ vairāgyakāraṇābhāvāt samyagdarśanānveṣaṇānupapattermokṣābhāvaḥ । na ca kriyāpariniṣpādyo mokṣaḥ, anityatvaprasaṅgāt ॥

ye cāpīndriyārthasannikarṣasya pratyakṣatvamabhyupayanti, na teṣāmapi samyagabhyupetaṁ, sannikarṣasya kriyāphalatvāt । sannikarṣaśca saṁyogaḥ । sa ca kriyājastairiṣyate । yato yadupajāyate tattasya pramāṇam । tacca tasya phalaṁ yadupajāyate ॥
phalamapi sannikarṣe jñānaṁ prati pramāṇamiti cet-tacca na-jñāpakapramāṇaprastāve kārakapramāṇopanyāsasyāyuktatvāt । sannikarṣe hi jñānasyotpādako na tasya jñāpakaḥ । prameyādhigamāya hi pratyakṣādīnyupanyastāni, na jñānotpattikāraṇam । tatprakriyāyāma(yānya)prakṛtaṁ prakriyata ॥
athāpi syāt-jñānasyāpi prameyatvāttaccāpyutpadyamānaṁ pramīyata iti, tadutpattikāraṇasya sannikarṣasya jñāpakatvameveti-tacca na-jñānaṁ jñānenaiva jñāyeta, teṣāṁ tathābhyupagamāt । na ca sannikarṣo jñānam । jñānotpādakatvenābhyupagamāt ॥
atha jñānasya jñāne sannikarṣo nimittatvāt pramāṇamiti cedadṛṣṭeśvarecchāviṣayanimeṣonmeṣādīnāmapi nimittatvāt pramāṇatve kaḥ pradveṣaḥ ? na ca jñānasya jñeyatve ātmanaśca svabhāvacidrūpatvānabhyupagama śakyā anavasthā parihartum ॥
atha ātmasamavetamātratayaiva jñānasya jñeyatā, na jñānāntaramapekṣyate yenātiprasajyeteti cet-asyāpyanyat pratyakṣalakṣaṇaṁ vācyam anindriyasannikarṣādilakṣaṇatvādātmani jñānasamavāyatvasya । sannikarṣasya ca jñānotpattiphalatvāttadutpattivyavadhāne sati tasya jñānena nānantaryam ॥
tasmāttadānantaryeṇāpi na sannikarṣaphalatvaṁ jñānasya । tathā hānādibuddhīnāmapi rūpādijñānaphalatvānupapattiruktā ॥
vyabhicārācca । yathaikasminnaṅganādipiṇḍaviṣaye jñāne samāne bahūnāmutpane kasyacidupādānabuddhiḥ, anyasya heyabuddhiḥ, kasyacidubhayābhāvaḥ, tatra hānopādānabuddhivyabhicarati । anyataranaikameva jñānaṁ tadevībhayaṁ vyabhicaralyupe । kṣakasya । yacca yadyabhicarati na tattasya phalam ॥
kiṁ ca-hānepādānābhāvamātratvādabhāva evopekṣā । na cābhāvaḥ pramāṇasya vastunaḥ phalaṁ bhavitumarhati । rāgadveṣābhyāṁ copādānaparityāgabuddhī । tadabhāvāt kāraṇābhāve kāryābhāva iti pramāṇavijñāne satyapi hānopādānabuddhyabhāva evopekṣeti vyabhicārānna hānādibuddhiphalatvam ।
kiṁ ca-rāgadveṣatadabhāvanāmabhyupādānādibuddhiphalatve pramāṇatvaprasaṅgaḥ । pauruṣeyacittavṛttibodhaphalatve tu na kiñcidvirudhyata iti ॥
nanu ca cittavṛtteḥ sevedyatvamasiddham । na hi karaṇameva karma bhavati । na hi dātrameva lūyate । naiṣa doṣaḥ । kriyākārakayorbhinnadharmatvāt । kriyānirvṛttiṁ prati sambhūya kārakāṇi vyāpriyante parasparaṁ viṣayaviṣayibhāvena । kriyā tu sattāmātreṇaiva phalaheturiti karaṇatvamasyāmupacaryate, na kārakavat । kurvaddhi kārayediti kriyādhikārakaṁ syānna bhūtaṁ bhavyāyopadiśyeta ॥
kiṁ ca-anavasthāprasaṅgaśca । kriyā cet । karaṇaṁ syāt , tannirvartyayā cānyayā kriyayā bhavitavyam । na hyanyāṁ kriyāmantareṇa tasyāḥ kāraṇatvaṁ ghaṭate । yāpi cānyā sāpi kāraṇaṁ syādanyasyāḥ kriyāyāḥ । sāpyanyasyā ityanavasthā । tataśca kriyāsantānānuparamāt phalānabhinirvṛttiḥ । tatrāntyā cet । kriyāntareṇa vinā phalaheturbhavet, prathamasya tathātve kaḥ pradveṣaḥ ? cittavṛttestvabhivyañjakatvāt saṁvedyatetyadoṣaḥ ।
dṛśyate cābhivyañjakānāṁ svarūpasaṁvedyatayaiva karaṇatvaṁ pradīpādīnām । tathā cittavṛtterapi । cakṣurādiṣvabhivyañjakatve'pi agrahaṇādvyabhicāra iti cet, samāna (cetanasamāna) jātīyasaṁkarāt katham ॥
yeṣāṁ tāvadbhautikānīndriyāṇi, teṣāṁ cakṣuṣastaijasatvāt bāhyenālokena tulyajātīyena vyatibhedāt gṛhyamāṇasyaivāvivekaḥ । yathā pradīpānāṁ bahūnāṁ prabhāvyatibhedāt kasya kā prabheti na vivicyate । tathā śrotrādiṣvapi ॥
yeṣāmapyabhautikāni, teṣāmapyabhivyañjakatvena samānajātīyatā vṛtterabhivyañjakatvādagrahaṇamiti । tanna-prāptacaitanyopagrahatayā'vibhāvyatvādavyavahitatvācca । sarvagatatve'pyātmanaḥ sūkṣmatvena svacchataratvena ca citenāvyavadhānācca grahaṇaṁ cittavṛttestasmāccittavṛttipramāṇenaiva tadākāratayā pauruṣeyo'pi bodhaḥ sevedyamāna eva phalamiti siddham ॥
yeṣāṁ puna: pratyakṣeṇāsaṁvedyā cittavṛttisteṣāṁ phalagrahaṇapramāṇābhāva: ! phale ca gṛhīte jñānāsiddhatvasyārthāpattiḥ । na ca phalaṁ gṛhyate pramāṇavyāpārānabhyupagamāt । tadabhyupagame cānavasthāprasaṅgaḥ ! yatphalāvagrahaṇāya pramāṇamabhyupagamyate tasyāpyanyat phalaṁ tatpramāṇasyāpyanyaditi na kvacidavatiṣṭheta ॥
[॥] 
atha agṛhyamāṇamapi tadeva jñānaṁ pramāṇaṁ phalasyāpīti cet-na- abhivyañjakadharmavyatikramāt । na hyabhivyañjakaṁ gṛhyamāṇamabhivyañjayaddṛṣṭam । na hyulkā giriśikhare'pi nijaṁ dharmamatikrāmati ॥
athābhivyañjayadeva phalaṁ pratyapi pramāṇamiti cet-siddhaṁ tarhīpsitamasmākam । rāgādīnāṁ vṛttiviśeṣaṇatvena grahaṇopapatteḥ । rakto'haṁ dviṣṭo'hamiti yadyahaṁpratyayaviśeṣaṇaṁ, tadapi vṛttibhāvābhāvitvenaiva grahaṇādvṛttiviśaṣaṇānāṁ rāgādīnāṁ grahaṇamupapadyate । a(tenā)nyathā rūpādivanmānāntarāpekṣatvaprasaṅgāt । tataścānavastheti । tasmātpramāṇaphalānabhijñānāmabhimānamātrameva kevalaṁ paṇḍitaṁmanyānā mityupekṣaṇīyamiti ॥

anumeyasya tulyajātīyeṣvanuvṛtto bhinnajātīyebhyo vyāvṛttaḥ saṁbandho yastadviṣayā sāmānyāvadhāraṇapradhānā vṛttiranumānam। yathā deśāntaraprāptergatimaccandratārakaṁ caitravat, vindhyaścāprāptiragatiḥ। āptena dṛṣṭo'numito vā'rthaparatrasvabodhasaṁkrāntaye śabdenopadiśyate, śabdāttadarthaviṣayā vṛttiḥ śroturāgamaḥ। yasyāśraddheyārtho vaktā na dṛṣṭānumitārthaḥ sa āgamaḥ plavate। mūlavaktari tu dṛṣṭānumitārthe nirviplavaḥ syāt ॥ 7 ॥

vivaraṇam
[anumeyasya tulyajātīyeṣvanuvṛtta iti । anumeyasya] [jijñāsita]dharmaviśiṣṭasya । taddharmavattayā
['anumeyasya tulyajātīyeṣvanuvṛttaḥ'] ityādinaivoktatvāt । na hyanumeyenāsaṁbaddhaṁ liṅginā tatsadṛśajātīyeṣvanuvartate, bhinnajātīyebhyo vā nivartate । tasmāt ya iti ca prasiddhameva saṁbandhamanuvadati ॥
[tadviṣayā] -evamanvayavyatirekaviśiṣṭasaṁbandhasaṁbandhiviṣayā
[yathā deśāntaraprāptergatimaccandratārakaṁ caitravaditi ॥] yadyapi lakṣaṇābhidhānamātreṇa tadabhivyaktiḥ, tathāpyudāharaṇapratyudāharaṇapradarśanādatitarāmityudāharaṇapratipādanam । tatra gatimaccandratārakamiti candratārakasya gatimattvamanumeyam । tatsamānajātīyeṣvanuvṛttā deśāntaraprāptirgatimatsu caitrādiṣu, bhinnajātīyebhyaścāgatebhyo vindhyādibhyo vyāvṛtteti avyabhicarantī । nityaṁ gatimatā saṁbandhāt ।
tasmāditthaṁjātīyakamavinābhāvena saṁbaddhaṁ saṁbandhyantaraṁ gamayati । yathā vadhyaghātaka(kṛdi)kāryakāraṇādi ॥
bhavatu tāvadaviruddhānāṁ nityasaṁbandhāddeśāntaraprātaptyādīnāṁ gamyagamakatā, vadhyaghātakodīnāṁ tu saṁbandhābhāve kathamityucyate gamyagamakabhāvaḥ (bhāvena) ?
tatrāpi nityasaṁbandhādadoṣaḥ । na hyanyatrāpi prāptilakṣaṇaḥ saṁbandho'bhipreyate । sāmānyato dṛṣṭā(nu)bhāvaprasaṅgāt । na hi candratārakādiṣu deśāntaraprāpte: prāptilakṣaṇasaṁbandhaḥ pratyakṣeṇa gṛhyate । agṛhyamāṇaścedgamakaḥ sarvaṁ sarvasya gamakaṁ syāt । na hi kiṁcitkenacidasaṁbaddham, ākāśādīnāṁ sarvatra bhāvāt ॥
tasmādgamyagamakabuddhyutpattihetureva saṁbandho'numānaviṣaye । tathā ca vadhyaghātakayorapi anyatara(rā)bhāvadarśane'nyatarābhāvo gamyata ityanumānameva । yasyāpyucite deśe abhāvadarśanādanyatra bhāvo gamyate । yathā ghātakadarśanena vadhyābhāvo'numīyate । caitrasya jīvato gṛhe , abhāva(gṛhyabhāva)darśane bahirbhāvaśvati ।
nanu cābhāvārthāpattī ete, nānumāne, (na) lakṣaṇāsaṅgateḥ, gavādivat ॥ na-yathoktalakṣaṇopapatteḥ- vadhyaghātakayorvirodhalakṣaṇaḥ saṁbandhaḥ । yatra yatra ghātakabhāvastatra tatra vadhyābhāva evetyavinābhāvaḥ । na hi vadhyasyābhāvaṁ ghātaka(ka)bhāvo vyabhicarati । vadhyasya vā bhāve ghātaka(ka)bhāvam, agnibhāvamiva dhūmabhāvaḥ ॥
kathaṁ punaravagamyate ghātakabhāvadarśanādeva tadgocare vadhyasyābhāvabuddhiriti ? na punaḥ sadupalambhakapramāṇānāṁ ghātaka iva vadhye vyāpārābhāvāditi ॥
ucyate-ghātakabhāve vyāpṛ(pyāvṛ)tapramāṇasyeva vadhyābhāvabudhyutpati:, dhūmabhāve vyāpṛ(vṛ)tapramāṇasyevāgnibhāvabuddhyutpatti:, tathā ghātakaviśeṣavyāpṛ(vṛ)tapramāṇasya vadhyaviśeṣābhāvabuddhyutpattiḥ, dhūmaviśeṣavyāpṛ(vṛ)tapramāṇasyevāgniviśeṣabuddhiriti । abhāvapramāṇavādinastu sarvatra pramāṇābhāvasyāviśiṣṭatvādvirodhiviśeṣa darśanānuvidhānaṁ virodhyantarābhāvadarśanasyānupapannaṁ, liṅgaviśeṣānuvidhānamiva liṅgiviśeṣadarśanasya । na hi sadupalambhakapramāṇavyāpārābhāvasya kaścidviśeṣaḥ, yena viśeṣabuddhistadviśeṣamanuvidhīyate ॥
atha jijñāsite viśeṣe sadupalambhakapramāṇābhāvāditi cet-tanna-asataḥ smṛtīcchādisahabhāvāpekṣānupapatte: । na hyasat sahāyāpekṣayā kāryaṁ nirvartayaddṛṣṭaṁ śaśaviṣāṇādi । dṛṣṭamiheti cet-na-vipratipattisthānatve dṛṣṭāntābhāvāt । tulyamiti cet-na-ghaṭādeḥ sato'pekṣādarśanāt ॥
na cāpi nirvyāpārasyāvastutvādabhāvasya pramāṇabhāvo yuktaḥ । na hi nirastavyāpārakaṁ kiṁcit kāryārambhakaṁ dṛśyate loke । tasmādvyāpārarūpapramāṇajanitā prameyābhāvabuddhiḥ, prameyaviṣayatvāt ghaṭādibuddhivat । tathā ca vastutvāt pravṛttinivṛttihetutvāt । vipakṣaḥ śaśaviṣāṇādiḥ । tathā abhāva[pramā]pramāṇā(ṇa)bhāvajanitā na bhavati, yathā'bhihitahetudṛṣṭāntadarśanāt । (nena) ॥
ghātakadarśanaṁ vadhyābhāvabuddherliṅgaṁ tadbhāvabhāvitvādagnyādibuddhinimittadhūmādibuddhivat saṁśayanivartakatvācca । vadhyābhāvabuddhirvā liṅgajanitā niścayarūpatvādagnibuddhibaditi ॥
iha ghaṭo nāstīti kila nānumānaṁ liṅgaliṅgisaṁbandhāgrahaṇāt । na hi yathā'gnyādibuddherdhūmādiliṅgānveṣaṇaṁ tatheha nāsti ghaṭa ityatra liṅgānveṣaṇamasti । progava liṅgānveṣaṇāt budhyutpatteḥ ॥
naiṣa doṣaḥ । ihapratyayākārasyaiva liṅgatvāt । na hi prathamameva liṅgabudhyupajanane sati liṅgānveṣaṇaṁ bhavati । ihetyākāroparañjitā buddhirliṅgam । umuparañjakavyatiriktaghaṭādyabhāvabuddherghātakabuddhivadeva । virodhalakṣaṇa eva cātrāpi sambandhaḥ ॥
yatra punaraviruddhānyuparañjakāni tatrāstitvabuddheḥ । etenaivārthāpatteranumānatvaṁ vyākhyātamavinābhāvena saṁbandhena । tatrāpi jīvato hi devadattasya gṛhābhāve bahirbhāvaḥ, yadā gṛhe bhāvaḥ na tadā bahirbhāva ityanyatareṇānumānam । sākṣāt dṛśyamānabahirbhāvābhyantarābhāvatvaṁ dṛṣṭāntaḥ । vṛttyuparañjakānuparañjakatvena hyabhāvagrahaṇasyābhihito hetuḥ ॥
agnyādāvapi dahanādiśaktigrahaṇamanumānameva । kāryanirvarttakayoravinābhāvasaṁbandhasyātmani dṛṣṭatvādbhujyādau । dṛśyate hi pratyagātmāni śakto'hamidaṁ kāryaṁ kartumaśakto'hamityātmavadātmaviśeṣaṇasya śaktergrahaṇam । śaktinirvartyameva dahanādikāryamapīlyanumānasiddhiḥ ।
nanu cābhāvasya pratyakṣatāmupagāyati kecit । yathā kilādarśakena pradīpādinā sati gṛhyamāṇe vastuni na tadavayavini yadupalabhyate tannāstītyevaṁ sata: prakāśakaṁ pramāṇamasadapi prakāśayati । tathā codāharanti-anaṅkitaṁ vāsa ānayetyuktaḥ praviśya bhāṇḍāgāram aṅkitānaṅkitavāsassannidhāvaṅkitavāsograhaṇenaiva pratyakṣeṇāṅgābhāvaviśiṣṭaṁ vāsa upalabhyānayati । tasmāt pratyakṣa evābhāvo lakṣaṇāntarānupapatteriti ॥
tanna-buddhyākāreṇārthāvadhāraṇānṛtatvaprasaṅgāt । yadākārā hi buddhistasya pratyakṣāvadhriyamāṇātmatābhyupagamyate । yathā nīlaṁ vastu pītamityatrāpi viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyasaṁbandhapratyayo mithyāṁ prāpnoti । tadyatheha ghaṭo nāstīti ihapradeśasya ghaṭābhāvenāsati saṁbandhe saṁbandhapratyayaḥ ; na hi ghaṭābhāvasyehapradeśasya cā [prāpta]prāptilakṣaṇaḥ samavāyābhidhāno vā saṁbandhastairabhyupeyate । yatheha devadatta iti । tasmādabhāva(ve)pratyayava(yā)nnīlaṁ vastviti viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyasaṁbandhapratyayo'pi saṁbandhapratyayatvānmithyā prasajyeta ॥
yathā cāsatyapīhadeśaghaṭābhāvasaṁbandhe sabandhapratītistathaivānīle'pi vastunyasatyeva nīlatvasaṁbandhe nīlatvasaṁbandhapratyayaḥ prāpnoti, tathā saṁbandhiṣvapi । athāstyeva saṁbandhaḥ, dviṣṭhatā virudhyeta saṁbandhasya । abhāvasyāvastutvābhyupagamāt ।
athāpyekaśataṁ ṣaṣṭhyarthā iti yāvat ṣaṣṭhyarthaḥ saṁbandha iṣyeta, tadā dvividha eva saṁbandhaḥ samavāyākhyaḥ saṁyogākhyaśceti na yujyate ॥
athai(tatha)kaśatasyapi ṣaṣṭhyarthanāmubhayānta:pātitvamucyeta-na-abhāve'nyatarasyāpyasambhavāt ।
kiñca(ntva)nyat । iha nabhasi kusumaṁ nāstīti saṁbandhino nabhaso'pyapratyakṣatvāt gaganakusumābhāvasyāpratyakṣatvaṁ prāpnoti । athāpratyakṣatvameveti cedāpatitaṁ gaganakusumābhāvavadapratyakṣatvamiha bhūpradeśe ghaṭābhāvasyāpi । viśeṣo vaktavyaḥ ॥
atha vyomno'pratyakṣatvāditi-tanna-puṣpasya patato nabhasyastitvadarśanādvyomāpratyakṣatvamahetuḥ । yathaiva nipatatkusumasadbhāve vyomāpratyakṣatvamahetustathā sadbhāvaviruddhagrahaṇe'pyahetuḥ syāt । athākāśāpratyakṣatvādeveti cet, asaṁbandhamapi yatkiñcidvyavahitāpratyakṣatvādi so'pi hetuḥ syāt । atha nabhaḥkusumābhāvaḥ pratyakṣa iti cet-indriyārthasannikarṣānarthakyaṁ sarvatra prasajyeta । tathā ca satyasannikṛṣṭopalabdheḥ sarveṣāṁ sarvajñatvaṁ prasaktam ॥
athānumeyaṁ tatreti cet-nabha:kusumābhāvavadiha ghaṭābhāvasyāviśeṣādānumānikatva(kīya)meva siddham । evaṁ ca satyabhāvapramāṇavādino'pi vyavahitaviprakṛṣṭodakādāvanalādyabhāvasyānumeyatvādiha ghaṭabhāvo'pi tatsāmānyādanumānagrāhya eveti niścetuṁ yuktam ॥
[vindhyaścāprāptaragati] riti ca prayogāntaram । agatirvindhya iti pratijñānam । aprāpteriti hetuḥ । caitravaditi kākalocanavadubhayatra saṁbadhyate ।
athavaitasminprayoge vyatirekaviparyayadarśanena doṣābhāva ityupanyastam । lakṣaṇasya ca lakṣyaviśeṣeṇohyatvādadoṣaḥ ॥
[tena dṛṣṭo vā anumito vārthaḥ paratra] śrotṛviśeṣe
[śroturāgamaḥ] , na vaktuḥ । dṛṣṭānumitārtho hi vaktā, tasya laiṅgikamaindriyakaṁ vā tajjñānam । śrotureva tu śravaṇapūrvakaṁ niścitaṁ vijñānaṁ laiṅgikaindriyakavyatiriktam । sa
[yasya] āgamasya
[na dṛṣṭo'numito vārthaḥ] tena vaktrā । śiṣṭalokaprasiddhānyathāpratipādanāt buddhārhatādiḥ । na hi rāgādidoṣānupahatānta:karaṇa: prasiddhamanyathā nirvarṇayati ।
yadyapi pratyakṣānumānaviṣayābhāsadarśanaṁ svaśabdena na kṛtaṁ, tathāpyāgamābhāsopapradarśanenaiva pūrvatrāpi yathābhihitalakṣaṇaviparītatvena pratyakṣānumānābhāsādi draṣṭavyamarthāduktam ॥
[mūlavaktari tu] ādyavaktarīśvare tannimitte ya āgamaḥ sa viplavanimittābhāvānnirviplavaḥ syāt । yathārtha(ya)vaktṛvat ॥
upamānaṁ (mānaṁ) śabdapūrvakam । tadāgamāntaḥpatitvānna pramāṇāntaram । yathā gauriva gavaya iti vanecarābhihitādeva vākyādavadhṛtasādṛśyasya punarvane gavayadarśane'pi pūrvaśrutavākyopasthāpitasādṛśyasmaraṇamātrameva nādhikam । sādṛśyaṁ tu vākyādeva pūrvapratipannam ॥
nāpi saṁjñāsaṁjñisaṁbandhapratipattita eva mānaṁ, tasyā api tadvākyādevāvagatatvāt । na hi gaurityetāvatānavagatagavayanāmakasya vanagatagavayadarśino'pi gavayo'yamiti saṁjñāsaṁjñisaṁbandhāvabodho bhavati ॥
tasmādgauriva gavaya iti gavayaśabdo'pi tadvākye'pekṣitavyaḥ । tathā ca sati pūrvaśrutādeva vākyāt sarvaṁ pratītam । athāpi syādayaṁ(dasya)gavaya iti na pūrvabuddhaviṣayamiti-tadapi tatrabhavatāmapi paricodanaparihāramavapaśyatāmapi pīḍitakaivale[kaule]yakavṛttikoṇe'vasthānamiva lakṣyate ॥
tathā hi-deśakālasannikarṣaviprakarṣadibhedanānekopamānabheda: prasajyeta । tathāstviti cet-tatpūrvadhiyaivātatvamantarnihitasamastaviśeṣameva hi vā neyau pūrvamupapāditam । nahi gauriyukta deśakālādiviśeṣābhāve na gośabdādarthapratipati: ॥
kiṁ cānyat-na hi saṁjñāsaṁjñisaṁbandhapratipattirupamānaṁ, yena hyupamīyate tadupamānaṁ, sādṛśyajñānaṁ hi tat । na hi nāmināmasaṁbandhapratipattyā kiṁcidupamīyate uttarakālatvāt । avadhṛtasādṛśyasya hi paśvāda(sya)yaṁ gavaya ityevaṁ so'pi nipatati ॥
evaṁ tarhi syādaśabdapūrvakaṁ pramāṇāntaraṁ, yathā gavayadarśanādetatsadṛśo gauriti grāmīṇasya buddhiḥ-tadapi na-prameyābhāvāt । sati hi prameye sadupalambhakatvābhimatasya pramāṇasya vyāpāraḥ, na hi gogavayayorvyāvṛttamanuvṛttaṁ ca vastutaḥ sādṛśyaṁ nāmaikamasti ॥
nanu ca sādṛśyabuddhirasyeva, nāsau nirālambanā bhavitumahati । satyamevaṁ tatraiva vicāraṇā-kimasau vanayūthādipratyayavat ? atha ghaṭādibuddhivaditi । kiṁ cātaḥ ? yadi vanapratyayavadbhavettadā yathaiva viśiṣṭasanniveśānugatā mahīruhā evātmavyatirekeṇāvidyamānavanapratyayahetavastathaiva gogavayāvayavā eva dvayadarśanasmṛtyapekṣayā svātmavyatirekeṇāsataḥ sādṛśyasya pratītau kāraṇamiti prāptamavastutvam ॥
atha punarghaṭādipratyayavadvastutvaṁ pramāṇatvaṁ ca, tadā syāditi ॥
tatra kīdṛśaṁ vastviti vicāryate - kiṁ gogavayayoranuvṛttamekaṁ sādṛśyaṁ gotvagavayatvābhyāmanyat ? te eva vānyonyaviśiṣṭe, yadi vā tābhyāṁ bhinne gogavayādhāre dve sādṛśye parasparānapekṣe, sāpekṣe vā ?
kiṁ vyaktireva sā'nyatarajātiviśiṣṭā vā, kiṁ jātiḥ, sā cānyataravyaktiviśiṣṭā, vyaktidvayaviśiṣṭā vā, saṁbandho vaiteṣāṁ yathāvikalpayogamityekaikānyonyaviśiṣṭaviśeṣaṇatvādinā bhūyāṁso'nye'pi vikalpā udbhāvayitavyāḥ । tatra yadyekaṁ sādṛśyamubhayagataṁ, tadā nopameyatvamekatvāt, yathā gauriva gairiti ।
atha tenānyataravyaktirupamīyeta-naitadapi-svātmagatatvāt gauriva gotvena । atha tadvatyā vyaktyā vyaktyantaramupamīyeta-naitadapi-na hi gotvaṁ khaṇḍamuṇḍopameyatvakāraṇam । atha dharmāntarāpekṣayā sādṛśyaṁ tadbuddheḥ kāraṇamiti, naṣṭaṁ tarhi sādṛśyaṁ, sa evāstu dharmaḥ tadbuddheḥ kiṁ te sādṛśyahatakena kalpitena ॥
kiṁ ca-sa cāpyapekṣyamāṇo dharmaḥ kimekaḥ sādṛśyavadubhayatra, atha bhinna ityevamādivikalpāḥ syurityasambhavaḥ pūrvavadeva । atha bhinnaṁ sādṛśyamucyeta-tacca na-bhedādeva, na hi bhavati gaurivāśva iti । yathaivaikaikatvādaghaṭamānatā tathā bahubhirapekṣyamāṇaiḥ । etena jātivyaktisambandhādayaḥ pūrvavikalpitāḥ pratyuktāḥ ॥
atha buddhyutpatyanyathānupapatyā sādṛśyakalpanā, satyevaṁ vanavivarapūrvadakṣiṇottarādibuddhiyogānyathānubhavāt [nyathānupapatyā]vastutvaṁ kiṁ na kalpyate । syādeṣā tava buddhirvṛkṣādaya eva tatra tadbuddhijanmahetava iti । yadyevaṁ mithyāpratyayo gavayena sadṛśī gauriti vanabuddhivat । atha ye vyāvṛttāḥ ka ihopamārtha: gaurivāśva iti । athobhaye'pi te'vayavā vyāvṛttānuvṛttātmānastaduddhihetavaḥ, tathāpi vanapratyayavadeva prāptam ॥
tasmāt parīkṣyamāṇaṁ nātivimardanakṣamamiti ta evāvayavā ubhayatre.opalabhyamānā bhūyāṁsaḥ sādṛśyabuddheḥ kāraṇaṁ vanabuddheriva pādapāḥ [iti] nopamānaṁ nāma pramāṇāntaramiti siddham ॥
nāpi prameyadvitvāt pramāṇadvitvakalpanam । kutaḥ ? pramāṇavaśādarthapratīteḥ । na hyarthavaśāt pramāṇakalpanā । yadi cārthavaśāt pramāṇakalpanā syāt, adhunā tanna śakyam, janānāmasarvajñatvāt । caityavandanāt svargo bhavatītyatra caityavandanasya svargahetutvabuddheḥ pratyakṣānumānāviṣayatvānmithyātvaṁ syāt । tadarthaṁ vā pramāṇāntarakalpanam ॥
atha sā buddhiranumānaphalamiti cet-pramāṇādanyatra phalaprasaṅgaḥ, evaṁ śa(ka)raṇatrayādivākyārthaviṣayabuddhirapīti ॥
nāpi cātra pramāṇalakṣaṇanirūpaṇatātparyaṁ, prasiddhapramāṇādivṛttinirodhābhyupāyābhipradarśanaparatvāt । ata eva na sūtrakāraḥ sūtrayāñcakāra । bhāṣyakāreṇa tu kiñciprasiddhānuvādamātramavalambitamiti tadanusaraṇena kimapi jalpitamiti ॥ 6 - 7 ॥
viparyayo mithyājñānamatadrūpapratiṣṭham ॥ 8 ॥
sa kasmānna pramāṇam? yataḥ pramāṇena bādhyate। bhūtārthaviṣayatvātpramāṇasya। tatra pramāṇena bādhanamapramāṇasya dṛṣṭam। tadyathā – dvicandradarśanaṁ sadviṣayeṇaikacandradarśanena bādhyata iti।

vivaraṇam
[viparyayo mithyājñānamiti] ॥
nanu nirodhasya prakṛtatvāttasya ca hānatvāddhānasya ca heyāpekṣatvāddheyasya cāvidyāmūlatvādavidyā ca viparyaya iti sa eva prādhānyena niroddhavyaḥ । tatprabhavatvāddheyasya । kāraṇanirodhe hi kāryamarthādeva niruddhaṁ syāt । tasmādviparyayaḥ prādhānyāt pramāṇāta pūrvaṁ vyākhyātavyaḥ ॥
satyamevamasyeva prāthamyaṁ viparyayasya nirodhanīyatayā, tathāpi guṇadoṣajñānāpekṣatvānnirodhaṁ prati puruṣapravṛtteḥ । pramāṇameva hi guṇadoṣajñānam । na hyapramāṇena viparyayasya duṣṭatvaṁ gamyate, nirodhatatphalasādhanāni vā jñāyante । tasmāt pramāṇavṛttereva prāthamyaṁ yuktam । jñāyete ca guṇadoṣau pramāṇeneti tadanantaraṁ viparyayābhidhānam । vṛtyantarāpekṣayā tu viparyayasya prāthamyam । tanmūlasvācca vṛttyantarāṇāṁ tannirodhapūrvamevānyanirodhopapatteḥ ॥
[viparyayo mithyājñāna] miti paryāyakathanam ।
saṁśayo hyubhayoridaṁ sāmānyamityevaṁ gṛhītasāmānyasya viśeṣameva bubhutsamānasya jāyata iti smṛtāvevāntarbhavati । yathā sthāṇuḥ kiṁ vā puruṣa iti gṛhītapūrvasyaiva viśeṣasya smarataḥ saṁśaye । jāyate, na tathā viparyayaḥ । anyatarasmaraṇamātreṇaivāvasitatvāt । tadyathā---sthāṇau purastādavasthite pariṇāhārohaṇādisāmānyamātropalambhena samupajātapuruṣasmaraṇasya puruṣa evāyamiti niścitā buddhirutpadyate ॥
[yataḥ pramāṇena prabādhyate] a(ā) bhūtārtha(rthādi)viṣayatvāt ! (ityataḥ pratiṣṭhatvādityetat) abhūto hi smaryamāṇo'rthastadā ! yadyevaṁ smṛtireva prāpnoti-na-viśiṣṭatvāt । upalabhyamānaṁ vastu nimitīkṛtyānyatra smṛtirjāyate yathānubhūtavastuviṣayā । na viparyayastathā । sannihitasāmānyamātre deśakālādiviśeṣānugate vastuni smaraṇaparyavasānatve satyapyayamiti viśeṣarūpeṇa viparyayapratyayo jāyate । tasmādevaṁ na pramāṇadharmoṁ nāpi smṛtidharma iti vṛtyantaratvam ॥
[tadyathā dvicandradarśanamiti ।] yathā kācakāmalādyupahatadarśanasyābhūtārthaviṣayatvāddhi dvicandradarśanasya
nanu ca dvicandramiti dvipūlī pañcapūlītivat dviguṇasamāsatvāt “dvigurekavacanam' iti pratilabdhe tadbhāvāt ‘akārāntottarapado dviguḥ striyāmiṣṭaḥ’ iti dvigorakārāntāt (iti) dvicandraśabdādīkāraḥ prāpnoti-naiṣa doṣaḥ-pātrādipratiṣedhāt । tatra cādiśabdasya prakāravacanatvāt । prakārasya ca śiṣṭaprayogānusāritvāt samādhipādaḥ prathamaḥ ।
seyaṁ pañcaparvā bhavatyavidyā, avidyāsmitārāgadveṣābhiniveśāḥ kleśā iti। eta eva svasaṁjñābhistamo moho mahāmohastāmisro'ndhatāmisra iti। ete cittamalaprasaṅgenābhidhāsyante ॥ 8 ॥

vivaraṇam
[sā ca pañcaparvā avidyāḥ sā] viparyayavṛtti
[avidyāsmitetyādi । eta eva] avidyādayaḥ kleśāḥ
śabdajñānānupātī vastuśūnyo vikalpaḥ ॥ 9 ॥

sa na pramāṇopārohī। na viparyayopārohī ca। vastuśūnyatve'pi śabdajñānamāhātmyanibandhano vyavahāro dṛśyate। tadyathā – caitanyaṁ puruṣasya svarūpamiti। yadā citireva puruṣastadā kimatra kena vyapadiśyate।

vivaraṇam
[śabdajñānānupātī vastuśūnyo vikalpaḥ ॥] śabdasya jñānaṁ śabdajñānama, vācyavācakaniyamena sādhvasādhuśabdajñānaṁ, tadanupatituṁ śīlamasyeti śabdajñānānupātī ।
[sa na pramāṇopārohīti ॥] na pramāṇāntaḥpāti.īṁ vastuśūnyatvāt । na hyāgamasya śabdajñānānupātitve'pi vastuśūnyatā । yataḥ śabdārthaviṣayā vṛttirāgamaḥ, vikalpastu vastuśūnyatvānna pramāṇam ॥
kiñca-vaktṛśrotrośca tulyo vikalpaḥ । dvayorapi śabdāduccaritādvikalpyaiva hi buddhirjāyate । na tathā āgame ॥ śrotureva hyāgama: । vaktā tu dṛṣṭānumitārthaḥ ॥
kiñca-nirvitarkasamāpannasya vikalpo vivartate nāgamaḥ । tasmānnapramāṇopārohī ॥
[na viparyayopārohīti ॥] kutaḥ ? śabdajñānānupātitvāt । na hi vastuśūnyatve'pi viparyayaḥ śabdajñānamapekṣate । yataḥ ‘‘
tasmādvastuśūnyatvagrahaṇena śabdajñānānupātitvagrahaṇena ca parasparasaṁbandhena pramāṇaviparyayābhyāṁ pramāṇaviparyayagandhamātrānuliptamapi bhinnaṁ vikalpākhyaṁ vṛtyantaraṁ darśitam । tadvadgandhānulepanādeva tadānantaryeṇa vikalpasyārambhaḥ । nāpi smṛtitvam । smṛte: kevalānubhūtāspadatvāt ॥
[vastuśūnyatve'pi śabdajñānamāhātmya[mātra]nibandhano vyavahāro dṛśyate] iti । mātragrahaṇa śabdajñānavyatiriktakāraṇābhāvakhyāpanārtham । kva dṛśyata iti cedāha-

bhavati ca vyapadeśe vṛttiḥ। yayā caitrasya gauriti। tathā pratiṣiddhavastudharmo niṣkriyaḥ puruṣaḥ, tiṣṭhati bāṇaḥ sthāsyati sthita iti, gatinivṛttau dhātvarthamātraṁ gamyate। tathā'nutpattidharmā puruṣa iti utpattidharmasyābhāvamātramavagamyate na puruṣānvayī dharmaḥ। tasmādvikalpitaḥ sa dharmastena cāsti vyavahāra iti ॥ 9 ॥

vivaraṇam
[vyapadeśe vṛttiḥ ॥] 
[pratiṣiddhavastudharmeti ।] vastuno dharmo vastudharmaḥ । pratiṣiddho vastudharmo'syeti
na hi pratiṣiddhāḥ sattvādidharmāḥ pratiṣiddhatvādevāsya puruṣasya saṁbandhino bhavanti । yena te puruṣeṇa asyeti vyapadiśyeran । tadabhāvamātrameva tu tatrārthaḥ । tathāpi yathā citrā gāvo'syeti vyapadeśe buddhiḥ tathā pratiṣiddhā vastudharmā asyeti vyapadeśe buddhiḥ ॥
[‘niṣkriyaḥ puruṣa'] iti vyapadeśe bhavati vṛttiḥ ॥
[tathā'nutpattidharmā puruṣa] iti । na vidyate utpattidharmo'syeti pūrvavadeva । atra svayamevārthamācaṣṭe bhāṣyakāraḥ---
[tiṣṭhati bāṇa] iti lokaprasiddhodāharaṇapratipādanamaprasiddhayāśaṅkānivṛttyartham । tiṣṭhatīti gatinivṛttirgatyabhāvaḥ । na cābhāvasya kālatrayayogo bhavati । nāpi bāṇasya kriyānirapekṣasya dravyasya । nīpi cābhāvena gatinivṛtyā bāṇasya vastunaḥ saṁbandhaḥ ।
[gatinivṛttau dhātvartha iti ॥] nanu gatinivṛttireva dhātvarthaḥ, tatra kathaṁ gatinivṛttāvityādhāraḥ ? ata evodāharaṇāntarametat । asati vyatireke ādhārādheyabhāvasyābhāvāt । asti ca
abhāvaprayayālambanā vṛttirnidrā ॥ 10 ॥

sā ca saṁprabodhe pratyavamarśātpratyayaviśeṣaḥ। kathaṁ, sukhamahamasvāpsam। prasannaṁ me manaḥ prajñāṁ me viśāradī karoti। duḥkhamahamasvāpsaṁ styānaṁ me mano bhramatyanavasthitam। gāḍhaṁ mūḍho'hamasvāpsam। gurūṇi me gātrāṇi। klāntaṁ me cittam। alasaṁ muṣitamiva tiṣṭhatīti। sa khalvayaṁ prabuddhasya pratyavamarśo na syādasati pratyayānubhave tadāśritāḥ smṛtayaśca tadviṣayā na syuḥ। tasmātpratyayaviśeṣo nidrā। sā ca samādhāvitarapratyayavanniroddhavyeti ॥ 10 ॥

vivaraṇam
[abhāvapratyayālambanā vṛtirnidrā ।] jāgradviṣayatvāt prāguktasya vṛttitrayasya_ tadupamardena ca nidrāsamudbhava iti, tadanantaraṁ nidrākhyā vṛttirvyākhyāyate ॥
[abhāva] iti jāgradviṣayābhāvaḥ, na tvatyantābhāva eva । tatra pratyayānupapatteḥ । abhāve pratyayaḥ
[“svapnanidrājñānālambanaṁ vā “] iti sūtrakāreṇa bhedenopadiṣṭatvādiha suṣuptāvasthaiva nidrā'bhipretā ॥
kiṁca-abhāvapratyayālambanatvācca suṣuktameva । na hi svapnasyābhāvapratyayālambanatā, smṛtitvāt । smṛteśvānubhūtaviṣayatvāt । tathā bhāṣyakāraḥ’’svapne bhāvitasmartavyā ‘ iti smṛtitvaṁ darśayati ॥
[prabodhe pratyavamarśādityādi । tasmāt pratyayaviśeṣo nidrā ।] na hāsati pratyayaviśeṣe parāmarśa yuktaḥ ! asti cāyaṁ prabuddhasya pratyavamarśaḥ ‘
kiñca—garbhagṛhādiṣu cādṛṣṭabāhmanimittānāmasati viśeṣa ciramaī suptavān kṣipramiti ca parāmarśo'nyathā na yujyate ॥
nanu ca nātra smṛtayaḥ, smṛtīnām anvabhavamityevaṁviśiṣṭatvāt । na hi suṣuptādutthito viśeṣaṁ smarati--atrocyate--bālasyeha janmanyananubhūtastanyasaṁbandhasya janmānantarameva tasyābhilāṣo dṛśyate । na ca। sa] svābhāvikaḥ । abālānāṁ smṛtipūrvapravṛttidarśanāt । tathehāpi । tasmāt pratyayapūrvakaḥ suṣuptaviṣayaḥ pratyavamarśaḥ, pratyavamarśatvāt jāgradupalabdhaviṣayapratyavamarśavat । tathā suṣuptotthitasya gātragauravādi kāryaṅ duḥkhādyanubhavapūrvaṅ , gātrādiviṣayagauravādikāryatvāt prasiddhaduḥkhānubhavakāryagātragauravavaditi pratyayaviśeṣo nidreti siddham ॥ 10 ॥
anubhūtaviṣayāsaṁpramoṣaḥ smṛtiḥ ॥ 11 ॥

kiṁ pratyayasya cittaṁ smarati āhosvidviṣayasyeti। grāhyoparaktaḥ pratyayo grāhyagrahaṇobhayākāranirbhāsastajjātīyakaṁ saṁskāramārabhate। sa saṁskāraḥ svavyañjakāñjanastadākārāmeva grāhyagrahaṇobhayātmikāṁ smṛtiṁ janayati।

vivaraṇam
[anubhūtāviṣayāsampramoṣaḥ smṛtiḥ ।] smṛteḥ pramāṇādisarvavṛttikāryatvādante niveśaḥ । anubhūtaścāsau viṣayaśca anubhūtaviṣayaḥ । yo'sāvanubhūtaḥ sa eva viṣayaḥ, na punaryo viṣayaḥ sa evānubhūta iti । tathā ca smṛteraśabdāditvāt smṛtiviṣayāyāḥ smṛterasmṛtitvaṁ prāpnotīti । iṣyate ca smṛtiviṣayā'pi smṛtiḥ svasaṁvedyatvāt । anubhūtaviṣayasyāsaṁprameṣo'napaharaṇamatirobhāvaḥ । pārokṣye'pi sādṛśyādinimittāpekṣayā'nubhūtasya viṣayasya dṛśyamānavadavabhāsaḥ smṛtiḥ ॥
[kiṁ pratyayasya cittaṁ smaratī] tyādi ॥ yadyapyanubhūtānanubhūyamānaviṣayatvena vivekaḥ, tathāpi sādṛśyanimittāṁ bhrāntiṁ tayoḥ kāryakāraṇatvapradarśanāya nivartayati । etadeva ca vaināśikānāṁ bahirarthānupapatterbuddhikāraṇam ।
[anubhūtaviṣayāsampramoṣa] iti । tadā hyanubhavāsampramoṣa iti syāttatrāha -
[svavyañjakāñjana iti ।] saṁskārādhāyinaḥ pratyayasya hetubhūtaṁ yat karma dattaphalaṁ tattulyajātīyaṁ yatkarmāntaraṁ phalapradānāyābhimukhībhavati tat svavyañjakam । tathā ca vakṣyati-‘tatastadvipākānuguṇānāmevābhivyaktirvāsanānām' iti । tatkarmapratyupanītaṁ vā sādṛśyapraṇidhānādi । svena vyañjakenābhivyajyata iti svavyañjakāñjanaḥ ।

tatra grahaṇākārapūrvā buddhiḥ। grāhyākārapūrvā smṛtiḥ। sā ca dvayī – bhāvitasmartavyā cābhāvitasmartavyā ca। svapne bhāvitasmartavyā। jāgratsamaye tvabhāvitasmartavyeti। sarvāḥ smṛtayaḥ pramāṇaviparyayavikalpanidrāsmṛtīnāmanubhavātprabhavanti। sarvāścaitā vṛttayaḥ sukhaduḥkhamohātmikāḥ। sukhaduḥkhamohāśca kleśeṣu vyākhyeyāḥ। sukhānuśayī rāgaḥ। duḥkhānuśayī dveṣaḥ। mohaḥ punaravidyeti। etāḥ sarvā vṛttayo niroddhavyāḥ। āsāṁ nirodhe saṁprajñāto vā samādhirbhavatyasaṁprajñāto veti ॥ 11 ॥

vivaraṇam
[tatra grahaṇākārapūrvā buddhiḥ ।] grahaṇam [svī]karaṇaṁ[svī]karaṇameva pūrvaṁ prathamamutpadyamānasya pratyayasya । na hi viṣayaviśeṣamapekṣate pūrvamiṣṭāniṣṭagrahaṇāt , nirbhagnavaṭapradīpavinirgataprabhājālavat ॥
[grahyākārapūrvā smṛtiḥ] anubhūtāpekṣatvāt । yadi ca grahaṇapūrvikā smṛtiḥ pratyayavadabhaviṣyat, anubhūtaṁ nāpaikṣiṣyata । apekṣate tu । tasmādgrāhyo viṣayaḥ pūrvo'syā na grahaṇam । tathāpi tūbhayātmikaiva । smṛtisaṁskārayorekarūpatvāt । nāpyanyatarapratyayākhyānena sambhavati । tathā cānubhūtaviṣayāsampramoṣa ityupapadyate । smṛtipratyayayorapi[samāna]viṣayatvāt, grahaṇatvasya ca sarvatra sambhavāt । tasmāt pakṣadvaye'pyabhihitadoṣo na dṛśyata iti ॥
[sā ca dvayī ।] katham?
[sarvāśca pramāṇādi] vṛttipañcatayā
[niroddhavyā vṛttaya:।] kiñca -
athā''sāṁ nirodhe ka upāya iti –
abhyāsavairāgyābhyāṁ tannirodhaḥ ॥ 12 ॥

cittanadī nāmobhayatovāhinī vahati kalyāṇāya vahati pāpāya ca। yā tu kaivalyaprāgbhārā vivekaviṣayanimnā sā kalyāṇavahā। saṁsāraprāgbhārā'vivekaviṣayanimnā pāpavahā। tatra vairāgyeṇa viṣayasrotaḥ khilīkriyate। vivekadarśanābhyāsena vivekasrota uddhāṭyata ityubhayādhīnaścittavṛttinirodhaḥ ॥ 12 ॥

vivaraṇam
[atha āsāṁ nirodhe ka upāya iti ॥] 
[abhyāsavairāgyābhyāṁ tannirodha iti ॥] abhyāsavairāgye vakṣyamāṇalakṣaṇe । tābhyāṁ yathoktalakṣaṇānāṁ [vṛttīnāṁ] nirodhaḥ virodhanāt । nirodha upaśamaḥ । abhyāsavairāgyayorviṣayavivekapradarśanārthametadbhāṣyam -
tatra sthitau yatnā'bhyāsaḥ ॥ 13 ॥
cittasyāvṛttikasya praśāntavāhitā sthitiḥ। tadarthaḥ prayatno vīryamutsāhaḥ। tatsaṁpipādayiṣayā tatsādhanānuṣṭhānamabhyāsaḥ ॥ 13 ॥

vivaraṇam
[tatra sthitau yatno'bhyāsaḥ । tatra] tasminnirodhe । sā ca nimittasaptamī । nirodhanimittā cittasya yā
sa tu dīrghakālanairantaryasatkārāsevito dṛḍhabhūmiḥ ॥ 14 ॥
dīrghakālāsevito nirantarāsevitaḥ satkārāsevitaḥ। tapasā brahmacaryeṇa vidyayā śraddhayā ca saṁpāditaḥ satkāravāndṛḍhabhūmirbhavati। vyutthānasaṁskāreṇa drāgityevānabhibhūtaviṣaya ityarthaḥ ॥ 14 ॥

vivaraṇam
[dīrghakālanairantaryasevitaḥ] dīrghakāla tvavarjito vā [nairantaryavarjito vā na]
dṛṣṭānuśravikaviṣayavitṛṣṇasya vaśīkārasaṁjñā vairāgyam ॥ 15 ॥

striyo'nnapānamaiśvaryamiti dṛṣṭaviṣaye vitṛṣṇasya svargavaidehyaprakṛtilayatvaprāptāvānuśravikaviṣaye vitṛṣṇasya divyādivyaviṣayasaṁprayoge'pi cittasya viṣayadoṣadarśinaḥ prasaṁkhyānabalādanābhogātmikā heyopādeyaśūnyā vaśīkārasaṁjñā vairāgyam ॥ 15 ॥

vivaraṇam
[dṛṣṭānuśravikāvaṣayavitṛṣṇasya vaśīkārasaṁjñāvairāgyam । viṣaya] śabdaḥ pratyekamabhisaṁbadhyate
[dṛṣṭaścāsau viṣayaśca tasmin ॥] kaḥ punarasai.au ?
[rāgastṛṣṇā garddhaḥ'] iti hi vakṣyati । na - avasthāviśeṣasya vivakṣitatvāt । tathā ca yatamānasaṁjñā, vyatikrāntasaṁjñā, ekendriyasaṁjñā, vaśīkārasaṁjñeti catasṛṇāmāsāṁ sāmānyasaṁjñā । vairāgyamiti । evaṁ sati dṛṣṭānuśravikaviṣayavitṛṣṇasyetyetaduktaṁ bhavati- adhigatapūrvāvasthātrayasya caturthī yā avasthā sā tviha vairāgyaṁmiti vivakṣitam । tasmādiha vaitṛṣṇyādanyavairāgyamābhipretam । tathā ca darśayati--
tatparaṁ puruṣakhyāterguṇavetṛṣṇyam ॥ 16 ॥

dṛṣṭānuśravikaviṣayadoṣadarśī viraktaḥ puruṣadarśanābhyāsāttacchuddhipravivekāpyāyitabuddhirguṇebhyo vyaktāvyaktadharmakebhyo virakta iti। tadvayaṁ vairāgyam। tatra yaduttaraṁ tajjñānaprasādamātram। yasyodaye sati yogī pratyuditakhyātirevaṁ manyate – prāptaṁ prāpaṇīyaṁ, kṣīṇāḥ kṣetavyāḥ kleśāḥ, chinnaḥ śliṣṭaparvā bhavasaṁkramaḥ, yasyāvicchedājjanitvā mriyate mṛtvā ca jāyata iti। jñānasyaiva parā kāṣṭhā vairāgyam। etasyaiva hi nāntarīyakaṁ kaivalyamiti ॥ 16 ॥

vivaraṇam
[tatparaṁ puruṣakhyāterguṇavaitṛṣṇyam । tadi] ti vairāgyaṁ parāmṛśyate ।
[paramiti] pūrvoktavairāgyāduttarakālabhāvīti । yadi vā --tasya viṣayanimittābhyāmutkṛṣṭīnimittaviṣayatvāt , kaivalyasya vā pratyāsannataratvāt paramutkṛṣṭam ।
[puruṣakhyāte] rnimittāt । kiṁviṣayamityāha—
[vyaktāvyaktadharmakebhyaḥ] mahadādisaṁsthitā vyaktadharmakāḥ । pradhānāvasthitā avyaktadharmakāḥ । tebhyo virakta iti ।
[’'prasaṁkhyāne'pyakusīdasya sarvathā vivekakhyātedharmarmagheḥ samādhiḥ'] iti ॥
[yasyodaye] yasya vairāgyasyodaye ।
nanu caivaṁ buddheraṣṭaguṇatvaṁ bādhyeta । ṣaḍguṇatvaṁ hi dhyānāvasthābhedābhyupagamāt । jñānatve'pi vairāgyasya prasannataratvābhyupagamaḥ । rāgo'pyajñānasyāvasthāntaraviśeṣaḥ ।
nanu caivaṁ sati jñānājñānayoranekāvasthābhedādaṣṭaguṇatvaṁ punarapi na prāpnoti । naiṣa doṣaḥ । phalavattvapratyanīka-tvaniyamāt । jñānāvasthācatuṣṭayasya phalavattvena bhedaniyamaḥ । tathā ajñānāvasthācatuṣṭaya pratyanīkatvenādharmadicatuṣṭayaniyama ityaṣṭaguṇatvasiddhiḥ । dharmādipratidvandvina eva hi guṇatvena niyamyate, nājñānabhedāḥ sarva eva ॥ 16 ॥
athopāyadvayena niruddhacittavṛtteḥ kathamucyate saṁprajñātaḥ samādhiriti –
vitarkavicārānandāsmitārūpānugamātsaṁprajñātaḥ ॥ 17 ॥

vitarkaścittasyā''lambane sthūla ābhogaḥ ānando hlādaḥ। sūkṣmo vicāraḥ। ekātmikā saṁvidasmitā। tatra prathamaścatuṣṭayānugataḥ samādhiḥ savitarkaḥ। dvitīyo vitarkavikalaḥ savicāraḥ। tṛtīyo vicāravikalaḥ sānandaḥ। caturthastadvikalo'smitāmātra iti। sarva ete sālambanāḥ samādhayaḥ ॥ 17 ॥

vivaraṇam
[samprajñātaḥ samādhirvitarkādyanugata ityupariṣṭāt pravedayiṣyāmaḥ'] iti । so'vasaraprāpta idānīṁ lakṣyeta ।
bhāṣyakāro'pyavādīt - ‘vairāgyeṇa viṣayasrota: khilīkriyate । vivekadarśanābhyāsena kalyāṇasrota uddhāṭyate? iti । nāvocata vṛttisvarūpatiraskārameva samprajñātasamādheḥ । vṛttinirodhaprabhavatvamaniṣṭaviṣayapravṛtyuparamottara-kālabhāvitvāpekṣayā, vṛttiviṣayaviśeṣānugata eva hi saḥ ॥
[niruddhavṛtteścittasya kathamucyate] -kathaṁ lakṣaṇamucyata iti yāvat ।
[vitarkaścittasyālambane sthūla ābhogaḥ ।] syūla(pi)miśrībhāvaḥ prathamamālambanākāreṇa pariṇamamānasya cittasya ya ālambanavyatikaraḥ sa vitarkaḥ ॥
nanu cāsmitā kleśeṣu paṭhiṣyati 'dṛgdarśanaśaktyorekātmatevāsmitā' iti । tatkathamivāsmitārūpeṇa kleśena samādhiranugamyata iti । satyamevaṁ– prakṛṣṭasvakāraṇākārāvabhāsakatvādanyaviṣayavinivṛttātmakatvāñcāsmitāyā: samādhirūpatve'pyadoṣaḥ ॥
yadi vā asmitārūpasyālambanasyāvidyātve'pi na yogipratyayasyāvidyātvam । na hi khalu paracittavividiṣāyāṁ parasyāvidyātvam । na hi khalu paracittapratyayaṁ gṛhṇan parakīyāvidyāpratyayarūpālambanadoṣeṇa svayamavidyāvān bhavati ॥
athāsamprajñātaḥ samādhiḥ kimupāyaḥ ? kiṁsvabhāvo vā ? iti yaḥ punaḥ kleśaḥ sa viparyeyaviśiṣṭa eva । yathā---ahaṁ gacchāmi kṛśo'hamiti । yogicittasya tannyagbhūte rajastamasī iti na tathā ॥
tatra pūrvaḥ pūrvaḥ svakīyottarottaradharmānugataḥ । paraḥ parastu pūrvapūrvadharmavikalaḥ । yasmāccaitaddharmacatuṣṭayānugata evāyaṁ samprajñātaḥ samādhistasmādetallakṣaṇa iti lakṣaṇārthaṁ sūtram । loke'pi yo yadasādhāraṇadharmānuyātaḥ sa tallakṣaṇaḥ, yathā sāsnādilakṣaṇo gauriti ॥
[sarva ete sālambanā iti ।] yaḥ punarmanyate nirvikalpatvamasmiteti--tadasat । asmitāśabdasyāhaṅkāre prasiddhatvāt । tathā cāha--asmibhāvo'smitā ॥ 17 ॥
athāsaṁprajñātaḥ samādhiḥ kimupāyaḥ kiṁsvabhāvo veti –
virāmapratyayābhyāsapūrvaḥ saṁskāraśeṣo'nyaḥ ॥ 18 ॥

sarvavṛttipratyastamaye saṁskāraśeṣo nirodhaścittasya samādhirasaṁprajñātaḥ। tasya paraṁ vairāgyamupāyaḥ। sālambano hyabhyāsastatsādhanāya na kalpata iti virāmapratyayo nirvastuka ālambanī kriyate। sa cārthaśūnyaḥ। tadabhyāsapūrvakaṁ hi cittaṁ nirālambanamabhāvaprāptamiva bhavatītyeṣa nirbījaḥ sabhādhirasaṁprajñātaḥ ॥ 18 ॥

vivaraṇam
[atha asamprajñātaḥ 'yogaścittavṛttinirodha’] ityupapāditalakṣaṇaḥ
[virāmapratyayābhyāsapūrva] ityetāvatā sādhanasambandhamācaṣṭe ।
[anya iti ॥] 
viramaṇaṁ virāmaḥ । virāmaśvāsau pratyayaśca virāmapratyaya: । virāmarūpatvāt sa eva pratyayo virāma ityucyate । sarvaviṣayebhyo vinivartamānasya vinivartanakāle prāgapratyayāpatteḥ pratyayarūpatvam । etadyathā-pāvakasya jvalataḥ prakṣīyamāṇendhanasya śanaiśśanairupaśāmyataḥ prāgaṅgāratāpatterjvalātmakatā ॥
[virāmapratyayaḥ] tasya
nanu ca paraṁ vairāgyaṁ ceti vaktavyam, abhyāsavairāgyābhyāṁ vṛttinirodhasyābhipretatvāt । naiṣa doṣaḥ । virāmapratyayābhyāsasya sūtropāttatvādanāśaṅkayastadabhyāsaḥ । vairāgyaṁ punaranupāttatvādāśaṅkayeta । tasmāttadeva prāpayatā na cā [caḥ] paṭhitaḥ ॥
yadyevaṁ kasmānna sūtra eva vairāgyagrahaṇaṁ kṛtam ? pūrvatra paṭhitatvāt । tatra kimarthaṁ paṭhitamiti cet--vairāgyaprasaṅgāt । pūrvavairāgyaviśeṣa evottaraṁ vairāgyamiti prasaṅgāduttaram[duktam] । pūrvasya ca vairāgyasya samprajñātaviṣaye('pi)viniyogādavaśiṣṭatya parasya sādhanatvādanyaviṣayatvācca nirbījenaiva sambandha iti na sūtre vairāgyagrahaṇaṁ kṛtam । sāmarthyaprāptaṁ tu bhāṣyakāro darśeyati ॥
[sālambane.o hyābhyāso] viruddhatvānnirālambanasya samādheḥ
sa khalvayaṁ dvividhaḥ - upāyapratyayo bhavapratyayaśca। tatropāyapratyayo yogināṁ bhavati –
bhavaprayayo videhaprakṛtilayānām ॥ 19 ॥

videhānāṁ devānāṁ bhavapratyayaḥ। te hi svasaṁskāramātropayogena cittena kaivalyapadamivānubhavantaḥ svasaṁskāravipākaṁ tathājātīyakamativāhayanti। tathā prakṛtilayāḥ sādhikāre cetasi prakṛtilīne kaivalyapadamivānubhavanti, yāvanna punarāvartate'dhikāravaśāccittamiti ॥ 19 ॥

vivaraṇam
[sa khalvayaṁ dvividhaḥ ।] saḥ nirbījaḥ samādhiḥ
videhaprakṛtilayānāṁ tu janmanaiva labhyaḥ । tehi tanutarapratibandhāvaśeṣāḥ । sa tu pratibandhāvaśeṣasteṣāṁ sakṛdāsāditapunarjanmanāṁ samādhivyāghātāya na paryāpnoti । sa tu janmapratilambhamātranimittam । (tvāt)jñānavairāgyādyanuṣṭhānakāryatvādvidehaprakṛtilayatvasya tadanuṣṭhānastutyarthaṁ sūtram । idṛśaṁ hi tadanuṣṭhānamāhātmyam । yaduta sāmarthyādivaikalyādabhīpsitaphalānavātāvapi mahanīyataraṁ videhaprakṛtilayatvaṁ prāpyate ।
[te svasaṁskāramātropabhogena] vairāgyābhyāsāhitaḥ saṁskāraśeṣastanmātropabhogena
[kaivalyamivānubhavantīti ।] pūrvavat ।
śraddhāvīryasmṛtisamādhiprajñāpūrvaka itareṣām ॥ 20 ॥

upāyapratyayo yogināṁ bhavati। śraddhā cetasaḥ saṁprasādaḥ। sā hi jananīva kalyāṇī yoginaṁ pāti। tasya hi śraddadhānasya vivekārthino vīryamupajāyate। samupajātavīryasya smṛtirupatiṣṭhate। smṛtyupasthāne ca cittamanākulaṁ samādhīyate। samāhitacittasya prajñāviveka upāvartate। yena yathārthaṁ vastu jānāti। tadabhyāsāttattadviṣayācca vairāgyādasaṁprajñātaḥ samādhirbhavati ॥ 20 ॥

vivaraṇam
[śraddhāvīryasmṛtisamādhiprajñāpūrvakaḥ] samādhiḥ,
[smṛtyupasthāne ca cittamanākulaṁ samādhīyate । samāhitacittasya] prajñāyā buddheḥ
[tadabhyāsāt] etaduktaṁ bhavati – ārmadarśanavirāmapratyayābhyāsāditi ।

te khalu nava yogino mṛdumadhyādhimātropāyā bhavanti। tadyathā - mṛdūpāyo madhyopāyo'dhimātropāya iti। tatra mṛdūpāyastrividhaḥ – mṛdusaṁvego madhyasaṁvegastīvrasaṁvega iti। tathā madhyopāyastathā'dhimātropāya iti। tatrādhimātropāyānāṁ –
tīvrasaṁvegānāmāsannaḥ ॥ 21 ॥
samādhilābhaḥ samādhiphalaṁ ca bhavatīti ॥ 21 ॥

vivaraṇam
[tadyathā mṛdūpāyo madhyopāyo'dhimātropāya iti ।] teṣāmekaikastridhā bhidyate-tatra
[॥ tatrādhimātropāyānāṁ tīvrasaṁvegānāmāsannaḥ samādhilābhaḥ samādhiphalaṁ ca] ॥ 21 ॥
mṛdumadhyādhimātratvāttato'pi viśeṣaḥ ॥ 22 ॥

mṛdutīvro madhyatīvro'dhimātratīvra iti। tato'pi viśeṣaḥ। tadviśeṣādapi mṛdutīvrasaṁvegasyā''sannaḥ, tato madhyatīvrasaṁvegasyā''sannataraḥ, tasmādadhimātratīvrasaṁvegasyādhimātropāyasyāpyāsannatamaḥ samādhilābhaḥ samādhiphalaṁ ceti ॥ 22 ॥

vivaraṇam
[ttato'pi viśeṣaḥ] sādhanānuṣṭhānasaṁskārasya ।
kimetasmādevā''sannatamaḥ samādhirbhavati। athāsya lābhe bhavatyanyo'pi kaścidupāyo na veti –
īśvarapraṇidhānādvā ॥ 23 ॥
praṇidhānādbhaktiviśeṣādāvarjita īśvarastamanugṛhṇātyabhidhyānamātreṇa। tadabhidhyānamātrādapi yogina āsannatamaḥ samādhilābhaḥ samādhiphalaṁ ca bhavatīti ॥ 23 ॥

vivaraṇam
[kimetasmādevāsannataro bhavati ? atha (tasya) asya lābhe bhavatya nyo'pi kaścidupāyo] na veti । upāyāntaramastītyāha-
atha pradhānapuruṣavyatiriktaḥ ko'yamīśvaro nāmeti –
kleśakarmavipākāśayairaparāmṛṣṭaḥ puruṣaviśeṣa īśvaraḥ ॥ 24 ॥

avidyādaya kleśāḥ। kuśalākuśalāni karmāṇi। tatphalaṁ vipākaḥ। tadanuguṇā vāsanā āśayāḥ। te ca manasi vartamānāḥ puruṣe vyapadiśyante, sa hi tatphalasya bhokteti। yathā jayaḥ parājayo vā yoddhṛṣu vartamānaḥ svāmini vyapadiśyate। yo hyanena bhogenāparāmṛṣṭaḥ sa puruṣaviśeṣa īśvaraḥ।

vivaraṇam
[atha pradhānapuruṣavyatiriktaḥ ko'yamīśvara] iti sāṁkhyaśāsre prasiddhyabhāvādīśvarasadbhāve copapattimavaśyamanavagateśvaraviśeṣo vā pṛcchati । tatra tāvat pratijānīte-
[kleśā] iti ।
[manasi vartamānā] manovṛtiprabhavatvāt
[yā hmanena bhogenāparāsṛṣṭa] iti ucyate । na kālavivakṣā, upalakṣaṇārthatvaṁ-na parāmṛśyate, nāpi parāmṛkṣyate, nāpi parāmṛṣṭa iti । kleśakarmavipākāśayāsaṁbandhī(ndhayegī)tyarthaḥ ॥

kaivalyaṁ prāptāstarhi santi ca bahavaḥ kevalinaḥ। te hi trīṇi bandhanāni cchittvā kaivalyaṁ prāptā īśvarasya ca tatsaṁbandho na bhūto na bhāvī। yathā muktasya pūrvā bandhakoṭiḥ prajñāyate naivamīśvarasya। yathā vā prakṛtilīnasyottarā bandhakoṭiḥ saṁbhāvyate naivamīśvarasya। sa tu sadaiva muktaḥ sadaiveśvara iti।

vivaraṇam
[kaivalyaṁ prāptastarhīti ।] kleśādyaparāmarśasya kādācitkatayā'pi saṁbhavāt ।
[te hi trīṇi bandhanāni] prākṛtavaikṛtadākṣiṇāni samyagdarśanena hitvā
yo'sau prakṛṣṭasattvopādānādīśvarasya śāśvatika utkarṣaḥ sa kiṁ sanimitta āhosvinnirnimitta iti। tasya śāstraṁ nimittam। śāstraṁ punaḥ kiṁnimittaṁ, prakṛṣṭasattvanimittam।

vivaraṇam
[yo'sau prakṛṣṭasattvopādānādīśvarasya śāśvatika utkarṣa iti ।] nityaniratiśayasarvajñānaiśvaryaśaktisampattirutkarṣaḥ ॥
[sa kiṁ sanimitta ahosvinnirnimitta iti ।] nimittaśabdaḥ kāraṇaparyāyaḥ । sa kiṁ sakāraṇa āhettvinniṣkāraṇa iti । kiñcātaḥ ? yadi tāvat sakāraṇastadā sadaiveśvara ityayuktam, anityatvāt । atha niṣkāraṇaḥ, tathā cotkarṣasya kāryatvādasattvaprasaṅgaḥ । na hi niṣkāraṇaṁ kāryai dṛśyate loke ॥
[śāstranimittatvāt । śāsraṁ] jñānam । śāstrasya hetutvāt । yataḥ sarvaviṣayaṁ jñānaṁ nityaṁ dravyasvabhāvasādhyasādhanavyavahitaviprakṛṣṭāspadam ॥
[śāstraṁ punaḥ kiṁnnimittamiti ।] yadi svābhāvikaṁ jñānaṁ, mattonmattajñānavadanutkarṣahetutvam । atha punaḥ sanimittakaṁ, nimittāt prāganutkarṣa iti manyate ॥
[prakṛṣṭasattvanimittaṁ] prakṛṣṭasattvāśrayamiti yāvat । ata eva svabhāvajñānadoṣābhāvaḥ ॥
kiñca - svābhāvikajñānatve'pi na mattādijñānavadapakarṣahetutvam । nityamuktakleśādisattvāśrayatvāt । tatra yathaiva jñānasaṁskārasmṛtiprabandhānāmanyonyanimittanaimittikabhāvena bījāṅkuravadanādisaṁbandhaḥ, tathaiva śāstraprakarṣayorīśvaracetasi nityapravṛttaprabandharūpeṇa pravartamānayoranādyantaḥ saṁbandhaḥ । tatrotkarṣo jñānasya kāryemeva । jñānamapi tasya kāraṇameva ॥
[tasya śāstraṁ nimittaṁ] pramāṇam , tena hi tadutkarṣaḥ pramīyate । śāstraṁ punaḥ kiṁpramāṇakam ? īśvaranirmalasattvapramāṇam । viśuddhasattvapraṇītatvāddhi śāstrasya prāmāṇyam ? yathā manvādīnām । tathā ca śrutiḥ-‘yakiṁcinmanurabhyavadattadbheṣajam' iti । yathā ca loke guruṇā'bhihitamiti ॥

etayoḥ śāstrotkarṣayorīśvarasattve vartamānayoranādiḥ saṁbandhaḥ। etasmādetadbhavati sadaiveśvaraḥ sadaiva mukta iti। tacca tasyaiśvaryaṁ sāmyātiśayavinirmuktam। na tāvadaiśvaryāntareṇa tadatiśayate। yadevātiśayi syāttadeva tatsyāt। tasmādyatra kāṣṭhāprāptiraiśvaryasya sa īśvara iti। na ca tatsamānamaiśvaryamasti। kasmāt, dvayostulyayorekasminyugapatkāmite'rthe navamidamastu purāṇamidamastvityekasya siddhāvitarasya prākāmyavighātādūnatvaṁ prasaktam। dvayośca tulyayoryugapatkāmitārthaprāptirnāsti। arthasya viruddhatvāt। tasmādyasya sāmyātiśayairvinirmuktamaiśvaryaṁ sa eveśvaraḥ। sa ca puruṣaviśeṣa iti ॥ 24 ॥

vivaraṇam
[etayoḥ śāsrotkarṣayoḥ] pramāṇaprameyatayā
nanu ca naiveśvarasatva[a]vartamānena śākheṇa tadutkarṣaḥ pramīyate । naiṣa doṣaḥ । tatprabhavatvāttatra vartamānam । varta(māna)ta eva tatprabhavamapi śāsraṁ tasmin sarvajñatvādeva । loke'pi yato yatprabhavati vartate tattasmin, yathā tantvādiṣu paṭādi । tatprabhavatvamanumānāgamābhyāmavagamyate । śāstrapramāṇakaḥ utkarṣaḥ, īśvarabhramāṇakaṁ śāstramiti bhinnāśrayatvācchāsrotkarṣayornetaretarāśrayatvam ॥
nanu ca śāstrādīśvaraprāmāṇyaṁ, tatprāmāṇyācca śāstraprāmāṇyamiti syādanyonyāśrayatvam-ucyate-īśvaraprāmāṇyasyānumānena siddhatvādadoṣaḥ ॥
[etasmādetadbhavati ।] kasmāt ? īśvaraprakṛṣṭasattvāśrayayorniratiśayajñānotkarṣayoḥ kāryakāraṇarūpe prabandhanityatayā nityatvādetadbhavati-
[na tāvadaiśvaryāntareṇa tadatiśayyate ।] kutaḥ?
na hyekasmin rājye dvayoḥ saṁbhavo rājñoḥ । ekasya vā dve rājye । tathā pratipādayati-taddvayostutyatvaṁ prasaktam । na hyekasyānyataratra prākāmyamabādhitvā anyatarasmin pravṛttirupapadyate । dvayośca yugapadekārthayorekasya prākāmyeṇa pravṛttireva nāsti । prakāmite vastuni samānaprakarṣasyārthasya viruddhatvāt ॥ yena ca samānaprakarṣatā tasya tenaiva sa bādhyate । (te ca) tava na vācā bādhanamitarasya rūpātiśayā āvṛttyatiśayāśca virudhyante । sāmānyāni tvatiśayaiḥ saha vartanta iti vakṣyāmaḥ ॥
tasmādyasya sāmyātiśayaviproṣitamaiśvaryaṁ sa īśvara iti pradhānapuruṣavyatiriktaḥ puruṣaviśeṣa īśvaraḥ siddhaḥ ॥ 24 ॥
kiṁ ca –
tatra niratiśayaṁ sarvajñabījam ॥ 25 ॥

yadidamatītānāgatapratyutpannapratyekasamuccayātīndriyagrahaṇamalpaṁ bahviti sarvajñabījametadvivardhamānaṁ yatra niratiśayaṁ sa sarvajñaḥ। asti kāṣṭhāprāptiḥ sarvajñabījasya sātiśayatvātparimāṇavaditi। yatra kāṣṭhāprāptirjñānasya su sarvajñaḥ। sa ca puruṣaviśeṣa iti।

vivaraṇam
[tatra niratiśayaṁ sarvajñabījam । tatra] tasmin yathāpratijñātalakṣaṇa
[alpaṁ bahniti ।] yathāprasiddha
tathā śaktirapi sātiśayatvena vivardhamānā yatra kāṣṭhāṁ prāpnoti, sa sarvaśaktiḥ । tena jagannirmāṇasthāpanopasaṁhādikartṛtvasiddhiḥ । tathaiśvaryasyāpi vardhamānasya yatra kāṣṭhāprāptiḥ, sa parameśvaraḥ । tataśca aśaktyādiviparyayadoṣābhāvasiddhiḥ ॥
athāpi syāt-ajñānasyāpi vivardhamānasya svabhāvasiddhasya kāṣṭhāprāptasya tasminnīśvare siddhiriti-na-jñānāvirodhāt । na hi jñānājñānayorviruddhayorekasminnabhisaṁyogo'sti । na hi jñāne prakarṣavati tatrājñānaṁ saṁbhavati ॥
yatra hi jyotirvivardhate tatra tamo'pakṛṣyata eva । viparyayo'pīti cet- tacca na-sati jyotiṣi tamaso'nupalambhāt । vidyamānaṁ hi tamo jyotiṣā tiraskriyate, na kadācidvidyamānaṁ jyotistamasā'bhibhūyate ।
yadapi jaladharoparodhāt prāvṛṣi raveradarśanam, tadapi dṛṣṭivyavadhānamātram । na punaḥ prakāśa eva tirodhīyate tamovat । tasmānna, yatra jñānavivṛddhistatrājñānasya bhāvaḥ savitarīva tamasaḥ । nityātyantatirohitarajastame.oguṇasattvopādānāt ॥
kiñca- nājñānasyāvastuviṣayatvādvivṛddhiḥ saṁbhavati । jñānasya jñeyavastuviṣayatvādabhivṛddhayupapattiḥ । ajñānasya hi vastuviṣayatve jñānatvaprāptiḥ ॥
yaścāpi sthāvarādiṣvajñānaprakarṣa iti, nāsau prakarṣaḥ । atyantajñānābhāvāpekṣayā hi sa ucyate । ajñānasya prakarṣe hi satyajñānasahasrasya na jñānenaikena bādhaḥ syāt । tathā[dā]hi pratyajñānaṁ jñānenotpannenānekena bādhanaṁ syāt । tasmānnājñānasya prakarṣaḥ svarūpeṇa ॥
yasya hi sātiśayatvaṁ tasya kāṣṭhāpraptirdṛśyate । yathā phalādiparimāṇānāmākāśaparyantatā । tathā sarvajñabījamapi parāṁ kāṣṭhāṁ prātumarhati ॥
samastaṁ vyastaṁ ca sarvaṁ vastujātamekasya pratyakṣaṁ, jñeyatvāt, ghaṭādivat ॥
jñānāviṣayatvena puruṣārthatvāt, ghaṭādivadeva ॥
utpattimatī ca pṛthivī, sāvayavatvāt, ghaṭādivat ॥
prāṇikarmatatsādhanaphalavibhāgavideka(gadhaika)niṣpāditaṁ jagat, tadupabhogyasthānādiracanā-viśeṣavatvāta prāsādādivat ॥
anekaprāṇyupabhogavijñānavadekanirvartitā pṛthivī, anekaprāṇavadupabhogyatvāt vrīhiyavādivat ॥
anekaprayojanārthinā ekena nirmitā pṛthivī, gṛhādivadeva ॥
sarvaprāṇyāśrayo girinadīsamudāyaḥ tannivāsiparibhogayogyavijñānavadekakuśalotpāditaḥ, prakṛtahetunidarśanābhyāmeva ॥
anekaprāṇabhākprakāśādisāmarthyajñānavatā ekena nirvartitaḥ savitā, prakāśātmakatvāt pradīpādivat ॥
niyatakālamādityodayāstamayādisañcaraṇam etatprayojanajñānavadekaprayuktaṁ, pratiniyatakālatvāt, kṛṣyādivat ॥
buddhimadekeśvaraprayuktā sūryagrahacandranakṣatrādipravṛttiḥ, pravṛtterduḥkhātmakatve sati niyatasamayatvāt, dharmajñaśiṣyabhṛtyādipravṛttivat ॥
candramaso vṛddhikṣayau tithyādikālajñānavataikena prayuktau, kālaparicchedakatvāt, ghaṭikā[harā]divat । kālaparicchedajñānavataikena nirvartitaścandramā:, vṛddhikṣayayuktatvāt, ghaṭikādivadeva ॥
buddhimadekasvāmikaṁ jagat, anyonyaviruddhasaṁhatānekaprāṇināyakādhiṣṭhitabahumaṇḍalatvāt, itthaṁjātīyakaikarājyavat ॥
sarvametatsādhanasādhyavyāpārāvasthaṁ pratyakṣaṁ kasyacidekasya, avāntaravirodhānugrahavattayaikaprayojanatvāt, sāṁgrāmavastuvat ॥
saṁhatatvāt, kulālādivastuvat । saiva pratijñā ॥
yugapacca sarvaṁ pratyakṣameka(ta)sya, anekatve (tva)sakṣyanyonyasaṁbandhāt, prasiddhasambandhānekārthavat ॥
agnihotrādisādhanasādhanīye kasyacitpratyakṣe, sādhyasādhanarūpatvāt , bhujitṛptivat ॥
sarvāḥ śaktayaḥ kasyacit pratyakṣāḥ, vastutvāt, ghaṭādivat ॥
a[vā]ntarapratibandhābhāve sarvaṁ vastujātaṁ nairantaryeṇa kasyacit pratyakṣaṁ, śabdādimattvena sambandhāt, drāghīyasīmiva śaṣkulīṁ bhakṣayataḥ śabdādayaḥ ॥
svatantratayā kenacidekena sarvaṁ pratyakṣata upalabhyate, jñeyatvenābhimatatvāt, nāṭyavastuvat ॥
apratibandhena kasyacit pratyakṣopalabhyaṁ sarvam, aneka(satve)tve satyanyonyasaṁbandhāt, nāṭyasaṁbandhinartakādivat ॥
saṁsārarahitaḥ sarvajñaḥ, ajñānābhāvāt, muktātmavat । kleśādirahita īśvaraḥ, apratibandhajñānatvāt, siddhayogivat ॥
etena kleśādipratibandhājñānarahitatvena cakṣurādīndriyagrāmanirapekṣasarvaviṣayajñānatvaṁ siddham । sarvārthagrahaṇasamarthasya parameśvaracittasya sarvavyāpino yugapatsarvaviṣayayogitvāt । evaṁ sati samastavastugrahaṇābhāve kāraṇābhā(vānu)vopapatiḥ ॥
nāpi mūrtimatpratibandho'pyākāśavadeva sarvaviṣayayogino'pi cittasya । viṣayānavasthānādāvirbhāvatirobhāvasmṛtisaṁkalpānavasthitatvopapattiḥ । viṣayākāratayā vṛttilābhādarkaprabhāvat ॥
na hi kleśādyāvaraṇāvacchannaṁ cittasatvam, tasyādharmādiyogāt । sarvagatasya sarvārthasyāpi satvasyādharmādipratibandhakaniruddhasvakīyapravṛttimārgatvādindriyādidvārāpekṣitvamupapadyate । yathā apavarakādyāvaraṇāvṛtaḥ pradīpastadāvaraṇagatacchidradvāreṇa bahiḥ prakāśayati । sa eva tu pradīpaḥ prabhinnāpavarakāvaraṇaḥ sannanapekṣya tattacchidramārgaṁ samantataḥ prakāśayati ॥
tathaiveśvarasatvaṁ kleśādyāvaraṇayogābhāvādasati viṣayaviśeṣānirodhikāraṇe yugapadaśeṣārthagrahaṇam । tataśca svātilaṅghanānatilaṅghanādidoṣābhāvaḥ ॥
sarvasya viṣayatvāt sarvamekeśvaraṁ jagat, paripālakāpekṣasthānādyanekavastuviśeṣatvāt, prasiddhevaṁbhūtaikarājyavat ॥
tathā, niyatasthitihetvanekopakaraṇavattvāt, anyonyābhibhavanīyaprabhūtataradurgayuktānekadeśatvāt, abhaṅguravyavasthaśarīrabhedavatvācca, pratītaivaṁvidhaikarājyavat ॥
anekakartṛbhoktṛkriyāsādhanaphalasaṁbandhaviśeṣajñānavadupadiṣṭāni varṇāśramādyanuṣṭhānāni, phalārthibhiḥ pratyavāyabhīrubhistaiścānuṣṭhīyamānatvāt, bhaiṣajyarasāyanādyanuṣṭhānavat ।
tathā tadupadeśāḥ, parārthatvāt, upadetvāt, vidvacchraddheyatvāt, upadeśādṛte manuṣyānavagamyārthatvācca, bhaiṣajyādyupadeśavat ॥
śarīrendriyāṇi sarvatatprayojanavidekanimittakāraṇābhinirvartitāni, niyatakriyāsthitihetusādhanavatvāt, prāsādagṛhadāruyantrādivat ॥
atrābhidhīyate-svābhāvikī tāvanna bhavati pṛthivyādiracanā । dṛṣṭānto naiva tatsādhanasya vidyate । kaṇṭakādīnāṁ ca taikṣṇyaṁ na svābhāvikamabhyupeyate ॥
agnyādīnāmivauṣṇyādi svabhāvo vastudharmatvāddhetoḥ pṛthivyādiracaneti cet-prāsādādiracanāyā vastudharmatvāt syādānaikāntikatvam ॥
atha svābhāvikatvāditi cet-asiddhatvam, jagadracanāyā dharmādharmaphalopabhegārthaprayuktatvābhyupagamāt । kartṛdharmādharmastitvamupariṣṭāt sādhayiṣyate ॥
tasmāt pṛthivyādiracanā svābhāvikī na bhavati, prāṇyupabhegārthatvāt , prāsādādiracanāvat । candrādipravṛtirna svābhāvikī, pravṛtitvāt, asmadādipravṛttivat ॥
asmadādipravṛtirapi svābhāvikīti cet-na-agnyuṣṇatvavānityatvaprasaṅgāt । na hyagnyuṣṇatvaṁ svābhāvikaṁ sanniyataṁ nimittamātmalābhāya kāṅkṣati dharmisattāvyatirekeṇa । kriyāphalaracanādīnāṁ tu viśiṣṭanimittākāṅkṣaṇamātmapratilambhāyati na svābhāvikatvam ॥
niyatanimittākāṅkṣaṇamapi prāsādādiracanānāṁ svabhāva iti vet— astu tathāvidhasvabhāvatvam । tathā'pi pṛthivyādiracanāyā niyatanimittākāṅkṣaṇasvabhāvatvaṁ prāsādādivadeva । tataśva nāmni vipratipatirna doṣāya, kārakāntarāpekṣatvāditi pratijñā pratirūpakāriṇī ca ॥
bhavadbhiruktani [anumānāni] lokānumāgamavirodhāt [apramāṇāni] । anumānavirodhaṁ tāvat sātiśayatvādibhyo brūmaḥ ॥
[“yaḥ sarvajñaḥ sarvavit” “eko vaśī”] ityevamādibhyaḥ samācakṣmahe ॥
