samastale.okavirodhaṁ cāpi । sarva evānārīge.opālaṁ saṁvyavaharamāṇāḥ satataṁ śivanārāyaṇādināmnā praṇihitacetasaḥ pratiṣedhatsvapi saṁbhinnabuddhiṣu akarṇīkṛtatatpratiṣedhaviṣayapallavāḥ parameśvaraṁ praṇatamūrdhānaḥ kusumāñjaliprabhṛtibhirarcayanti । phalaṁ cāpi tata eva prārthayante ॥
atha cedbrūyāt - sarvajñābhāvapratipādibhirasmadanumānairitarapratijñānāṁ virodha iti - atrocyate –
naitānyanumānāni । katham ? prathamaṁ tāvat pratijñaiva duṣṭā । yadi tāvadīśvaraśabdārthaḥ sarvajño na bhavatīti yuṣmadabhipreta īśvara ucyeta, tathā ca siddhasādhyatā syāt ॥
athāsmadabhipretaḥ, tathāpi yuṣmākamasiddhaviśeṣyatā bhavet ॥
atheśvaratvasyāsarvajñatvamucyate, tathāpi siddhaṁ sādhyate ॥
tathaivābhyupagamavirodho'pi । katham ? aiśvaryasarvajñabījatvayorvivardhamānatvāt kāṣṭhāprāpti: parimāṇavadevābhyupagamanīyā । tathā kāṣṭhāprāptaiśvaryasarvajñatvavācināvapīśvarasarvajñaśabdāveṣitavyau । kāṣṭhāpraptiśca niravadhikatvam । yathā parimāṇādīnāmātmākāśādyanantaparimāṇāntatvam । tathā cānumānābhyupagamasvavacanavirodhāḥ syuḥ ॥
kiñcānyat-kāṣṭhāprāteśvaratvasya ca śabdārthasya parityāge śabdārthavādaḥ prāpnoti । na hi śabdaḥ parityaktābhidheyaikadeśa uccaritaḥ ॥
atha parimāṇāderapi niravadhikaniṣṭhatvaṁ neṣyate-siddhāntavirodhaḥ । ātmākāśādīnāṁ hi sarvagatatvābhāve, madhyamaparimāṇatvānityatvādidoṣaprasaṅgaśca । athāpyātmanaḥ sarvatra kāryadarśanāt sarvagatatvam, tatrāpi śakunyādyātmanāṁ manuṣyagocarākāśādigatatvaṁ sāmānyato dṛṣṭādevānumānāt syāt । tathā cehāpi sāmānyato dṛṣṭānumānatvaṁ kena vāryate ॥
athānumānavirodhānnāvadhāryata iti cet-ātmādīnāmapi prameyatvavastutvādibhyaḥ pṛthivyādivadityanumānavirodhodbhāvanā śakyate [kartum] vaktum । na ca tāvatā'trānumānavirodhitvam, anumānābhāvaprasaṅgāt ॥
tathā anumānābhāva iṣyata iti cet---pratyakṣe'pyanāśvāsaḥ syāt । atha niścīyamānabuddhyutpatteḥ pratyakṣapramāṇatvam, anumānasyāpi tarhi niścitabuddhisamudbhavādastu prāmāṇyam । atha dṛṣṭasambandhadhūmādiviṣayamevānumānamiti cet-tatrāpyanumānābhāva eva - anagniḥ dhūmavān predaśaḥ, pratyakṣānupalabhyamānāgnisambandhe sati pradeśatvāt, agniśūnyopalabhyamānapradeśavaditi ॥
atha pramāṇāntarasaṁvādādadṛṣṭasambandhaviṣaye'numānasyānumānatvamucyate, pratyakṣamapi pramāṇāntarasaṁvādāt pramāṇaṁ bhavet, pramāṇatvāt, anumānavadeva । apramāṇaṁ syāt । pramāṇāntarasaṁvādābhāvāt, sāmānyato dṛṣṭādivaditi । tasmānna sāmānyato dṛṣṭasya pramāṇatvaṁ niścitabuddhitvādbādhituṁ śakyam ॥
kiṁ ca – sāmānyato dṛṣṭasya mānatvamanabhyupagacchataḥ svaśarīramaraṇasambandhalakṣaṇasyānupalabdhapūrvatvāt sarpādibhyo bhayānupapattiḥ । vyādhipratīkārāya cikitsādiprayogo na ghaṭeta । maraṇaśaṅkākāraṇābhāvāt । tathā janmanopyupalambhābhāvādātmaśarīrasyājatvaṁ cintyeta । hānopādānaniyogābhāvaśca syāt ॥
tasmāt sāmānyato dṛṣṭaparimāṇatvādisātiśayatvasāmānyādīśvarajñānaniravadhikatvasiddhiḥ ॥
kiṁ cānyat-īśvarasarvajñatvasya pratiṣiddhyamānatvāt sattvābhyupagamaḥ, a(nupa)padārthasya pratiṣedhāsambhavāt । na hi kevalo neti (na) prayujyate । īśvaraḥ sarvajño na bhavatītyucyate । tatra kvacit sarvajñatvamabhyupagataṁ bhavati ॥
tadyathā-śaśasya viṣāṇaṁ nāsti, vandhyāyāḥ suto nāsti, kusumamākāśasya nāstīti kvacidvidyamānānameva viṣāṇasutakusumādīnāṁ śaśādisaṁbanvena pratiṣedhaḥ, tadvadihāpi syāt ॥
kiṁ ca-īśvaraḥ sarvajño na bhavatīti, īśvaraśabdārthasarvajñatvasambandhapratiṣedhādinā īśvarādanyasya sarvajñatvābhyupagamaḥ । sambandhināvanabhyupagamya sambandhapratiṣedho hi na śakyaḥ kartum ॥
sa eṣa yuktaḥ sambandhaḥ pratiṣidhyate, ayuktaścābhyupagamyate । tatpariśramamātram । īśvarasarvajñayoḥ prasiddhapadārthayorapratiṣedhāt । na hyanantaparimāṇamākāśaṁ na bhavatītyākāśasya prasiddhamanantaparimāṇatvaṁ pratiṣidhyāprasiddhānantaparimāṇatveṣu ghaṭādiṣu tat vyavasthāpayituṁ yuktam ॥
atha sanbandhināveveśvarasarvajñatve pratiṣidhyete, svavacanavirodhinī pratijñā syāt । īśvarasarvajñatvayorīśvarasarvajñaśabdārthatvābhyupagamāt । na bhavatyagniragniśabdārtho na bhavatīti ॥
athāprasiddhapadārthāvīśvarasarvajñaśabdau, tathā'pi tadarthapratiṣedhānupapattiḥ । aprasiddhasyārthasya prāptyabhāvāt । na hi kiṁcidaprasiddhametacchikhare meṣakuṭumbinīṁ pratiṣeddhumarhati । kiṁ ca śabdopādānānarthakyaṁ ca । aprasiddhapadārthatvāt ॥
atha prasiddhārthayorīśvarasarvajñaśabdayorniravadhikeśvarasarvajñatvābhyāmaprasiddhābhyāṁ gaganasyeva kusumaiḥ saṁbandhaḥ kaiścit kalpitaḥ, sa pratiṣidhyeta-tathā'pyabhyupetārthapratiṣedhāt svavacanavirodhinyeva pratijñā syāt । sātiśayaniratiśayānekeśvarasarvajñavyaktimatsāmānyayorīśvarasarvajñaśabdārthavenābhyupagamāt ॥
prasiddhaṁ hi loke īśvarasarvajñaśabdayorutkarṣopakarṣayuktānekavyaktiviṣayabuddhyutpādakatvam । na hi grāmādhipatirīśvara iti dvitrigrāmaviṣayādhipataya uttarottareśvarā na bhavanti । yo vā kuṭumbādhipatirīśvaro na bhavati sarvaiścāsāvarthavānīśvaraśabdaḥ ॥
tathā vaiyākaraṇaḥ sarvajña ityukte nādhikavijñānayukto na bhavati । niravadhikau sāvadhikau veśvarasarvajñāvīśvarasarvajñaśabdayorarthāvabhyupagamyeyātām । atastatpratiṣedhādabhyupagamavirodhinī pratijñā syāt, ātmākāśādīnāṁ mahattvasya mahacchabdārthatvapratiṣedhavat ॥
atheśvarasarvajñau niravadhikau na sta:, anupalabhyamānatvāt, anīśvaradvitīyaśirovadityucyeta, tathā'pi śabdārthābhyupagamādabhyupagamāvirodhinī pratijñā ॥
sātiśayatvādibhiraiśvaryasarvajñatvabījādiliṅgairniravadhikeśvarasarvajñatvayorupalabhyamānatvaniravadhikaparimāṇatvavadityasiddhiranupalabdheḥ ॥
atha aviśeṣyaiveśvaraśabdārthaḥ sarvaijño na bhavatītyucyeta vastutvādihetubhirasmadādivaditi, tadā sarvapramāṇavirodhinī pratijñā syāt । prasiddheśvaraśabdārthasya prākṛtasarvajñatvasya sarvapramāṇasiddhatvāt । yathā īśvaraśabdārthaḥ [sarvajño na bhavati] prameyatvādibhirhetubhirghaṭādivadityukte yat brūyāttadevāhaṁ vakṣyāmi ॥
iha sarvajñaśūnyaṁ jagat । kālī vā diśa ākāśaṁ vā prāṇimaddeśo vā prāṇino vā sarve sarvajñaśūnyāḥ । pramāṇāni vā sarvāṇi sarvajñāviṣayāṇi । pramātāro vā sarvajñasyāpratipattāra:, ityevaṁjātīyāsu pratijñāsu niravadhikeśvare sarvajñe vā pratiṣidhyamāne, prasiddheśvarasarvajñaśabdārthābhyupagamavirodhāḥ pratijñādoṣā vacanīyāḥ ॥
nanu ca vandhyāsuto nāstīti, tacchūnyaṁ jagat kālo veti, pratijñāyamāne yathoktapratijñādoṣaprāptirbhavet - naiṣa doṣaḥ- vandhyāsutasattālakṣaṇasya pratiṣeddhavyasya vākyārthasyeśvarasarvajñaśabdārthavadaprasiddhatvāt kevalaśabdaprāpitasannidhānabuddhimātrapratipanne padārtha [padārtha pratiṣedha] vyāpāro'stīti vandhyāsutastitvasya (vā nāstitvasya) nābhyupagamo'sti । tato nābhyupagatapratiṣedhadoṣaḥ ॥
nanu ceśvaraḥ sarvajño na bhavatītyatrāpi buddhimātraṁ prāpyamāṇaṁ pratiṣidhyate, na kacidapi prāpnuvadvastu (na) pratiṣeddhuṁ śakyate pratihastineva hastī । yadi ca nañā vastu nirākariṣyate, nañmātreṇaiśvaravādipakṣatvamapi[pakṣo'pi]nirākariṣyate, (ataḥ) tasmādihāpi buddhimātrapratiṣedha iti nābhyupagatapratiṣedhaḥ pratijñādoṣaḥ ॥
satyamevam । kiṁ tvasti viśeṣaḥ । pramāṇasiddhavastuviṣayā buddhirvastvantare kālaviśeṣe vā pratiṣidhyate vastusāmānyāt prāpnuvatī yathā ghaṭo nāstīti । kvacidvināpyarthena buddhireva śabdapratyupanītasannidhānā kalpitavastvantarā pratiṣidhyate । yathā vandhyāsutī nāstīti ॥
yatra tu pramāṇāntarasiddhasadvastupratiṣedhastatrāpi[sti]abhyupagatārthapratiṣedhadoṣaḥ । yathā īśvaraśabdārthaḥ sarvajño na bhavatīti । īśvarasarvajñaśabdayorabhivardhamāneśvarasarvajñavyaktyanugatasāmānyavacanatvena liṅgena niravadhikeśvarasarvajñasattāvadyotitvaṁ siddhameva । mahadbahusarvānantaparimāṇādiśabdavat ॥
yathaivaite mahadādiśabdāḥ prasiddhasātiśayamahadādyanugatasāmānyārthābhidhāyinaḥ santo niravadhikamahadvahusarvānantaparimāṇavyaktīnāmastitvāvadyotanaliṅgā bhavanti । mahadādisāmānyānāṁ sātiśayavyaktyanugatānāṁ niravadhikamahadādivyaktivyāpana(ravyākṣīṇa)śaktitvāt । na hi santaṁ vyāpyamarthaṁ tadvaddhyāpakaḥ sannartho na vyāpnotīti । niravadhikāttu paro vyāpyo nāstīti vyāpakasya sāmānyasya kṣayaḥ vyāpyaviṣayatvenaiva prasiddhatvāttatra । tasmāt pramāṇasiddhatvādīśvarasarvajñaśabdāthayorabhāvaṁ sādhayato'bhyupagatārthapratiṣedha eveti duṣṭā pratijñā ॥
na ceśvarasarvajñaśabdayoratadarthavamanyārthatvaṁ vā karta viktuṁ śakyate । tathā śatijñānaiśvayaṇāṁ pratipururṣa samucitānāṁ sātiśayānāṁ niravadhika tatrva ataḥ[nānunmattaḥjpratiṣeddhumutsahetetyanumānavirodhitvaṁ pratijñāyāḥ ॥
kiṁ cānyat- pari[para]kalpitasyeśvarasya pratiṣedhaṁ kurvantaḥ pratyakṣaparacittāniṣṭāḥ prāpnuvanti । paravākyāditi cenna - sātiśayatvādisarvajñasādhakaliṅgapratipādakavadaviśiṣṭatvāt paravākyasya । tādṛśavākyārthapratiṣedhe cābhyupagatapratiṣedhaḥ, pūrvavadevānumānavirodhaśca ॥
kiṁ ca - prameyatvādihetūnāmapi asiddhatvam । kutaḥ ? asmābhirniratiśayajñānaiśvaryaviśiṣṭatvasyābhyupagatatvāt । atha svayamapi tādṛśamabhyupagacchettadā । sarvajñasiddhiḥ, abhyupagatatvāt ॥
kiṁ cānyat-abhyupagatatādṛkpratiṣedhe, yathā ghaṭo ghaṭo na bhavati, vastutvāt, paṭavāditi, evamihāpi syāt ॥
kiṁ ca-niravadhikasyānabhyupagame, prameyavādīnām [a]pakṣadharmatvamāśrayāsiddhatvaṁ ca । tadabhyupagame hi kiṁ sādhyaṁ bhavet ? yo hi tṛptavantaṁ brūyāt mā'trātsīriti, kiṁ tena kṛtaṁ syāt ॥
athāpi syāt--niravadhikamīśvaramabhisandhāya tasya sarvajñatvaṁ niṣedhāmīti । naidatapi yuktam -sarvajñatvasyapi niravadhikatvāt ॥
api ca sātiśayaiśvaryasarvajñatvayorutkarṣānutkarṣaviṣayatvena vyabhicārānneśvarasarvajñaśabdamukhyābhidheyatvam । yathā mahadādayaḥ śabdā vyabhicaritamahattvādiṣu ghaṭādiṣvamukhyāḥ, nākāśādiṣu, tathaivātrāpi niratiśayamaiśvaryaṁ sarvajñatvaṁ cāvyabhicārīti sa eva mukhyaḥ śabdārthaḥ । na ca mukhyanirākaraṇaṁ sādhimānamṛcchati ॥
kiṁ ca-yathā bhavatā anumānāgamaprasiddheśvarasya prameyatvādidharmavikalpatayā sarvajñatvaṁ nirākriyate, tathaiva prameyatvādibhiracetanatvamapi ghaṭādivadeva prāpnuyāt । avirodhāt । yathā prameyatvaṁ[a]sarvajñatvena vyāptamevamacetanatvādibhirapi ॥
pratyakṣavirodha iti cet-ihāpi anumānāgamavirodhaṁ kiṁ kaṭākṣeṇāpi nekṣase ॥
nāpi ca prameyatvādidharmasāmānyena sapakṣe vipakṣe vā kiñcit । kvacidadhyāropayituṁ śakyam । vastuviṣaye sarvatra prameyatvādīnāmāstitvāt । na matimohanārthaḥ prameyatvādyupanyāsaḥ ॥ atha ātmatvāditi cet, muktātmavadajñatvaprasaṅgaḥ syādbhavadīśvarāṇām । pratyakṣādivirodha iti cet-atrāpyanumānādivirodhaḥ pūrvavadeva ॥
bhūtabhaviṣyatkālayorapi īśvarasyānupalabdhāra itīdānīntaneśvarāṇāmupailabdhṛbhiranaikāntike prāṇitvādityādi । kiṁ ca atītānāgatakālayorapi sātiśayatvādiliṅgairupalabdhavanta upalapsyamānāśca prāṇinaḥ pramāṇakuśalāḥ, pramāṇakuśalatvāt, asmadādivat । atha aśarīratvādasarvajñaḥ, muktākāśādivat iti cet-na-saśarīratvāt । vyaktāvyaktaṁ hi sarvamaśarīraṁ saśarīratvādanityeśvaratvaṁ dharmādyapekṣatvādityuktatvāditi cet – na – śarīratvāt । saśarīrāśarīratvavirodha iti cet – na – muktamucyamānaikātmano'śarīratvasaśarīratvadarśanāt । tatra bhinnakālatvādavirodha iti cet-na- atrāpi bhinnakālābhyupagamāt ॥
[“aśarīraṁ śarīreṣu”] iti । tathā
śrutīnāṁ vipratiṣedhārthavādīśvarāpratyāyakatvam iti cet-na-ananyaśeṣatvāt । na hi karmaśeṣatve śrutiliṅgādīnāmanyatamadapi pramāṇamasti ॥
[‘mantavyo nididhyāsitavyaḥ'] ityādiviṣayatvānnāgnihotrādiśeṣatvaṁ yuktam ॥
[“sarvāṁśca lekānāpnoti sarvāṁśca kāmānyastamātmānamanuvidya vijānāti'] ityādiphalamuddiśya vidhānāt ॥
[“vāyurvai kṣepiṣṭhā devatā”] iti vāyorakṣepiṣṭhatvam । kvacidasatā'pi stutyadisambhava iti cet-na-anumānasiddhasyehopadānāt ॥
atha sarvakāryakaraṇayogādīśvarasya sarvaprāṇisukhaduḥkhādisaṁbandha iti cet-na-nimittabhedāt । dharmādinimittaḥ saṁsāriṇāṁ śarīrādisambandhaḥ । dharmādinimi(ktānāṁ)tto duḥkhādiyogaḥ । neśvarasya dharmādayaḥ । niratiśayaiśvaryādihetutvāccharīrādikāryakaraṇasaṁbandhasya । yathā grahatadāviṣṭayoḥ ॥
atha cakṣurādikaraṇatvādasmadādivat sarvānupalabdhariti cet-na- sarvaviṣayagrahaṇasamarthānāṁ pratibandhakaraṇābhāvāt । sarvagatānāṁ hi karaṇānāṁ [a]dharmādisaṁvaraṇena svaviṣayasaṅkocaḥ kriyate । yasya punarāvaraṇaṁ pratibandhaka[maṁ]- dharmādi na vidyate, tasya tadabhāvādaśeṣasvaviṣayagrahaṇāni karaṇānīti na duṣyati ॥
atha vā sarvaprāṇikaraṇaiḥ [īśvaraḥ] pṛthagātmanaḥ karaṇābhāve'pyāveśagraha iva sarvamanubhavati । na ca prāṇiśūnyo viṣayaḥ kaścidvidyate, ‘yaḥ pṛthivyāṁ tiṣṭhan’ ‘yo'psu tiṣṭhan’ ityevamādiśruterantaryāminānna īśvarasya sarveṣvavasthitatvaśravaṇāt ॥
api vā prakṛṣṭameva sa(rva)ttvaṁ nilyānatiśāyitaśaktijñāneśvaratvadharmakam, sarvagatatvādākāśavat sarvayogi, sarvārthatvātsarvaviṣayaprakāśakam, dharmādhamīdiviprayogādapratibandhaśaktikaṁ ca iti akāyānindriyatvapakṣe'pīśvarasarvajñatvasiddhiḥ ॥
cakṣurādyapekṣameva cittasya rūpādipratilambhasāmarthyamiti cet – na - aiśvaryadharmādyabhāvābhyāṁ parihṛtatvāt ॥
api ca cakṣurgrāhyasyāpi cakṣuṣā agrahaṇaṁ loke dṛśyate । cakṣurgrāhyaṁ sat sarvaṁ tamaḥ sannimīlitalocanairapi svasthāntaḥkaraṇairupalabhyate । tadeva cāndhatamasaṁ viṣphāritanayanairapyanyagatacittairnaiva gṛhyate । yathā gṛhyamāṇa evākāśe prakāśaḥ ॥
athāpi prakāśābhāvamātrameva tame na vasviti brayāt - tacca na - abhāvasya vastutirodhānasāmarthyābhāvāt ॥
atha grahaṇanimittasya prakāśasyābhāvādeva ghaṭādyagrahaṇaṁ, na vastutirodhāyakaṁ tama iti bruvīta-na-cakṣuṣaḥ prakāśakatvāt prakāśasāhāyakāpekṣānupapattiḥ । asati bhinnajātīye vastuni vastūnāṁ tirodhātṛṇi tatra yā ca yāvatī ca । mātrā prakāśakatvāccakṣuṣā prakāśyeta । na hi pradīpaḥ pradīpāntaradvaitīyakāpekṣaḥ prakāśayati ॥
kiṁ cānyat-cakṣuṣaḥ prakāśāntarasahāyatvāpekṣatāyāṁ ca niśāyāmapi tārādhipatiprakāśadvitīyena cakṣuṣā divasa iva rūpādigrahaṇaprasaṅgastirodhānasyāsati nimitte ॥
kiṁ cānyat-abhāvaścettamaḥ, candramāsu niśāyāṁ bhā(bhava)ntīṣu tamasā mandena na pravartitavyam । sarvātmanaiva hi tena vinaśanīyam । bhāsāṁ bhāvāt । bhāsāṁ tu vastutvānmandatvapāṭavādiviśeṣo ghaṭate, na(bhāvasya)abhāvasya nirviśeṣatvāt ॥
kiṁ ca-sahāyābhāvāccakṣuṣa upalabdhasāmarthyābhāvādagrahaṇamityetadapi vyabhicarati । yathā satyapi vidyullatāprakāśe tīvratare vidyullatavilāse ca kiṁ taddṛṣṭirnopalabhate । na hi vidyutaḥ sahāyake dṛṣṭacakitatvenāgrahaṇaṁ virodhābhāvādyuttam ॥
kiñca - cikitsāśāstre chāyā madhuraśītaletyucyate । na hyavastuno madhuraśītalatvam । tathā cākṣipati pathyatvam । nābhāvasya pathyāpathyatvaṁ brūyuḥ ॥
pradīpācchāyopalabdheśca । abhāvaścettamaḥ, pradīpaprabhāmaṇḍale pradīpācchāyā kathaṁ bhavet । vastutve'pi virodhādayuktamiti cet-na-viṣasarpayoriva saṁbhavāt । yathā prāṇaviyogakaramapi viṣaṁ pannagaprāṇaviyogāya na paryāpnoti, tathā pradīpatacchāyayorapi ॥
tasmādvastu tamaḥ, prakarṣāpakarṣavattvāt , prabhāvat । virodhidravyāpaneyatvācca, ghaṭavat । upalabdhṛvyavadhānakaratvācca, bhittivaditi ॥
itaśvendriyanirapekṣamapyantaḥkaraṇamindriyaviṣayagrahaṇāya samartham । pihitakarṇavivarasya ghoṣopalaṁbhāt । na ca pihitakarṇasaṁpuṭasya śrotrāntaramanumātuṁ śakyam । badhirasyāpi pihitaśrotrapuṭasya tadagrahaṇāt ॥
kiñca-pratijñājñānenāpi rūpādigrahaṇamindrayanirapekṣaṁ dṛśyate ॥
kiñcānyat-smṛteścānupapattiḥ syāt indriyanirapekṣasya cittasya sātiśayagrahaṇasāmartharye'pi । spaṣṭāśca smṛtayaḥ svāpnā rūpādiviṣayāḥ ॥
yadi cakṣurādyantaḥkaraṇābhyāṁ samanvitābhyāṁ rūpagrahaṇaṁ pūrvamapi nirvartiṣyate, svapnādāvapi samucitābhyāmeva paryagrahīṣyata । na caivamasti । sukhādigrahaṇe svātantryaṁ cittasya sarvaprasiddham ॥
[“indriyapranāḍikayā’] iti । tathā śrutirapi-
athocyeta - indriyāṇāmālekāpekṣāvat antaḥkaraṇamapīndriyasāhāyakāpekṣameva grāhakamiti –tanna - vyabhicārāt । rātriñcarāṇāṁ vibhinnavyālokadvaitīyakena divasa iva rūpagrahaṇam । satyapi prakāśe na rūpasya grahaṇamulūkādibhirdine ॥
kiñca-sādhanāpekṣasya vijñānasādhanādṛte'pi tulādau । darśanamātreṇaiva suvarṇādiparimāṇajñānaṁ dṛśyate ॥
atha cedbrūyādānarthakyaṁ cakṣurādīnāmiti-sa vaktavyaḥ-tulādivadevānyatrārthavattvamindriyāṇāmiti । yathaiva tulādiviṣayavaimatyaprakarṣāt puruṣasya vināpi tulādisādhanena darśanamātrādeva kanakadivastuparicchedakauśalaṁ, tathaivāntaḥkaraṇasyānapekṣitacakṣurādisāhāyakasyāpi vaimatyaprakarṣādrūpādigrahaṇasāmarthyaṁ na vihanyate ॥
nāpi hyanekanirvartanīyaṁ kriyājātamekena nābhinirvartyate । dṛśyante ca bahubhiruttotyamānaṁ śilādikamadvitīyā hastipuruṣādayaḥ keciduttolayantaḥ ॥
tathaivendriyasahāyenānyeṣāmanta:karaṇena gṛhyumāṇā rūpādayaḥ parameśvaracittasatvenānākalita(vakarṇita)cakṣurādiparispandena kevalenaiva gṛhyante । kāṣṭhāgatatvādvematyaśakyaiśvaryaprakarṣasya ॥
saṁsāriṇāṁ tato nikṛṣṭatvādavidyādimalenaiśvaryaśaktijñānādīnāmindriyasahakāritvāpekṣitvamanta: karaṇasya । śilādisamuttolana iva hīnabalānām ॥
ye(ṣāṁ) punaḥ saṁsāriṇa eva santa īśvarībhavanti buddharṣabhādayaḥ, teṣāṁ niratiśayaśaktijñānaiśvaryanupapattiḥ । kālaparicchedyatvāt । abhyupagacchanti ca taddarśanaślāghinaḥ kālaparicchedanīyake teṣām ॥
nāsmadīśvarasya kālaparicchedyatā । tatkālaistadādyakālaiśva buddhādibhiraparijñātaiśvaryādisātiśayatvādiliṅgairanumeya evāsau । nāmuṣmin kāla utpanna utpadyata utpatsyamāna iti tridhā kaiścidanumīyate । niratiśayatvavirodhī hi tathā[dā]syāt ॥
tasmāt buddhādīnāṁ siddhyapekṣatvāt, pūrvabuddhānāṁ kālādhikyaprāpteruttarakālabuddhasyāpi na niratiśaktyaiśvaryajñānatvaṁ viruddham । atha tutyaśaktijñānaiśvaryāṇāmeva teṣāṁ samānarājyarājānāmivāsamānakālatvamiti brūyāt, tathāpi buddhāntarakālasya vyāptyabhilāṣavighātānniratiśayaiśvaryādyabhāvaḥ ॥
abhilaṣati hi kaścit buddhāntaraṁ vaśīkartum , tadviṣayaṁ ca vyāptum । aniyatatvādicchāyāḥ । buddhāntarāvaśīkaraṇe ca sarvavaśitvaṁ hī(nī)yeta ॥
atha ceducyeta, buddhāntarasyānanugrāhyatvādrāgādyabhāvācca tadviṣayavyāptāvanabhilāṣa iti-atrocyate-yathaiva prāptabuddhatvasya kaṁcitkālamavasthānamabhilāṣapūrvakam, tathā buddhāntarakālāvasthānābhilāṣeṇāvaśyaṁ bhavitavyam ॥
anugrāhyaprāṇyantarabhāvācca kālāntarāvasthānābhilāṣeṇa yukta bhavitum । na ca bhaviṣyatā buddhena sarve prāṇabhṛto'nugrahīṣyante ॥
buddhatvasya ca duḥkhādyātmakatve'pi prāṇyanugrahārthatvādbuddhasthiteḥ kālāntarāvasthānecchayā bhavitavyameva । siddheśca prāgavidyādiparāmaśat, buddhasvarūpasya ca duḥkhaśūnyādyātmakatvasya tairabhyupetatvāt, buddharṣabhādyanyatīrthakaraṇāt[karāt]niratiśayaśaktijñānaiścaryānupapattiḥ ॥
kālānavacchedātu naite doṣā asmadīśvare kramante । śaktijñānaiśvaryāṇāṁ tu niravadhikatvānumānāt sātiśayatvānavasthitatvādidoṣaḥ nātmākāśādīnāmivātiśaṅkanīyaḥ ॥

sāmānyamātropasaṁhāre ca kṛtopakṣayamanumānaṁ na viśeṣapratipattau samarthamiti। tasya saṁjñādiviśeṣapratipattirāgamataḥ paryanveṣyā। tasyā''tmānugrahābhāve'pi bhūtānugrahaḥ prayojanam। jñānadharmopadeśena kalpapralayamahāpralayeṣu saṁsāriṇaḥ puruṣānuddhariṣyāmīti। tathā coktam – ādividvānnirmāṇacittamadhiṣṭhāya kāruṇyādbhagavānparamarṣirāsuraye jijñāsamānāya tatraṁ provāceti ॥ 25 ॥

vivaraṇam
[sāmānyamātropasaṁhāre kṛtopakṣayamanumānam iti ।] niratiśayaśaktijñānaiśvaryayuktapuruṣaviśeṣasattvasāmānyamātropasaṁhāre
tadetaduktaṁ bhavati । yadaivaṁ satāmapi guṇānāṁ sāmānyapratipādanakṛtakṣayatvānna pratipādakamanumānam, kimaṅga punaranyantāsambhāvyamānasannidhīnāmanumeyadharmaviruddhānāmaśaktyajñānadharmādharmānaiśvaryādīnāṁ [na]tatpratyāyakamiti ॥
ata eva ca viruddhapratisādhanānupapattiḥ । sarvajñāstitvānumānavat prathamaṁ tadabhāvapratipādakānumānāpravṛtteḥ । na hyanumānasya paroktyudīkṣādharmatvamasti । na hi dhūmadarśanenāgnyanumāne vaktrantaroktirudīkṣyate ॥
na ca svayameva sarvajñāstitvaṁ nāstitvaṁ vā buddhi(prati)pūrvamāśaṅkayate । ghaṭādivat sarvajñasadbhāvasya svayamanabhyupagamāt । na hyanirdhāritaśaśisvarūpaḥ śaśe viṣāṇamasti nāstīti kaścidāśaṅkate ॥
[saṁjñādiviśeṣapratipattirāgamataḥ paryanveṣyā] iti । vedetihāsapurāṇayogadharmaśāstrādyāgamataḥ paryanveṣyā ॥
[tasyātmānugrahābhāve'pi] tasyātmārthamavāptavyābhāvāt
[coktamādividvāniti] -ādau vidvān
[āgamataḥ paryanveṣyā] ityuktatvāt । anumānasya ca tadviṣayasyānupapattiḥ viśeṣasaṁbandhāgrahaṇāditi ॥ 25 ॥
sa eṣaḥ –
pūrveṣāmapi guruḥ kālenānavacchedāt ॥ 26 ॥
pūrve hi guravaḥ kālenāvacchidyante। yatrāvacchedārthena kālo nopāvartate sa eṣa pūrveṣāmapi guruḥ। yathā'sya sargasyā''dau prakarṣagatyā siddhastathā'tikrāntasargādiṣvapi pratyetavyaḥ ॥ 26 ॥

vivaraṇam
[pūrveṣāmapi] gurūṇām abhyudayaniḥśreyasasarvasādhanasādhyasaṁbandhopadeśināṁ
[kālenānavacchedāditi ।] atītānāgatapratyupādīyamānatvaviśiṣṭena kālenānye guravo'vachidyante । sa tvīśvaraḥ sarvadā mukteśvaratvena tairapyasmābhirivānumeyaḥ ॥
[yatrāvacchedārthaḥ kāle nopāvartata iti ।] yasminnīśvare viṣaye
nanu ceśvaraprakṛṣṭasattvasya pradhānakāryatvāt, pradhānakāryasya ca kālāvacchedyatvāt, kasmāttatsattvaṁ nāvacchidyate puruṣasvarūpaṁ hi sarveṣāmeva kālānavacchedya(miti nāśaṅkanīya)mapariṇāmitvāt puruṣasya ॥
atha manyethāḥ-tantrāntaraprasiddheśvaravat sattvanirapekṣa īśvara iti tadayuktam-prakṛṣṭasattvāpādānābhyupagamāt ॥
athāpi manvīthāḥ--īśvarasattvāt pravṛttameva kāryamavacchinatti kāle neśvarasattvamiti-tadapyayuktam-vyaktasya paricchedyatvāt । vyaktaṁ ceśvarasattvam ॥
athāpyabhisandadhīthāḥ-pradhānāvasthameveśvarasattvamiti--tadanupapannam-- jñānānupapateḥ ॥
athāpi pratipadyethāḥ-satkāryābhyupagamādbījaphalavallarīkusumādivajjñānādīnāṁ pradhānāvasthā yatsattvameveti-tacca na sādhu-vyavahārayogyatvāt । sarveṣāṁ ca tathā satyanavacchedyatvaṁ jñānādisattāmātrasambandhaviśeṣāt prāpnuyāt ॥
athāpi bruvīthāḥ-vyaktatve satyapi kāryāṇāṁ kasyacit paricchedyatvaṁ kālīnaṁ kasyacinneti-tacca na-nyāyavirodhāt ॥
athāpi pratyavatiṣṭhethāḥ, īśvarasatvasya kālāparicchedyatvamāgamasiddhamiti - tacca na- avadyotakatvādagamasya ॥
athāpyācakṣīthāḥ-vidyamānasyaiva kālāparicchedyatvasyājñātasyāvadyotaka agama iti-taccāpi na -nirodhādisamanuṣṭhānanimittatvāt kālā(ja)vacchedye vaimalyādanavacchedyo vaimalyādanavacchedyaśceti viruddhaṁ syāt ॥
atrocyate-īśvarasatvavaimatyaprakarṣāpekṣatvāt kālānavacchedyatvasyādoṣaḥ ॥
yathā anyeṣāṁ gurūṇāṁ yogadharmādisamanuṣṭhānanimittatvāt kālānavacchedyo vaimatyaprakarṣaḥ, tathā na bhagavataḥ । katham? sarvadā'tyantatirobhūtarajastamastvādanapekṣitadharmādinimitte sakalārthāvadyotakaraṁ kālānavacchedyaṁ sattvasvarūpavadbhagavatsattve jñānam ॥
[yatnāvacchedārtha: kālo nopāvartata] iti । na tvakāryāpekṣayā hyucyate ॥
[yathā'sya sargasyādau] jñānavaimalpa
asya ca sūtrasyedaṁ prayojanam - yathā dṛṣṭā guravo jñānadharmādyupadeśitvādananyaśaraṇairanavaratamupāsyante, tathā bhagavānayamapi sarvagurūṇāmapi gurutvāttato'pi viśeṣeṇa nārāyaṇādināmā(dīnāma)nanyacetobhiḥ svahṛdayenāniśaṁ dhārayitavya iti ॥
yathā dṛṣṭagurava upāsanenābhimukhīkṛtāstadupāsanaparānanugṛhṇanti, tathā'yaṁ paramagururapyābhidhyānamātreṇānugrahaṁ karoti । tathā ca śrutiḥ-
[“yasya deve parā bhaktiryathā deve tathā gurau ।] 
[tasyaite kathitā hyarthāḥ prakāśante mahātmanaḥ ॥ ”] iti ।
smṛtirapi -
[“matkarmakṛnmatparamo madbhaktaḥ saṅgavarjitaḥ ।] 
[nirvairaḥ sarvabhūteṣu yaḥ sa māmeti pāṇḍava ॥ “] iti ॥ 26 ॥
tasya vācakaḥ praṇavaḥ ॥ 27 ॥
vācya īśvaraḥ praṇavasya। kimasya saṁketakṛtaṁ vācyavācakatvamatha pradīpaprakāśavadavasthitamiti।

vivaraṇam
[tasya vācakaḥ praṇava] iti ।
prakarṣeṇa nūyate stūyate aneneti praṇavaḥ । yadi vā, praṇauti stautīśvaramiti praṇava oṅkāraḥ । praṇidhīyate cānena bhagavān praṇidhātṛbhiriti, praṇamanti vā । aneneti, praṇidhate vā tena bhagavantaṁ cetasīti, dhāño vakāropajanaṁ kṛtvā । śabdena hi parokṣāṇāmarthānāṁ manasi praṇidhānaṁ merurindra iti yathā ॥
[īśvaraḥ ।] anvarthaṁ khalvapi nirvacanam । avateḥ rakṣaṇādyarthānmaniṣṭilopaśceti । praṇidhātṝn saṁsārādavatīti, gamayati vā । saṁsāriṇaṁ nirvāṇamiti, niratiśayaṁ vā prīṇayati, samādhyādyanugraheṇāvagamayati vā paramārthamityevamādyarthānugatam sarvathā tu nediṣṭhaṁ priyaṁ nāma bhagavataḥ ॥
[‘oṁ khaṁ brahma’ ‘omiti brahma’] ityādayaḥ । smṛtayaśca
[kimasya saṅketakṛtaṁ vācyavācakatvaṁ? atha pradīpaprakāśavadavasthitamiti ।] kiṁ cātaḥ ? । yadi tena bhagavatā anyairvā saṁvyavahārārthamasya nābhedamastviti saṁketitam, tato'sya prāgoṁśabdāvācyatvādoṁśabdena vā praṇidhātāraḥ prāṇyadhiṣata, anyena vā nāmāntareṇādhītavantastathedānīmapyastu, kimoṅkārāvaśeṣavacanena । athāpi
kiṁ ca-saṅketo'pyanarthakaḥ sthitasambandhatvāt । athāpūrvaṁ saṅketyeta, pūrvoktadoṣaprasaṅga iti manyate ॥

sthito'sya vācyasya vācakena saha saṁbandhaḥ। saṁketastvīśvarasya sthitamevārthamabhinayati। yathā'vasthitaḥ pitāputrayoḥ saṁbandhaḥ saṁketenāvadyotyate, ayamasya pitā, ayamasya putra iti। sargāntareṣvapi vācyavācakaśaktyapekṣastathaiva saṁketaḥ kriyate। saṁpratipattinityatayā nityaḥ śabdārthasaṁbandha ityāgaminaḥ pratijānate ॥ 27 ॥

vivaraṇam
[sthito'sya vācyasya vācakena] sambandho yadi nityaḥ śabdo yadi vā anityaḥ, saṅketastu tameva sthitaṁ sambandhamavajvalayati ॥
nanu coktaṁ-sthitaścet prathamaśravaṇe'pi taṁ pratīyuriti । ucyate-na hi pratyāyyapratyāyakasambandhaḥ śabdārthayoḥ sthito'pi sannindriyeṇa gṛhyate । yathendriyārthayoḥ । apratyakṣe hi vācyavācakaśaktī ॥
tataśca yenocyate śabdādartho'numeya iti-tadasat । sambandhāgrahaṇāt । paraprayegavyaṅgyatvācca sambandhasya । na hyanumānaṁ paraprayogamapekṣate ॥
atha brūyādanumitāt saṁbandhādarthānumānamiti । sa vaktavyaḥ kathamanumitaḥ śabdārthasambandhaḥ? iti ॥
sa cet brūyāt-kāryadarśanādarthaṁ hi pratītya paścādanuminoti tatsaṁbandham । yathā cakṣuṣā rūpamupalabhya cakṣussaṁbandhamiti । sa prativaktavyaḥ-siddhaṁ tarhi vinā'numānena śabdādeva pratipattiriti ॥
yo hi grāṣṭrapākenaiva kṛtārtha: kiṁ tasya kilośipākena । athāsakṛt prayogadarśanādgṛhyate sambandhaḥ, yathā'gnidhūmayoriti cet- na tu brūmaḥ na hi sahasreṣvapi prayogeṣu pratyakṣeṇa śavdārthayoḥ saṁbandho gṛhyate yathā'gnidhūmayorādāvapi saṁbandho gṛhyate । vākye'pyayameva ॥ tasmādavasthitameva vācyasyeśvarasya vācakena praṇavena sambandhamavadyotayati saṅketo yathā sthitaṁ pitāputrasaṁbandham । saṅketopāyāpekṣatvāt prathamaśrutānnārthaḥ pratīyate । yathā cakṣuṣa ālokābhāve ॥
[sargādiṣvapi vācyavācakaśaktyapekṣaḥ saṅketaḥ ।] ।
[vācyavācakaśaktyapekṣayaiva saṅketaḥ kriyate ॥] 
[āgaminī] vedavādina:
tadetaduktaṁ bhavati-yadyāgamipakṣaḥ syādathānyapakṣaḥ, sarvathā sthita eva saṁbandhaḥ pitāputrayoriva saṅketenābhivyajyata iti ॥
vācyavācakayorasthitasaṁbandhatve tu praṇavarūpeṇābhimukhībhavatīśvara iti nāvakalpate । na hi pācyapācakasaṁbandhe na ca sthite pācakāgnyupādānaṁ pākārthaṁ kalpate । sthite tu vācyavācakasaṁbandhe bhagavadārādhanasādhanasya praṇavasyopādānamavakalpata iti tatpratipādanārthaṁ sarvaṁ bhāṣyam ॥ 27 ॥
vijñātavācyavācakatvasya yoginaḥ –
tajjapastadarthabhāvanam ॥ 28 ॥
praṇavasya japaḥ praṇavābhidheyasya ceśvarasya bhāvanam। tadasya yoginaḥ praṇavaṁ japataḥ praṇavārthaṁ ca bhāvayataścittamekāgraṁ saṁpadyate। tathā coktam –
svādhyāyādyogamāsīta yogātsvādhyāyamāmanet।
svādhyāyayogasaṁpattyā paramātmā prakāśate ॥ iti ॥ 28 ॥

vivaraṇam
[tajjapastadarthabhāvanam] tasyeśvaravācakasya praṇavasyārdhacaturmātrasya trimātrasya vā japaḥ manasopāṁśu vā āvartanaṁ japaḥ, tadarthasya ceśvarasya praṇavena vācakena samarpitasya buddhau samāropitasya bhāvanamabhidhyānaṁ
[tathā coktam-svādhyāyādyogamā(tiṣṭhet)sīta svādhyāyāt] praṇavajapādīśvaraṁ pratyavanatacittaḥ san
kiṁ cāsya bhavati –
tataḥ pratyaktcetanādhigamo'pyantarāyābhāvaśca ॥ 29 ॥

ye tāvadantarāyā vyādhiprabhṛtayaste tāvadīśvarapraṇidhānānna bhavanti। svarūpadarśanamapyasya bhavati। yathaiveśvaraḥ puruṣaḥ śuddhaḥ prasannaḥ kevalo'nupasargastathā'yamapi buddhe pratisaṁvedī yaḥ puruṣastamadhigacchati ॥ 29 ॥

vivaraṇam
[kiścāsya bhavati ?] pūrvasūtre cittamekāgraṁ sampadyata ityuktamekaṁ phalam , tadepakṣayā kiñceti cakāraḥ । kiñcānyadapyasti phalam ? āhosviccittaikāgratvameveti, tatrāha
nanu cādhigata eva pratyātmaṁ puruṣo'haṁ sukhī duḥkhī cāhamiti । evaṁ prasiddhaṁ, tataḥ kiṁ viśeṣeṇocyate iti । satyamevam-kiṁ tvaviśiṣṭo'so pratyayaścittasya vṛtyā । kiñca-sukhī duḥkhī cāhamiti sukhiduḥkhisāmānādhikaraṇyādihāhaṁpratyayasya cittavṛttiviṣayatvādavidyāpratyaya eva prasiddhiḥ ॥
[yathaiveśvaraḥ puruṣaḥ śuddhaḥ] kleśādimalavarjitastata eva
yathā tatheti ca dṛṣṭāntadārṣṭāntikanirdeśādīśvarakṣetrajñayorbheda ukto bhavati । baddhamuktopapatteśca । pradhānasya pārāthyopapatteḥ । kṣetrajñānāṁ cāta eva parasparabhedaḥ ॥
[ye tāvadantarāyā vyādhiprabhṛtayo] vakṣyamāṇāste'pi cāsye
atha ke'ntarāyā ye cittasya vikṣepāḥ। ke punaste kiyanto veti –
vyādhistyāna​saṁśayapramādālasyā​viratibhrāntidarśanālabdha​bhūmikatvānavasthitatvāni citavikṣepāste'ntarāyāḥ ॥ 30 ॥

navāntarāyāścittasya vikṣepāḥ। sahaite cittavṛttibhirbhavanti। eteṣāmabhāve na bhavanti pūrvoktāścittavṛttayaḥ। vyādhirdhāturasakaraṇavaiṣamyam। styānamakarmaṇyatā cittasya। saṁśaya ubhayakoṭispṛgvijñānaṁ syādidamevaṁ naivaṁ syāditi। pramādaḥ samādhisādhanānāmabhāvanam। ālasyaṁ kāyasya cittasya ca gurutvādapravṛttiḥ। aviratiścittasya viṣayasaṁprayogātmā gardhaḥ। bhrāntidarśanaṁ viparyajñānam। alabdhabhūmikatvaṁ samādhibhūmeralābhaḥ। anavasthitatvaṁ yallabdhāyāṁ bhūmau cittasyāpratiṣṭhā। samādhipratilambhe hi sati tadavasthitaṁ syāditi। ete cittavikṣepā nava yogamalā yogapratipakṣā yogāntarāyā ityabhidhīyante ॥ 30 ॥

vivaraṇam
[ke te'ntarāyāḥ ? kiyanto ve] tyāha-
[sa] ca saptadhā, rasakāryavādrasa ityucyate rasalohitamedomāṁsāsthimajjāśuklākhyaḥ । tasya vaiṣamyaṁ vṛddhikṣayau । karaṇavaiṣamyamandhabadhiratvādi ॥
[styānamakarmaṇyatā cittasya] stimitam ।
[pramādaḥ samādhisādhanānāmabhāvana] maśīlanam ।
[bhrāntidarśanaṁ viparyayajñānaṁ] yogasādhaneṣu tanmārge vā viparītavṛttiḥ ।
[tadete navāntarāyāḥ ।] antaraṁ vivaraṁ vicchedaṁ kurvanta ayāntītyantarāyāḥ
duḥkhadaurmanasyāṅgamejayatvaśvāsapraśvāsā vikṣepasahabhuvaḥ ॥ 31 ॥

duḥkhamādhyātmikamādhibhautikamādhidaivikaṁ ca। yenābhihatāḥ prāṇinastadapaghātāya prayatante tadduḥkham। daurmanasyamicchāvighātāccetasaḥ kṣobhaḥ। yadaṅgānyejayati kampayati tadaṅgamejayatvam। prāṇo yadbāhyaṁ vāyumācāmati sa śvāsaḥ। yatkauṣṭhyaṁ vāyuṁ niḥsārayati sa praśvāsaḥ। ete vikṣepasahabhuvo vikṣiptacittasyaite bhavanti। samāhitacittasyaive na bhavanti ॥ 31 ॥

vivaraṇam
[duḥkhaṁ yenābhihatāḥ prāṇinastadapaghātāya prayatante] ceṣṭante । tacca trividham ।
[daurmanasyamicchāvighātāccetasaḥ kṣobhaḥ] ākulībhāvaḥ sañcalanam ।
[antarāyābhāvaśca'] ityukyā prāktanādapīśvarapraṇidhānādantarāyā nirudhyante ॥ 31 ॥
athaite vikṣepāḥ samādhipratipakṣāstābhyāmevābhyāsavairāgyābhyāṁ niroddhavyāḥ। tatrābhyāsasya viṣayamupasaṁharannidamāha –
tatpratiṣedhārthamekatattvābhyāsaḥ ॥ 32 ॥

vikṣepapratiṣedhārthamekatattvāvalambanaṁ cittamabhyaset। yasya tu pratyarthaniyataṁ pratyayamātraṁ kṣaṇikaṁ ca cittaṁ tasya sarvameva cittamekāgraṁ nāstyeva vikṣiptam। yadi punaridaṁ sarvataḥ pratyāhṛtyaikasminnarthe samādhīyate tadā bhavatyekāgramityato na pratyarthaniyatam।

vivaraṇam
[tatpratiṣedhārthamekatattvābhyāsa] iti । teṣāṁ vikṣepāṇāṁ pratiṣedhāya
nanu naikaṁ cittamavasthitamasti, yasyaikatattvāvalambanaḥ pratyaya āpadyeta । pratyayā eva cittam, te ca pratyarthaṁ niyatāḥ kṣaṇapraṇāśinaśca । pratyātmasaṁvedyaṁ ca pratyayānāmanavasthitatvam । nāpi pratyayavyatirekeṇāvasthitaṁ pratyayi cittaṁ nāmopalabhyate । yo'pyahamevāhamiti pratyayaḥ so'pi samānasantatipatitattvātsādṛśyanibandhanaḥ । yathā sa eva pradīpaḥ ta eva keśā iti ॥
tadapyāha-pratyahaṁ[prati]pratyayaṁ pratyayo bhinnaḥ, pratyayebhyo'tyantaparasparabhinnebhyo'nanyatvāt । ekaikapratyayasvarūpasadvartamānāhaṁpratyayaviṣayaḥ pratyayī bhūtabhaviṣyatkālāhaṁpratyayaviṣayāt pratyayino bhinnaḥ, bhinnapratyayaviṣayatvāt , ghaṭāt (gha) paṭa iva । yadi vā-bhinnakālatvāt, vinaṣṭabhaviṣyadghaṭābhyāṁ vartamāno ghaṭaḥ [iva] । ahaṁpratyayā vā sarve bhinnālambanāḥ, pratyayatvāt, ghaṭapaṭadiviṣayapratyayavaditi ॥
[kṣaṇikaṁ ca । yasya cittaṁ tasya sarvameva cittam ekāgram] vikṣepābhāvādeva
nanu ca tavāpi vṛttivṛttimatorabhedādanupapanno vikṣepa iti tatpratiṣedhopadeśānarthakyam--naiṣa doṣaḥ-vṛttavṛttimatvābhyupagamāt ॥
yadi vṛttaya eva parasparabhinnāḥ svatantrā vṛttimato'tyantabhinnā jāyeran pratyarthaniyatāśca, tata eṣa doṣaḥ syāt । na caivamabhyupeyate ॥
[yadi punaridaṁ] cittaṁ vṛttibhedenānekadhā (mmilāvayavaddhi) prasṛtaṁ sāṅkhyayogavādina iva tavāpi
[na pratyarthaniyataṁ] (vā) paścādabhyupagamanīyam । anyathā śāsravirodhaḥ syāt ।

yo'pi sadṛśapratyayapravāhena cittamekāgraṁ manyate tasyaikāgratā yadi pravāhacittasya dharmastadaikaṁ nāsti pravāhacittaṁ kṣaṇikatvāt। atha pravāhāṁśasyaiva pratyayasya dharmaḥ, sa sarvaḥ sadṛśapratyayapravāhī vā visadṛśapratyayapravāhī vā pratyarthaniyatatvādekāgra eveti vikṣiptacittānupapattiḥ। tasmādekamanekārthamavasthitaṁ cittamiti।

vivaraṇam
[yo'pi sadṛśapratyayapravāhaṁ cittamekāgraṁ manyate] sadṛśaḥ samānaḥ pratyayapravāho yasyaikasyāṁ santatau taccittamekāgram । tadviparītam asamānapratyayapravāhaṁ vikṣiptam । tathā caikāgratā vikṣepapratiṣedhenopapadyate, tadarthopadeśaśceti kutaḥ śāstravirodha iti ॥
[na hi pravāhacittaṁ nāmaika] matītavartamānabhaviṣyatpratyayānāṁ dharmiṇamabhyupagacchati । yadi hyabhyupagacchet parityaktaḥ svapakṣaḥ । kasmāt ? pravāhacittasyākṣaṇikatvāttadevaikaṁ nāsti, yasyaikāgratā dharmaḥ । pratyayāneva hyanyonyasaṁhatān pipīlikāpaṅktikalpānasāvabhyupagacchati ॥
athaivaṁ manyate, yadyayekaṁ nāsti tathāpi sarveṣāmeva pratyayānāṁ sadṛśapravāhāṇāmekāgratā dharmaḥ pradīpārciṣāmiva prakāśa iti-tatrāha-nāyugapatkālotpattivināśānāṁ samāhāraḥ sambhavati । dṛṣṭāntasya ca sādhyavikalatvāt । na hi bahvīnāmarciṣāmekaḥ prakāśaḥ । pratyarciṣamasya bhedāt । na cāpi prakāśasyārciṣāṁ caiko dharmo nā[mā]sti ॥
[athāpi manyate pravāhāṁśasyaiva pratyayasya] kasyacidekāgratā

yadi ca cittenaikenānanvitāḥ svabhāvabhinnāḥ pratyayā jāyerannatha kathamanyapratyayadṛṣṭasyānyaḥ smartā bhavet। anyapratyayopacitasya ca karmāśayasyānyaḥ pratyaya upabhoktā bhavet। kathaṁcitsamādhīyamānamapyetadgomayapāyasīyanyāyamākṣipati।

vivaraṇam
[yadi cittenaikenānanvitāḥ] karaṇena
na hi bhaviṣyatputraḥ pitrā racitakarmāśayaphalaṁ svargadi pratyupabhuñjīta । atha brūyāt -viśiṣṭabhaviṣyatputravijñānārthaṁ vinaśyatpravṛttivijñānamālayavijñānasaṁskāra kañcanādhatte iti – naitadevam -ālayapravṛttivijñānayoratyantabhedādavastutvācca ॥
yadyālayavijñānānna tatpravṛttivijñānaṁ, tadā tadeva taditi nāmamātrabhedaḥ, tathā ca saṁskārādhānayuktatvāt smṛtyanupaklṛptiḥ । athāpyanyat-evamapyanyatpravṛttavijñānamālayavijñāne saṁskāre nādadhīta, bhinnatvāt । yathā santatyantarālayavijñāne ॥
kiṁca—yadyapi saṁskāramādhattām, tathāpi pravṛttivijñānāpāditasaṁskāramālayavijñānaṁ deśakālāntarākṣamam । tasyāpi kṣaṇikatvābhyupagamādvinaśyacca tāvatyeva nottaravijñānopakārāya paryāpnoti । deśakālāntaravyavahitaṁ cedupakurvīta, tadā bhinnasantānāntarajanmanāpyupakartavyam ॥
atha kālāntarāvasthāyi, tadā kṣaṇikatvahāniḥ । kṣaṇāntaraṁ cedavatiṣṭheta, dīrghakālāvasthāyitve kasya syādakṣamā ॥
athāpi pravṛttivijñānasaṁskāraviśiṣṭasyāntarālabhāvina ātmasadṛśasya bhaviṣyata ālayavijñānasya saṁskāramādhāya pūrvamālayavijñānaṁ vinaṅkṣyatīti
tacca na-saṁskārāntarābhāvāt । asti cedanavasthāprasaṅgaḥ । atha nāstyādhāra:, tatra kiṁ pravṛttivijñānasyālayavijñānakalpanayā saṁskarādhānāya । yathā ālayavijñānamutpitsiṣyamāṇasya tatkālamasataḥ ālayavijñānasya saṁskāramādhatte, tathā pravṛttivijñānamapi utpitsiṣyamāṇasya tatkālamasataḥ pravṛttivijñānasyaiva saṁskāramādhattāmanapekṣyālayavijñānam ॥
na ca vinaśyat anyasya bhāvinastatkālamavidyamānasya saṁskāramādhatte ityasya dṛṣṭānto dṛśyate । nāpi bhāvinyeva saṁskāraṁ kurvīta । pūrvaṇa bhaviṣyatsaṁskriyate, bhaviṣyati ceti viruddham । tatkālaṁ cedasadbhaviṣyatsaṁkriyate, kiṁ tulyātutyasantatikalpanena ? asaṁbandhāviśeṣāt sarvaṁ sarveṇa saṁskriyeta ॥
nāpi bhaviṣyadvinaśyatoryugapadutpattivināśāvakṣaṇikatvaprasaṅgāt । atha tulāntayoriva natyunnatī yugapatpūrvavināśottarasamutpatī syātām (na) vastuneriti cet-na-abhyupagamavirodhāt । na hi vaināśikenotpattivināśakriyāvyatirekeṇa kārakamanyadiṣyate । abhyupagame ca siddhāntāvirodhaḥ ॥
kiṁca-anyatve ca kriyākārakayoryāvatkriyotpatti karakeṇāvasthātavyaṁ, tataśca kṣaṇikatvahāniḥ । a[na]vasthāne ca kriyārthaṁ tataḥ[tasya]upādānamanarthakam ॥
kiṁ cānyat-kriyāyā eva kārakatve kārakasyāpi kriyātve kriyākārakaśabdau paryāyau syātām । tataścāṅkuro jāyate, devadatto jāyata ityaṅkuradevadattayoḥ paryāyatvaṁ syāt । tayorjanikriyāmātratvāt ॥
atha anyajanikrayā devadattaviśiṣṭā anyā cāṅkuraviśiṣṭeti cet - abhyupetaṁ tarhi viśeṣaṇaṁ kārakaṁ, na hi svarūpeṇa kiṁcidviśiṣṭaṁ syāt ॥
athocyeta, svarūpeṇaivotpattikriyā utpattikriyāntarādviśiṣṭā yathā svalakṣaṇāni rūpādīni iti -tacca na-bhāvābhāvayerekatvaprasaṅgāt । ihāṅkuro jāyate naśyatyaṅkura iti ca ya eva jāyate sa eva naśyati tatrāṅkurajananamaṅkuravināśanamiti jananaṁ vināśa ityuktaṁ bhavati । aṅkuro hi kriyaiva kārakamiti vocyeta । (citaḥ) ॥
athāpi syāt-anyai(nyasyai)vāṅkurajananakriyāyā aṅkuravināśakriyeti--tathā'pyaṅkurajananasya nityatvaprasaṅgaḥ । vināśasyānyatvādeva ॥
athāpi nāśajananavadvastu śabalamiti, tathā'pyabhāvasya śabalatvaṁ prasajyeta । katham ? kriyāvyatiriktasya kārakasyābhāve'pi nāśa eva jananavināśavān jananameva jananavināśavaditi । na hyabhāvasya śabalatvādiviśeṣo nirviśeṣatvādbhāvābhāvayoścāvirodhāt pratyakṣānumānānupapattiḥ ॥
yadapyucyate-tulāntayornāmonnāmāviti-tatra yuktā tulāntayorekakālayorvidyamānatvādanyatarasya vastvantaragauravanimittā ānatiranyatarasya cennatiḥ । iha punarbhavadbhaviṣyatkālayorvijñānayornāśotpattī tulānāmahetuvattṛtīyasya nimittāntarasyābhāvādekakālaṁ nopapadyate । vinaśyadeva vijñānamātmasadṛśaṁ janayatīti na śakyaṁ vaktum । na hi devadatto mriyamāṇa evātmasamānaṁ putraṁ janayati vināśenākṣaṇatvāt ॥
atha mṛtpiṇḍo yathā ghaṭamutpādayan vinaśyati, tadvaditi cet-tacca na-mṛdavayavānāmeva ghaṭākareṇa pariṇatatvāt । ekaiva hi mṛtpiṇḍaghaṭādibahudharmayoginī । yaścāpi bījeṣu dravyāntaravāsiteṣu vāsakadravyānuvidhāyitvaṁ vāsyadravyasyeti - tadapyakāraṇam vāsyavāsakayoravasthitatvāt । avasthitānyeva hi bījeṣvaṅkurādīni vāsyante bījavāsanena । tadanyatvāt vāsakadravyasyāpyavayavānanupraviṣṭāḥ sūkṣmā vidyanta eva । tasmādvidyamānānyevāṅkurādīni bījavāsanayā vāsyanta iti yuktam । asatāṁ śaviṣāṇādīnāmutpattyabhāvāt । asatāṁ cedutpattiḥ syādvāsyavāsakayorvinaṣṭatvādavidyamānatvāviśeṣe bāsakadravyānanuvidhāyi notpadyeta । anyadvā hastādi ॥
[samādhīyamānamapi] (samarthyamānamapi)
yathaiva bahubhirapi govikāratvādihetubhiḥ samīhamāne kṛtāṭopenāpi gomayaṁ pāyasīkartuṁ na śakyam, tathā kṣaṇikena cittena smaraṇādi samarthayitum ॥

kiṁ ca svātmānubhavāpahnavaścittasyānyatve prāpnoti। kathaṁ, yadahamadrākṣaṁ tatspṛśāmi yaccāsprākṣaṁ tatpaśyāmītyahamiti pratyayaḥ sarvasya pratyayasya bhede sati pratyayinyabhedenopasthitaḥ। ekapratyayaviṣayo'yamabhedātmā'hamiti pratyayaḥ kathamatyantabhinneṣu citteṣu vartamānaḥ sāmānyamekaṁ pratyayinamāśrayet। svānubhavagrāhyaścāyamabhedātmā'hamiti pratyayaḥ। na ca pratyakṣasya māhātmyaṁ pramāṇāntareṇābhibhūyate। pramāṇāntaraṁ ca pratyakṣabalenaiva vyavahāraṁ labhate। tasmādekamanekārthamavasthitaṁ ca cittam ॥ 32 ॥

vivaraṇam
[kiñca-svātmānubhavāpahnavaḥ cittasyānyatve] pratyayamātratve ’nānyadṛṣṭamanusmaratīti svātmanānubhūtamapahnuvīna ॥
[yadahamadrākṣaṁ tat] ahameva
[svānubhavagrāhyaścāyamabhedātmā ahamiti pratyayaḥ ॥] 
[na hi pratyakṣasya māhātmyaṁ] prāmāṇyaṁ cakṣuṣo rūpa ivānumānā
[pramāṇāntaraṁ ca pratyakṣabalenaiva prāmāṇyavyavahāraṁ labhata] iti । tena pratyakṣavirodhena anumānavirodhena ca prativādi(pādita)pramāṇapratijñādoṣo vyākhyata: ॥
atītānāgatapratyayasaṁskārādhārādananyaḥ idānīntanapratyayasaṁskārādhāraḥ, ekasantānasaṁbandhitve sati bodhātmakatvāt, ātmasvarūpādyathā ॥
bhūtabhaviṣyatpratyayasaṁskārāśrayaḥ vartamānapratyayasaṁskārāśrayādananyaḥ, ekasantānasaṁbandhe sati bodhātmakatvāt, ātmana iva svarūpāt ॥
vartamānāhaṁpratyayī bhūtabhaviṣyatpratyayibhyāmabhinnaḥ, ekasantānayoge sati pratyayitvāt, yathā svarūpāt ॥
bhūtabhaviṣyatpratyayibhyāmananyo vartamānaḥ pratyayaḥ, ekasantānasaṁbandhe sati bodhātmakatvāt, ātmarāgasvarūpādibhya iva ॥
bhūtabhaviṣyatpratyayibhyo nānyo vartamānaḥ pratyayī, ekasantānasaṁbandhitve sati bodhātmakatvāt , ātmano yathā svarūpāt ॥
[tasmādekamanekārthamavasthitaṁ ca cittam । yasyedaṁ śāstreṇa parikarma nirdiśyata] iti-śāsropadeśasambandhitvaṁ cittasyāvasthitatve hetumupadiśati । na hi viśīryamāṇasya ghaṭasya prakṣālanaparivartanādisaṁskāraḥ kriyate ॥ 32 ॥
yasya cittasyāvasthitasyedaṁ śāstreṇa parikarma nirdiśyate tatkatham –
maitrīkaruṇāmuditopekṣāṇāṁ sukhaduḥkhapuṇyāpuṇyaviṣayāṇāṁ bhāvanātaścitaprasādanam ॥ 33 ॥

tatra sarvaprāṇiṣu sukhasaṁbhogāpanneṣu maitrīṁ bhāvayet। duḥkhiteṣu karuṇām। puṇyātmakeṣu muditām। apuṇyaśīleṣūpekṣām। evamasya bhāvayataḥ śuklo dharma upajāyate। tataśca cittaṁ prasīdati। prasannamekāgraṁ sthitipadaṁ labhate ॥ 33 ॥

vivaraṇam
kathaṁ cittaparikarma nirdiśyate ? tathaikatatvābhyāsa iti coktam , kiṁ ca tadekaṁ tattvam? yadviṣaye'bhyāsa iti । tata āha—
[maitrīkaruṇāmuditopekṣāṇāṁ sukhaḥdukhapuṇyāpuṇyaviṣayāṇāṁ bhāvanātaścittaprasādanamiti । maitrī] mitraviṣayā bhāvanā । tādṛśī sukhateṣu sukhamanumodayantīmasūyādivarjitām । tathā duḥkhiteṣu
[masya bhāvayataḥ, śukla] iti viśuddhaḥ prāṇyupaghātādivarjanācchuklo
tatropekṣāyā akriyārūpatvāddhamīhetutve sati kimarthamihopādānam ? ucyate-upekṣānupādāne cāpuṇyaśīleṣvapi cittaṁ vyāpāraṁ yāyāt । tataśca tadvyāpāropadhānakāluṣyānmaitryādibhāvanāyā na yogyaṁ bhavati । apuṇyaśīlanimittanaimittikākāravyāpārādadharmoṁ vā mā saṁjaniṣṭeti cittasthitirevopekṣeti tasyā upādānam । cittasthitiśceha samīhitā ॥
tasmāditthaṁ samāhitacittasya maitrīkaruṇādyekatattvālambanaṁ cittaṁ śīlayataḥ prāgabhihitā antarāyā na janiṣyante ॥ 33 ॥
pracchardanavidhāraṇābhyāṁ vā prāṇasya ॥ 34 ॥
kauṣṭhyasya vāyornāsikāpuṭābhyāṁ prayatnaviśeṣādvamanaṁ pracchardanaṁ, vidhāraṇaṁ prāṇāyāmastābhyāṁ vā manasaḥ sthitiṁ saṁpādayet ॥ 34 ॥

vivaraṇam
[pracchardanavidhāraṇābhyāṁ vā prāṇasya । vā] śabdo maitryādibhāvanopāyāntaravikalpārthaḥ । maitryādibhāvanādyupāyānāmanyatamena yena kenacit cittasthitiḥ sampādanīyeti prakaraṇārthaḥ । anekopāyapradarśanaṁ kasyacit kvacit sukaratābhiprāyeṇa । pracchardanavidhāraṇābhyāṁ vyastābhyāṁ samastābhyāṁ vā । pracchardanam
viṣayavatī vā pravṛttirutpannā manasaḥ sthitinibandhanī ॥ 35 ॥

nāsikāgre dhārayato'sya yā divyagandhasaṁvitsā gandhapravṛttiḥ। jihvāgre rasasaṁvit। tāluni rūpasaṁvit। jihvāmadhye sparśasaṁvit। jihvāmūle śabdasaṁvidityetā vṛttaya utpannāścittaṁ sthitau nibadhnanti, saṁśayaṁ vidhamanti, samādhiprajñāyāṁ ca dvārī bhavantīti। etena candrādityagrahamaṇipradīparaśmyādiṣu pravṛttirutpannā viṣayavatyeva veditavyā। yadyapi hi tattacchāstrānumānācāryopadeśairavagatamarthatattvaṁ sadbhūtameva bhavati, eteṣāṁ yathābhūtārthapratipādanasāmarthyāt tathā'pi yāvadekadeśo'pi kaścinna svakaraṇasaṁvedyo bhavati tāvatsarvaṁ parokṣamivāpavargādiṣu sūkṣmeṣvartheṣu na dṛḍhāṁ buddhimutpādayati। tasmācchāstrānumānācāryopadeśopodbalanārthamevāvaśyaṁ kaścidarthaviśeṣaḥ pratyakṣīkartavyaḥ। tatra tadupadiṣṭārthaikadeśapratyakṣatve sati sarvaṁ sūkṣmaviṣayamapi ā'pavargācchraddhīyate। etadarthamevedaṁ cittaparikarma nirdiśyate। aniyatāsu vṛttiṣu tadviṣayāyāṁ vaśīkārasaṁjñāyāmupajātāyāṁ samarthaṁ syāttasya tasyārthasya pratyakṣīkaraṇāyeti। tathā ca sati śraddhāvīryasmṛtisamādhayo'syāpratibandhena bhaviṣyantīti ॥ 35 ॥

vivaraṇam
[viṣayavatī vā pravṛttirutpannā sthitinibandhinī ।] citasyeti vākyaśeṣaḥ । viṣayā gandhādayo yasyā yogapravṛttergandhādisaṁvedanalakṣaṇāyā ālambanībhūtāḥ, sa viṣayavatītyucyute ॥
[pravṛtti] rnāma yogino yogamabhyasyataḥ abhimukhībhāvaṁ pratipadyamānasya yogasya yaḥ prathamo'bhimukhībhāvaḥ pratyayakaraṇo yogānuṣṭhānaṁ pratyutsāhajanano nirmathyamānasyāgneriva dhūmasamudbhavaḥ, sā pravṛttiḥ । sā ca tādṛśī
[nāsikāgre cittaṁ dhārayato gandhasaṁvit] prahvādanakarasurabhigandhasaṁvedanaṁ nirantaratayā sammatasaṁyogamivācakṣāṇā jāyate ।
[etena raśmicandrādityagrahapradīpādiṣu cittaṁ] dhārayato hṛdayapuṇḍarīke vā dhārayato vaiṣamyādraśmicandrādyākārā
[yadyapi śāstrānumānācāryebhyo'vagatamarthatattvaṁ tathābhūtameva] avyabhicārisvarūpameva । teṣāmanyathābhūtāpratipādakatvāt ।
[tatra] śāstrādyu
[tasya tasya] tṛtīyapādopadiṣṭapariṇāmatrayāde
viśokā vā jyotiṣmatī ॥ 36 ॥

pravṛttirutpannā manasaḥ sthitinibandhanītyanuvartate। hṛdayapuṇḍarīke dhārayato yā buddhisaṁvit buddhisattvaṁ hi bhāsvaramākāśakalpaṁ, tatra sthitivaiśāradyātpravṛttiḥ sūryendugrahamaṇiprabhārūpākāreṇa vikalpate। tathā'smitāyāṁ samāpannaṁ cittaṁ nistaraṅgamahodadhikalpaṁ śāntamanantamasmitāmātraṁ bhavati। yatredamuktam – “tamaṇumātramātmānamanuvidyāsmītyevaṁ tāvatsaṁprajānīte” iti। eṣā dvayī viśokā viṣayavatī, asmitāmātrā ca pravṛttirjyotiṣmatītyucyate। yayā yoginaścittaṁ sthitipadaṁ labhata iti ॥ 36 ॥

vivaraṇam
[viśokā vā jyotiṣmatī pravṛttirutpannā manasaḥ sthitinibandhinīti] prakṛtamabhisaṁbadhyate । jyotiryasyāṁ vidyate pravṛttau sā
[hṛdayapuṇḍarīke dhārayato buddhisaṁvidbhavati] svarūpasaṁvedanam । buddhisatvaṁ hi kiṁrūpamityāha-
[sthitivaiṣamyāditi ।] buddhisattvātmatāsāmyānāpattariti । hṛdayapuṇḍarīka eva dhārayata: pravṛttijyotiṣmatī
[yatredamuktaṁ yatrā] smitāsamāpattau । taṁ etaṁ prakṛtamasmitātmānamahaṅkāram aṇu sūkṣmam
vītarāgaviṣayaṁ vā cittam ॥ 37 ॥
vītarāgacittālambanoparaktaṁ vā yoginaścittaṁ sthitipadaṁ labhata iti ॥ 37 ॥

vivaraṇam
[vītarāgaviṣayaṁ vā cittaṁ] vīto rāgo yasmāta pratyayāt sa vītarāgaḥ rāgaśūnya ityarthaḥ । sa eṣa viṣaya ālambanaṁ yasya cittasya tadvītarāgaviṣayam । vītarāgaśca pratyayaḥ prasiddho loke । rāgiṇo'pi hi puruṣasya rāgakāraṇe'pi viṣaye, yaḥ strīṣu mātrādiṣu । sa eva pratyayaḥ [tameva pratyayaṁ] vītarāgaḥ [gaṁ] alambanatve nābhyasyet ; na tu tasya yo viṣayaḥ ālambanam । viṣayāṇāṁ khalatvāt । tat
svapnanidrājñānālambanaṁ vā ॥ 38 ॥
svapnajñānālambanaṁ vā nidrājñānālambanaṁ vā tadākāraṁ yoginaścittaṁ sthitipadaṁ labhata iti ॥ 38 ॥

vivaraṇam
[svapnanidrājñānālambanaṁ vā । svapnajñānālambanaṁ vā nidrājñānālambanaṁ vā cittaṁ tadākārameva] bhavati । evaṁsvabhāvaṁ hi cittaṁ yadālambate
yathābhimatadhyānādvā ॥ 39 ॥
yadevābhimataṁ tadeva dhyāyet। tatra labdhasthitikamanyatrāpi sthitipadaṁ labhata iti ॥ 39 ॥

vivaraṇam
[yathābhimatadhyānādvā । yadevābhimatamiti] cittasthityapekṣayā । cittasthiteḥ prakṛtatvāt । na tu sukhādyapekṣayā । pratiṣiddhatvācca-
paramāṇuparamamahattvānto'sya vaśīkāraḥ ॥ 40 ॥

sūkṣme niviśamānasya paramāṇvantaṁ sthitipadaṁ labhata iti। sthūle niviśamānasya paramamahattvāntaṁ sthitipadaṁ cittasya। evaṁ tāmubhayīṁ koṭimanudhāvato yo'syāpratīghātaḥ sa paro vaśīkāraḥ। tadvaśīkārātparipūrṇaṁ yoginaścittaṁ na punarabhyāsakṛtaṁ parikarmāpekṣata iti ॥ 40 ॥

vivaraṇam
[paramāṇuparamamahattvānto'sya vaśīkāraḥ ।] antaśabdaḥ pratyekaṁ saṁbadhyate ।
[itthamubhayakoṭimanudhāvataścittasya] saṁkṣepaṁ vistāraṁ cānubhavato
tatra saṁkṣiptā viśālā vikaraṇī ceti trayī dhāraṇā । tatrebhayakoṭisparśinī vikaraṇī । paramamahatvāntaspṛgviśālā । paramāṇvantaspṛkū saṁkṣiptā । sā ca trayyapāha sūtropāttā ॥ 40 ॥
atha labdhasthitikasya cetasaḥ kiṁsvarūpā kiṁviṣayā vā samāpattiriti, taducyate –
kṣīṇavṛtterabhijātasyeva maṇergrahītṛgrahaṇagrāhyeṣu tatsthatadañjanatā samāpattiḥ ॥ 41 ॥

kṣīṇavṛtteriti pratyastamitapratyayasyetyarthaḥ। abhijātasyeva maṇeriti dṛṣṭāntopādānam। yathā sphaṭika upāśrayabhedāttattadrūpoparakta upāśrayarūpākāreṇa nirbhāsate tathā grāhyālambanoparaktaṁ cittaṁ grāhyasamāpannaṁ grāhyasvarūpākāreṇa nirbhāsate। bhūtasūkṣmoparaktaṁ bhūtasūkṣmasamāpannaṁ bhūtasūkṣmasvarūpābhāsaṁ bhavati। tathā sthūlālambanoparaktaṁ sthūlarūpasamāpannaṁ sthūlarūpābhāsaṁ bhavati। tathā viśvabhedoparaktaṁ viśvabhedasamāpannaṁ viśvarūpābhāsaṁ bhavati।

vivaraṇam
[atha labdhasthitikasya cetasaḥ] atha uktānāmanyatamenopāyena labdhasthitikasya
[parārthāt svārthasaṁyamāt puruṣajñānam’] ityādinā । samāpattisvarūpaṁ ca saṁyamasvarūpaṁ tatkāryanirvartanenaiva setsyati । tataścānarthakamidaṁ sūtram-naiṣa doṣaḥ-pūrvoktopāyavaśīkāraṇārthavatvapradarśanārthatvāt । evaṁ hyeṣa cittavaśīkāro'rthavān, yena grahītrādyarthasamāpannaṁ cittaṁ tadābhāsaṁ bhavatīti ॥
[kṣīṇavṛtteriti pratyasta] mitabāhyapramāṇādi
nanu sarva eva pratyayāḥ pratyastamitāḥ । sarvapratyastamaye hi avasitādhikāraṁ na sthūlasūkṣmādikamālambate ॥
[abhijātasyeva maṇeriti dṛṣṭāntopādānam । yathā sphaṭika upāśrayabhedāttattadrūpoparakta upāśrayākareṇa nirbhāsate । tathā grāhyālambanoparaktaṁ cittaṁ grāhyasamāpannaṁ grāhyasvarūpākāreṇa nirbhāsate ॥] 
[tathā bhūtasūkṣmoparaktaṁ] tanmātroparaktaṁ
[[tathā sthūlālambanoparaktaṁ sthūlarūpasamāpannaṁ sthūlarūpāmāsaṁ bhavati । tathā viśvabhedoparaktaṁ viśvabhedasamāpannaṁ viśvarūpābhāsaṁ bhavati ॥]

tathā grahaṇeṣvapīndriyeṣvapi draṣṭavyam। grahaṇālambanoparaktaṁ grahaṇasamāpannaṁ grahaṇasvarūpākāreṇa nirbhāsate। tathā grahītṛpuruṣālambanoparaktaṁ grahītṛpuruṣasamāpannaṁ grahītṛpuruṣasvarūpākāreṇa nirbhāsate। tathā muktapuruṣālambanoparaktaṁ muktapuruṣasamāpannaṁ muktapuruṣasvarūpākāreṇa nirbhāsata iti। tadevamabhijātamaṇikalpasya cetaso grahītṛgrahaṇagrāhyeṣu puruṣendriyabhūteṣu yā tatsthatadañjanatā teṣu sthitasya tadākārāpattiḥ sā samāpattirityucyate ॥ 41 ॥

vivaraṇam
[tathā grahaṇeṣvapīndriyeṣvapi draṣṭavyam । grahaṇālambanoparaktaṁ grahaṇasamāpannaṁ grahaṇasvarūpākāreṇa nirbhāsate ॥] yujyate । saṁbandhaviśeṣācca yathā svapuruṣo grahītṛsvarūpaśca muktaśca cittavṛttiviśeṣasaṁbandhāt gṛhyate tadvat । na tu sarvātmanaiva mahadahaṅkārayorapi grahaṇaṁ mahattvāt ॥
tayorapi [tāvapi] yadi sarvātmanā gṛhyeyātām , cittasattvamātrātmānau jāyeyātām , tathā ca sati tadviṣayagrahaṇameva na syāt । pradhānapuruṣayostu tatsaṁbandhasya cātyantamavyaktasvarūpatvānna svarūpagrahaṇam । nanu ceśvarasyāsarvajñatā, [yataḥ] pradhānapuruṣatatsaṁbandhā na pratyakṣā iti । ucyate-pradhānapuruṣasaṁvandhebhyo'nyatsarvaṁ pratyakṣamityatra tāvat avipratipattiḥ, niravadhikapratyakṣajñānābhyupagamāt । (yatra tvanumānāgocaraḥ) [yattu asmākamagocaraḥ tat] sa eveśvaro jñātumarhati । jñeyaṁ cedasti tatsarvamasau yathā vā tathā vā jānātīti niścayaḥ । ajñātṛkasya jñeyatvānupapatteḥ ॥
kiñca-yadi prakṛtipuruṣau svarūpeṇa jñeyatvamā(nā)padyeyātāṁ tadā buddhivadbhogyatāprasaṅgaḥ । tataśca parārtho'pi syāt paraścānyaḥ kalpyaḥ syāt ॥
nanu puruṣāṇāmanyonyabhogyateti na paro bhoktā kalpyaḥ-naitadevamsamatvāt puruṣāṇāṁ viṣayaviṣayitvānupapatteḥ । na hi pradīpāvanyonyamupakurutaḥ । kiñca - bhogyatve sukhadirūpatāprasaṅgaśca puruṣasya । tathā ca sati pradhānasya nirhetukatvaprasaṅgaścetyevamādayo bhūyāṁso doṣāḥ ॥
[‘parārthāt svārtasaṁyamāt puruṣajñānam'] iti puruṣapratyakṣatāṁ vakṣyati-satyaṁ yuktamuktam । ata evocyate puruṣo na svarūpeṇa viṣayībhavatīti । yenaivaṁ tatroktam
nanu puruṣālambanoparakta cittaṁ puruṣasya viṣayaḥ । tathā ca sati pratyakṣa eva puruṣaḥ । yathā ghaṭālambanoparakte pratyaye puruṣeṇopalabhyamāne ghaṭaḥ pratyakṣa ucyate-naiṣa doṣaḥ-ghaṭavatpuruṣasya cittenāvyāpyatvāt । ghaṭādistu bāhyaścittena vyāpyate, na puruṣaḥ, ānantyāt ॥
paricchinnaṁ hi cittaṁ viṣayīkurvanna puruṣaṁ viṣayiṇamanantaṁ vyāptumutsahate । yadi puruṣaṁ vyāpnoti pradhānamapi vyāpnuyāt ॥
[‘yathā''darśatalaprakhye paśyatyātmānamātmani' ॥] iti ।
na tu muktānyapuruṣākāreṇa pariṇatau dvāramasti । yadi tadākareṇa pariṇameta, muktasyāpi tatsvameveti dṛśyaṁ syāt । na hi cittasya pariṇāmādanyatvaṁ nāmasti । svākoraṇa hi pariṇataṁ puruṣe na tu cittaṁ na paśyati । svapuruṣe svatvātsati saṁbandhe pariṇatidvāramasti ॥
kathaṁ tarhi svapuruṣādanyasya svatvāsaṁbandhino grahaṇam-ucyate-yathā paradarpaṇadvāreṇa paramukhadarśanaṁ, tathā darpaṇasthānīyaparasatvākārapariṇataṁ svasatvaṁ puruṣaḥ paśyan paramapi puruṣaṁ jānāti ॥
tasyāyamātmā mamāyamityanyatvantvanumānādeva pratipadyate svakīyādanyadīyasatvagataviśeṣaliṅgena । satvānāṁ ca triguṇatvādavaśyaṁ viśeṣāḥ santi । puruṣāṇāṁ tu nirviśeṣatvātsvarūpeṇa bhedī duravabodha eva ॥
[tasmādevamabhijātamaṇikalpasya cetaso grahītṛgrahaṇagrāhyeṣu puruṣendriyabhūteṣu tatsthatadañjanatā ।] teṣu grahītrādiṣu tiṣṭhatīti tatsthaṁ tatsthatāviśiṣṭā yā grahītrādyañjanatā, tadevāha-
samyagāpattiḥ samāpattiḥ sā ca tādṛśī pratyastamitabahirvṛttereva bhavati । yadyapi vyutthitacittasyāpi samāpattirasti । tathā'pi sā na samīcīnatarā, rajastamobhyāṁ cittasatvasyātyantābhibhūtatvāditi ॥ 41 ॥
tatra śabdārthajñānavikalpaiḥ saṁkīrṇā savitarkā samāpattiḥ ॥ 42 ॥

tadyathā gauritiśabdo gaurityartho gauriti jñānamityavibhāgena vibhaktānāmapi grahaṇaṁ dṛṣṭam। vibhajyamānāścānye śabdadharmā anye'rthadharmā anye vijñānadharmā ityeteṣāṁ vibhaktaḥ panthāḥ। tatra samāpannasya yogino yo gavādyarthaḥ samādhiprajñāyāṁ samārūḍhaḥ sa cecchabdārthajñānavikalpānuviddha upāvartate sā saṁkīrṇā samāpattiḥ savitarketyucyate ।

yadā punaḥ śabdasaṁketasmṛtipariśuddhau śrutānumānajñānavikalpaśūnyāyāṁ samādhiprajñāyāṁ svarūpamātreṇāvasthito'rthastatsvarūpākāramātratayaivāvacchidyate। sā ca nirvitarkā samāpattiḥ। tatparaṁ pratyakṣam। tacca śrutānumānayorbījam। tataḥ śrutānumāne prabhavataḥ। na ca śrutānumānajñānasahabhūtaṁ taddarśanam। tasmādasaṁkīrṇaṁ pramāṇāntareṇa yogino nirvitarkasamādhijaṁ darśanamiti ॥ 42 ॥

vivaraṇam
[śabdārthajñānavikalpaiḥ saṅkīrṇā savitarkā samāpattiḥ ।] śabdaścārthaśca jñānaṁ ca śabdārthajñānāni teṣāṁ vikalpāḥ śabdārthajñānavikalpāḥ । dhyātavyālambanaviṣayairvikalpaiḥ saṁkīrṇā vimiśrā itaretarapratyayānuviddhā sā saṁkīrṇasamāpatiḥ ॥
nanu ca śabdārthapratyayā itaretaravyāvṛttasvarūpāḥ, yogī caikaṁ vastu dhyeyatvenālambate śabdamarthaṁ pratyayaṁ vā, tatra kaḥ śabdārthajñānavikalpasaṅkaraḥ ? ॥
[tadyathā gauriti śabdo gaurityartho gauriti jñānami] tyavibhāgena loke
[vivicyamānāścānye śabdadharmā] gakārādivarṇodāttasvaritadrutamadhya- vilambitaśrotragrahaṇādayaḥ । te nārthajñānayoḥ । tathā
[samāpannasya yo hyevārthaḥ samādhiprajñāmupārūḍhaḥ sa cecchabdārthajñānavikalpānuviddhaḥ] śabdārthasaddhetakṛto ya itaretarasmṛtyanuvyādhastadviśiṣṭathedartha
anekajanmāntaraśabdārthasaddhetujñānasaṁskāraviśiṣṭatvādyogino'pi prathamatarāsamāpatirlokapratyayāviśiṣṭā । eṣa tu viśeṣo yat labdhasthitipadatvādyogicittasya samānapratyayapravāhateti ॥ 42 ॥
nirvitarkāyāḥ samāpatterasyāḥ sūtreṇa lakṣaṇaṁ dyotyate –
smṛtipariśuddhau svarūpaśūnyevārthamātranirbhāsā nirvitarkā ॥ 43 ॥

yā śabdasaṁketaśrutānumānajñānavikalpasmṛtipariśuddhau grāhyasvarūpoparaktā prajñā svamiva prajñāsvarūpaṁ grahaṇātmakaṁ tyaktvā padārthamātrasvarūpā grāhyasvarūpāpanneva bhavati sā tadā nirvitarkā samāpattiḥ।

vivaraṇam
[yadā punaḥ śabdasaṅketasmṛtipariśuddhau ।] śabdasaṅketo'syāyaṁ vācakaḥ ayamasya vācya iti samayapratipattiḥ । tajjanitasmṛtiḥ śabdasaṅketasmṛtiḥ । tasyāḥ pariśuddhirmithyātvādvinivṛttiḥ । sā rajastamasornyagbhāvāt ॥
[śrutajñānaṁ] āgamikam ,
[sā ca] tādṛśī
[tat] etat
[na ca (nanu) śrutānumānajñānasahabhūtaṁ taddarśanam,] śrutānumānajñānābhyāmasamānaviṣayamityetat । viśeṣaviṣayaṁ hi taddarśanaṁ, sāmānyaviṣaye śrutānumānajñāne ।
[śabdasaṅketaśrutānumānajñānavikalpasmṛtipariśuddhau] śabdasaṅketavikalpaḥ śrutajñānavikalpaḥ anumānajñānavikalpaśca, sa eva smṛtiḥ । smaraṇena hyanyasyānyadharmo'dhyāropyate । na hi vastu svarūpeṇa vastvantare'dhyāropayituṁ śakyam ।
nanu ca kathaṁ śrutānumite pratyakṣe'dhyāropyate । nanu ca prasiddho'dhyāropaḥ, tathā cedaṁ mayā śrutamidaṁ mayā'numitamidamiti ca paśyati ॥
nanu tadeva tat dṛśyamānamapi yadanumitaṁ śrutaṁ ca-na-sāmānyaviśeṣabhedāt । sāmānyaṁ śrutamanumitaṁ ca । viśeṣastu pratyakṣasya viṣayaḥ । tasmiṁśca tatsāmānyādhyāsaḥ prasiddha eva ॥
[grāhyoparaktā] yoginaḥ
[sā nirvitarkā samāpatiḥ ।]
tathā ca vyākhyātam – tasyā ekabuddhyupakramo hyarthātmā'ṇupracayaviśeṣātmā gavādirghaṭādirvā lokaḥ।

vivaraṇam
[tathā ca vyākhyātam । tasyā hyekabuddhyupakramo'rthātmā ।] upakramyate ekayā buddhayā yaḥ sa ekabuddhyupakramaḥ ekabudviparicchedya iti ।
[aṇupracayaviśeṣātmā] aṇūnāṁ tanmātrāvayavānāṁ pracayaviśeṣa ātmā yasya sa

sa ca saṁsthānaviśeṣo bhūtasūkṣmāṇāṁ sādhāraṇo dharma ātmabhūtaḥ phalena vyaktenānumitaḥ svavyañjakāñjanaḥ prādarbhavati। dharmāntarasya kapālāderudaye ca tiro bhavati। sa eṣa dhairmo'vayavītyucyate। yo'sāvekaśca mahāṁścāṇīyāṁśca sparśavāṁśca kriyādharmakaścānityaśca tenāvayavinā vyavahārāḥ kriyante।

vivaraṇam
[bhūtasūkṣmāṇāṁ sādhāraṇo dharma iti ātmabhūto] na vyatiriktaḥ । yathā sarpasya ābhogakuṇḍalanādi ॥
yeṣāṁ punaratyantavyatiriktamanyadeva kāraṇāt kāryaṁ, teṣāṁ kāraṇatantratvaṁ kāryasya na prāpnoti । aṁśutantro hi tantuḥ tantutantraśva paṭa: । na cātyantānyatve'nyatantratvaṁ dṛṣṭamanyasya । yathā mṛtpiṇḍatantratā na paṭasya, tantūnāṁ vā ॥
kiñca-tadvināśānuvināśitvaṁ ca na śakyaṁ, na hi kapālavināśamanuvinaśyati paṭa: ॥
athocyeta, sambandhaḥ kāraṇamiti । paṭasya hi tantavastantūnāñcāṁśava iti sambandhastatra hetuḥ kāraṇaṁ tattantratvatadanuvināśayoriti ॥
atrocyata-caitrakṣetrādisambandhe'pi prasaṅgaḥ syāt । caitrasyāpi kṣetrāditantratā tadanuvināśitvaṁ ca sambandhaviśeṣāt prasajyeta ॥
athāpi syāt-samavāyalakṣaṇaḥ sambandhaḥ kāraṇamiti – na - tasyāpi saṁbandhatvāviśeṣādahetutvaṁ, yathānyasaṁbandhaḥ saṁbandhinoranyataratantratvādyahetuḥ evaṁ samavāyalakṣaṇasyāpi saṁbandhavādanyataratantravādāvahetutvam ॥
api ca-na dravyavyatirekeṇa karmasāmānyaviśeṣasamavāyāḥ santi । dravyatantratvādyupapattereva । tatrāpi sambandhasyāpyahetutvameva ॥
kiñcānyat-saṁbandhasya ca saṁbandhinorevānyataratantratvādihetutve samavāyasyāpi samavāyāntaraṁ tasyāpyanya ityanavasthā prasajyeta । yathā guṇādīnāṁ samavāyalakṣaṇāt saṁbandhāt dravyatantratvaṁ, tathā samavāyasyāpi dravyavyatiriktatve dravyatantratvārthaṁ samavāyāntaraṁ kalpyeta, tasyāpyanyattasyāpyanyadityanavasthā syāt ॥
prāgutpatterabhāvāt kāryasya kāraṇena saṁbandhānupapattiḥ, aviśiṣṭaṁ cāsatvaṁ śaśaviṣāṇasya ghaṭasya ca । tatra ghaṭenaiva kāraṇasya saṁbandho na śaśaviṣāṇmādibhiriti heturvaditavyaḥ ॥
prāk asannotpadyeta śaśaviṣāṇavat । yastu tantubhyo'nyaḥ sa tantubhyo notpadyate, tantubhyo'nyatvāt । yathā tantubhyo ghaṭaḥ ॥
itara āha-prāk sannapi notpadyeta, satvāt, vidyamānaghaṭavaditi । yo yasmādananyaḥ so'pi tasmānnotpadyate, vidyamānatvāt, svarūpavaditi ॥
apara āha-yadi sannotpadyata iti sata uttpatyabhāva ucyeta, siddhasādhyatā syāt । athābhivyaktyabhāvaḥ, tadā dṛṣṭāntābhāvaḥ ॥
yadapyucyate yo yasmādananya iti, tatrāpi siddhasādhyatā dṛṣṭāntābhāvaśca । svarūpādeva hyabhivyajyate, nāsatyabhivyaṅgyasvarūpe'bhivyaktirabhivyañjakasahasreṇāpi śakyate kartum ॥
kiñcānyat-sarvavyavahāralopaśca । kathaṁ ? yadā devadattasya gairaśvo vā prātarvidyamānakarṇalāṅgūla: punaraṭavīṁ gataḥ kenacillūnakarṇo lūnalāṅgūle vā syāt, tadā pūrvāvayavavibhāgādvinaṣṭaḥ, anyastu navaḥ pralūnakarṇalāṅgūlo'svāmikaḥ sañjāta iti yena kenacidupādīyeta, tathā cāvayavavibhāgaḥ sarvatra sambhavatīti svasvāmisambandhādiniyamābhāvādaśeṣavyavahāralopaḥ syāt ॥
atha brūyāt-pūrvopārjitāvayavairevāvayavī navaḥ pralūnakarṇalāṅgūla ārabdha iti-naivam-na hi mātāpitrādivyatirekeṇedānīntanalūnakarṇalāṅgūlāvayavyantarapratyārambhiṇo dṛśyante ॥
kiṁca-yasya ca kṣetre lūnakarṇalāṅglo jātastasyaivāsau syāt, na pūrvāvayavikasya, tatkṣetrajātatṛṇapalāśādivat ॥
yathā cānyakṣetragatāni bījāni salilaughenānyakṣetramupanītāni cetaktadbījaniṣpannasasyaṁ kṣetravāneva gṛhṇāti, na tu pūrvabījavān (taḥ) । na cāsyāsau pratibadhnāti vidvānapi madīyabījapariniṣpannaṁ sasyamahamupādīyeti ॥
tathā lūnakarṇalāṅgūlamapi kṣetravāneva gṛhṇīta । na tatra pratibandha(rūpa) nīyammadīyāvayavairārabdho'yamavayavīti ॥
yeṣāmapyekasmingṛhīte tasminnaśve lūnakarṇalāṅgūlake jāte svakṣetre ca dṛṣṭe sa evāśvadātā anyoyaṁ (vitisanyoyaṁ) mahattamādaśvānmayā datto mahattama iti hareta । haratāmiti cetsarvavyavahāralopaprasaṅgaḥ śāstrake.opaśca । tasmāda[nanyo']vayavebhyaḥ kāraṇebhya eko'vayavī kāryamiti siddham ॥
yadapyucyata-śabdapratyayadharmādibhedādanya iti, tadapyayuktam । dṛśyate hi śabdādibhede'pyananyatvam । yathā hastaḥ karaḥ pāṇiriti śabdabheda ekasya, pitṛtvaṁ putratvaṁ ca, pratyayabheda ekasyaiva baddhaḥ punarmuktaḥ sthito gataśceti kālabhedāt । dāhakatvaṁ pācakatvamityādayo dharmabhedā iti । digdeśādibhedāstvasiddhā eva । tasmādāha-ātmabhūtā iti ॥
[svaphalena vyaktenānumitaḥ । phalena] udakāharaṇadhāraṇasambhavanādinā । yasya hi phalaṁ kāryaṁ vyaktamupalabhyate so'stīti niścayaḥ ।
[so'vayavītyucyate ।] yaścaivaṁdharmaḥ so'ṇubhyo'nya iti ॥
[yo'sāvekaśca mahāṁ ścāṇīyāṁśca kriyādharmakaścānityaśca ।] pratyekamete hetavaḥ ॥
api ca-eko ghaṭa iti ghaṭaśabdavācyasyaikatvena sāmānādhikaraṇyāt । asti cedaṁ sāmānādhikaraṇyaṁ yo'sāveka iti । na hi bahūnāmaṇūnāmekatvena sāmānādhikaraṇyamupakalpate ॥
tathā mahatvena । na cāṇūnāṁ amahatāṁ mahatvena sāmānādhikaraṇyaṁ yujyate । tathā'ṇīyastvena । na hyaṇūnāmaṇvantarāpekṣayā aṇīyastvaṁ ghaṭate । sarva eva hi te'ṇīyāṁsaḥ । nāpi cāṇūnāmaṇutvaṁ gṛhyate'ṇubhyaḥ । aṇutve vastvantarasyāṇīyastvamupapatsyate ॥
kiñca-kriyādharmakaśca । kriyā dharmo yasya sa kriyādharmakaḥ । phalavadvayāpāranirvṛttikaratvadityuktaṁ bhavati । na hyaṇūnāṁ phalavadvyāpāranirmuktikaratvaṁ yuktam । aśakyaprayojyatvādasmadādibhiḥ । kiñca-anityatvāt । na hyaṇūnāmānityatvaṁ gṛhyate ॥
[tenāvayavinā vyavahārāḥ kriyante nāṇubhiriti ॥]
yasya punaravastukaḥ sa pracayaviśeṣaḥ sūkṣmaṁ ca kāraṇamanupalabhyamavikalpasya tasyāvayavyabhāvādatadrūpapratiṣṭhaṁ mithyājñānamiti prāyeṇa sarvameva prāptaṁ mithyājñānamiti।

vivaraṇam
[yasya punaḥ] itthaṁ pramāṇasuprasiddhasattāko'pi
tataḥ sarvameva jñānaṁ śabdādyākāreṇa sukhādyākāreṇa tadjñānākāreṇa copajāyate । śabdādayaśca jñānākārakarāvayavitvābhimatā nābhyupagamyanta । sukhādayo'pi viṣayatvādavayavipakṣā eva । tathā tajjñānameva jñānākārakaratvātsvarūpamapi mithyeti prāptaṁ sarvameva mithyājñānam ॥
tataśca pratyakṣānumānayorapyābhāsatvameva tenābhyupetaṁ tayorapi śabdādiviṣayatvāt ।
yadapi sarvajñajñānamanityaduḥkhaśūnyānātmakatvādiviṣayaṁ tasyāpi viṣayābhāvāttadapi mithyājñānaṁ prāptamiti, svatantrasya tīrthakarasya cāprāmāṇyaṁ, tatra tīrthakarasahadharmābhāvaścābhyupagato bhavati । śabdādivatpramāṇaviṣayatvāviśeṣāt ॥
tadā ca samyagjñānamapi kiṁ syādviṣayābhāvāt। yadyadupalabhyate tattadavayavitvenā''mnātam। tasmādastyavayavī yo mahattvādivyavahārāpannaḥ samāpatternirvitarkāyā viṣayī bhavati ॥ 43 ॥

vivaraṇam
[samyagjñānamapi kiṁ syādviṣayābhāvāt । yadyadupalabhyate tattadavayavitvenāghrātamiti,] jñānasya svākārasamarpakavāviśeṣāt । tacca svākārasamarpakaṁ kiñcana nābhyupeyata iti sarvasyātmīyasya jñānasya tena mithyātvamāpāditam ।
tathā ca samyagjñānamapi kiṁ syāt, yadapekṣayā mithyājñānamabhisandhīyate ॥
yadā cāvayavinaṁ sarvapramāṇasamyaksarvajñānasiddhamapahnute tadā na samyagjñānasya viṣayaḥ sampādayituṁ pāryate ॥
yadā ca na pārayati, tadā kathamabhisandadhīta sarvaṁ mithyeti । samyagjñānamapekṣya mithyājñānaṁ mithyābhāvamāsīdati āpekṣikatvātsamyaṅmithyājñānayoḥ ॥
yaścāpi manyate-nirviṣayaṁ jñānaṁ samyagiti, tasyāpi svarūpāgrahaṇāt tadastitvānupapattiḥ । gṛhyate cedviṣayatvādavayavimithyātvaṁ, tanmithyātvācca tajjñānamithyātvaṁ, tathā tajjñānamapīti sarvamithyātvamuktaṁ pūrvameva ॥
api ca-nirviṣayajñānasamyaktve sarvajñānasya viṣayānabhyupagamānnirviṣayatvamiti, samyaktvameva prāpnuyāt । tathāpi tu sarvajñānasamyaktvānmithyājñānaṁ kiṁsyāditi vaktavyam ॥
[tasmādastyavayavī yo mahatvādvyavahārāpannaḥ samāpaternirvitarkayā viṣayībhavatīti ॥ 43 ॥]
etayaiva savicārā nirvicārā ca sūkṣmaviṣayā vyākhyātā ॥ 44 ॥

tatra bhūtasūkṣmakeṣvabhivyaktadharmakeṣu deśakālanimittānubhavāvacchinneṣu yā samāpattiḥ sā savicāretyucyate। tatrāpyekabuddhinirgrāhyamevoditadharmaviśiṣṭaṁ bhūtasūkṣmamālambanībhūtaṁ samādhiprajñāyāmupatiṣṭhate।

vivaraṇam
[etayaiva savicārā nirvicārā ca sūkṣmaviṣayā vyākhyātā । tatra bhūtasūkṣmeṣvabhivyaktadharmakeṣu] tanmātreṣveva
katham ? ihāpyadhyāsaviśeṣāt । ayantu viśeṣaḥ śabdasaṅketārthajñānadeśādisarvādhyāsāḥ savitarkāyām ॥
iha punastanmātrasūkṣmadharmeṣu śabdasaṅketasyāprasiddhatvādviśiṣṭanāmasaṅketajñānānadhyāsaḥ deśādyadhyāsaśca sūkṣmaviṣayatvañceti savitarkāviśeṣatvasiddhiḥ ॥
[tatrāpyekabuddhinigrāhyamevoditadharmaviśiṣṭaṁ] uktadeśādidharmaviśiṣṭamudbhūtadharmaviśiṣṭaṁ vā

yā punaḥ sarvathā sarvataḥ śāntoditāvyapadeśyadharmānavacchinneṣu sarvadharmānupātiṣu sarvadharmātmakeṣu samāpattiḥ sā nirvicāretyucyate। evaṁ svarūpaṁ hi tadbhūtasūkṣmametenaiva svarūpeṇā''lambanībhūtameva samādhiprajñāsvarūpamuparañjayati।

vivaraṇam
[yadā punaḥ sarvathā] sarvaprakāreṇa
[evaṁsvarūpaṁ hi tadbhūtasūkṣmamanenaiva svarūpeṇa] deśakālanimittānubhavādiviśeṣavirahitena sarvātmakena sarvadharmānupātinā

prajñā ca svarūpaśūnyevārthamātrā yadā bhavati tadā nirvicāretyucyate। tatra mahadvastuviṣayā savitarkā nirvitarkā ca, sūkṣmavastuviṣayā savicārā nirvicārā ca। evamubhayoretayaiva nirvitarkayā vikalpahānirvyākhyāteti ॥ 44 ॥

vivaraṇam
[prajñā ca svarūpaśūnyevārthamātrā yadā bhavati tadā nirvicārā ।] tasmannirvitarkāviśeṣā nirvicārā । tatsvayameva darśayati-
[ubhayoriti] savitarkanirvitarkayormadhye
sūkṣmaviṣayatvaṁ cāliṅgaparyavasānam ॥ 45 ॥

pārthivasyāṇorgandhatanmātraṁ sūkṣmo viṣayaḥ। āpyasya rasatanmātram। taijasasya rūpatanmātram। vāyavīyasya sparśatanmātram। ākāśasya śabdatanmātramiti। teṣāmahaṁkāraḥ। asyāpi liṅgamātraṁ sūkṣmo viṣayaḥ। liṅgamātrasyāpyaliṅgaṁ sūkṣmo viṣayaḥ। na cāliṅgātparaṁ sūkṣmamasti। nanvasti puruṣaḥ sūkṣma iti। satyam। yathā liṅgātparamaliṅgasya saukṣmyaṁ na caivaṁ puruṣasya। kiṁtu, liṅgasyānvayikāraṇaṁ puruṣo na bhavati, hetustu bhavatīti। ataḥ pradhāne saukṣmyaṁ niratiśayaṁ vyākhyātam ॥ 45 ॥

vivaraṇam
[sūkṣmaviṣayatvañcāliṅgaparyavasānam । pārthivasyāṇorgandha] mātrasvarūpamātrateti pṛthivīsamīkṣayā
[liṅgamātraṁ] mahattatvaṁ
[na cāliṅgātparaṁ sūkṣmamasti ।] sūkṣmaṁ nāma sthūlakāryāpekṣayā kāraṇaṁ, taccāliṅgāvasānam ।
[nanu puruṣa iti ।] nanu tatra puruṣasyānāśaṅkaiva, kāryakāraṇasūkṣmatayā prakramāt-naiṣa doṣaḥ-puruṣasyāpi kaiścitkāraṇatvasyābhyupagamāt । tadāśaṅkayaiva hyetaducyate
[hetustu bhavatīti ।] pradhānapravṛttau bhoktṛtvena nimittaṁ bhavatītyarthaḥ ।
tā eva sabījaḥ samādhiḥ ॥ 46 ॥
tāścatasraḥ samāpattayo bahirvastubījā iti samādhirapi sabījaḥ। tatra sthūle'rthe savitarko nirvitarkaḥ, sūkṣme'rthe savicāro nirvicāra iti caturdhopasaṁkhyātaḥ samādhiriti ॥ 46 ॥

vivaraṇam
[tā eva sabījaḥ samādhiḥ । catasraḥ samāpattayo bahirvastuviṣayā iti] bahirvastuviṣayatvaṁ hetuḥ sabījatve ।
nirvicāravaiśāradye'dhyātmaprasādaḥ ॥ 47 ॥

aśuddhyāvaraṇamalāpetasya prakāśātmano buddhisattvasya rajastamobhyāmanabhibhūtaḥ svacchaḥ sthitipravāho vaiśāradyam। yadā nirvicārasya samādhervaiśāradyamidaṁ jāyate tadā yogino bhavatyadhyātmaprasādo bhūtārthaviṣayaḥ kramānanurodhī sphuṭaḥ prajñālokaḥ। tathā coktam –
prajñāprasādamāruhya aśocyaḥ śocato janān।
bhūmiṣṭhāniva śailasthaḥ sarvānprājño'nupaśyati ॥ 47 ॥

vivaraṇam
[nirvicāravaiśāradye'dhyātmaprasādaḥ । aśuddhyāvaraṇamalāpetasya] aśuddhirevāvaraṇaṁ tadeva malaṁ kleśādikaṁ tasmādapetasya
[tathā coktam “prajñāprāsādamāruhya aśocyaḥ śocato janān । bhūmiṣṭhāniva śailasthaḥ sarvānprājño'nupaśyati ॥ ” iti ॥ 47 ॥]
ṛtaṁbharā tatra prajñā ॥ 48 ॥
tasminsamāhitacittasya yā prajñā jāyate tasyā ṛtaṁbhareti saṁjñā bhavati। anvarthā ca sā, satyameva bibharti na ca tatra viparyāsajñānagandho'pyastīti। tathā coktam –
āgamenānumānena dhyānābhyāsarasena ca।
tridhā prakalpayanprajñā labhata yogamuttamam ॥ iti ॥ 48 ॥

vivaraṇam
[ṛtaṁbharā] tatra
[tathā coktam -] 
[‘āgamenānumānena dhyānābhyāsarasena ca । tridhā prakalpayanprajñāṁ labhate yogamuttamam ॥ ' iti ।] 
yogāṅgaprajñāṁ tridhā vibhajate । tatraiko bhāgaḥ śāsrācāryopadiṣṭārthānusārī । dvitīyastasyaiva yuktyā'numānena vicāryāgamārthavirodhinirākaraṇapūrvakaṁ tatsamyagupapādanaparaḥ । tṛtīyastu sadāgamānumānasamyagupapakṣārthīlambanasya pratyayasyānuśīlanaṁ rasopayegī । taditthaṁ tridhā prakalpayanyogī yogaṁ labhate ॥ 48 ॥
sā punaḥ –
śrutānumānaprajñābhyāmanyaviṣayā viśeṣārthatvāt ॥ 49 ॥

śrutamāgamavijñānaṁ tatsāmānyaviṣayam। na hyāgamena śakyo viśeṣo'bhidhātuṁ, kasmāt, na hi viśeṣeṇa kṛtasaṁketaḥ śabda iti। tathā'numānaṁ sāmānyaviṣayameva। yatra prāptistatra gatiryatrāprāptistatra na bhavati gatirityuktam। anumānena ca sāmānyenopasaṁhāraḥ। tasmācchrutānumānaviṣayo na viśeṣaḥ kaścidastīti।

vivaraṇam
[sā punaḥ] ṛtambharā prajñā sāmānyapuruṣapratyayaviṣayādanyaviṣayetyāha--
[tathānumānaṁ sāmānyaviṣayameva ।] tadapyuktameva

na cāsya sūkṣmavyavahitaviprakṛṣṭasya vastuno lokapratyakṣeṇa grahaṇamasti। na cāsya viśeṣasyāpramāṇakasyābhāvo'stīti samādhiprajñānirgrāhya eva sa viśeṣo bhavati bhūtasṛ'kṣmagato vā puruṣagato vā। tasmācchratānumānaprajñābhyāmanyaviṣayā sā prajñā viśeṣārthatvāditi ॥ 49 ॥

vivaraṇam
[na cāsya sūkṣmavyavahitaviprakṛṣṭasya vastuno lokapratyakṣeṇa grahaṇam । na cāsya viśeṣasyāpramāṇikasyābhāvo'stīti ।] pramāṇāvagamyamānarūpo hi bhāvo'sti rājavīthīmadhirohati । tasmāt
nanu ca te sūkṣmagatā viśeṣāḥ pratyakṣeṇāvagamyante iti kimīśvarājñāpitam ? vastutvādavagamyanta iti cet---āgamānumānābhyāṁ santītyavagamyanta eva । na ca niyāmaka kiṁcidasti pratyakṣeṇaiva nirgrahyā iti । na hi viśeṣā hastatalagatā api sarve gṛhyante-na-anyavastugataviśeṣāṇāṁ pratyakṣagrāhyatvasyānumeyatvāt ॥
[tasmācchrutānumānaprajñābhyāmanyaviṣayā sā prajñā, viśeṣārthatvāditi ।] viśeṣārthā hi sā ॥ 49 ॥
samādhiprajñāpratilambhe yoginaḥ prajñākṛtaḥ saṁskāro navo navo jāyate –
tajjaḥ saṁskāro'nyasaṁskārapratibandhī ॥ 50 ॥

samādhiprajñāprabhavaḥ saṁskāro vyutthānasaṁskārāśayaṁ bādhate। vyutthānasaṁskārābhibhavāttatprabhavāḥ pratyayā na bhavanti। pratyayanirodhe samādhirupatiṣṭhate। tataḥ samādhijā prajñā, tataḥ prajñākṛtāḥ saṁskārā iti navo navaḥ saṁskārāśayo jāyate। tataśca prajñā, tataśca saṁskārā iti। kathamasau saṁskārātiśayaścittaṁ sādhikāraṁ na kariṣyatīti। na te prajñākṛtāḥ saṁskārāḥ kleśakṣayahetutvāccittamadhikāraviśiṣṭaṁ kurvanti। cittaṁ hi te svakāryādavasādayanti। khyātiparyavasānaṁ hi cittaceṣṭitamiti ॥ 50 ॥

vivaraṇam
[samādhiprajñāpratilambhe yoginaḥ prajñākṛtaḥ saṁskāro navo jāyate ।] prajñā hi saṁskārārāmbhaṇīti siddham । prajñābhinavatvāttatsaṁskāraḥ pratyagrataro jāyate iti viśeṣaḥ । prajñānavatvaṁ tu tasyā (sāmānya) anyaviṣayatvāt । tajja
[vyutthānasaṁskārābhibhavāt] vyutthānasaṁskārāśayasya samādhiprajñāsaṁskāreṇābhibhavāt
[kathamasau saṁskārāśayaḥ cittaṁ sādhikāraṁ] saṁskāropetaṁ na kariṣyatīti ? ॥
[te saṁskārāḥ kleśakṣayahetutvāccittamadhikāraviśiṣṭaṁ na kurvanti ।] vyutthānapratyayaprabhavānāṁ hi saṁskārāṇāmavidyādikleśahetutvacittasaṁskārābhimukhabhāvakāraṇatā । tadvirodhipratyayaprabhavatvāttu na samādhijapratyayajanmanāṁ saṁskārāṇāmadhikārābhimukhyanimittatā ॥
[cittañca te svakāryāt] saṁskārābhimukhavṛttibhye'
yo hi vigatatṛṣṇāsamudāyo, nāsau pānīyaṁ pipāsati । etāvadeva cittena puruṣasya karaṇīyam । na hi kaśvit kṛtaṁ karaṇīyaṁ cikīrṣati ॥ 50 ॥
kiṁ cāsya bhavati –
tasyāpi nirodhe sarvanirodhānnirbījaḥ samādhiḥ ॥ 51 ॥
sa na kevalaṁ samādhiprajñāvirodhī prajñākṛtānāmapi saṁskārāṇāṁ pratibandhī bhavati। kasmāt, nirodhajaḥ saṁskāraḥ samādhijānsaṁskārānbādhata iti।

vivaraṇam
[tasyāpi nirodhe sarvanirodhānnirbījassamādhiriti । iti] śabdaḥ parisamāptyarthaḥ ।
[sarvanirodhānnirbījaḥ samādhiḥ ॥] 
[sa na kevalaṁ] ṛtambharaprajñājanitasaṁskāraḥ
[nirodhajaḥ saṁskāraḥ] yasmātsamādhiprajñāyāstajjanmanaśca saṁskārasya nirodhe, nirodhakaḥ samādhiprajñājānitasaṁskārādanyo jāyate, sa cāpi yataḥ samādhiprajñāṁ tajjanitasaṁskārāṁścātiraskṛtya na janma pratipadyate, tasmātsa

nirodhasthitikālakramānubhavena nirodhacittakṛtasaṁskārāstitvamanumeyam। vyutthānanirodha-samādhiprabhavaiḥ saha kaivalyabhāgīyaiḥ saṁskāraiścittaṁ svasyāṁ prakṛtāvavasthitāyāṁ pravilīyate। tasmātte saṁskārāścittasyādhikāravirodhino na sthitihetavo bhavantīti।

vivaraṇam
[nirodhasthitikālakramānubhaveneti ।] nirodhasya sthitistasyāḥ kālaḥ sa ca kālaḥ krameṇānubhūyate, yataḥ pratyabhyāsamabhivardhate, tasmāttena
[vyutthānanirodhasamādhiprabhavaiḥ] vyutthānasamādhiprabhavaiḥ nirodhasamādhiprabhavaiśca
yasmādavasitādhikāraṁ saha kaivalyabhāgīyaiḥ saṁskāraiścittaṁ nivartate, tasminnivṛtte puruṣaḥ svarūpamātrapratiṣṭho'taḥ śuddhaḥ kevalo mukta ityucyata iti ॥ 51 ॥

vivaraṇam
[yasmādavasitādhikāraṁ saha kevalyabhāgīyaiḥ saṁskaraiścittaṁ] yaṁ puruṣaṁ prati caritaprayojanaṁ tasmāt
iti śrīpātañjale sāṁkhyapravacane yogaśāstre śrīmadvyāsabhāṣye prathamaḥ samādhipādaḥ ॥ 1 ॥
sādhanapādaḥ
uddiṣṭaḥ samāhitacittasya yogaḥ। kathaṁ vyutthitacitto'pi yogayuktaḥ syādityetadārabhyate –
tapaḥsvādhyāyeśvarapraṇidhānāni kriyāyogaḥ ॥ 1 ॥

nātapasvino yogaḥ sidhyati। anādikarmakleśavāsanācitrā pratyupasthitaviṣayajālā cāśuddhirnāntareṇa tapaḥ saṁbhedamāpadyata iti tapasa upādānam। tacca cittaprasādanamabādhamānamanenā''sevyamiti manyate। svādhyāyaḥ praṇavādipavitrāṇāṁ japo mokṣaśāstrādhyayanaṁ vā। īśvarapraṇidhānaṁ sarvakriyāṇāṁ paramagurāvarpaṇaṁ tatphalasaṁnyāso vā ॥ 1 ॥

vivaraṇam
athedānīṁ dvitīyaḥ sādhanapāda ārabhyate । kaivalyasya sādhanaṁ samyagdarśanam । yogasādhanāni ca yogadvāreṇa samyagdarśanasādhanānyeva । tāni ca prādhānyenāsminpāde pratipādyanta iti sādhanapāda ityucyate ॥
tathā, yogasādhanānuṣṭhānapravṛttasyānuṣaṅgikavibhūteḥ prādhānyena pratipādanādvibhūtipāda ityucyate tṛtīyaḥ ॥
tathā, sakalayogaiśvaryavibhūtibhyo viraktasya sarvopasaṁhāradvāreṇa kaivalyasya prādhānyena pradarśanāt kaivalpāda ityucyate caturthaḥ ॥
tathā, samādhiḥ prādhānyenādāvupākhyāta iti prathamaḥ samādhipāda ityucyate ॥
[uddiṣṭaḥ samāhitacittasya yoga iti] -karmaṇyacittasyetyarthaḥ । maitrīkaruṇādibhāvanādyupā(khyā)yalabdhasthitipadasya yoginaḥ paravairāgyavirāmapratyayasādhano nirbījaḥ samādhiruddiṣṭaḥ ।
[tapassvādhyāyeśvarapraṇidhānāni kriyāyogaḥ ।] 
nanu ca tapassvādhyāyeśvarapraṇidhānāni niyameṣu vadiṣyamāṇāni kimarthamihocyante ॥
nanu caitadeva prayojanaṁ--yaduktaṁ vyutthitacitto'pi yogayuktaḥ syāditi ॥
nai tadasti-yatra niyamāḥ paṭhyante tatraivedaṁ prayojanaṁ sidhyati ।
[“ yogāṅgānuṣṭhānādaśuddhikṣaye”] iti । aśuddhiśca kleśādi: । samādhibhāvanārthañca yogāṅgānuṣṭhānamāmnāyiṣyata eva । yathā
na-yogāṅgānuṣṭhānasya samyagdarśanopāyasya samyagdarśanapūrvatvapratipādanārthatvāt । sarvāṇi ca yogāṅgāni samyagdarśanopāyatvātsamyagdarśanaprākkālāni । teṣāṁ ca niyamaikadeśa iha paṭhita: sarvopāyaprākkālatve nidarśanāya । yadyapyupāyatvādeva prākālatvamarthātsiddham , tathā'pi spaṣṭatvamevaṁ sati syāditi ॥
nanu caivamapi prāk samyagdarśanādanantaraṁ paṭhitavyam-ucyate-na-samyagdarśanasyaiva sākṣātkleśadipratipakṣatvāt । avidyā hi samastānarthamūlam । sā ca sākṣātpratyanīkabhūtasamyagdarśanena nivartyate । tapa ādestadanantaraṁ pāṭhe satyavidyāsamyagdarśanayorvyavadhānaṁ bhavet । tato'bhiśaṁketa-kiṁ avidyāyāstapaādiḥ sākṣātpratipakṣaḥ ? kiṁ vā samyagdarśanameveti ॥
kiñca---viṣayaśca prathamaṁ darśanīyaḥ samyagdarśanaśāsrasya । sa ca kleśakarmavipākāśayābhibhūtaḥ puruṣaḥ । yathā rogārtaḥ cikitsāśākhasya viṣayaḥ । tapaādestadanantaraṁ samāmnāne viṣayaviṣayiṇau vyavadhīyeyātāṁ, tataścāyaṁ viṣayo'yañca viṣayīti na vivicyeta ॥
pādādau ca pāṭhe samyagdarśanopāyatvaṁ ca pratipāditaṁ bhavati, prathamapādasambandhaśca vyākhyātaḥ syāt-samāhitacittasya yoga uddiṣṭaḥ, vyutthitacitto'pi tapaādisādhanaḥ kathaṁ yogayuktaḥ syāditi ॥
kiñca-samādhibhāvanakleśatanūkaraṇārthatvañca tapaādīnāṁ darśayitavyam ॥
["samādhisiddhirīścarapraṇidhānāt " "kāyendriyasiddhiraśuddhikṣayāttapasaḥ"] ityevam । pratyekasādhanānāṁ siddhiṁ ca vakṣyati ॥
["samādhibhāvanārthaḥ kleśatanūkaraṇārthaśca"] iti । tatra hyanūdyante sādhanastutaye । samprati sūtrākṣarāṇi vyākhyāyante-tapaśca svādhyāyaśceśvarapraṇidhānañca tapassvādhyāyeśvarapraṇidhānāni । tānyava kriyārūpo yoga: kriyāyogaḥ । tapaādikriyā ca yogārthavādyoga ityucyate । citatdharmo hi samādhiryogaḥ । tadarthaścāyaṁ kriyāyogaḥ । tasmādanena kriyāyogena yogīti ॥
[tapa iti] kṛcchracāndrāyaṇādi, śītoṣṇādidvandvasahatvam ।
[nātapasvino yogaḥ sidhyatīti ॥] 
śarīrādipoṣaṇābhiratacittasya kāyendriyamanaḥkhedaparihāraparāyaṇasyātyantaśarīrādyātmatvadarśinaḥ sukumārataraṁmanyasya na yogaḥ sidhyatīti tapasa upādānam ॥
[anādivāsanācitrā] -viṣayagrahaṇavāsanābhiranadikālabhiruparacitavicitrabhāvā । tathā
sa hi kriyāyogaḥ –
samādhibhāvanārthaḥ kleśatanūkaraṇārthaśca ॥ 2 ॥

sa hyāsevyamānaḥ samādhiṁ bhāvayati kleśāṁśca pratanū karoti। pratanūkṛtānkleśānprasaṁkhyānāgninā dagdhabījakalpānaprasavadharmiṇaḥ kariṣyatīti। teṣāṁ tanūkaraṇātpunaḥ kleśairaparāmṛṣṭā sattvapuruṣānyatāmātrakhyātiḥ sūkṣmā prajñā samāptādhikārā pratiprasavāya kalpiṣyata iti ॥ 2 ॥

vivaraṇam
[sa hi kriyāyogaḥ] kimartha iti tasya pārārthyapratipādanārthamāha-
[sa hi āsevyamānaḥ samādhiṁ bhāvayati ।] itarayogāṅgasahitaḥ samādhiṁ bhāvayati
[teṣāṁ tanūkaraṇānujanmā punaḥ kleśairaparāmṛṣṭā satvapuruṣānyatāmātrakhyātiḥ samāsādhikārā prajñā pratiprasavāya [kalpiṣyate]] saṁsārābhimukhatāyai punarna kalpiṣyata ॥
[punaḥ kleśairaparāmṛṣṭe] tyanena ॥ 2 ॥
atha ke kleśāḥ kiyanto veti –
avidyāsmitārāgadveṣābhiniveśāḥ kleśāḥ ॥ 3 ॥
kleśā iti pañca viparyayā ityarthaḥ। te spandamānā guṇādhikāraṁ draḍhayanti, pariṇāmamavasthāpayanti, kāryakāraṇasrota unnamayanti, parasparānugrahatantrī bhūtvā karmavipākaṁ cābhinirharantīti ॥ 3 ॥

vivaraṇam
[ke te kleśāḥ] svarūpeṇa,
[pañca viparyaṁyā ityarthaḥ ॥] 
[“ pratyakṣānumānāgamāḥ pramāṇāni”] iti tridhā bhedastatraiva vyākhyātaḥ, tathā kasmāttatraivāsya viparyayasyāpi bhedaḥ pañcadhā nopavyākhyātaḥ ? cittavṛttireva ca viparyaya ityuktam । tathā codāhataṁ,
naiṣa doṣaḥ--kleśānāmavṛttitvāt । na hi kleśāḥ pratyayamātrāḥ, pratyayamātrā hi vṛttayaḥ । kleśāstu cittasya malaṁ, yathā cakṣuṣastimiram । kleśamalaviyoge cittasya viparyayapratyayābhāvāt ॥
yadi hi pratyaya eva viparyayaḥ, tadā yathā kleśanirodhe'pi yoginaḥ smṛtipramāṇapratyayo bhavanti, tathā viparyayo'pi bhavet । na tu viparyayaḥ kṣīṇakleśānām । tasmāccākṣuṣa iva ayathārthagrahaṇanimittaṁ pratyayasya malaṁ viparyaya ityucyate ॥
['viparyayo vṛttiḥ'] iti । tathā ca vṛttayaḥ
[''cittamalaprasaṅgenabhidhāyiṣyante''] iti kleśānāṁ na vṛttitvaṁ, malatvamevetyabhiprāyeṇa । abhedopacāreṇa tu pratyayena sāmānādhikaraṇyaṁ, yathā dhūmo malairagniṁ garbhādaśāntavṛttāstathā jñānameteneti, (?) tathaivātrāpi ॥
[te spandamānā] ityādinā । spandamānāḥ pratyayadvāreṇodbhāsamānāḥ, na hi svatasteṣāñcalanamasti, vastrādirāgavat ।
[parīṇāmamavasthāpayānti] punaḥ punaḥ pariṇamayantīti yāvat ।
[karmavipākāṁścābhinirvartayanti ।] karma trividhaṁ, tadvipākāṁśca jātyāyurbhogāniti ॥ 3 ॥
avidyā kṣetramuttareṣāṁ prasuptatanuvicchinnodārāṇām ॥ 4 ॥

atrāvidyā kṣetraṁ prasavabhūmiruttareṣāmasmitādīnāṁ caturvidhavikalpānāṁ prasuptatanuvicchinnodārāṇām। tatra kā prasuptiḥ। cetasi śaktimātrapratiṣṭhānāṁ bījabhāvopagamaḥ। tasya prabodha ālambane saṁmukhībhāvaḥ। prasaṁkhyānavato dagdhakleśabījasya saṁmukhībhūte'pyālambane nāsau punarasti, dagdhabījasya kutaḥ praroha iti। ataḥ kṣīṇakleśaḥ kuśalaścaramadeha ityucyate। tatraiva sā dagdhabījabhāvā pañcamī kleśāvasthā nānyatreti। satāṁ kleśānāṁ tadā bījasāmarthyaṁ dagdhamiti viṣayasya saṁmukhībhāve'pi sati na bhavatyeṣāṁ prabodha ityuktā prasuptirdagdhabījānāmaprarohaśca।

vivaraṇam
[avidyā kṣetramuttareṣāṁ prasuptatanuvicchinnodārāṇām ।] kathamasmitādayo viparyayā iti, tatpradarśyate sūtreṇaiva ।
viparyayapratyayā hi tāmāśrityātmānaṁ pratilabhante । tasmādavidyaivāsmitādicatuṣṭayarūpeṇa vipariṇamate ॥
[tatra kā prasuptiriti ।] asmitādīnāṁ prasutirnāma dharme ucyate, nāvidyāyāḥ । kāraṇatvāt । sarvāsmitādivikalpeṣvanugamātsarvadā prabuddhaiva sā, na prasuptā । prasvapane vyavahārābhāvāt । asmitādīnāmanyatamasya prasuptāvanyatamasyāvasthānamavaśyameva । anyathā kleśāntarasyodbhava eva na syāt । tasmādasmitādīnāmeva caturṇāṁ prasuptādicaturvikalpatvam ॥
[cetasi śaktimātrapratiṣṭhānami] tyasya vyākhyānaṁ karoti-
[tasya prabodha] iti-
[prasaṁkhyānavataḥ] samyagdarśanābhyāsavataḥ
yadyevam , eṣā pañcamī kasmādavasthā noktā dagdhaprasuptatanuvicchinno dārāṇāmiti-na-asādhāraṇatvāt । na hi sarvadehināṁ sādhāraṇī pañcamī kleśāvasthā । yogina eva hi sā, tato nāmnāyate ॥
[tatraiva sā] samyagdarśanābhyāsavatyeva

tanutvamucyate – pratipakṣabhāvanopahatāḥ kleśāstanavo bhavanti। tathā vicchidya vicchidya tena tenā''tmanā punaḥ punaḥ samudācarantīti vicchinnāḥ। kathaṁ, rāgakāle krodhasyādarśanāt। na hi rāgakāle krodhaḥ samudācarati। rāgaśca kvacidṛśyamāno na viṣayāntare nāsti। naikasyāṁ striyāṁ caitro rakta ityanyāsu strīṣu viraktaḥ kiṁtu tatra rāgo labdhavṛttiranyatra tu bhaviṣyadvṛttiriti। sa hi tadā prasuptatanuvicchinno bhavati।

vivaraṇam
[tanutvaṁ] idānīṁ
[tathā vicchidya] vicchidyārthāntaropajanakālāntarāleṣu svātmānamapradarśayantaḥ
[vicchidya vicchidya] vicchedakāle
[kathaṁ ? rāgakāle krodhasyādarśanāt । na hi rāgakāle krodhaḥ samudācarati ।] kuta: rūpātiśayānāṁ vṛtyatiśayānāṁ ca virodhāt । sa hi rāgodayāttirobhūto'nyenāvyaktenātmanā vartata iti vicchinnaḥ ॥
[rāgaśca kvaciddṛśyamāno na viṣayāntare nāsti ।] kutaḥ? viṣayavirodhādatra । pūrvatra rāgeṇa virodhādasamudācaraṇaṁ krodhasya । atra tu viṣayāṇāmanyonyavirodhāt । na hi viṣaya ekasminnupajanayati rāgaṁ viṣayāntaramapi tasyaiva rāgasyotpādakam ॥
[naikasyāṁ striyāṁ caitro rakta ityanyāsu viraktaḥ । kintu tatra rāgo labdhavṛttiḥ] yasyāṁ raktaḥ ।
[rāgaśca kacit dṛśyamāna’] ityādi bhāṣyaṁ kimarthaṁ? nanu rāgasvabhāvākhyānaṁ, itthaṁ viṣayabhedāllabdhabhaviṣyadvṛttisvabhāvo rāga iti-satyam tathā'pi prakrāntānupayogaḥ । prakrānta hi vicchedavyākhyānaṁ । na caitadvicchedavyākhyānam । nāpi vakṣyamāṇodāravyākhyānena sambandhaḥ । tasya nirākāṅkatvāt ॥
evaṁ tarhi pūrvaśeṣa evāyam । katham ? evaṁ manyate, prasuptatanūdāratvavyatirekeṇa vicchittirnāma dharma eva nāsti । katham ? yāvanna labdhavṛttistāvatprasupta ityuktam । pratipakṣabhāvanopahato mandapravṛttistanurityucyate ॥
yaścāpi labdhavṛttiḥ sa udāra ityākhyāyate । vicchinno nāma sa bhavati, yaḥ kvacidupalabdhaḥ punarupalabhyate । yathā sarasvatīsrotaḥ । na hi rāgodaye krodhaḥ kvacidapi dṛśyate । tasmānna vicchittirnāma dharmo'sti । adarśanāt ॥
[kacit dṛśyamāno na viṣayāntare nāstī] tyādi ॥
tathā krodho'pi rāgeṇodbhūtenābhibhūtatvādvicchinnadarśano bhaviṣyati, sarasvatīsrotovadeva । sa hi rāgo viṣayāntare prasuptaḥ tanurvā । tadābhimukhyenādṛśyamānaviśeṣatvāt ॥
kaḥ punaḥ prasuptivicchedayorviśeṣaḥ ? yāvatobhayatrādarśanamaviśiṣṭam । ucyate-pravṛttadarśanaprabandhasyāntarāvirodhinā'nubaddhatvādadarśanaṁ vicchittiradagdhasya ॥
prasuptiḥ punarnimitteṣu satsvapyadagdhabījasyaivāsatyapi virodhinā'bhibhave nyagbhūtatayā bījarūpeṇāvasthānam ॥
