nanu caivaṁ sati “sa(na)hi tadā prasuptastanurve”ti viruddhaṁ, pravṛtteradarśanaprabandho hi viṣayāntareṇa dṛśyate-na-viṣayāntarābhimukhyasya vivakṣitatvāt । viṣayāntarābhimukhyaṁ nāma yo rāgasya dharmaḥ sa hi tadā prasuptaḥ tanurvā । na rāgaḥ sarvedā āmanaiva prasuptastanurvā । kvacit dṛśyamānatvādeva । krodhaḥ prasuptastanurvā ātmanaiva rāgakāle sarvaviṣayeṣu na dṛśyate ॥
['rāgaśca kvaci'] dityādi bhāṣyam । kathaṁ ? dviprakāro vicchedaḥ pradarśayiṣya(ti)te । ekastāvatpravṛttadarśanaprabandhasya virodhinā'bhibhavātsarvatrādarśanam । yathā darśitaṁ
[tatra labdhavṛtti] riti kvacidviṣaye dṛśyamānasyaiva yatra
[sa hi tadā prasuptastanurvā ।] na hi prasuptistānavaṁ vā vivakṣyate । yathā tathā vā bhavatu । tatrādarśanaṁ vicchedatvena vivakṣitam ॥

viṣaye yo labdhavṛttiḥ sa udāraḥ। sarva evaite kleśaviṣayatvaṁ nātikrāmanti। kastarhi vicchinnaḥ prasuptastanurudāro vā kleśa iti, ucyate – satyamevaitat, kiṁtu viśiṣṭānāmevaiteṣāṁ vicchinnāditvam। yathaiva pratipakṣabhāvanāto nivṛttastathaiva svavyañjakāñjanenābhivyakta iti। sarva evāmī kleśā avidyābhedāḥ। kasmāt, sarveṣvavidyaivābhiplavate। yadavidyayā vastvākāryate tadevānuśerate kleśā viparyāsapratyayakāla upalabhyante kṣīyamāṇāṁ cāvidyāmanu kṣīyanta iti ॥ 4 ॥

vivaraṇam
[viṣaye yo labdhavṛttiḥ sa udāraḥ ।] nanu ca prasuptatanuvicchinnānāṁ kāryāsamarthānāṁ na kleśatā । na hi prasuptastanuvicchinne vā prasuptivicchittitanniyamāvasthāyāṁ kāryaṁ kartuṁ kṣamate । na hyajātaśśatrurupaghātāyālam । vicchinne vā pradeśe srotasi snātuṁ śakyam । tasmādavidyā kṣetramuttareṣāmityetāvadevāstu । kintairakāryakṣamaiḥ prasuptatanuvicchinairupadiṣṭai: । etadāśaṁkyāha-
[kastarhi vicchinnaḥ prasutastanurudāro vā kleśaḥ ।] na yuktamevaṁ bhedena vacanam । ekamevodāharaṇamastu । na codārāvasthāyā anyatra kāryaṁ kariṣyati ॥
[satyamevametat ।] tathā'pi parihāra ucyate,
tatkāle kāryākṣamatvamiti cet-na-pratipakṣavidhānārthavādvacanasya । na hi śatroradṛśyamānasya prasuptasya janiṣyamāṇasya vā na pratividhātavyam ॥
[yathaiva pratipakṣabhāvanāto nivṛttastathaiva svavyañjakāñjanena] viṣayādinā
yasmātte punarabhivyaktāḥ punaśca tirohitāḥ punarapyabhivyañjiṣyante ca, tasmātprasuptādyavasthā api pratipakṣavidhānāya vaktavyā eva, hreśatvānatikrāntatvāt ॥
[sarva evāmī kleśā avidyābhedāḥ । kasmāt?] yasmāt
[yadavidyayā vastvākāryate] prakalpyate
[viparyāsapratyayakāla evopalabhyante ।] itaścāvidyābhedā:, yasmā
tatrāvidyāsvarūpamucyate –
anityāśuciduḥkhānātmasu nityaśucisukhātmakhyātiravidyā ॥ 5 ॥

anitye kārye nityakhyātiḥ। tadyathā - dhruvā pṛthivī, dhruvā sacandratārakā dyauḥ, amṛtā divaukasa iti। tathā'śucau paramabībhatse kāye – sthānādbījādupaṣṭambhānniḥsyandānnidhanādapi। kāyamādheyaśaucatvātpaṇḍitā hyaśuciṁ viduḥ ॥ iti aśucau śucikhyātirdṛśyate। naveva śaśāṅkalekhā kamanīyeyaṁ kanyā madhvamṛtāvayavanirmitevacandraṁ bhittvā niḥsṛteva jñāyate, nīlotpalapatrāyatākṣī hāvagarbhābhyāṁ locanābhyāṁ jīvalokamāśvāsayantīveti kasya kenābhisaṁbandhaḥ। bhavati caivamaśucau śuciviparyāsapratyaya iti। etenāpuṇye puṇyapratyayastathaivānarthe cārthapratyayo vyākhyātaḥ।

vivaraṇam
[tatrāvidyāsvarūpamucyate ।] kiṁ punaravidyāsvarūpākhyāne prayojanaṁ ? tatsvayameva bhāṣyakṛdākhyāsyate
[anityāśuciduḥkhānātmasu nityaśucisukhātmakhyātiravidyā ।] katham?
[‘dyaurāsīnna pṛthivī nāntarikṣa'] mityādiṣu siddham ॥
[tathā aśucau paramabībhatse] paramodvegakare'tyantaghṛṇāspade kārātmasadmanīvāśucau kāye । kathama(pi)sya bībhatsakatvamityāha-
[kāyamādheyaśaucatvāditi ।] śāsrata ādhātavyameva śai.aucamasminna svato'stīti yāvat ॥
yadvā, karaṇani buddhisatvādīni satvātmakatayā śucīnyādheyānyasminniti, tacchrucitvādasyāpi śaucam । buddhisatvādyādheyaviprayoge cātyantāśucitvadarśanāt ॥
[tasmātpaṇḍitā hyaśuciṁ viduḥ ।] paṇḍitagrahaṇaṁ viparyastadhiyāṁ śucitvagrahaṇakhyāpanārtham ॥
[veva śaśāṅkalekhā kamanīyeyaṁ kanyā amṛtāvayavanirmiteva candra bhitveva nissṛtā jñāyate nīlotpalapatrākṣī bhāvagarbhābhyāṁ locanābhyāṁ jīvalokaṁ samāśvāsayantīti kasya kenābhisaṁbandho bhavatīti ।] kva śarīrādiyāthātmyaṁ, kva
[etenāpuṇye puṇyapratyayaḥ,] yathā saṁsāramocakānāṁ,

tathā duḥkhe sukhakhyātiṁ vakṣyati - pariṇāmatāpasaṁskāraduḥkhairguṇavṛttivirodhācca duḥkhameva sarvaṁ vivekinaḥ iti। tatrasukhakhyātiravidyā। tathā'nātmanyātmakhyātirbāhyopakaraṇeṣu cetanācetaneṣu bhogādhiṣṭhāne vā śarīre puruṣopakaraṇe vā manasyanātmanyātmakhyātiriti। tathaitadatroktam - vyaktamavyaktaṁ vā sattvamātmatvenābhipratītya tasya saṁpadamanu nandatyātmasaṁpadaṁ manvānastasya vyāpadamanu śocatyātmavyāpadaṁ manvānaḥ sa sarvo'pratibuddhaḥ iti। eṣā catuṣpadā bhavatyavidyā mūlamasya kleśasaṁtānasya karmāśayasya ca savipākasyeti।

vivaraṇam
[tathā duḥkhe sukhakhyātiṁ] vakṣyati ।
[tathā anātmanyātmakhyātibodhyopakaraṇeṣu cetanācetaneṣu] gavādighaṭādiṣu
atrocyate-kasya punarmanasyanātmanyātmakhyātiriti ? nanu manasa eva khyātiḥ, kiṁ codyate-yāvatā avidyā viparyayaścittavṛttiriti hyuktam । cittameva prāptacaitanyopagrahaṇarūpatvādātmānaṁ cetanamabhimanyate ‘ahaṁ draṣṭṛ śrotṛ vā ahamidaṁ mame'ti cāviśeṣeṇa ।
[tathaitadatra] etasminnarthe
[eṣā catuṣpadī bhavatyavidyā ।] nanu cāpuṇye puṇyakhyātiḥ puṇye apuṇyakhyātiḥ ityābhyāṁ ṣaṭpadītvam-na-caturṣveva padeṣu yathāsaṁbhavamantarbhāvāt ।

tasyāścāmitrāgoṣpadavadvastusatattvaṁ vijñeyam। yathā nāmitro mitrābhāvo na mitramātraṁ kiṁ tu tadviruddhaḥ sapatnaḥ। yathā vā'goṣpadaṁ na goṣpadābhāvo na goṣpadamātraṁ kiṁtu deśa eva tābhyāmanyadvastvantaram, evamavidyā na pramāṇaṁ na pramāṇābhāvaḥ kiṁtu vidyāviparītaṁ jñānāntaramavidyeti ॥ 5 ॥

vivaraṇam
[tasyā] śca avidyāyāḥ
ayamabhiprāyaḥ-avidyā iti nañsamāso'yaṁ tatpuruṣaḥ, sa cottarapadārthapradhāno vā syāt , yathā rājapuruṣa iti । yadvā, pūrvapadārthapradhānaḥ, ardhapippalīti ॥
tatra yadi pūrvapadārthapradhānastadānīṁ vidyāyāḥ pramāṇasyābhāva (vādi) iti, yatraiva vidyāprasaṅgo vṛttisāmānyāttatraiva (smṛtya)vṛttyantarādau pratītiriti, anirdhāritaviśeṣatatvo'rthaḥ prajñāyeta । yā tu viparītākhyātiḥ pūrvoktā avidyeti sā pāribhāṣikī syāt ॥
[loke yeṣvarthaṣu prasiddhāni padāni tāni sati sambhave tadarthānyeva sūtreṣvityavagantavyaṁ] iti । athāśabdārtha eva, yathā
athottarapadārthaprādhānyaṁ samānādhikaraṇatvānnīlotpalavat, tatrāpi nīlotpalaśabdārthayoravirodhādviśeṣyaviśeṣaṇabhāvena saṁbandho yuktaḥ ॥
iha nañā nivṛttirucyate । vidyāśabdenāpi vidyā । tatra yadyuttarapadasyārthaṁ pradhānaṁ prati guṇabhūto nañ tasyaivottarapadārthasyābhāvaṁ kuryāt, tadā tadguṇatvameva hīyeta । nāpītarasya prādhānyam ॥
yo hi kañcinnirvartayituṁ anuprasthito nirvartyameva vyāpādayet, na tasya nirvartyaṁ prati guṇatvam । nāpi nirvartyasya pradhānatā, tadvat । tasmāt pradhānavaśavartinā guṇena bhavitavyamiti vidyāyāmanyasyābhāva eveti kevalo nañ nityānuvādīti vidyāmātraṁ pratīyeta ॥
[‘tasyāścāmitrāgoṣpadavadvastusatatvaṁ vijñeyam’] iti ।
[yathā vā agoṣpadaṁ na goṣpadābhāvo na goṣpadamātraṁ, kintu deśa eva tābhyāṁ] goṣpadābhāvagoṣpadamātrābhyām
tataścāgoṣpadamiti goṣpadaprasakto'rthaḥ , goṣpadamātraṁ, goṣpadaviruddhaśceti trayo'rthāḥ pratibhānti । tatra yadi goṣpadamātraṁ bhavettadā nañaḥ prayogo'narthaka eva । anyābhāvānuvādī cedgoṣpade nañ syādevamapyanarthaka eva ।
atha goṣpadaprasaṅgayukte'rthe, tathāpi nañamukhye'rthe pravṛttassyāt , gobhiratyantāsevitatvasyānuktatvāt । yataḥ sevitattve bhaviṣyatyapi triṣvapi kāleṣu śabdaprayogo yuktassyāt । mukhyaścārtho nāma sa bhavati, yatra gobhiḥ sevitaṁ na bhūtaṁ na vartate nāpi bhaviṣyati । tasmāt, sati sambhave nañarthaḥ sa eva yukta iti na sevitaprasaṅgo nāpi sevitamātra iṣyate । gosevitaviruddha eva deśo'goṣpadaśabdenābhidhīyate ।
kathaṁ punarnīlotpalavadviśeṣyaviśeṣaṇabhāvaḥ ekasya, bhāvābhāvayorvirodhāt । tadabhāvapratipādanamātreṇa saṁvyavahārānupapatteḥ yasmin vastuni tadabhāva ucyate tadeva vastvantaraṁ pratīyate । taduktam - "goṣpadaṁ sevitāsevitapramāṇeṣu iti" ।
[kintu viparītaṁ jñānāntaramiti] ॥ 5 ॥
dṛgdarśanaśaktyorekātmatevāsmitā ॥ 6 ॥

puruṣo dṛkśaktirbuddhirdarśanaśaktirityetayorekasvarūpāpattirivāsmitā kleśa ucyate। bhoktṛbhogyaśaktyoratyantavibhaktayoratyantāsaṁkīrṇayoravibhāgaprāptāviva satyāṁ bhogaḥ kalpate। svarūpapratilambhe tu tayoḥ kaivalyameva bhavati kuto bhoga iti। tathā coktam – ‘buddhitaḥ paraṁ puruṣamākāraśīlavidyādibhirvibhaktamapaśyankuryāttatrā''tmabuddhiṁ mohena’ iti ॥ 6 ॥

vivaraṇam
adhunāsmitākhyaṁ viparyayamācaṣṭe - dṛk darśanam upalabdhiḥ puruṣaḥ sa eva śaktiḥ । dṛśyate'neneti darśanam । saiva śaktiḥ antaḥkaraṇādhyavasāyarūpā । tayoḥ dṛgdarśanaśaktyoḥ upalabdhyadhyavasayasvarūpayoḥ ekātmateva ekaścāsāvātmā ca tasya bhāva ekātmatā । ivaśabdenātyantaviviktatāmācaṣṭe । ekasvarūpāpattirivāsmitā kleśa ucyate ॥
yasminnahaṁpratyaye cittapuruṣayorviveko nopalabhyate so'yamahaṁpratyayo'smitākhyaḥ kleśa ucyate ।
pūrvatra tu puruṣopakaraṇe'ntaḥkaraṇe'nātmanyātmakhyatiriti viparītadarśanamevāvidyetyuktama । iha tu punarbuddhipuruṣayoraviśeṣadarśanamekasvarūpāpattiriva darśanamasmiteti viśeṣaḥ ॥
[bhoktṛbhogyaśaktyoratyantāviviktayoḥ] atyantāsaṅkīrṇayoḥ
[svarūpapratilambhe tu tayoḥ] viveke nāhaṁ mameti svarūpopalabdhau satyāṁ buddhipuruṣayoḥ kaivalyameva avimiśrataiva bhavati ।
na hi manasi cetanāvatvamanadhyāropya sukhitvaṁ duḥkhitvaṁ vā śakyaṁ pratyetum । ahaṁpratyayaviṣayo hi sukhaduḥkhapralyayādhikaraṇam । 'ahaṁ sukhī duḥkhī cāham' iti sāmānādhikaraṇyāt । tasmādasmitākhyo'haṅkāro bhogahetuḥ ॥
[tathā coktaṁ-buddhitaḥ paraṁ puruṣaṁ] buddhitaḥ sakāśāt
[ākāreṇa] sukhaduḥkhamohātmakatvena,
[vibhaktamapaśyan kuryāttatrātmabuddhim] iti । sā pūrvoktaivāvidyā । yadvā asmitāyā avidyābhedatvāt sarvamudāharaṇamiti । apaśyan kuryāditi puruṣasvarūpādarśanamavidyāyāḥ, asmitāyāśca hetuḥ kāraṇaṁ cittasya draṣṭṛdṛśyoparaktatā । puruṣasya tvadarśanaṁ draṣṭṛtvādeva ॥ 6 ॥
sukhānuśayī rāgaḥ ॥ 7 ॥
sukhābhijñasya sukhānusmṛtipūrvaḥ sukhe tatsādhane vā yo gardhastṛṣṇā lobhaḥ sa rāga iti ॥ 7 ॥

vivaraṇam
[sukhānujanmā] sukhānuśayī
[sukhābhijñasya] sukhe ābhijñānamābhijñā yasya sa sukhābhijñaḥ sukhaṁ ya upalabdhavāṁstasya, sukhābhijñasya
duḥkhānuśayī dveṣaḥ ॥ 8 ॥
duḥkhābhijñasya duḥkhānusmṛtipūrvo duḥkhe tatsādhane vā yaḥ pratigho manyurjighāṁsā krodhaḥ sa dveṣaḥ ॥ 8 ॥

vivaraṇam
[duḥkhānujanmā] duḥkhānuśayī dveṣaḥ । duḥkhamuktam
svarasavāhī viduṣo'pi tathā rūḍho'bhiniveśaḥ ॥ 9 ॥

sarvasya prāṇina iyamātmāśīrnityā bhavati mā na bhūvaṁ bhūyāsamiti। na cānanubhūtamaraṇadharmakasyaiṣā bhavatyātmāśīḥ। etayā ca pūrvajanmānubhavaḥ pratīyate। sa cāyamabhiniveśaḥ kleśaḥ svarasavāhī kṛmerapi jātamātrasya pratyakṣānumānāgamairasaṁbhāvito maraṇatrāsa ucchedadṛṣṭyātmakaḥ pūrvajanmānubhū'taṁ maraṇaduḥkhamanumāpayati।

vivaraṇam
[svarasavāhī viduṣo'pi tathā rūḍho'bhiniveśaḥ svarasena] svabhāvena cittasyavidyāmātraṇa
[sarvasya prāṇinaḥ iyamātmāśīrnityā bhavati,] yadasau
[na cānanubhūtamaraṇadharmakasya bhavatyeṣā ā.ātmāśī] riti ।
[pratyakṣānumānāgamairasambhāvito maraṇātrāsa ucchedadṛṣṭadyātmaka] ātmabhogocchedapratipattihetuḥ
yathā cāyamatyantamūḍheṣu dṛśyate kleśastathā viduṣo'pi vijñātapūrvāparāntasya rūḍhaḥ। kasmāt। samānā hi tayoḥ kuśalākuśalayormaraṇaduḥkhānubhavādiyaṁ vāsaneti ॥ 9 ॥

vivaraṇam
[yathā cāyamatyantamūḍheṣu dṛśyate] kṛmiprabhṛtiṣu
te pratiprasavaheyāḥ sūkṣmāḥ ॥ 10 ॥
te pañca kleśā dagdhabījakalpā yoginaścaritādhikāre cetasi pralīne saha tenaivāstaṁ gacchanti ॥ 10 ॥

vivaraṇam
[‘kleśamūlaḥ karmāśayaḥ’, ‘sati mūle tadvipākaḥ’] iti vakṣyate । tasmātte kleśā hātavyāḥ । hānārthaśca te pradarśaitāḥ । tadavahānau copāyaṁ vakṣyati –
[te pañca kleśāḥ dagdhabījakalpāḥ yoginaśvaritādhikāre cetāsi pralīne saha tenāstaṁ gacchanti ।] etaduktaṁ bhavati--samyagdarśanābhyāsānaladagdhabījasāmarthyānāṁ kleśānāṁ kṛtāśeṣapuruṣaprayojanasya cetasaḥ pratiprasavenaiva pralayenaiva pralayotpatterna dhyānasādhanāpekṣā । na hi dagdhaṁ dāhamapekṣate, piṣṭaṁ vā peṣaṇamiti । cetastu sādhitapuruṣārthatvāt sthitiprayojanābhāvācca svayameva nivartate ॥ 10 ॥
sthitānāṁ tu bījabhāvopagatānām –
dhyānaheyāstadvṛttayaḥ ॥ 11 ॥

kleśānāṁ yā vṛttayaḥ sthūlāstāḥ kriyāyogena tatkṛtāḥ satyaḥ prasaṁkhyānena dhyānena hātavyā yāvatsūkṣmīkṛtā yāvaddagdhabījakalpā iti। yathā vastrāṇāṁ sthūlo malaḥ pūrvaṁ nirdhūyate paścātsūkṣmo yatnenopāyena cāpanīyate tathā svalpapratipakṣāḥ sthūlā vṛttayaḥ kleśānāṁ, sūkṣmāstu mahāpratipakṣā iti ॥ 11 ॥

vivaraṇam
[sthitānāṁ tu bījabhāvopagatānāmiti ॥] 
[dhyānaheyāstadvṛttayaḥ । kleśānāṁ yā vṛttayaḥ sthūlāstāḥ kriyāyogena] tapassvādhyāyeśvarapraṇidhānākhyena sthūlapratipakṣeṇa
[yathā vastrāṇāṁ sthūlo malaḥ pūrvaṁ nirdhūyate, paścātsūkṣmo] malaḥ khenehanādinimitto
kleśamūlaḥ karmāśayo dṛṣṭādṛṣṭajanmavedanīyaḥ ॥ 12 ॥

tatra puṇyāpuṇyakarmāśayaḥ kāmalobhamohakrodhaprabhavaḥ। sa dṛṣṭajanmavedanīyaścādṛṣṭajanmavedanīyaśca। tatra tīvrasaṁvegena mantratapaḥsamādhibhirnirvartita īśvaradevatāmaharṣimahānubhāvānāmārādhanādvā yaḥ pariniṣpannaḥ sa sadyaḥ paripacyate puṇyakarmāśaya iti। tathā tīvrakleśena bhītavyādhitakṛpaṇeṣu viśvāsopagateṣu vā mahānubhāveṣu vā tapasviṣu kṛtaḥ punaḥ punarapakāraḥ sa cāpi pāpakarmāśayaḥ sadya eva paripacyate। yathā nandīśvaraḥ kumāro manuṣyapariṇāmaṁ hitvā devatvena pariṇataḥ। tathā nahuṣo'pi devānāmindraḥ svakaṁ pariṇāmaṁ hitvā tiryaktvena pariṇata iti। tatra nārakāṇāṁ nāsti dṛṣṭajanmavedanīyaḥ karmāśayaḥ। kṣīṇakleśānāmapi nāstyadṛṣṭajanmavedanīyaḥ karmāśaya iti ॥ 12 ॥

vivaraṇam
[kleśamūlaḥ karmāśayo dṛṣṭādṛṣṭajanmavedanīyaḥ ॥ kleśā] avidyādayo
yasya puṇyāpuṇyarūpasya karmāśayasya yasmin janmani niṣpattistasya tasminneva janmani vedanīyaṁ phalaṁ sa dṛṣṭajanmavedanīyaḥ । yasya tu janmāntare vedanīyaṁ phalaṁ so'dṛṣṭajanmavedanīyaḥ karmāśaya iti ॥
[tatra puṇyāpuṇyakarmāśayo lobhakrodhamohaprabhava iti,] kleśamūlatvaṁ tasyācaṣṭe । puṇyakarmāśayo lobhaprabhavo yathā-svarge vā atra vā śubhaṁ phalamanubhaviṣyāmīti svargakāmaputrakāmayāgādiḥ । krodhaprabhavo yathāviśvāmitrasyāmbāyāśca । mohaprabhavo yathā-draupadyāḥ kumbhakarṇasya ca ॥
apuṇyakarmāśayo'pi lobhaprabhavo yathā---carmaṇi dvīpinaṁ hanti kuñjaraṁ hanti dantayoḥ । karṇasya cāsrajñānalobhādanṛtavacane ॥ krodhaprabhavo yathā-brahmahatyā । bhārate(bhāve)'pyaśvatthāmnaśca । mohaprabhavo yathā-saṁsāramocakādīnāṁ nahuṣasya ca ।
asmitāvidyayorlobhakrodhamohaiḥ pratyekaṁ sambandhaḥ । katham ? ahamadhikṣipto'smīti krudhyati । ahaṁ sukhamanubhaviṣyāmīti lubhyati । ahaṁ muhyāmīti muhmati ॥
avidyā'pi sarvatraiva viparītadarśanalakṣaṇā sambadhyate । nahyasātyāmavidyāyāmasmitādīnāṁ sambhavo'sti । rāgastu lobha eva । dveṣastu krodhaḥ । abhiniveśe vimoha evāntarbhavati ॥
yattu mohaḥ punaravidyeti, tadavivekasāmānyāduktam । lobhakrodhamohāstu parasparanirapekṣā dharmādharmotpatidvāram । tathā ca vakṣyati--lobhakrodhamohapūrvikā iti ॥
[sa dṛṣṭajanmavedanīyaśca] sa lobhakrodhamohaprabhavaḥ karmāśayo
[yathā tīvrasaṁyogena] tīvrodyamena
[tathā tīvrakleśena] lobhādiprakarṣeṇa
loke'pi kṣetrabījasaṁskāraviśeṣeṇa vṛkṣādiphalasannikarṣaḥ prasiddhaḥ vṛkṣāyurvedaprasiddhyā । tathā kriyāsu phalasannikarṣaviprakarṣadarśanaṁ gamipacyādiṣu tīvramandānuṣṭhānaviśeṣataḥ ।
[yathā nandīśvaraḥ kumāro manuṣyapariṇāmaṁ svakaṁ hitvā] maheśvarārādhanapariniṣpannena tīvratarakleśānuṣṭhānena janmanā
[tathā nahuṣo'] puṇyakarmāśayasyodāharaṇam । sa
krodhādīnāṁ tu yathāsaṁkhyaṁ dṛṣṭādṛṣṭajanmavedanīyatvenodāharaṇāni vyākhyātāni pūrvameva । etena ca mandamandataralobhādikkeśānuṣṭhānajanmānau puṇyapāpakarmāśayāvadṛṣṭajanmavedanīyau vyākhyātau lokavadeva । tatrāpi tāvaducyate ॥
[tatra nārakāṇāṁ nāsti] -yairnarakaprāptyarthameva karmānuṣṭhitaṁ brahmahatyāgurudāragamanādilakṣaṇaṁ, teṣāṁ nārakāṇāṁ nārakatvasyāśubhāvitvamāśritya
kathaṁ punarnārakāṇāṁ karmārambhastiryagādīnāṁ devatānāṁ ca ? manuṣyāṇāṁ hi karmādhikāraḥ । eṣā ca karmabhūmirna narakādirityucyate---na-nahuṣārdanāṁ karmadarśanāt । śrūyate ca śatakratorapi vṛtrādivadhena brahmahatyāprāptiryogādyanuṣṭhānaśravaṇaṁ ca ॥
['kṣipraṁ hi mānuṣe loke siddhirbhavati karmajā”] iti । vyāsena kīṭopākhyāna(śrava)smaraṇāca tiraśvāmipi karmopapattiḥ ॥
kiñca-dehendriyādimataḥ kriyopapatteḥ । kriyāṇāṁ ca kāyavāṅmanaḥprabhavānāṁ phalārambhakatvaṁ, kleśapūrvakavāt ॥
[kṣīṇakleśānāmapi] samyagdarśināmapi
sati mūle tadvipāko jātyāyurbhogāḥ ॥ 13 ॥

satsu kleśeṣu karmāśayo vipākārambhī bhavati nocchinnakleśamūlaḥ। yathā tuṣāvanaddhāḥ śālitaṇḍulā adagdhabījabhāvāḥ prarohasamarthā bhavanti nāpanītatuṣā dagdhabījabhāvā vā, tathā kleśāvanaddhaḥ karmāśayo vipākaprarohī bhavati nāpanītakleśo na prasaṁkhyānadagdhakleśabījabhāvo veti। sa ca vipākastrividho jātirāyurbhoga iti।

vivaraṇam
[sati mūle tadvipāko jātyāyubhoṁgāḥ । mūlaṁ hi] karmaṇāṁ kleśaḥ । asmin
[“satsu kleśeṣu karmāśayo vipākārambhī bhavati nocchinnakleśamūla”] iti, mūlasya vyākhyānam । tatra satsu kleśeṣu karmaśayo vipākārambhītyisya dṛṣṭāntamāha-
tuṣāvanaddhā api kadāciddagdhabījabhāvā na prarohasamarthā bhavanti । adagdhabījabhāvā api vyapanītatuṣā na prarohāyālaṁ bhavanti । ubhayathā ca dārṣṭāntikapratipādanārthaṁ dṛṣṭhāntavikalpa: ॥
[tathā kleśāvanaddhaḥ karmāśayo vipākaprarohī bhavati] kleśopabandhaḥ tuṣāvanaddhaśālitaṇḍulavat ।
yogāṅgānuṣṭhānakleśakṣayapūrvasamyagdarśanānāṁ yogināma[na]panītakleśo'pya [na] panītatuṣadagdhabījaśaktiśālivadyogāṅgānuṣṭhānapraṇālikevalasamyagdarśanānaladagdhabījasāmarthyo na vipākaprarohī bhavati ॥
tathā ca vyāsaḥ sāṁkhyānāṁ yogināṁ ca pṛthaṅmokṣaṁ darśayati ॥
[“bījānyagnyupadagdhāni na rohanti yathā punaḥ ।] 
[jñānadagdhaistathā leśainātmā sampadyate punaḥ ॥ ”] iti ॥
[“yogaiśvaryamatikrānto yogī mucyeta”] ityādi । vakṣyati cātrāpi prāptāprāptaiśvaryayogayoḥ kaivalyam ॥
[sa ca vipākastrividhaḥ jātirāyurbhoga] iti ॥

tatredaṁ vicāryate – kimekaṁ karmaikasya janmanaḥ kāraṇamathaikaṁ karmānekaṁ janmā''kṣipatīti। dvitīyā vicāraṇā – kimanekaṁ karmānekaṁ janma nirvartayati athānekaṁ karmaikaṁ janma nirvartayatīti। na tāvadekaṁ karmaikasya janmanaḥ kāraṇam। kasmāt, anādikālapracitasyāsaṁkhyeyasyāvaśiṣṭasya karmaṇaḥ sāṁpratikasya ca phalakramāniyamādanāśvāso lokasya prasaktaḥ, sa cāniṣṭa iti। na caikaṁ karmānekasya janmanaḥ kāraṇam। kasmāt, anekeṣu karmasu ekaikameva karmānekasya janmanaḥ kāraṇamityavaśiṣṭasya vipākakālābhāvaḥ prasaktaḥ, sa cāpyaniṣṭa iti। na cānekaṁ karmānekasya janmanaḥ kāraṇam। kasmāt, tadanekaṁ janma yugapanna saṁbhavatīti krameṇaiva vācyam। tathā ca pūrvadoṣānuṣaṅgaḥ।

vivaraṇam
[tatredaṁ vicāryate ।] kiṁ punarvicāraphalam ? ucyate-ekaikena prāṇinā viruddhaphalāni bhūyiṣṭhānyekasminneva janmani karmaṇi kriyante । tadyathā –
[śarīrajaiḥ karmadoṣairyāti sthāvaratāṁ naraḥ ।] 
[vācikaiḥ pakṣimṛgatāṁ mānasairantyajātitām ॥ “] 
[śvasūkarakharoṭrāṇāmi] tyādasmṛteḥ ॥
tatra viruddhadeśakālanimittavipākānāṁ karmaṇāmekajanmārambhe viruddhavipākatādarthyaṁ hīyeta । tataśca tādarthyacodanāḥ karmeṇāṁ bādhyeran ॥
atha paryoyeṇa janmārambhitvaṁ, karmaṇāmasaṁkhyeyatvāt kenacideva phalamārabdhaṁ nānyairiti, tatra niyamānupapattiḥ, kenārabdhaḥ kena vā neti । tathā । ca kartṝṇāṁ karmaphalaṁ pratya(pya)visrambhādutsāhavibhaṅgaḥ syāt abhyudayāniśreyasapravṛttiṣu ॥
athānyatamenārambhe vināśa evānyeṣāmiti, tathā'pi sa eva doṣaḥ, kiṁ vinaṣṭa kimārambhakamityaniyamāt ॥
athāvināśa eva, tathāpyavaśiṣṭasyārambhakālābhāvo mokṣābhāvaśveti । tasmātpravṛttinivṛttiśāstrārthavatvapratipādanārthamidaṁ vicāryate ॥
[kimekaṁ karma ekasya janmanaḥ kāraṇaṁ] svargādiprāptinimitteṣu bahuṣu karmasu satsu ।
[dvitīyā vicāraṇā - kimanekaṁ karmānekaṁ janma nirvartayati] viruddhaphalamaviruddhaphalaṁ vā ।
[na tāvadekaṁ karmaikasya janmanaḥ kāraṇam । kasmāt?] bahuṣu karmasu satsvekameva karma janmaikaṁ nārabhata iti ॥
[anādikālapracitasya] saṁsārānāditvādekaikena puruṣeṇāsaṁkhyeyamekaikasmin janmani karma pracīyate viruddhaphalamaviruddhaphalaṁ ca ॥
[avaśiṣṭasya] janmārambhikarmavyatiriktasya
[prasaktaḥ, sa cāgniṣṭaḥ ॥] 
[na caikaṁ karmānekasya janmanaḥ kāraṇam । kasmāt ?] ekaikasmiṁstāvajanmāna
[na cānekaṁ karmānekasya janmanaḥ kāraṇam । kasmā] devaṁ nābhyupagamyate? taducyate,

tasmājjanmaprāyaṇāntare kṛtaḥ puṇyāpuṇyakarmāśayapracayo vicitraḥ pradhānopasarjanabhāvenāvasthitaḥ prāyaṇābhivyakta ekapraghaṭṭakena maraṇaṁ prasādhya saṁmūrchita ekameva janma karoti। tacca janma tenaiva karmaṇā labdhāyuṣkaṁ bhavati। tasminnāyuṣi tenaiva karmaṇā bhogaḥ saṁpadyata iti। asau karmāśayo janmāyurbhogahetutvāttrivipāko'bhidhīyata iti। ata ekabhavikaḥ karmāśaya ukta iti।

vivaraṇam
[tasmāt] evaṁ pakṣatrayānupapattāvidānī siddhāntamupasaṁharati-—
[pracayavicitraḥ] tulyātulyānekakarmapracitatvā
[prāyaṇābhivyaktaḥ] yathā bījakṣetrasaṁskārasaṁyogo'ṅkurabhāvābhivyaktikāraṇaṁ, tathā prāyaṇamapyaviruddhānāṁ karmaṇāmabhivyaktinimittam ।
[tacca janma tenaiva] prāyaṇābhivyaktātmanā
[ttenaiva karmaṇeti] janmamātramārabhya kṛtakāryatvādvinivṛttyāśaṅkaniṣedhamātraṁ kriyate ॥
[asau karmāśayo janmāyurbhogahetutvāt] trayo vipākā janmādayo yasya sa

dṛṣṭajanmavedanīyastvekavipākārambhī bhogahetutvāddvivipākārambhī vā āyurbhogahetutvāt nandīśvaravannadvuṣavadveti। kleśakarmavipākānubhavanirvartitābhistu vāsanābhiranādikālasaṁmūrchitamidaṁ cittaṁ vicitrīkṛtamiva sarvato matsyajālaṁ granthibhirivā''tatamityetā anekabhavapūrvikā vāsanāḥ। yastvayaṁ karmāśaya eṣa evaikabhavika ukta iti। ye saṁskārāḥ smṛtihetavastā vāsanāstāścānādikālīnā iti।

vivaraṇam
[dṛṣṭajanmavedanīyastvekavipākārambhī] yathā – putrāgrāmādikāmayāgaḥ ।
nanu ca nandīśvaranahuṣayordṛṣṭajanmavedanīyatvaṁ trivipākāsmbhitvaṁ ca viruddham । dṛṣṭaṁ hi janma nandīśvarasya manuṣyatvam । yatpunarnandīśvarasya devatvaṁ, nahuṣasya cājagaratvaṁ tat dvayamapyadṛṣṭaṁ, na hi manuṣyatva eva devatvaṁ saṁvedyaṁ nandīśvarasya, nāpi devatva eva nahuṣasyājagarasvaṁ sevadyamiti, kathaṁ trivipākārambhitvaṁ dṛṣṭajanmavedanīyatvaṁ ceti ॥
naiṣa doṣaḥ । dṛśyamānajātiviśiṣṭameva śarīraṁ tayorjātyantaratvena pariṇatam । na ca yathā'nyeṣāṁ dṛṣṭajātiviśiṣṭaśarīropamardena jātyantaropādānaniṣekādinimittāpekṣayā jātyantaraprāptiḥ, tathā nandīścaranahuṣayoḥ । tasmāt trivipākārambhitvaṁ dṛṣṭajanmavedanīyatvaṁ cetyudāhṛtam ॥
tatra trividhaḥ karmarāśirdṛṣṭajanmavedanīyaścādṛṣṭajanmavedanīyaśca । dṛṣṭajanmavedanīyatavipākaniyatavipāraḥ kadācidbhogaheturityekavipākaḥ । kadācidbhogāyurhetutvāt dvivipākaḥ । kadācit jātyāyurbhegahetutvāt trivipāko nandīśvaranahuṣayoriva ॥ ।
[tasmājjanmaprāyaṇāntare kṛta] ityādinā । yastvaniyatavipākaḥ sa trividho vakṣyate ॥
[kleśakarmavipākānubhavanirvartitābhaiḥ] kleśānubhavaśca karmānubhavaśca vipākānubhavaśca kleśakarmavipākānubhavāḥ, tairnirvartitābhiḥ
[anekabhavapūrvakā vāsanāḥ] karmaṇi vipāke ca tadaṅgībhāvena vyāpriyante । na hi vāsanāyāḥ karmavipākānajñabhāve sati jātamātrasya pṛṣadaṁśadārakasya vṛṣabuvānaṁ prati sphuritaparikopasyāvaskandanaṁ jāghaṭīti । na ca sakṛdanubhavavāsanāmāttratayā tena śakyaṁ bhavitum ॥

yastvasāvekabhavikaḥ karmāśayaḥ sa niyatavipākaścāniyatavipākaśca। tatra dṛṣṭajanmavedanīyasya niyatavipākasyaivāyaṁ niyamo na tvadṛṣṭajanmavedanīyasyāniyatavipākasya। kasmāt। yo hyadṛṣṭajanmavedanīyo'niyatavipākastasya trayī gatiḥ – kṛtasyāvipakvasya nāśaḥ, pradhānakarmaṇyāvāpagamanaṁ vā, niyatavipākapradhānakarmaṇā'bhibhūtasya vā ciramavasthānamiti।

vivaraṇam
[yastvayaṁ karmāśayaḥ] yastvayaṁ janmaprāyaṇāntare kṛto'viruddhajanmadeśanimittaḥ pradhānopasarjanībhāvena trivipākārambhī
[ye saṁskārāḥ smṛtihetavastā vāsanāstāścānādikālīnāḥ,] saṁsārasya kleśararmavipākānubhavarūpasyānāditvātū ॥
[yastvasāvekabhavikaḥ karmāśayaḥ] pūrvottastasyāpavāda ucyate ekadeśasya । kathaṁ ?
[yastvasāvekabhavika: karmāśaya] iti, tadadṛṣṭajanmavedanīyatvasāmānyena ॥
[janmaprāyaṇāntare kṛtaḥ puṇyapāpakarmāśayaḥ pracayavicitraḥ pradhānopasarjanabhāvenāvasthitaḥ prāyaṇābhivyaktaḥ ekapraghaṭṭena sammūrchita ekajanma karotī] tyevamādirniyamo virudhyeta । kutaḥ ? prāyaṇasya sarvapūrvakarmābhivyañjakatvāt, āśayādhāropamardena cāśayāntarotpatteḥ, mānuṣyakāśayādhāre pūrvaṁ daivatairyagyonāśayānāṁ samavatthānaṁ, tadādhāropamardanakāle ca prāyaṇe sādhāraṇe sarvakarmabhivyaktikāraṇe daivatairyagyonāśayānāṁ kasyacidevābhivyaktirnetareṣāmiti nāsti hetuḥ । na hi svagecarāpannaṁ vyaṅgyamekadeśaparityāgenābhivyanakti pradīpaḥ ॥
atrecyate – naitadyuktaṁ, karmānarthakyaprasaṅgāt । bahuprakārāṇi hi karmaṇi parasparaviruddhāni kriyante । yo hi svargārtha karma kṛtavān sa eva paśugrāmādyarthaṁ karmānuṣṭhāya punarbahmahatyāṁ vā sthāvarādiprāptyarthaṁ vā balavakarmānutiṣṭhet । tatra narakasyāvarādiprāptasya na hi paśugrāmādilābhasaṁbhavaḥ । tataśca tatkarmaṇāmānarthakyaṁ prasajyeta ॥
atha tatrāpi grāmādilābhasukhaṁ bhavatīti cet – na hi grāmakāma ityukte grāmasukhatvamabhipretam । na hi grāmasukhaṁ prāpto grāmaṁ prāptavān ॥
[‘tataḥ śeṣeṇa'] iti śeṣasadbhāvajñāpanaśrutismṛtayo bādhyeran । tasmānna sarvaṁ karma prāyaṇe'bhivyajyate । atyantaviruddhānāṁ karmaṇāmānarthakyaprāpteḥ । karmaśākhānarthakye ca mokṣaśāstre'pyanāśvāsaprasaṅgaḥ ॥
abhivyañjakānāmapi kasyacidabhivyañjakatvaṁ kasyacinneti dṛśyate vyabhicāraḥ । yathā cakṣuṣo rūpābhivyañjakatve'pi caitroळ.ūkacakṣuṣorahorātrayoritaretaravyabhicāraḥ । ālokasya ca samāne sarvacakṣussahakāritve, nolūkacakṣussahakāritvam । ekasmiśva stryādipiṇḍe sukhaduḥkhamehānāṁ sarveṣāmabhivyaktinimitte'pi kasyacidevābhivyaktiḥ ॥
tatra karmādyapekṣayā virodhādadoṣa iti cet – ihāpi virodhādanabhavyaktiḥ sarvakarmaṇām । na cāpi bījādhāre kṣetre upamardyamāne jalādinimittasaṁyoge satyapi tadgatānāṁ bījānāṁ viruddhajātīyānāmaṅkurādikāryārambhitvam । evaṁ mānuṣyakālīnāśayādhāre'pyupamardyamāne, na viruddhajātīyadevatairyagyonāśayānāṁ sarveṣāṁ yugapadvṛttilābhaḥ ॥
na ca prāyaṇameva karmaṇāmabhivyañjakam । dṛṣṭajanmavedanīyānāṁ bhogārthānāṁ darśanāt । yeṣāṁ prāyaṇamevābhivyañjakaṁ teṣāṁ sarveṣāṁ bhavatvabhivyaktiriti cet – na – virodhāddaivatairyagyonamānuṣyakāśyānām ॥
[‘yaṁ yaṁ vāpi smaranbhāvaṁ tyajatyante kaळ.ebaram’] iti smaraṇaviśeṣabhedāt prāyaṇabhedaḥ । tasmānna sarvakarmabhivyañjakatvaṁ prāyaṇasya । anyathā viśeṣaṇānarthakyaprasaṅgāt ॥
na ca smaraṇādiviśeṣaṇena prakṛtasyānyathātvaṁ nāśo vā syāt । tannāśanyathātvakaraṇe hi smaraṇasya prakṛtakarmasahakāritvaṁ na syāt । svatantraṁ hi smaraṇaṁ syāt । tathā cānuṣṭhitakarmanairarthakyaṁ bhavet ॥
kiñca – kalalādyavasthāsu mṛtānāṁ mokṣaprasaṅgaḥ । karmārambhāt । tāsāṁ phalatravatkarmatvamapīti cet – na – karaṇāvyūhāt । karaṇeṣu hi vyūhiteṣu karmaṇāṁ vṛttilābhaḥ phalatvaṁ ca । na tadā tadvyūha upapadyate ॥
[‘sa yattatra kiñcitpaśyatyananvāyatastena bhavati’] iti karmaṇā svapnadarśanajenāsambandhaṁ darśayati । na kaścitsvapnairaparādhavānasti । brahmahatyādikaraṇadarśanāt । atha skannaprāyaścittādidarśanānneti cenna, retasskandananimittatvātprāyaścittasya ॥
tasamādyadyapi svapnādyavasthāyāmiva kalalādyavasthāsu phalamabhyupagamyate, tathā'pi karaṇavyāpārābhāvāt svapnanāvasthāvadeva phalamātraṁ tat, na karmakartṛtvamiti mokṣaprasaṅga eva garbhaprasṛtānāmapatita iti ॥
[tatrādṛṣṭajanmavedanīyasya niyatavipākasyaivāyaṁ niyamo] yo'sau
[kṛtasyāvipakasya vināśaḥ] nāśakālamaprāptasyaiva nāśa: । yathā---prāyāścittādinā pratiṣiddhasya kṛtasya nāśaḥ ॥
[pradhānakarmaṇyāvāpagamanaṁ] pradhānakarmaṇi niyatavedanīye ācāpāpāte: pradhānakarmaphalātiraskareṇa svayamapi mandamandaṁ phalaṁ madhyamanupraviśya prayacchati । yathā – sakaleṣu taṇḍuleṣu vipacyamānaṣu asakalā api taṇḍulakaṇā uptā alpīyāṁsamartha sādhayantyeva ।

tatra kṛtasyāvipakvasya nāśo yathā śuklakarmodayādihaiva nāśaḥ kṛṣṇasya। yatredamuktam –“dve dve ha vai karmaṇī veditavye pāpakasyaiko rāśiḥ puṇyakṛto'pahanti tadicchasva karmāṇi sukṛtāni kartumihaiva te karma kavayo vedayante।”

vivaraṇam
[tatra kṛtasyāvipakasya nāśo yathā śuklamoṁdiyādihaiva] tapasvādhyāyayogādilakṣaṇasya śuddhasyodayāt prāyaścittādilakṣaṇasya ca,
[yatredamuktaṁ dve dve ha vai karmaṇī] śuklakṛṣṇe janmani janmani sādhakasya puruṣasyādhikṛtasya ।

pradhānakarmaṇyāvāpagamanam। yatredamuktaṁ – “syātsvalpaḥ saṁkaraḥ saparihāraḥ sapratyavamarṣaḥ kuśalasya nāpakarṣāyālam। kasmāt, kuśalaṁ hi me vahvanyadasti yatrāyamāvāpaṁ gataḥ svarge'pyapakarṣamalpaṁ kariṣyati” iti।

vivaraṇam
[svalpasaṅkaraḥ] alpīyānū, doṣāvakaraḥ । kutaḥ ?
[kuśalasya] karmaphaladoṣaparihārādivibhāgāvaśāradasya viduṣaḥ ।
[niyatavipākapradhānakarmabhibhūtasya vā'pyavasthānam । katha] miti duṣṭābhiprāyaḥ praśnaḥ । kathaṁ ? pravṛttarājyenaparasyāpravṛttarājyasyābhibhave yukto nimittabhedena rājyapravṛtteḥ । iha tu nimittamābhivyañjakaṁ maraṇaṁ sarveṣāṁ karmaṇāṁ tulyaṁ tasmiṁstu nimitte sati sarveṣāṁ karmaṇāṁ vṛtilābho yukta iti pradhānakarmābhabhavo na yukta itarasyeti manyate । tataśvāvāpagamanamevāstviti ॥
[tatrādṛṣṭajanmavedanīyasyaiva] aviruddhadeśakālavipākadinimittasya
[yattvadṛṣṭajanmavedanīyamaniyatavipākaṁ tannaśyedāvāpaṁ vā gacchedabhibhūtaṁ vā ciramapyupāsīta] udāsīta,
[tadvipākasyaiva] tasyāniyatavipākasya karmaṇo vipākasyaiva ।

niyatavipākapradhānakarmaṇā'bhibhūtasya vā ciramavasthānam। kathamiti, adṛṣṭajanmavedanīyasyaiva niyatavipākasya karmaṇaḥ samānaṁ maraṇamabhivyaktikāraṇamuktam na tvadṛṣṭajanmavedanīyasyāniyatavipākasya। yattvadṛṣṭajanmavedanīyaṁ karmāniyatavipākaṁ tannaśyedāvāpaṁ vā gacchedabhibhūtaṁ vā ciramapyupāsīta, yāvatsamānaṁ karmābhivyañjakaṁ nimittamasya na vipākābhimukhaṁ karotīti। tadvipākasyaiva deśakālanimittānavadhāraṇādiyaṁ karmagatiścitrā durvijñānā ceti। na cotsargasyāpavādānnivṛttirityekabhavikaḥ karmāśayo'nujñāyata iti ॥ 13 ॥

vivaraṇam
[ekameva janma karotī] tyekajanmārambhitvamuktam - tadidānīṁ nāśāvāpābhibhavāvasthānādivacanādvādhyeteti ceta – na – upapādite.ottaratvāt
athavā, utsargasyāpavādānnivṛttiriti matvā naikabhavikaḥ karmāśayo durśana ityanena nañ saṁbadhyate । yasmādutsargasyaikadeśasyāpavādo nivartako na savaisya, tasmānniyatavipaki ekabhavika karmīśayaḥ sujñāna eva ॥
aparaḥ kalpaḥ--iha karmagatirjñātavyeti prakṛtaṁ, tasyāyamapavāda ekabhavikaḥ karmāśayo durjñāna iti । tatretiśabdo hatvarthe । yasmāddhetorautsargikasya karmagatijñānasya prakṛtasya etasmādapavādānna nivṛttiriti, tasmādyathā jñeyā karmagatistathā jñātavyaiva । durjñānā iti duḥkhena jñeyatvamucyate kleśena ॥ 13 ॥
te hlādaparitāpaphalāḥ puṇyāpuṇyahetutvāt ॥ 14 ॥
te janmāyurbhogāḥ puṇyahetukāḥ sukhaphalā apuṇyahetukā duḥkhaphalā iti। yathā cedaṁ duḥkhaṁ pratikūlātmakamevaṁ viṣayamukhakāle'pi duḥkhamastyeva pratikūlātmakaṁ yoginaḥ ॥ 14 ॥

vivaraṇam
[hlādaparitāpaphalāḥ puṇyāpuṇyahetutvāt ।] hvāda: sukhaṁ, paritāpī du:khaṁ, hvādaśca paritāpaśca hvādaparitāpau, tau phalaṁ yeṣāṁ te hlādaparitāpaphalāḥ । tathā puṇyaṁ ca apuṇyañca puṇyāpuṇye, te eva hetū yeṣāṁ te puṇyāpuṇyahetavaḥ, teṣāṁ bhāvaḥ puṇyāpuṇyahetutvaṁ, tasmātpuṇyāpuṇyahetutvāt ।
kathaṁ, tadupapādyate –
pariṇāmatāpasaṁskāraduḥkhairguṇavṛttivirodhācca duḥkhameva sarvaṁ vivekinaḥ ॥ 15 ॥

sarvasyāyaṁ rāgānuviddhaścetanācetanasādhanādhīnaḥ sukhānubhava iti tatrāsti rāgajaḥ karmāśayaḥ। tathā ca dveṣṭi duḥkhasādhanāni muhyati ceti dveṣamohakṛto'pyasti karmāśayaḥ। tathā coktam – “nānupahatya bhūtānyupabhogaḥ saṁbhavatīti hiṁsākṛto'pyasti śārīraḥ karmāśayaḥ” iti। viṣayasukhaṁ cāvidyetyuktam।

vivaraṇam
[kathaṁ] viṣayasukhakāle yogina: du:khamasti ? tathā pūrvatra coktaṁ
[pariṇāmaḥ,] tapti
[vivekina iti ।] kleśādīnāṁ vibhāgavivekī yasya vidyate sa vivekī ; tasya kleśakarmavipākābhijñasya pariṇāmatāpasaṁskāraguṇavṛttivirodhātmaka(dhāñca)sarvaduḥkhatvopapādaka(pratipādaka)hetvabhidarśina ityartha: । netarasyānitthaṁdarśinaḥ ॥
tasya tu tatimātraṁ duḥkham । tadapi ‘ahaṁ tapya' ityātmatvena pratipadyamānaḥ tatrāpi saṁśayāno'sau mamedaṁ duḥkhamityetāvanmātramapi viviṅkte । yadi hyetāvadapyantaraṁ viviścīta, tato duḥkhasādhanamapyetadduḥkha(sādhana)miti manvīta ॥
tathā ca sarvamidaṁ duḥkhamiti titikṣediti so'pi vivekī syāt । tasmādyadyapi tāpakāle duḥkhamātraṁ paśyanti, tathā'pi na tatsādhanādi sarvaṁ du khamiti manyante nirvivekinaḥ । yasya punaḥ pariṇāmaduḥkhahetudarśarnaṁ tasya vivekinaḥ sarvameva duḥkham ॥
[sarvasyāyaṁ rāgānuviddhaḥ ।] sarvasyetyanena sarvaprāṇiprasiddhatvādavyabhicāripratyakṣāvagamyatvaṁ darśayati ।
[tathā,] sukhavelāyāṁ sukhapratyanīkabhūtāni
[tathā,] yaśvāsau sukho
evamekasminnupabhogakāle bahudhā karmaśayo lobhakrodhamohanimitta upacīyate । tathā ca rāgadveṣamohaviśiṣṭatvādanekamukhakarmāśayaviśiṣṭa: sukhānubhavaḥ pariṇamamānaḥ sannanubandhe duḥkhībhavatīti pariṇāmaduḥkhatetyucyate । vivekinasvevaṁ paśyataḥ sukhānubhavakāle'pi duḥkhamasyeva । tadyathā – viṣadigdhatāṁ jñātvā dadhyodanaṁ bhuñjānasya ॥
[viṣayasukhaṁ cāvidyetyuktamiti ।] kvoktam ? ihaiva paryāyaśabdena
[“pratyayāviśeṣo bhogaḥ”] iti । avidyā ca pariṇamamānā sarvamanarthaṁ kareti । tataśva duḥkhabījāvādduḥkhameva viṣayasukham । yathā vyādhinimittatvāt svādutaramapi bhakṣyamāṇam ॥

yā bhogeṣvindriyāṇāṁ tṛpterupaśāntistatsukham। yā laulyādanupaśāntistadduḥkham। na cendriyāṇāṁ bhogābhyāsena vaitṛṣṇyaṁ kartuṁ śakyam। kasmāt, yato bhogābhyāsamanu vivardhante rāgāḥ kauśalāni cendriyāṇāmiti। tasmādanupāyaḥ sukhasya bhogābhyāsa iti। sa khalvayaṁ vṛścikaviṣabhīta ivā''śīviṣeṇa daṣṭo yaḥ sukhārthī viṣayānuvāsito mahati duḥkhapaṅke nimagna iti। eṣā pariṇāmaduḥkhatā nāma pratikūlā sukhāvasthāyāmapi yoginameva kliśnāti।

vivaraṇam
[yā bhogoṣvindriyāṇāṁ] bhujyanta iti bhogāḥ śabdādayaḥ teṣu nimitteṣu yā tṛptiḥ tata indriyāṇām
yā tu lailyādīpsayā tṛṇāta: sakāśaldanupaśāntaḥ anuparatiḥ tadduḥkham । taduktam -
[“nāsti tṛṣṇāsamaṁ duḥkhaṁ nāstyatṛṣṇāsamaṁ sukham” iti ॥] 
[na cendriyāṇāṁ bhogābhyāsena śakyaṁ vaitṛṣṇyaṁ kartum । kasmāt ?] ata āha--
[“ na jātu kāmaḥ kāmānāmupabhogena śāmyati ।] 
[haviṣā kṛṣṇavartmeva bhūya evābhivardhate ॥ '] iti ॥
[kauśalāni] naipuṇāni ca bhogābhyāseṣvandriyāṇāmanu vivardhante । yadyapi mana:kauśalapūrvakamindriyāṇāṁ kauśalaṁ, tathā'pi dṛśyata eva bhikṣā[kṣvā]dīnāmindriyasyāpi kauśalam ।
[sa khalvayaṁ vṛścikabhīta ivāśīviṣeṇa daṣṭo yaḥ sukhārthī viṣayānanvavasitaḥ] anvavabaddhaḥ anupravṛtto'nuvyavasito vā, yathā mandaviṣādvṛścikādupajātabhīti: paṭutareṇāśīviṣeṇa prasto mahattaraṁ du:khamabhiprapadyate,
[mahati duḥkhapaṅke magna iyeṣā pariṇāmadu:khatā] sukhasya

atha kā tāpaduḥkhatā, sarvasya dveṣānuviddhaścetanācetanasādhanādhīnastāpānubhava iti tatrāsti dveṣajaḥ karmāśayaḥ। sukhasādhanāni ca prārthayamānaḥ kāyena vācā manasā ca parispandate tataḥ paramanugṛhṇātyupahanti ceti parānugrahapīḍābhyāṁ dharmādharmāvupacinoti। sa karmāśayo lobhānmohācca bhavatītyeṣā tāpaduḥkhatocyate। kā punaḥ saṁskāraduḥkhatā, sukhānubhavātsukhasaṁskārāśayo duḥkhānubhavādapi duḥkhasaṁskārāśaya iti। evaṁ karmabhyo vipāke'nubhūyamāne sukhe duḥkhe vā punaḥ karmāśayapracaya iti।

vivaraṇam
atha tāpaduḥkhatā vyākhyāyate – sukhepabhogastu pariṇamamānaḥ sannanubandhe vijñāte viṣadigdhasvādudadhyodanopabhogavaddduḥkhībhavati, svarūpataḥ punaravidyārūpo'nukūlavedanāgandho'pi । iha punaḥ svarūpata eva duḥkhatā tāpasya pratikūlātmakatvāt ॥
[sarvasya dveṣānuviddhaḥ] dveṣānugataḥ
[prārthayamānaḥ kāyena vācā manasā ca parispandate] ceṣṭate । tacca paripandanaṁ parānugrahāya parapīḍanāya vā bhavati । tataḥ
[kāḥ punaḥ saṁskāradu:khatā? sukhānubhavāt sukhasaṁskārāśaya, dukhānubhavādapi । duḥkhasaṁskārāśayaḥ ।] sukhaduḥkhayo rāgaṁdveṣānuviddhatvātatsaṁskārāśayāvapi rāgadveṣānuviddhau ।
tato'pi sukhadu:khānubhavasaṁskārāśaya: yathā nairantaryeṇa sukhadu:khānubhavastathaiva tadanubhavasaṁskārāvapi rāgadveṣānuviddhau nirantaratayā bhavataḥ । tau ca saiskārāśayau kriyāyā upabhogasya cāṅgībhavataḥ । evaṁ saṁskārāśayaṁsya duḥkhahetutvam । saṁskārahetukaṁ saṁskāradu:khaṁ, tathā ca tatsaṁskāraduḥkhatā । na hmasmarannupabhogmaya kriyāyai vā sādhanamupādatte । smṛteśca saṁskāranimittatvamupapāditam ॥

evamidamanādi duḥkhasroto viprasṛtaṁ yoginameva pratikūlātmakatvādudvejayati। kasmāt, akṣipātrakalpo hi vidvāniti। yathorṇātanturakṣipātre nyastaḥ sparśena duḥkhayati na cānyeṣu gātrāvayaveṣu, evametāni duḥkhānyakṣipātrakalpaṁ yoginameva kliśnanti netaraṁ pratipattāram। itaraṁ tu svakarmopahṛtaṁ duḥkhamupāttamupāttaṁ tyajantaṁ tyaktaṁ tyaktamupādadānamanādivāsanāvicitrayā cittavṛttyā samantato'nuviddhamivāvidyayā hātavya evāhaṁkāramamakārānupātinaṁ jātaṁ jātaṁ bāhyādhyātmakobhayanimittāstriparvāṇastāpā anuplavante। tadevamanādinā duḥkhasrotasā vyuhyamānamātmānaṁ bhūtagrāmaṁ ca dṛṣṭvā yogī sarvaduḥkhakṣayakāraṇaṁ samyagdarśanaṁ śaraṇaṁ prapadyata iti।

vivaraṇam
[nādiduḥkhasroto yoginameva pratikūlātmakatvādudvejayati ॥] 
nanu cetarasyāpi pratikūlātmakameva, kasmānna tamudvejayati । nātyantakleśādikāluṣyāvivekakiṇīkṛtacetastvāditaramudrejayati । na pratikūlātmakatā prabhāvyate । yo hi dayitāmuṣṭighātaṁ mudgarābhighātadeśīyamapi mastakena pratīcchati । putrasya vā mūtrapurīṣamurasā dhārayati । asāvānandamahodanvattaraṅgāyamāṇaḥ [ṇaṁ] svātmanyapi na vātitarām [svātmānamapi na veti tarām] । na hi tasya tatpratikūlātmakam । rāgameva hi taditarasya pratipattṛtvādabhivardhayati tarām ॥
[kasmāt ? akṣipātrakalpo hi saḥ ।] prasannatvādviraktatvādityarthaḥ । tasmānna samānaṁ nimittaṁ tasya, yato'sau
[yathorṇātanturatimṛdusparśī'pyakṣipātre nyastaḥ sparśena duḥkhayati] svacchataratvadakṣipātrasya, tathā yoginaṁ viviktataraprajñānamakaluṣahṛdayamudvejayati duḥkham । sa evorṇātanturanyeṣu gātreṣu kṣiptaḥ kharatarasaṁsparśenāpi na duḥkhayati, tathā
[evametāni du:khāni akṣipātrakalpaṁ yoginameva kliśnanti netaraṁ pratipattāram ।] itarasya tu pratipatturitaragātrāvayavasvabhāvatāṁ darśayannāha--
[svakāraṇopahṛtaṁ] duḥkhaprāptinimittaiścetanācetanādibhirupahṛtamupanītaṁ buddhivṛttidvoraṇa puruṣasya karmatāmāpāditaṁ,
[itaraṁ] pratipattāraṁ kiṁviśiṣṭam ?
[jātaṁ jātam] anyagātrāvayavakalpaṁ
[triparvāṇaḥ] bāhyādinimittameva triparvatvam । bhūtabhaviṣyadvartamānatvaṁ vā triparvatvam । vakṣyati ca
[ta(me)devaṁ] aviveka pratipattāram
[“tadvairāgyādapi doṣabījakṣaye kaivalyam?] iti ॥

guṇavṛttivirodhācca duḥravameva sarvaṁ vivekinaḥ। prakhyāpravṛttisthitirūpā buddhiguṇāḥ parasparānugrahatantrī bhūtvā śāntaṁ ghoraṁ mūḍhaṁ vā pratyayaṁ triguṇamevā''rabhante। calaṁ ca guṇavṛttamiti kṣiprapariṇāmi cittamuktam। rūpātiśayā vṛttyatiśayāśca paraspareṇa virudhyante, sāmānyāni tvatiśayaiḥ saha pravartante। evamete guṇā itaretarāśrayeṇopārjitasukhaduḥkhamohapratyayāḥ sarve sarvarūpā bhavantīti, guṇapradhānabhāvakṛtastveṣāṁ viśeṣa iti। tasmādduḥkhameva sarvaṁ vivekina iti।

vivaraṇam
[itaśva sarvaṁ duḥrkhaṁ vivekinaḥ ।] kutaśva ?
guṇāḥ sattvādayaḥ, teṣāṁ vṛttayo guṇavṛttayaḥ, tāsāṁ virodhādguṇavṛttivirodhāt । te ca guṇā antaḥkaraṇadyākārasanniviṣṭāḥ । teṣāṁ guṇapradhānabhāvenābhinnapariṇāmatvācca viruddhavṛttitvaṁ bhavati । anyatamavṛttirudbhavantyā'nyatamavṛttyā'bhibhūyate ॥
evaṁ trayāṇāmapi pratikṣaṇa(pakṣa)manyenyavṛttitiraskāra itaretaravṛttyudbhāvitvaṁ ca । na sukhaduḥkhamohātmakānāṁ guṇānāmanyatamavṛttilābho'nyatamānanusaṁhitaḥ । tata etatsiddhaṁ bhavati – yadā duḥkhātmikaṁ raja udbhavati, tadā duḥkhatvādeva tadvṛtterna duḥkhamiti vaktavyam । sattvatamase.ārīpa rajo'nugatirastyeveti tayerapi duḥkhatvameva । satvatamaḥpravṛttinivṛtyorapi rajovyāpārānujavādduḥkhatvameva sarvasyeti ॥
[prakhyāpravṛttisthitiśīlābhirvṛttibhirguṇāḥ parasparānugrahatantrāḥ] parasparaviruddhā api parasparopakāryopakārakabhāvena tailavartyagnivat
yadā ca rājaso ghoraḥ pratyaya itaraguṇānugata udbhūto bhavati so'nantaramevodbubhūṣatā tāmasena pratyayena mūḍhena sattvānugatena sāttvikena vā tamo'nugatena hanyate । tathā tāmaso'pītarapratyayāmyāṁ paryāyeṇa । tathā sāttvikena itarāvityanyonyodayābhibhavapravṛttayā guṇāḥ ॥
[calaṁ guṇavṛttaṁ] guṇasvabhāvatvaṁ cittākāreṇa guṇāḥ sanniviṣṭā iti
kasmāt punarguṇā virudhyanta iti । anekātiśayānāmekatrāsambhavāt । yathā apavarake tamaḥprakāśayoratiśayavatoḥ, evamantaḥkaraṇākārasanniveśināṁ sukhaduḥkhamoharūpāṇāṁ prakāśapravṛttiniyamavṛttīnāṁ guṇānāṁ rūpeṇa vā sukhādinā vṛttyā vā jñānādilakṣaṇayā yugapadatiśayo na sambhavati ॥
[‘rūpātiśayā vṛttyatiśayāśca virudhyante । sāmānyāni tvatiśayaiḥ saha vartante’] ityucyate । yadā sukharūpātiśayastadā na duḥkharūpātiśayo moharūpātiśayo vā । ’ tathā itarātiśaye netarātiśayaḥ । tathā, jñānavṛttyatiśaye na lobhapratatyavṛttyatiśayaḥ । tathā, anyatamavṛttyatiśaye nānyatamavṛttyatiśayaḥ ॥
[evamete guṇā itaretaropāśrayeṇopārjitasukhaduḥkhamohapratyayāḥ ।] sukhena rajastasaupāśrayeṇopārjitaḥ sukhapratyayaḥ । rajasāpi sattvatamaupāśrayeṇopārjito duḥkhapratyayaḥ । tasamāpi sattvarajaupāśrayeṇopārjito mohapratyayaḥ । tataḥ
[guṇapradhānabhāvakṛtastveṣāṁ viśeṣa] iti । pradhānopasarjanatayā saṁjñālābhālābhau । yathā pāñcabhautiktave'pi pārthivaṁ taijasamāpyamiti ॥
[tasmāt sarvameva duḥkhaṁ vivekina iti ।] guṇavṛttivirodhādityetatparavairāgyārtham । kathaṁ ? pariṇāmatāpasaṁskāraduḥkhairiti dṛṣṭānuśravikraviṣayāvatṛṣṇasyaiva sarvasya du:khapratipādanārtha pṛthagvibhaktikaṁ kṛtam । na hi tatra duḥkhatvamapaśyato vairāgyamupakalppata iti ॥
etattu guṇavṛttivirodhāceti guṇānāṁ parasparavirodhivṛttitvena duḥkhatvapratipādanāttebhyo vyaktāvyaktadharmakebhyaḥ paraṁ vairāgyamupakalpyata ityevamartham । tathā cātrāpi pradhānopasarjanabhāvena sarve sarvarūpā bhavantīti vyaktāvyaktadharmatvaṁ pratipāditam । evaṁ ca kṛtvā sūtre'pi guṇavṛttivirodhācceti pṛthak paṭhitam ॥

tadasya mahato duḥkhasamudāyasya prabhavabījamavidyā। tasyāśca samyagdarśanamabhāvahetuḥ। yathā cikitsāśāstraṁ caturvyūham – rogo rogaheturārogyaṁ bhaiṣajyamiti, evamidamapi śāstraṁ caturvyūhameva। tadyathā – saṁsāraḥ saṁsāraheturmokṣo mokṣopāya iti। tatra duḥkhabahulaḥ saṁsāro heyaḥ। pradhānapuruṣayoḥ saṁyogo heyahetuḥ। saṁyogasyā''tyantikī nivṛttirhānam। hānopāyaḥ samyagdarśanam।

vivaraṇam
[tasyaitasya mahato] guṇagauṇalakṣaṇasya
[yathā cikitsāśāsraṁ caturvyūham – rogo rogaheturārogyaṁ bhaiṣajyamiti ।] rogarogohatumāṁstannivivartayiṣurbhaiṣajyasya śāstrasyārogyasya prayojanasya viṣayaḥ ॥
[evamidamapi śāsraṁ caturyūhameva । yathā—saṁsāraḥ saṁsaheturmīkṣo mokṣahetuḥ । tatra duḥkhabahulaḥ saṁsāro] heyaḥ ।
yathā cikitsāśāstraṁ roge rogahatau cārogye ca tatprayojanake bhaiṣajaye ca catuṣṭaye svarūpapratipādanāya vyūhitaṁ, tata eva ca rogādayo'sya catvāro vyūhā iti caturvyūhaṁ, tathā asya śāstrasya । duḥkhabahulaḥ saṁsāraḥ [heyaḥ], avidyāhetukaśca pradhānapuruṣasaṁyogo hetuḥ, sanimittasya saṁsārasya hānaṁ samyagdarśanaśāstrasya prayojanaṁ, tathā samyagdarśarna ceti catvāra ete vyūhā asyāpi iti caturvyūhaṁ śāstram । eṣu vā'rtheṣu caturdhā vyūho'syeti catuvryūham ॥
tatra hātuḥ svarūpamupādeyaṁ vā heyaṁ vā na bhavitumarhatīti hāne tasyocchedavādaprasaṅga upādāne ca hetuvādaḥ। ubhayapratyākhyāne śāśvatavāda ityetatsamyagdarśanam ॥ 15 ॥

vivaraṇam
[tatra hātuḥ svarūpamiti । nanu ‘draṣṭā dṛśimātra'] iti hātṛlakṣaṇasūtra etadvaditavyam । naiṣa doṣaḥ । śāstrārambhaprayojanapratipipādayiṣuṇā kleśādikaḥ samasto duḥkhāvasānaḥ saṁsāro nirvarṇitaḥ । saṁsārī ca yaḥ saṁsāraduḥkhena nirviṇṇo vivekī so'sya śāstrasya viṣaya upapāditaḥ । tasya vivekinaḥ śāstramata: paramārabhyate । etacca prathamasūtre pradarśitam । ābhyamāṇasya śāsrasya samyagdarśanameva prayojanam । tacca saṁsāraduḥkhanirvarṇanānantaramavasaraprāptaṁ pratipādayitavyamityetaducyate –
[svarūpamupādeyaṁ vā heyaṁ vā na bhavati ।] kuta etadevam ? heyopādeyavyatirekeṇa vastvadarśanāt । yathā loke sukhaṁ tatkāraṇaṁ copādeyaṁ, duḥkhaṁ tatkāraṇaṁ ca heyam , evamayamapi puruṣo vastutvādanyataradharmī bhavitumarhatītyabhiprāyaḥ । kimato yadyevam ? ata etadbhavati,
yadyasau heyatvadharmā, tata eṣa hātavyaḥ । hāne tvasya kiṁ syāt ? ā.ātmocchedavādaprasaṅgaḥ syāt । ataḥ ko doṣaḥ syāt ? doṣaṁ kaivalyapāde pratipādayiṣyāmaḥ ॥
kiñcānyat – asya hātrantarasya(kiñcānyatarasya)abhāvāddhānānupapattitvam । svayamevātmana ātmā hāteti cet – na – svātmani kriyāvirodhādbhedābhāvācca । heyādātmana ātmā hātā cedanyastadā'navasthāsaṅgaḥ । yo yo hātā । tasyāpi heyatvāt । na ca yugapaddvayorhatroḥ saṁbhavo'sti । bhinnakālabhāvinostu heyahātṛtvānupapattiḥ ॥
hātuśca heyatvābhyupagame tasyānavasthitatvāddheyasambandhānupapattiḥ । hāturanavasthitatve ca svayameva heyatvapratipatterhāturhānāyodyamānarthakyaprasaṅgaḥ । hānaphalānupapātiśva । na hi baddhasya svarūpanāśa eva phalam । mokṣo hi tasya phalam । nāpi mriyamāṇo'pi jñātakṣaṇāntaramaraṇaḥ svarūpavināśamicchati । vināśasyārthaprāptatvādevamanavasthitaśveddhātā na svarūpahānamicchet, arthaprāserhānasya ॥
[draṣṭṛsūtre] kaivalyapade ca vyākhyāsyāmahe । tasmānna heyatvadharmaṁ puruṣaḥ । saṁsārastu mahadādivyaktiḥ duḥkhabalo heyaḥ । tattulyadharmakaḥ puruṣo na bhavatītyarthaḥ । tattulyadharbhakatve
[upādāne] tvasya
kiṁ ca – pārārthryaprasaṅgaśca । anyasya hi hetoranyadupādīyate, satvādilakṣaṇasya pradhānasyopādāne puruṣo heturabhyupeyate, yathā ghaṭāya mṛtpiṇḍopādāne kulālo hetuḥ । sa cetpuruṣaḥ pradhānopādanahetuḥ pradhānavadupādīyeta, tasyapi sattvādidharmatvaṁ syāt, upādeyatvānmṛtpiṇḍavat । tate.o'sya pradhānasya nirhetukaṁ kāryārthamupādānaṁ prāpnoti ॥
[ityupādāne ca hetuvādaprasaṅga] ityucyate ॥
[hetustvapuruṣo bhavatīti ।] tasya copādane ahetu: pradhānavṛttirnirhetukī syāt । na ca svayaṁ svārthaṁ śakyaṁ vijñātum । prakāśādiṣu svārthatvādarśanātū ॥
[ubhayapratyākhyāne] heyatvopādeyatvapratyākhyāne ।
tadetacchāstraṁ caturvyūhamityabhidhīyate –
heyaṁ duḥkhamanāgatam ॥ 16 ॥

duḥkhamatītamupabhogenātivāhitaṁ na heyapakṣe vartate। vartamānaṁ ca svakṣaṇe bhogāruḍhamiti na tatkṣaṇāntare heyatāmāpadyate। tasmādyadevānāgataṁ duḥkhaṁ tadevākṣipātrakalpaṁ yoginaṁ kliśnāti netaraṁ pratipattāram। tadeva heyatāmāpadyate ॥ 16 ॥

vivaraṇam
[tadetacchāstraṁ caturvyūhamabhidhīyate ॥] 
[heyaṁ duḥkhamanāgatam । duḥkhamatītam] atikrāntaṁ, vartamānājjanmano'tikrāntajanmalakṣaṇaṁ duḥkhaṁ,
[vartamānaṁ ca] yajjanmalakṣaṇaṁ duḥkham
[tasmādyadevānāgataṁ] prāyaṇānantarabhāvijanmaduḥkhalakṣaṇaṁ
vartamānajanmayiyatiṣāyāṁ hi samyagdarśanamaśakyaviniyogatvādanarthakaṁ syāt । muktabāṇavat pravṛttaphalatvādvartamānaduḥkhasya । bhaviṣyati punarapravṛttatvādbījanirodha upakalpata iti samyagdarśanārthavatvam । svaviṣayo hi samyagdarśanasya sa iti ॥ 16 ॥
tasmādyadeva heyamityucyate tasyaiva kāraṇaṁ pratinirdiśyate –
draṣṭṛdṛśyayoḥ saṁyogo heyahetuḥ ॥ 17 ॥

draṣṭā buddheḥ pratisaṁvedī puruṣaḥ। dṛśyā buddhisattvopārūḍhāḥ sarve dharmāḥ। tadetaddṛśyamayaskāntamaṇikalpaṁ saṁnidhimātropakāridṛśyatvena svaṁ bhavati puruṣasya dṛśirūpasya svāminaḥ, anubhavakarmaviṣayatāmāpannaṁ yataḥ। anyasvarūpeṇa pratilabdhātmakaṁ svatantramapi parārthatvātparatantram। tayordṛgdarśanaśaktyoranādirarthakataḥ saṁyogo heyaheturduḥkhasya kāraṇamityarthaḥ। tathā coktam – tatsaṁyogahetuvivarjanātsyādayamātyantiko duḥkhapratīkāraḥ। kasmāt, duḥkhahetoḥ parihāryasya pratīkāradarśanāt।

vivaraṇam
[heyaṁ du:khamanāgata] miti । idānīṁ dvitīyo vyūhaḥ
[tasyaitasya mahato du:khasamudāyasya prabhavabījamavidyeti ।] satyamevam । kintu du:khasvarūpamātraṁ tatkāraṇasvarūpamātraṁ ca pūrvaṁ nirdiṣṭam । na ca tatsvarūpamātre, iti tatkāraṇaṁ nirdiśyate ।
draṣṭā ca dṛśyaṁ ca draṣṭṛdṛśye । tayerdraṣṭṛdṛśyayoriti । draṣṭṛdṛśyasaṁyoga iti tu vaktavye pṛthagvibhaktigrahaṇaṁ tayorbhinnajātīyatvakhyāpanārtham । bhoktṛbhogyayoḥ svasvāminoḥ pradhānapuruṣayoriti vā sūtrayituṁ śakyata eva । tathāpi draṣṭṛdṛśyagrahaṇamanena draṣṭṛdṛśyatvenaiva saṁyogo nānyathetyevamartham ॥
[draṣṭā buddheḥ pratisaṁvedī puruṣo] vakṣyamāṇalakṣaṇaḥ । pratisaṁvedituṁ śīlamasya sa pratisaṁvedī । kasya ?
[satvopāruḍhāḥ saveṁ dharmāḥ] śabdādayo buddhisatvamupārūḍhā buddhipratyayākārā eva dṛśyā na svataḥ । svataśca dṛśyatve jñātājñātaviṣayatvaṁ puruṣasya syāt । sadā jñātaviṣayatvaṁ ca puruṣasya nyāyena sthāpyate । tasmādbuddhayupārūḍhā eva sarve dharmā dṛśyāḥ ॥
[tadetaddṛśyamayaskāntamaṇikalpam] ayaso'pi kriyārthenaivopakartā'yaskāntamaṇiryathā, tathā
[karmaviṣayatvamāpannaṁ] karmaiva viṣayaḥ karmaviṣayaḥ, karmatvāpattireva । viṣayo dṛśirūpasya dṛśyatāmāpanna ityetat । kathambhūtaṁ satkarmaviṣayatāmāpadyata iti tadviśeṣaṇārthamāha –
anyasvarūpeṇa svaparapuruṣarūpeṇa śabdādirūpeṇa ca pratilabdhātmakaṁ pratilabdhaviśeṣarūpaṁ pratilabdhapuruṣaśabdādiviśeṣasvabhāvaṁ puruṣasvarūpeṇa labdhātmakaṁ saddṛśyatvena karmatāmāpannamapavargārthena svaṁ bhavati । śabdādyākāreṇa labdhātmakaṁ saddṛśyatvena karmatāmāpannaṁ bhogārthena svaṁ bhavati ॥
[svatantramapi] puruṣārthadvayakartṛtvena
[tayordṛgdarśanaśaktyoriti ।] draṣṭṛdṛśyayorityupakramasya dṛgdarśanaśaktyorityupasaṁhāraḥ, buddhipuruṣasaṁyogasya buddhyutpattyanantarabhāvitvādādimattvamāśaṅkya tadanādimattvapradarśanārthaṁ kriyate ।
[heyahetuḥ duḥkhasya kāraṇam] ityarthaḥ ॥
[tathā coktaṁ tantre – tatsaṁyogahetuvivarjanāt] tayorbuddhipuruṣayoḥ saṁyogastasya heturavidyā tadvivarjanāt । kathaṁ vivarjanam ? vidyayā samyagdarśanena tatpratipakṣeṇa nivartanāt । tasmāttatsaṁyogahetuvivarjanāt

tadyathā – pādatalasya bhedyatā, kaṇṭakasya bhettṛtvaṁ, parihāraḥ kaṇṭakasya pādā'nadhiṣṭhānaṁ pādatrāṇavyavahitena vā'dhiṣṭhānam, etattrayaṁ yo veda loke sa tatra pratīkāramārabhamāṇo bhedajaṁ duḥkhaṁ nā''pnoti। kasmāt, tritvopalabdhisāmarthyāditi। atrāpi tāpakasya rajasaḥ sattvameva tapyam। kasmāt, tapikriyāyāḥ karmasthatvāt, sattva kriyā nāpariṇāmini niṣkriye kṣetrajñe, darśitaviṣayatvāt। sattvaṁ tu tapyamāne tadākārānurodhī puruṣo'pyanutapyata iti ॥ 17 ॥

vivaraṇam
[tadyathā--pādatalasya bhedyatā] sukumārataratvāt ।
tathehāpi puruṣaḥ sattvadvāreṇa kaṇṭakasthānīyaṁ pradhānam, tayorviśeṣṭaḥ saṁyego'vidyānimitto duḥkhakāraṇam , duḥkhaparihāro'pyayam – guṇagauṇebhyaḥ pradhānamātraviśeṣebhyo dṛśyebhyo nirapekṣatā, samyagdarśanena prayojanābhāvaṁ buddhvā puruṣasyāvikriyasvāt kaṇṭakādhiṣṭhānavaccharīrārambhiṇī vā karmaṇo niyatavadanīyatvādavaśyaṁ phaladāyitvaṁ buddhvā aprārthitopanatānāṁ śabdādīnāṁ samyagdarśanavyavahitena satvena bhogaḥ । evaṁ parihāraṁ sañjānānaḥ kaṇṭakabhedaduḥkhaparihāramiva saṁsāraduḥkhaṁ nāmeti ॥
kasmādetadevamiti - tritvopalabdhisāmarthyāt । pradhānapuruṣasaṁyogatritvopalabdhisāmarthyāt । evaṁ hi vijñānasya sāmarthyaṁ dṛśyate । pādatalakaṇṭakatatsaṁyogeṣvajñānasya ca tritvānupalabdherduḥkhahetutvaṁ dṛśyata eva ।
yadyevaṁ puruṣaścenna tapyate puruṣārthaṁ pradhānaṁ pravartata ityetadanupapannam । vṛttisārūpyeṇoktottarattvāt । tadevedamucyate - darśitaviṣattvāt । apariṇāmino'vikriyattvāt darśitaviṣayattvam । tasmāt dṛśikarmaṇi sattve tapye tadākārānurodhī tadākārānuvartī । tadākārānurodhitvaṁ taddṛśisannidhau bauddhasya pratyayasya dṛśirūpāvabhāsatā । yathā lākṣārasasannidhau sphaṭikasya lākṣākārāvabhāsatā, tathā puruṣo'pi tapyata ityupacaryate ॥ 17 ॥
dṛśyasvarūpamucyate –
prakāśakriyāsthitiśīlaṁ bhūtendriyātmakaṁ bhogāpavargārthaṁ dṛśyam ॥ 18 ॥

prakāśaśīlaṁ sattvam। kriyāśīlaṁ rajaḥ। sthitiśīlaṁ tama iti। ete guṇāḥ parasparoparaktapravibhāgāḥpariṇāminaḥ saṁyogaviyogadharmāṇa itaretaropāśrayeṇopārjitamūrtayaḥ parasparāṅgāṅgitve'pyasaṁbhinnaśaktipravibhāgāstulyajātīyātulyajātīyaśaktibhedānupātinaḥ pradhānavelāyām upardaśitasaṁnidhānā guṇatve'pi ca vyāpāramātreṇa pradhānāntarṇītānumitāstitāḥ puruṣārthakartavyatayā prayuktasāmarthyāḥ saṁnidhimātropakāriṇo'yaskāntamaṇikalpāḥ pratyayamantareṇaikatamasya vṛttimanu vartamānāḥ pradhānaśabdavācyā bhavanti। etaddṛśyamityucyate।

vivaraṇam
[dṛśyasvarūpamucyate ।] nanu ca
[prakāśakriyāsthitiśīlaṁ bhūtendriyātmakaṁ bhogāpavargārthaṁ dṛśyam ।] prakāśaśca kriyā ca sthitiśca prakāśakriyāsthitayaḥ । prakāśasyābhyarhitatvāt pūrvanipātaḥ । bahuṣu cāniyamāt sthitikriyāśabdayoraniyama iti kriyāśabdasya pūrvanipātaḥ । tā eva śīlaṁ yasya tatprakāśakriyāsthitiśīlam । prakāśanaṁ prakāśaḥ, sa śīlaṁ yasya
nanu ca svarūpameva tatprakāśanaṁ sthitiśca । na । svarūpamātre śīlaśabdāyogāt । na hi mṛdaṅgaśīle mārdaṅgikaḥ । mṛdaṅgavādanaśīlo hi sa ucyate । na hi vyāpāraśūnye kvacidapi śīlaśabdaḥ · prayujyate ॥
nanu ca sthitiprakāśāvapi sattvatamasoḥ svarūpam । tadetenaiva gamyate svarūpe śīlaśabdaḥ prasaṁkṣyata iti । ucyate – na svarūpe sarvatra śīlaśabdaprayogaḥ । ihāpi rajasi duḥkhasvarūpe kriyāśīlamiti kriyayā samprayujya śīlaśabdavyapadeśaḥ । sthitiprakāśāvapi vyāpārarūpāvabhipretau ॥
atha mataṁ – kriyāpi rajasaḥ svarūpameveti – na – pradhānāvasthāyāṁ sāmyābhyupagamāt guṇānām । yadi kriyā rajasaḥ svarūpamabhaviṣyat pradhānasyāpi kriyāvatvaṁ guṇasāmyāvasthāyāmabhuviṣyat । kāryāvasthāyāṁ hi kriyāvatvamabhyupagamyate, na pradhānavelāyām । tasmānna svarūpābhiprāyeṇa śīlaśabdaprayogaḥ ॥
[prakāśaśīlaṁ sattvaṁ sthitiśīlaṁ tama] iti vyapadiśyate । sthitiprakāśayorātmalābhasya rajaḥkriyāpūrvatvāccalatorevābhivyaktestācchīlyaṁ sattvatamaserucyate ॥
[prakāśaśīlaṁ] yattatsattvam ।
yathā prakāśaśīlamiti sattvamucyate'traiva । rajaḥkriyoparañjanāt sarvāvabhāsasamarthasyāpi satvasya niyataprakāśatvaṁ tamauparaktatvena । tathā rajaso'pi pravṛttyabhivyaktiḥ sattvoparāgeṇa ! niyatapravṛttitvaṁ tu tamauparāgeṇa ! tathā tamase'pi sthilyabhivyaktiḥ satvoparāgeṇa ! sthitiśīlatvaṁ rajauparāgeṇa । sthitistu svata eva । rajase'pi pravṛttiḥ svataḥ । sattvasyāpi prakāśaḥ svata eva । itthamevānyeṣvapi kāryeṣu satvādīnāmitaretaroparāgo draṣṭavyaḥ ॥
[saṁyogaviyogadharmāṇaḥ ।] saṁyogaśva viyogaśva saṁyogaviyogau, tau dhamaiṁ yeṣāṁ te saṁyogaviyogadharmāṇaḥ । kasmiṁścit kāryaṁ aārambhabhmāṇe guṇapradhānabhāvenānyonyaṁ saṁyujyante । tathaivārabdhakāryavirodhidharmāntarodaye parasparaṁ viyujyante ॥
[iteretaropāśreyaṇopārjitamūrtayaḥ] -mahadādistambaparyantā mūrtaya itaretaropāśrayeṇopārjitā dharmadharmilakṣaṇā yaiste itarataropāśrayeṇopārjitamūrtayaḥ ॥
[parasparato bhinnā api] -paramārthato'nyonyato'nyo'pi ।
etaduktaṁ bhavati – ekasmin kārya ārabdhavye'tyantavyatiṣaktaparasparaśaktayaḥ kāryārambhakāle pṛthaktvenānupalakṣyamāṇaśaktipravibhāgā iti ॥
[tulyajātīyātulyajātīyaśatibhedānupatinaḥ ।] sātvikānāṁ sattvaṁ tulyajātiḥ, rājasānāṁ rajastulyajātiḥ, tāmasānāṁ tama iti ca । parasparāpekṣayā tu bhinnajātīyatvam । tulyajātīyātulyajātīyānāṁ śaktiprabhedamanupatituṁ śīlaṁ yeṣāṁ te
[pradhānavelāyāmupadarśitasannidhānāḥ] sarve । ekaikasmin prādhānyena svakāryārambhiṇi tatkāla itarayorapi sannidhānamupasarjanabhāvenopadarśitamiti
[guṇatve] copasarjanabhāve
[puruṣārthetikartavyatāprayuktasāmarthyāḥ] puruṣārthe bhogāpavargau tasyetikartavyatā yathā yathā arthaniṣpattistathā tathā prayuktaṁ kāryārambhaṁ prati
[sannidhimātropakāriṇaḥ] vikārapratyayarūpasannidhimātreṇa puruṣasyepakurvantīti
[pradhānaśabdavācyā bhavānti ।] naiva triguṇīvyatirekeṇānyatpradhānaṁ nāmāsti । ta eva guṇā: sāmyāvasthāḥ pradhānaikaśabdābhidhānīyakaṁ pratipadyante । vaiṣamyaṁ bhajante vikāraśabdābhidheyā vṛttimante bhavanti ॥
[etaddṛśyamityucyate ।]

tadetadbhūtendriyātmakaṁ bhūtabhāvena pṛthivyādinā sūkṣmasthūlena pariṇamate। tathendriyabhāvena śrotrādinā sūkṣmasthūlena pariṇamata iti। tattu nāprayojanamapi tu prayojanamurarīkṛtya pravartata iti bhogāpavargārthaṁ hi taddṛśyaṁ puruṣasyeti। tatreṣṭāniṣṭaguṇasvarūpāvadhāraṇamavibhāgāpannaṁ bhogo bhoktuḥ svarūpāvadhāraṇamapavarga iti। dvayoratiriktamanyaddarśanaṁ nāsti। tathā coktam – ayaṁ tu khalu triṣu guṇeṣu kartṛṣvakartari ca puruṣe tulyātulyajātīye caturthe tatkriyāsākṣiṇyupanīyamānānsarvabhāvānupapannānanupaśyannadarśanamanyacchaṅkata iti।

vivaraṇam
[bhūtendriyātmakaṁ] bhūtātmakamindriyātmakaṁ ca । kathaṁ tadātmakatvamityāha –
[nāprayojanam ।] sarvatraiva pravṛtteḥ prayojanadarśanāt ।
[tatreṣṭāniṣṭaguṇasvarūpāvadhāraṇamavibhāgāpannam iṣṭānām] agarucandanasparśanādilakṣaṇānām
[svarūpāvadhāraṇaṁ] bhoktṛsvarūpādavadhāryamāṇāduttarakālamapyapavṛttasya viśeṣābhāvādapavarga ityucyate । sarvadā svarūpapratiṣṭho hi (tadā) sa iti । vṛttisārūpyamitaratra viśeṣa iti ॥
[dvayo] rbhogāpavargayo
[tathā coktam – ayaṁ tu khalvevaṁ] samyagdaśī

tāvetau bhogāpavargau buddhikṛtau buddhāveva vartamānau kathaṁ puruṣe vyapadiśyete iti। yathā vijayaḥ parājayo vā yoddhṛṣu vartamānaḥ svāmini vyapadiśyate, sa hi tatphalasya bhokteti, evaṁ bandhamokṣau buddhāveva vartamānau puruṣe vyapadiśyete, sa hi tatphalasya bhokteti। buddhereva puruṣārthāparisamāptirbandhastadarthāvasāyo mokṣa iti। etena grahaṇadhāraṇohāpohatattvajñānābhiniveśā buddhau vartamānāḥ puruṣe'dhyāropitasadbhāvāḥ। sa hi tatphalasya bhokteti ॥ 18 ॥

vivaraṇam
[tāvetau bhogāpavargau buddhikṛtau] budvinirvartitau
[yathā vijayaḥ parājayo veti । budverevārthāparisamāptirbandha iti ।] yāvat samāptau kartavyau bhogā'pavargāviti buddhirmanyate tāvadbandhaḥ ।
[etena grahaṇadhāraṇavijñānohāpohakriyāvacanayathānyāyāvadhāraṇābhiniveśāḥ] puruṣe'vyāropitasadbhāvā iti jñeyāḥ । pratyayatvāviśeṣāt buddhidharmāḥ
[grahaṇaṁ] śabdādīnāṁ śrotrādibhirupādānam । gṛhītānāmavismaraṇaṁ
dṛśyānāṁ guṇānāṁ svarūpabhedāvadhāraṇārthamidamārabhyate –
viśeṣāviśeṣaliṅgamātrāliṅgāni guṇaparvāṇi ॥ 19 ॥

tatrā''kāśavāyvagnyudakabhūmayo bhūtāni śabdasparśarūparasagandhatanmātrāṇāmaviśeṣāṇāṁ viśeṣāḥ। tathā śrotratvakcakṣurjihvāghrāṇāni buddhīndriyāṇi, vākpāṇipādapāyūpasthāḥ karmendriyāṇi, ekādaśaṁ manaḥ sarvārtham, ityetānyasmitālakṣaṇasyāviśeṣasya viśeṣāḥ। guṇānāmeṣa ṣoḍaśako viśeṣapariṇāmaḥ।

vivaraṇam
[dṛśyānāṁ 'guṇānāṁ] yathāvyākhyātātmanāṁ
[‘anyebhyo'pi dṛśyante'] iti kartari vanipralyayaḥ ॥ tathā ca sati yannāntamakartari tannapuṅsakam । yatu nāntaṁ kartari tatsarvaliṅgaṁ bhavati । yathā merudṛśvā merudṛśvanīti । tataśca viśeṣādayaḥ parvaṇaḥ । keṣāṁ te sambandhina iti? guṇānāṁ parvāṇo guṇaparvaṇaḥ । keṣāñcidayameva pāṭho – viśeṣāviśeṣaliṅgamātrāliṅgāni guṇaparvāṇīti ॥
[tatrākāśavāyvagnijalabhūmayo bhūtāni ।] śabdatanmātrārabdhamākāśam । sparśatanmātraṇa śabdasparśalakṣaṇenārabdho vāyu; । rūpatanmātreṇa śabdasparśarūpalakṣaṇenārabdho'gniḥ ॥ rasatanmātreṇa śabdasparśarūparasacatuṣṭayalakṣaṇenā''pa ārabdhāḥ । gandhatanmātreṇa śabdasparśarūparasagandhapañcatayalakṣaṇena bhūmirārabdhā ॥
nanu ca nityamākāśam , prāgutpattervināśakālaṁ ca viśeṣābhāvāt । yo ya utpatimāṁstasya tasya pṛthivyādeḥ prāgutpattervināśottarakālaṁ ca viśeṣo dṛṣṭaḥ । tathā ākāśaṁ yadyutpattimat syāt prāgutpattervināśottarakālaṁ ca bhavedviśeṣaḥ । na ca so'sti । tasmādākāśamanutpattikam ॥
athāvakāśadānābhāvo viśeṣa iti cenna, mūrtimato'nyasyābhāvāttulyaṁ nityatve'pi । anityalakṣaṇābhāvāca nityamākāśam, sarvagatatvādātmādivat ॥
["tasmādvā etasmādātmana akāśaḥ sambhūtaḥ’] ityāgamavirodhaḥ । smṛtivirodhaśca । avakāśaṁ kurvate tadupacāra iti cenna, vāyvādiṣvapyupacārapraṅgāt ।
prāgutpatterviśeṣābhāvādānityo na bhavatīti ca bruvatā viśeṣābhāvānnityatvamityuktaṁ bhavati । viśeṣabhāvāccānityatvamityuktaṁ bhavati । tathā ca satyātmadīnāmapi bandhamokṣopalabdhyanupalabdhyādiviśeṣābhāvāt sato vaiśeṣikasya anityatvaprasaṅgaḥ । tathā, paramāṇvādīnāṁ cānityatvaṁ prasajyeta ॥
athāpyutpattimata eva prāgūrdhvaṁ ca viśeṣabhāvābhāvai vivakṣitāviti cet – na – ākāśasyotpatyabhyupagamaprasaṅgāt । athākāśotpativādinā viśeṣo vaktuṁ na śakyata iti cet – na – puruṣārthasādhanāsādhanatvaviśeṣāt । sarvagatatvāditi cāsiddho hetuḥ ॥
aṁsaṁrvagatāni kāladigākāśamanāṁsyanityāni ca, svārthībhāve parārthatvātū, ghaṭādivat । utpatimanti ca, pradhānapuruṣābhyāmanyatvāt, ghaṭādivat । evamākāśam [utpatimadanityaṁ ca] bāhendriyaviṣayaguṇatvāt, ghaṭādivat । bhūtatvācca, pṛthivīvat । anityadravyasaṁyogotpādyaguṇatvāt, pṛthivyādivat । cikitsānivartyaprakopakaratvāt, vāyuvat । nabhasaśca prakopaścikitsānivartanīyaścikitsakaprasiddhimupārūḍhaḥ । etenānityasādharmyaṁ vyākhyātam ॥
[bhūtāni śabdasparśarūparasagandhatanmātrāṇāmaviśeṣāṇāṁ viśeṣāḥ ।] śāntadhoramūḍhādyanekaviśeṣavatvādviśeṣā: । śāntādyabhāvāccāviśeṣā: tanmātrāṇi ॥
[tathā śrotratvak-cakṣurjihvāghrāṇani,] śabdādiviṣayabuddhayarthavād-
[‘na vākcapalo na pāṇipādacapalaḥ’] ityādervidhipratiṣedhaviṣayapravṛttinivṛttimatvasiddhaḥ ॥
[ekādaśaṁ manaḥ sarvārtha] matītānāgatavartamānaviṣayārthaṁ buddhīndriyakarmendriyaviṣayārthaṁ ca ॥
[etānye] kādaśendriyāṇya
[guṇānāma] viśeṣākārasaṁsthitānāṁ sattvādīnā

ṣaḍaviśeṣāḥ। tadyathā – śabdatanmātraṁ sparśatanmātraṁ rūpatanmātraṁ rasatanmātraṁ gandhatanmātraṁ ceti ekadvitricatuḥpañcalakṣaṇāḥ śabdādayaḥ pañcāviśeṣāḥ, ṣaṣṭhaścāviśeṣo'smitāmātra iti। ete sattāmātrasyā''tmano mahataḥ ṣaḍaviśeṣapariṇāmāḥ। yattatparamaviśeṣebhyo liṅgamātraṁ mahattattvaṁ tasminnete sattāmātre mahatyātmanyavasthāya vivṛddhikāṣṭhāmanubhavanti।

vivaraṇam
[ṣaḍaviśeṣāḥ । tadyathā śabdamātraṁ sparśamātra] miti dvilakṣaṇasyāpi pradhānena vyapadeśaḥ । tathā
[ete sattvamātrasyā] stitvamātrasya
[yattatparaṁ sūkṣmamaviśeṣebhyo liṅgamātraṁ mahattattvam, tasminnete sattāmātre mahatvānmahatyavasthāya] kāraṇasvarūpe mahatyavasthāya

pratisaṁsṛjyamānāśca tasminneva sattāmātre mahatyātmanyavasthāya yattanniḥsattāsattaṁ niḥsadasannirasadavyaktamaliṅgaṁ pradhānaṁ tatpratiyanti। eṣa teṣāṁ liṅgamātraḥ pariṇāmo niḥsattāsattaṁ cāliṅgapariṇāma iti।

vivaraṇam
[pratisaṁsṛjyamānāśca] pratilīyamānāścāviśeṣāḥ
[eṣa teṣāṁ] guṇānāṁ sattvādīnāṁ

aliṅgāvasthāyāṁ na puruṣārtho heturnāliṅgāvasthāyāmādau puruṣārthatā kāraṇaṁ bhavatīti। na tasyāḥ puruṣārthatā kāraṇaṁ bhavatīti। nāsau puruṣārthakṛteti nityā''khyāyate। trayāṇāṁ tvavasthāviśeṣāṇāmādau puruṣārthatā kāraṇaṁ bhavati। sa cārtho heturnimittaṁ kāraṇaṁ bhavatītyanityā''khyāyate। guṇāstu sarvadharmānupātino na pratyastamayante nopajāyante। vyaktibhirevātītānāgatavyayāgamavatībhirguṇānvayinībhirupajananāpāyadharmakā iva pratyavabhāsante। yathā devadatto daridrāti। kasmāt। yato'sya mriyante gāva iti, gavāmeva maraṇāttasya daridrāṇaṁ na svarūpahānāditi samaḥ samādhiḥ।

vivaraṇam
[liṅgāvasthāyāṁ na puruṣārtho hetuḥ ।] aliṅgāvasthānimittaṁ na puruṣārtho hetuḥ । nāliṅgāvasthā puruṣārthaprayuktetyarthaḥ । tadetat vyācaṣṭe –
[nnityā vyākhyāyate ।] yo hi puruṣārthaprayukta: so'nityo dṛṣṭo yathā pṛthivyādiḥ । na caiṣā pradhānāvasthā puruṣārthaprayukteti nityā vyākhyāyate ॥
[trayāṇāṁ tvavasthāviśeṣāṇāṁ] viśeṣāviśeṣaliṅgamātrāṇā
[guṇāstu sarvadharmānupātinaḥ] sarvavikārānupātinaḥ । yathā sarpaḥ prāṁśutvasarpaṇakuṇḍalatvādiviśeṣānupātī, tathā viśeṣāditatvānupatino guṇāḥ piṇḍapratyayānupātinaśca
[guṇā vyaktibhireva dharmairevātītānāgatavyayāgamavatībhikhrilakṣaṇābhirguṇānvayinībhirguṇopādānakāraṇabhirupajanāpāyadharmakā ivo] tpattipralayavanta iva
[yathā devadatto daridrāti । kasmāt ? yenāsya mriyante gāva iti । gavameva maraṇāttasya daridrāṇaṁ na svarūpahānāditi samaḥ samādhiḥ] tulyaścarco dṛṣṭāntena dārṣṭāntikasya devadattadaridrāṇavadeva guṇānugatābhivryatibhirmahadādibhirguṇavimardanavaicitryakṛtābhirvivardhamānabhirguṇānāmāḍhyatā tatpralaye ca teṣāṁ daridrāṇāṁ, na svarūpeṇāpacaya upacayo veti tulya: samādhiriti ॥

liṅgamātramaliṅgasya pratyāsannaṁ, tatra tatsaṁsṛṣṭaṁ vivicyate kramānativṛtteḥ। tathā ṣaḍaviśeṣā liṅgamātre saṁsṛṣṭā vivicyante pariṇāmakramaniyamāt। tathā teṣvaviśeṣeṣu bhūtendriyāṇi saṁsṛṣṭāni vivicyante। tathā coktaṁ purastāt। na viśeṣebhyaḥ paraṁ tattvāntaramastīti viśeṣāṇāṁ nāsti tattvāntarapariṇāmaḥ। teṣāṁ tu dharmalakṣaṇāvasthāpariṇāmā vyākhyāyiṣyante ॥ 19 ॥

vivaraṇam
[liṅgasyāliṅgaṁ pratyāsannaṁ] yathā mūlaṁ vṛkṣasya pratyāsannaṁ bīje saṁsṛṣṭaṁ mūlameva prathamataraṁ vivicyate, na vṛkṣasyottarāvasthā । evaṁ tanna pradhāne tat liṅgaṁ
[tathā ṣaḍaviśeṣāḥ] pūrvottā
[tathā coktaṁ purastāt । na viśeṣebhyaḥ] prāguktebhya ākāśādibhyaḥ
vyākhyātaṁ dṛśyamatha draṣṭuḥ svarūpāvadhāraṇārthamidamārabhyate –
draṣṭā dṛśimātraḥ śuddho'pi pratyayānupaśyaḥ ॥ 20 ॥

dṛśimātra iti dṛkśaktireva viśeṣaṇāparāmṛṣṭetyarthaḥ। sa puruṣo buddheḥ pratisaṁvedī। sa buddherna sarūpo nātyantaṁ virūpa iti। na tāvatsarūpaḥ। kasmāt। jñātājñātaviṣayatvātpariṇāminī hi buddhiḥ। tasyāśca viṣayo gavādirghaṭādirvā jñātaścājñātaśceti pariṇāmitvaṁ darśayati। sadājñātaviṣayatvaṁ tu puruṣasyāpariṇāmitvaṁ paridīpayati। kasmāt। nahi buddhiśca nāma puruṣaviṣayaśca syādagṛhītā gṛhītā ceti siddhaṁ puruṣasya sadājñātaviṣayatvaṁ tataścāpariṇāmitvamiti।

vivaraṇam
[vyākhyātaṁ dṛśyam] avaghṛtaṁ dṛśyam । yadarthaṁ ca dṛśyate tasyedānīṁ
[pratisaṁvedī buddheḥ puruṣa ityupapādayiṣyāma] iti, taccātropapādyate । dṛśirdarśanamupalabdhistāvanmātro
[pratyayānupaśya iti ।] etattu tadastitvānumānam । katham ? ghaṭādīnāṁ dṛśyānāṁ svarūpavyatiriktenānyena dṛśyatvadarśanāt , tatprakāśakānāṁ ca ālekādīnāṁ vyatiriktadṛśyatvāt , sarvārthāvabhāsakānāmapi pratyayānāṁ svarūpavyatiriktadṛśyatvaṁ dṛśyatvādavagamyate ghaṭāditadālokādivaditi ॥
[dṛśimātra iti । dṛkchaktireva] dṛgdarśanaṁ tadeva śaktirdṛkchaktiḥ । nāpyanyo dṛkchaktimānasti । saiva śaktirdṛgiti । tatra mātraśabdārthaṁ vyācaṣṭe –
[sa puruṣo buddheḥ] pratisaṁvedituṁ śīlamasyeti
[na tāvat sarūpaḥ ।] kasmāt ? ko hetuḥ ? । buddhestāvat svarūpaṁ vaidharmyadarśanārthamāha—
yadi na pariṇametāpariṇamamānā cedviṣayaṁ vikhyāpayet sadaiva viṣayitvaṁ buddheḥ syāt । tasmāt jñātājñātaviṣayatā pariṇāmitvaṁ khyāpayati । pariṇāminī buddhiḥ, jñātājñātaviṣayatvāt । dīpacakṣurādi(viṣaya)vat ॥
[sadā jñātaviṣayatvaṁ puruṣasyāpariṇāmitvaṁ paridīpayati ।] sadā jñātaviṣayatvamasiddhaṁ puruṣasyetyāśaṅkayāha –
nanu ca buddhyā vyavasitamarthaṁ puruṣaścetayati, buddheśca sarvo viṣayo jñātaścājñātaśca puruṣasyāpi samānaḥ । jñātājñātaviṣayatvaṁ buddhyā vyavasitārthopalambhitvāt । tasmāt puruṣasyāpi pariṇāmitvaṁ jñātājñātaviṣayatvādbuddhivadeva ॥
naiṣa doṣaḥ । buddhereva puruṣaviṣayatvāt । buddhireva hi bāhyārthākārā puruṣasya viṣayo nārthaḥ kevalaḥ kharūpeṇa । tasmānna jñātājñātaviṣayaḥ puruṣaḥ । buddhistu sadaiva jñātaiveti na pariṇāmitvaṁ puruṣasya ॥
kiṁ ca parārthā buddhiḥ saṁhatyakāritvāt, svārthaḥ puruṣa iti। tathā sarvārthādhyavasāyakatvāttriguṇā buddhistriguṇatvādacetaneti। guṇānāṁ tūpadraṣṭā puruṣa ityato na sarūpaḥ।

vivaraṇam
nanu ca buddhayā vyavasitamarthaṁ puruṣaścetayatīti kaścidāha । tat katham ? ucyate – na – tairapyapariṇāmitvasyābhyupagamāt puruṣasya । buddhayā vyavasitamarthamityetaduktaṁ bhavati – buddhyākāraṁ cetayati buddhivyavasāyākārāpannamarthaṁ cetayatīti । anyathā hi teṣāṁ pariṇāmitvaparārthatvasaṁhatyakārivādayo buddhidharmāḥ sarva eva prasajeyuḥ ॥
athāpariṇāmitve darśanānupapattiriti cet – na – darśanasaiyaiva puruṣasvarūpatvāt । yo hi puruṣapariṇāmitvamabhimanyate, sa idaṁ praṣṭavyaḥ – kiṁ pariṇāmena kriyata iti ॥
sa cedabhidadhīta – darśanamiti । sa pratyabhidhānīyaḥ – puruṣasya darśanameva rūpam, ataḥ pariṇāmānarthakyamiti ॥
sa cet pratibrūyāt – na puruṣasyopalabdhirbhogaḥ, kastarhi ? vikriyaiva bhoga iti - sa punarvaktavyaḥ – tathāpi vikriyāvattvādanityattvamupanataṁ śarīrādivadeva ॥
athāpi pratibhāṣeta – svātmani vikriyā nānityatvakāraṇaṁ syāt , kiṁ tvavasthāntarabhāvivikriyā hi kāraṇamanityatvasyeti । sa puna: pratibhāṣitavyaḥ – vikriyāvasthāyā evāvasthāntaratvāt । pūrvamavikṛtasya vastunaḥ punarvikriyā avasthāntaram ॥
kiṁ ca – viṣayābhyupagame ca vikriyaiva, tāvatā niyamaḥ pāryete na kartum । na cāpi svātmani vikriyamāṇānāṁ vajravaidūryādīnāmanityatvaṁ nāsti । na ca vikriyājanitasyaiva darśanasya dṛśyaviṣayatvaṁ na nityasya darśanasyeti niyamaheturasti । vikriyaivopalabdhirna vikriyājaniteti cet – na – śarīrādīnāṁ vikriyāvatāmupalabdhiprasaṅgāt ॥
tasmāddṛśimātra evāpariṇāmī ca, sadā jñātaviṣayatvāt puruṣa iti siddham । tasya ca nityopalabdhisvarūpatve'pi dṛśyabauddhapratyayabhāvābhāvikṛto'yaṁ vyapadeśaḥ paśyati darśayiṣyati dadarśeti ca । savitrādiprakāśanavyapadeśavat । yathā prakāśayati savitā prakāśayiṣyati prācīkaśaditi ca prakāśyabhāvābhāvakṛto vyapadeśaḥ । śuddhatvādayo hetavo vaidharmyeṇa buddhayādayo dṛṣṭāntāḥ ॥
[sarvārthādhyavasāyitvādgho] raśāntādisamastārthāvasāyitvāt

astu tarhi virūpa iti। nātyantaṁ virūpaḥ। kasmāt, śuddho'pyasau pratyayānupaśyo yataḥ। pratyayaṁ bauddhamanupaśyati, tamanupaśyannatadātmā'pi tadātmaka iva pratyavabhāsate। tathā coktam - apariṇāminī hi bhoktṛśaktirapratisaṁkramā ca pariṇāminyarthe pratisaṁkrānteva tadvṛttimanupatati, tasyāśca prāptacaitanyopagraharūpāyā buddhivṛtteranukāramātratayā buddhivṛttyaviśiṣṭā hi jñānavṛttirityākhyāyate ॥ 20 ॥

vivaraṇam
[astu tarhi virūpa] eva । tataścātyantavirūpatvādbhogānupapattiriti । atrocyate –
[yataḥ śuddho'pyasau bauddhaṁ pratyayamanupaśyati] tacca bauddhapratyayānudarśanaṁ sādhitam ।
tadartha eva dṛśyasyā''tmā ॥ 21 ॥

dṛśirūpasya puruṣasya karmarūpatāmāpannaṁ dṛśyamiti tadartha eva dṛśyasyā''tmā bhavati। svarūpaṁ bhavatītyarthaḥ। svarūpaṁ tu pararūpeṇa pratilabdhātmakaṁ bhogāpavargārthatāyāṁ kṛtāyāṁ puruṣeṇa na dṛśyata iti। svarūpahānādasya nāśaḥ prāpto na tu vinaśyati ॥ 21 ॥

vivaraṇam
[tadartha eva dṛśyasyātmā ta] cchabdena draṣṭā dṛśimātraḥ śuddho yathādhigatātmā pratyāmnāyate । tadarthaḥ tasmai tadarthastatprayojanaḥ dṛśikarmatvārtha ityarthaḥ । bhogarūpeṇāpavargarūpeṇa ca । ko'sāvityāha –
nanu caturvyūhatvaṁ vyācikhyāsitaṁ kimarthametadaprakṛtamucyate । naiṣa doṣaḥ । ātyantikaduḥkhanivṛttiprayojanasya prakṛtatvāt । kathaṁ dṛśyatādarthyalābhāvadhāraṇenātyantikī duḥkhaviratiruktā bhavediti । ucyate – yadi dṛśyasvarūpapratilaibhastadartha eva, tadā aśeṣatadarthaviratau punaḥ kṛtārthatvāt kāryābhāvādātyantikadṛśyaviratiḥ syāt । tasya punaḥ pravṛttau prayojanābhāvāt । na hi kṛtameva punaḥ karaṇīyakamupāśnute । atha tu svārtho'pi dṛśyasyātmalābho'bhaviṣyadataḥ svārthasya bhāvāt punaḥ punaḥ prāvartiṣyata । tataśca nātyantikī nivṛttiḥ । tasmāttādarthyamevāvadhāryete ॥
[dṛśirūpasya puruṣasya karmaviṣayatāmāpannaṁ dṛśyamiti ।] itiśabdo hetvarthe ।
[tataśca] tādarthyasya niyatatvāt kāraṇāt
kasmāt –
kṛtārthaṁ prati naṣṭamapyanaṣṭaṁ tadanyasādhāraṇatvāt ॥ 22 ॥

kṛtārthamekaṁ puruṣaṁ prati dṛśyaṁ naṣṭamapi nāśaṁ prāptamapyanaṣṭaṁ tadanyapuruṣasādhāraṇatvāt। kuśalaṁ puruṣaṁ prati nāśaṁ prāptamapyakuśalānpuruṣānprati na kṛtārthamiti teṣāṁ dṛśeḥ karmaviṣayatāmāpannaṁ labhata eva pararūpeṇā''tmarūpamiti। ataśca dṛgdarśanaśaktyornityatvādanādiḥ saṁyogo vyākhyāta iti। tathā coktam –rdhamiṇāmanādisaṁyogāddharmamātrāṇāmapyanādiḥ saṁyoga iti ॥ 22 ॥

vivaraṇam
[svarūpahānādasya vināśaḥ prāptaḥ । na tu vinaśyati] sarvātmanā ।
[kṛtārthaṁ prati naṣṭamapyanaṣṭaṁ tadanyasādhāraṇatvāt । kṛtārthaṁ] yaṁ puruṣaṁ prati bhogāpavarganirvartanena kṛtaprayojana
[kuśalapuruṣān prati nāśaprāptaṁ] bhogāpavargapradānena kuśalapuruṣānprati kṛtaprayojanam ।
[ataśca dṛgdarśanaśaktyornityatvādanādiḥ saṁyogo vyākhyātaḥ । tathā coktaṁ tantre – dharmiṇāmanādisaṁyogāt] guṇānāṁ puruṣāṇāṁ cānādisaṁyogā
saṁyogasvarūpābhidhitsayedaṁ sūtraṁ pravavṛte-
svasvāmiśaktyoḥ svarūpopalabdhihetuḥ saṁyogaḥ ॥ 23 ॥

puruṣaḥ svāmī dṛśyena svena darśanārthaṁ saṁyuktaḥ। tasmātsaṁyogādṛśyasyopalabdhiryā sa bhogaḥ। yā tu draṣuḥ svarūpopalabdhiḥ so'pavargaḥ। darśanakāryāvasānaḥ saṁyoga iti darśanaṁ viyogasya kāraṇamuktam। darśanamadarśanasya pratidvaṁdvītyadarśanaṁ saṁyoganimittamuktam। nātra darśanaṁ mokṣakāraṇamadarśanābhāvādeva bandhābhāvaḥ sa mokṣa iti। darśanasya bhāve bandhakāraṇasyādarśanasya nāśa ityato darśanaṁ jñānaṁ kaivalyakāraṇamuktam।

vivaraṇam
[svasvāmiśaktyoḥ svarūpopalabdherhetuḥ saṁyogaḥ । svasvāmiśaktyoḥ] buddhipuruṣayoḥ
pramāṇaṁ cātra svasaṁyogapūrvikā buddhipuruṣayoḥ svarūpopalabdhiḥ, viṣayaviṣayisvarūpopalabdhitvāt , īkṣaṇadarpaṇasvarūpopalabdhivat । yā kācit sukhaduḥkhopalabdhirvivādagocarāpannā sā sukhaduḥkhahetusaṁyogapūrvekā, sukhaduḥkhepalabdhitvāt, candanakaṇṭakasukhaduḥkhopalabdhivat ॥
[puruṣaḥ svāmī dṛśyena svena] svayā buddhyā
[tasmāt saṁyogādda] rśanaprayuktā
saṁsārisaṁsārahetuyāthātmyadarśarnaṁ duḥkhaduḥkhisaṁyogahetunivartakaṁ, duḥkhiduḥkhahetuyāthātmyaviṣayatvāt , rogirogahetuyāthātmyadarśanavat ॥
[darśanaṁ,] tasmāttadanyathāviṣayasyā
[darśanaṁ mokṣakāraṇam adarśanābhāvādevā] rthādadarśanakāryasya duḥkhaheto
[darśanasya bhāve] draṣṭṛdṛśyaviṣayasya darśanasya bhāve tadviṣayasyā
kiṁ cedamadarśanaṁ nāma, kiṁ guṇānāmadhikāra āhosviddṛśirūpasya svāmino darśitaviṣayasya pradhānacittasyānutpādaḥ। svasmindṛśye vidyamāne yo darśanābhāvaḥ।

vivaraṇam
[kiṁcedamadarśanaṁ nāma ?] nanu coktamavidyaiva । sā cā
[kiṁceda] miti sarvaireva vikalpairvakṣyamāṇairabhisaṁbandhanīyam ।
nanu guṇānāmadhikārasya kathamadarśanāśaṅkā ? ucyate – arthadvāreṇa bhavatyevādarśanamadhikāraḥ । yāvaddhi guṇānāṁ pravṛttistāvadbandhaḥ । bandhakāraṇamavidyeti sthitisthairyamānīyate । śabdadvāreṇāpi – darśanādanyadadarśanaṁ yadā, bhavatyeva tadānīmāśaṅkā । guṇadhikāro hi darśanādanya eveti ॥
[āhosviddṛśisvarūpasya svāmino darśitaviṣayasya cittasyānutpādaḥ ।] iha tu pūrvapadārthapradhānatvamadarśanasya gṛhītvā śaṅkyate ।

kimarthavattā guṇānām। athāvidyā svacittena saha niruddhā svacittasyotpattibījam। kiṁ sthitisaṁskārakṣaye gatisaṁskārābhivyaktiḥ। yatredamuktaṁ pradhānaṁ sthityaiva vartamānaṁ vikārākaraṇādapradhānaṁ syāt।

vivaraṇam
[kimarthavatā guṇānāṁ] bhogāpavargābhyāṁ yā guṇānāmarthavatā tadadarśanamiti । atra tvarthadvāreṇaivāśaṅkā । prayojanavato hi prayojanamavaśyakṛtyamiti ॥
kaḥ punareṣu pakṣeṣu doṣaḥ ? ucyate – yadyadhikāro guṇānāmadarśanaṁ vidyānarthakyaṁ prāptam । na hyāsmin pakṣe vidyā pratyanīkabhūtā syādadarśanasya । yasmādvidyādhikārayoravirodhaḥ, ataścānirmokṣaḥ prasaktaḥ । punaḥ punaḥ prayojanavattayā pravṛttisaṁbhavāt ॥
guṇārthavattā adarśanamiti pakṣe'pyeṣa eva doṣaḥ । tathā cittasyānutpādapakṣe'pyeṣa eva । anutpādo hi darśanābhāvaḥ, tasya cāvastutvādvidyayā nivṛtiranupapanneti । abhāve hi sati pratyanīkavidhānamanarthakameva ॥
[athāvidyā svacintena saha niruddheti ।] atra hyavidyāyā adarśanasya ca kenacidaṁśena bhedaṁ manyamāno vikalpayati । katham ? aniruddhā hyavidyā dṛśyamānatvāddarśanameva । yā tu niruddhā cittena saha pralīnā svakāraṇe ।
[sthitisaṁskāraḥ ।] tasya
[yatredamu] ktaṁ pradhānaṁ

tathā gatyaiva vartamānaṁ vikāranityatvādapradhānaṁ syāt। ubhayathā cāsya vṛttiḥ pradhānavyavahāraṁ labhate nānyathā। kāraṇāntareṣvapi kalpiteṣveva samānaścarcaḥ। darśanaśaktirevādarśanamityeke, “pradhānasyā''tmakhyāpanārthā pravṛttiḥ” itiśruteḥ। sarvabodhyabodhasamarthaḥ prākpravṛtteḥ puruṣo na paśyati sarvakāryakaraṇasamarthaṁ dṛśyaṁ tadā na dṛśyata iti। ubhayasyāpyadarśanaṁ dharma ityeke। tatredaṁ dṛśyasya svātmabhūtamapi puruṣapratyayāpekṣaṁ darśanaṁ dṛśyadharmatvena bhavati। tathā puruṣasyānātmabhūtamapi dṛśyapratyayāpekṣaṁ puruṣadharmatvenevādarśanamavabhāsate। darśanaṁ jñānamevādarśanamiti kecidabhidadhati। ityete śāstragatā vikalpāḥ। tatra vikalpabahutvametatsarvapuruṣāṇāṁ guṇānāṁ saṁyoge sādhāraṇaviṣayam ॥ 23 ॥

vivaraṇam
[tathā gatyaiva vartamānaṁ] nityaṁ vikārarūpeṇeva vartamānaṁ
asmin pakṣe tadevānābhivyaktātmakaṁ śaktirūpamadarśanaṁ tadeva cābhivyaktaṁ darśanamiti svātmani virodhānupapatterdarśanādadarśanasya nivṛttyanavaklṛptiḥ ॥
[sarvabodhasamarthaḥ] bodhātmakatvāt
[dṛśyasyātmabhūta] mavyatiriktamapi
[darśanaṁ jñānaṁ,] tadeva jñāna
[ete śāstragatā vikalpāḥ] darśanāntaragatā vikalpāḥ ।
yastu pratyakcetanasya svabuddhisaṁyogaḥ –
tasya heturavidyā ॥ 24 ॥

viparyayajñānavāsanetyarthaḥ। viparyayajñānavāsanāvāsitā ca na kāryaniṣṭhāṁ puruṣakhyātiṁ buddhiḥ prāpnoti sādhikārā punarāvartate। sā tu puruṣakhyātiparyavasānāṁ kāryaniṣṭhāṁ prāpnoti, caritādhikārā nivṛttādarśanā bandhakāraṇābhāvānna punarāvartate।

vivaraṇam
[sarvapuruṣāṇāṁ guṇasaṁyegāviśeṣaḥ ।] guṇaiḥ saṁyogaḥ sarveṣāmaviśiṣṭaḥ sādhāraṇaḥ, tathā
['viparyayo mithyājñānamatadūpapratiṣṭham’] ityuktam । tathā
[viparyayajñānavāsanāvāsitā na kāryaniṣṭhāṁ] kāryesamāptim । kāryaniṣṭhāmāha –
[sā tu] buddhiḥ

atra kaścitpaṇḍakopākhyānenoddhāṭayati - mugdhayā bhāryayā'bhidhīyate - paṇḍakā''ryaputra, apatyavatī me bhaginī kimarthaṁ nāma nāhamiti, sa tāmāha - mṛtaste'hamapatyamutpādayiṣyāmīti। tathedaṁ vidyamānaṁ jñānaṁ cittanivṛttiṁ na karoti, vinaṣṭaṁ kariṣyatīti kā pratyāśā। tatrā''cāryadeśīyo vakti – nanu buddhinivṛttireva mokṣo'darśanakāraṇābhāvādbuddhinivṛttiḥ।

vivaraṇam
[atra kaścitpaṇḍakopākhyānenoddhaṭṭayati ।] paṇḍakaḥ
ayamudghaṭṭayiturabhiprāyaḥ – avidyā cedbuddhipuruṣasaṁyegasya kāraṇaṁ, tasyāśca vidyā nivṛttihetuḥ, tataśca vidyamānāyāṁ vidyāyāṁ tadvirodhinyavidyā nivartate । na tu vidyotpattyanantaramapi cittanivṛttiḥ । tatra yathaiva satyāṁ vidyāyāṁ na cittanivṛtaḥ, tathā naṣṭāyāmapi vidyāyāṁ na nivartsyati tarāmidānī ṣaṇḍādiva mṛtādapatyopattiḥ । ata eva kāraṇādavidyā'pi na saṁyogakāraṇam ॥
[atrācāryadeśīyaḥ parihāraṁ vakti ।] ācāryadeśīyagrahaṇaṁ pūrvapakṣasyāsāratvaprakhyāpanārtham । uddhaṭṭanenaiva pratyuttaraṁ vadāmi iti ॥
[nanu buddhinivṛttireva mokṣaḥ ।] katham ?
taccādarśanaṁ bandhakāraṇaṁ darśanānnivartate। tatra cittanivṛttireva mokṣaḥ, kimarthamasthāna evāsya mativibhraḥ ॥ 24 ॥

vivaraṇam
[taccādarśanaṁ bandhakāraṇaṁ darśanānnivartate, tannivṛttireva mokṣaḥ । kimarthamasthāne vibhramaḥ] । pradhānapuruṣasaṁyogasya du:khahetoravidyā kāraṇamiti vistareṇa pratipāditam । tataśca darśanādadarśananivṛtyupapettaḥ pūrvapakṣamasāraṁ manyate ॥
nanu coktaṁ vidyānantarameva buddhirna nivartata iti । ucyate । vidyayā tāvadavidyā nivartata eva । nātra vibhramaḥ kāryaḥ । tasyāṁ tu nivṛttāyāṁ budvinivṛttiśca bhavatyeva । punarbuddhisaṁyogasyāvidyāvyatirekeṇa kāraṇāntarābhāvāt । tataśca buddhinivṛttireva mokṣaḥ ॥
[“tasya tāvadeva ciram”] iti ॥ 24 ॥
heyaṁ duḥkhaṁ heyakāraṇaṁ ca saṁyogākhyaṁ sanimittamuktamataḥ paraṁ hānaṁ vaktavyam –
tadabhāvātsaṁyogābhāvo hānaṁ taddṛśeḥ kaivalyam ॥ 25 ॥

tasyādarśanasyābhāvādbuddhipuruṣasaṁyogābhāva ātyantiko bandhanoparama ityarthaḥ। etaddhānam। taddṛśeḥ kaivalyaṁ puruṣasyāmiśrībhāvaḥ punarasaṁyogo guṇairityarthaḥ। duḥkhakāraṇanivṛttau duḥkhoparamo hānaṁ, tadā svarūpapratiṣṭhaḥ puruṣa ityuktam ॥ 25 ॥

vivaraṇam
[heyaṁ duḥkhamanāgatam'] ityuktam । regasthānīya eka vyūho vyākhyāta ityarthaḥ ।
[ataḥ paraṁ hānam] ārogyasthānīyaṁ mokṣaśāstraprayojane
[taditi] pūrvaprakṛtāyā avidyāyāḥ pratyavamarśaḥ ।
[duḥkhakāraṇanivṛtau duḥkhoparamo hānam । tadā svarūpapratiṣṭhaḥ puruṣa ityuktam – “svarūpapratiṣṭhā vā citiśaktiḥ” iti ॥] 
nanu ca aniyatavipākasya karmaṇaḥ sadbhāve kathaṁ hānaṁ syāt ? punarāneyatavipākakarmaṇā śarīrasyārambha iti । na—abhihitapratividhānatvāt । samyagdarśanena kreśabījasya dāhāta karmaṇāmanārambhakatvamuktaṁ dagdhabījabhāvāpanītatuṣaśalitaṇḍulanidarśanena । tasmāt na viduṣaḥ kāraṇābhāvāccharīrārambhaḥ ॥ 25 ॥
atha hānasya kaḥ prāptyupāya iti –
vivekakhyātiraviplavā hānopāyaḥ ॥ 26 ॥

sattvapuruṣānyatāpratyayo vivekakhyātiḥ। sā tvanivṛttamithyājñānā plavate। yadā mithyājñānaṁ dagdhabījabhāvaṁ vandhyaprasavaṁ saṁpadyate tadā vidhūtakleśarajasaḥ sattvasya pare vaiśāradye parasyāṁ vaśīkārasaṁjñāyāṁ vartamānasya vivekapratyayapravāho nirmalo bhavati। sā vivekakhyātiraviplavā hānopāyaḥ। tato mithyājñānasya dagdhabījabhāvopagamaḥ punaścāprasava ityeṣa mokṣasya mārgo hānasyopāya iti ॥ 26 ॥

vivaraṇam
[hānasya kaḥ prāptyupāyaḥ?] iti ॥
nanu ca kathaṁ hānasya prāpyupāya iti ? yāvatā naiva hānamavastutvāt prāpyam । bandhanoparama eva hi hānam । naiṣa doṣaḥ । yatnasādhyatvādavidyānivṛtteḥ yathā nigalabhedaḥ । samyakūkhyātau satyāmavidyānivṛttiriti hānamavastvapi prāpyamityupacaryete ॥
[vivekakhyātiraviplavā hānopāyaḥ ।] kā punarvivekakhyātirityāha –
[‘yathā hemāvipakvaṁ na virājate ।] 
[tathā'pakvakaṣāyasya vijñānaṁ na prakāśate ॥] 
[“kāmagrāhagṛhītasya jñānamapyasya na plavaḥ” ।] iti ॥
[yadā tu mithyājñānaṁ dagdhabījabhāvaṁ] dagdhabījatvādeva
[sā vivekakhyātiḥ] itthaṁbhūtā satī
[“bījānyagnyupadagdhāni na rohanti yathā punaḥ ।] 
[jñānadagdhaistathā kleśairnātmā sampadyate punaḥ ॥ ” iti ।] 
[rmokṣasya mārgo hānasyopāya] ityarthaḥ ॥ 26 ॥
tasya saptadhā prāntabhūmiḥ prajñā ॥ 27 ॥
tasyeti pratyuditakhyāteḥ pratyāmnāyaḥ। saptadheti aśuddhyāvaraṇamalāpagamāccittasya pratyayāntarānutpāde sati saptaprakāraiva prajñā vivekino bhavati।

vivaraṇam
[tasya saptadhā prāntabhūmiḥ prajñā । tasyeti pratyuditakhyāteḥ] pratyutpannasamyagdarśanasya

tadyathā – parijñātaṁ heyaṁ nāsya punaḥ parijñeyamasti। kṣīṇā heyahetavo na punareteṣāṁ kṣetavyamasti। sākṣātkṛtaṁ nirodhasamādhinā hānam। bhāvito vivekakhyātirūpo hānopāya iti। eṣā catuṣṭayī kāryā vimuktiḥ prajñāyāḥ। cittavimuktistu trayī caritādhikārā buddhiḥ। guṇā giriśikharataṭacyutā iva grāvāṇo niravasthānāḥ svakāraṇe pralayābhimukhāḥ saha tenāstaṁ gacchanti। na caiṣāṁ pravilīnānāṁ punarastyutpādaḥ prayojanābhāvāditi। etasyāmavasthāyāṁ guṇasaṁbandhātītaḥ svarūpamātrajyotiramalaḥ kevalī puruṣa iti। etāṁ saptavidhāṁ prāntabhūbhiprajñāmanupaśyanpuruṣaḥ kuśala ityākhyāyate। pratiprasave'pi cittasya muktaḥ kuśala ityeva bhavati guṇātītatvāditi ॥ 27 ॥

vivaraṇam
[yathā parijñātaṁ heyaṁ] sarvaṁ duḥkhaṁ heyaṁ sarvaṁ duḥkhaṁ heyaṁ jñātamupapattibhiḥ ।
[kṣīṇā heyahetava] iti bahuvacanaprayogāt kleśāḥ karmāṇi ca abhidhīyante । na punareṣāṁ kleśakarmaṇāmalpamapi samyagdarśanapāvakādagdhabījābhāvāt kṣe(dutprekṣi)tavyamasti । etenāpi prāntabhūmitvamevoktam । itthaṁ ca pratyupasthitasamīcīnapratyayasya kṣīṇakleśatvāt na kṣetavyamasti । kṛtakaraṇīyo'hamiti ca samyagdarśanaparipākaliṅgapratyaya upāvartate । yathā rogāturasya rogahetukṣaye nīrogo'haṁ na punarbhaiṣajyamastīti pratyayaḥ । evameva [ṣa] dvitīyaḥ prajñāprakāra uktaḥ ॥
[sākṣātkṛtaṁ nirodhasamāpattirhānam ।] hānapratyāsannatvāt hānatulyarūpatvācca nirodhasamādhireva hānamityākhyāyate । tacca
[bhāvitaḥ] samyagabhyastataraḥ
[kāryavimuktiḥ ।] sā ca
[caritādhikārāḥ] nivṛttakartavyāḥ
[na caiṣāṁ pratipralīnānāṁ puruṣaṁ prati punarastyutpādaḥ prayojanābhāvāt ।] vimuktaṁ hi caturvidhaṁ kāryam । eṣā dvitīyā prajñācittavimuktiḥ ॥
[etasyāmavasthāyāṁ] caritārthaguṇapralayāvasthāyāṁ
[etāṁ saptavidhāṁ prāntabhūmiṁ] prāntāḥ pragatāvasānāḥ bhūmayaḥ avasthāḥ yasyāstāṁ
siddhā bhavati vivekakhyātirhānopāya iti, na ca siddhirantareṇa sādhanamityetadārabhyate –
yogāṅgānuṣṭhānādaśuddhikṣaye jñānadīptirāvivekakhyāteḥ ॥ 28 ॥

yogāṅgānyaṣṭāvabhidhāyiṣyamāṇāni। teṣāmanuṣṭhānātpañcaparvaṇo viparyayasyāśuddhirūpasya kṣayo nāśaḥ। tatkṣaye samyagjñānasyābhivyaktiḥ। yathā yathā ca sādhanānyanuṣṭhīyante tathā tathā tanutvamaśuddhirāpadyate। yathā yathā ca kṣīyate tathā tathā kṣayakramānurodhinī jñānasyāpi dīptirvivardhate। sā khalveṣā vivṛddhiḥ prakarṣamanubhavatyā vivekakhyāteḥ, āguṇapuruṣasvarūpavijñānādityarthaḥ। yogāṅgānuṣṭhānamaśuddherviyogakāraṇam। yathā paraśuśchedyasya। vivekakhyātestu prāptikāraṇaṁ yathā dharmaḥ sukhasya nānyathā kāraṇam। kati caitāni kāraṇāni śāstre bhavanti। navaivetyāha।

vivaraṇam
[siddhā vivekakhyātiḥ] samadhigatā vivekakhyātiḥ saptavidhaprāntabhūmiprajñāphalāvasānā
[‘yogastattvajñānārthaḥ’] iti ॥
[yogāṅgānyabhidhāyiṣyamāṇāni teṣāmanuṣṭhānaṁ] yogāṅgānuṣṭhānam tasmāt । aśuddheḥ kleśākhyāyāḥ kṣayaḥ, tatkṣaye dīptiḥ prakarṣaḥ । kiyadavasānetyāha-
