[yogāṅgānyaṣṭāvabhidhāyiṣyamāṇāni । teṣāmanuṣṭhānāt paśvaparvaṇo viparyayasya aśuddhirūpasya kṣayaḥ nāśaḥ, tatkṣaye samyagdarśanasyābhivyaktiḥ'] dīptiḥ । kathametadbhavatītyāha -
[“prāṇāyāmairdaheddoṣān dhāraṇābhiśca kilbiṣān ।] 
[pratyāhāreṇa saṁsargān dhyānenānaiśvarān guṇān ॥ ” iti ।] 
[yathā yathā cāśuddhiḥ kṣīyate tathā tathā tatkṣayakramānuredhinī] divasakarasyeva śiśirāvasāne
[yogāṅgānuṣṭhānamaśuddheḥ kṣayakāraṇaṁ vivekakhyāteśca prāptikāraṇamiti,] dvidhaiva kāraṇam, dharmaparaśudvayasthānīyamekamubhayakāraṇaṁ,

tadyathā – utpattisthityabhivyaktivikārapratyayāptayaḥ। viyogānyatvadhṛtayaḥ kāraṇaṁ navadhā smṛtam ॥ iti। tatrotpattikāraṇaṁ mano bhavati vijñānasya, sthitikāraṇaṁ manasaḥ puruṣārthatā, śarīrasyevā''hāra iti। abhivyaktikāraṇaṁ yathā rūpasyā''lokastathā rūpajñānaṁ, vikārakāraṇaṁ manaso viṣayāntaram। yathā'gniḥ pākasya। pratyayakāraṇaṁ dhūmajñānamagnijñānasya। prāptikāraṇaṁ yogāṅgānuṣṭhānaṁ vivekakhyāteḥ।

vivaraṇam
[tadyathā] – tāni ślokenaiva kathayati
[viyogānyatvadhṛtayaḥ kāraṇaṁ navadhā smṛtam ॥] iti ।
[tatrotpattikāraṇaṁ mano bhavati [vijñānasya]] , manaso hi vṛttiḥ
[sthitikāraṇaṁ] sthiteḥ kāraṇam
[abhivyakteḥ kāraṇaṁ rūpasyālokaḥ । tadā rūpajñānam ।] na hyālokenānabhivyakte rūpe'vabodhaḥ ॥
[vikārasya] kāraṇaṁ
[pratyayakāraṇaṁ dhūmajñānamagnijñānasya ।] pratyayasya phalavataḥ pramāṇasya kāraṇamityarthaḥ । pūrvatra tu
[prāptikāraṇaṁ yogāṅgānuṣṭhāne vivekakhyāteḥ] dharma iva sukhasya ।

viyogakāraṇaṁ tadevāśuddheḥ। anyatvakāraṇaṁ yathā suvarṇasya suvarṇakāraḥ। evamekasya strīpratyayasyāvidyā mūḍhatve dveṣo duḥkhatve rāgaḥ sukhatve tattvajñānaṁ mādhyasthye। dhṛtikāraṇaṁ śarīramindriyāṇām। tāni ca tasya। mahābhūtāni śarīrāṇāṁ, tāni ca parasparaṁ sarveṣāṁ tairyagyaunamānuṣadaivatāni ca parasparārthatvādityevaṁ nava kāraṇāni। tāni ca yathāsaṁbhavaṁ padārthāntareṣvapi yojyāni। yogāṅgānuṣṭhānaṁ tu dvidhaiva kāraṇatvaṁ labhata iti ॥ 28 ॥

vivaraṇam
[tadevāśuddherviyogakāraṇaṁ] paraśuriva chedyasya ॥
[anyatvakāraṇaṁ yathā suvarṇakāraḥ suvarṇasya ।] suvarṇaṁ hi bhittvā vardhamānakamanyaṁ karoti । tathā vardhamānakaṁ bhitvā anyadābharaṇāntaraṁ karoti । tathā'nyaditi ॥
[evamekasya 'strī' iti pratyayasyāpi avidyā kāraṇaṁ mūḍhatve । dveṣa] stasyaiva strīpratyayasya
[dhṛteḥ kāraṇam ।] dhāraṇe dhṛtiḥ, tasyāḥ kāraṇaṁ
[mahābhūtānyā] kāśādīni
[sarveṣāṁ] padārthānāṁ
tathā mānuṣaṁ ijyārakṣaṇādibhirdaivatairyagyaunayoḥ dhṛtikāraṇam । tathā daivamitarayoḥ śītoṣṇapravarṣaṇārdanā dhṛtikāraṇam ॥
[evaṁ navaiva kāraṇāni] iti kāraṇāntaraṁ pratiṣedhati ।
tatra yogāṅgānyavadhāryante –
yamaniyamāsana​prāṇāyāmapratyāhāra​dhāraṇādhyāna​samādhayo'ṣṭāvaṅgāni ॥ 29 ॥
yathākramameṣāmanuṣṭhānaṁ svarūpaṁ ca vakṣyāmaḥ ॥ 29 ॥

vivaraṇam
[tatra yogāṅgānyavadhāryante – yamaniyamāsanaprāṇāyāmapratyāhāradhāraṇādhyānasamādhayo'ṣṭāvaṅgāni ॥] 
[‘ṣaḍaṅgo yoga ucyata'] ityādi ।
kiñca – sākṣādāsanādīnyeva samādherupakurvanti, na yamaniyamau ॥
[‘nāvirato duścaritānnāśanāntaḥ’] iti śruteḥ । tathā –
yamaniyamayośca yamasya prathamopādānaṁ prādhānyakhyāpanārtham । yamasya hi prādhānyaṁ sarvatra siddham । yamaniyamayuktasyādhikṛtasya yogina āsanādyaṅgānāṁ pūrvapūrve sthirapadaprāptasyottarottarānuṣṭhānaṁ prāptam । na hi prathamaṁ sopānamanāruhyottaramāroḍhuṁ śakyam ॥
yadanyatrācyate –
[“sthānāsanavidhānāni yogasya vidhayo'pi vā ।] 
[vyākṣepajanākāḥ sarve na te yogasya hetavaḥ ॥] 
[sarvadoṣaparityāgaḥ samādhiśceti taddvayam ॥] 
[nirṇaya[yāt] yogahetuḥ syādbhavati vānyanna vā [bhavatvanyanna vā bhavet] ॥ ”] iti ॥
[yathākramameṣāṁ] yamādīnā
tatra –
ahiṁsāsatyasteyabrahmacaryāparigrahā yamāḥ ॥ 30 ॥

tatrāhiṁsā sarvathā sarvadā sarvabhūtānāmanabhidrohaḥ। uttare ca yamaniyamāstanmūlāstatsiddhiparatayaiva tatpratipādanāya pratipādyante। tadavadātarūpakaraṇāyevopādīyante। tathā coktam – sa khalvayaṁ brāhmaṇo yathā yathā vratāni bahūni samāditsate tathā tathā pramādakṛtebhyo hiṁsānidānebhyo nivartamānastāmevāvadātarūpāmahiṁsāṁ karoti।

vivaraṇam
[tatra] teṣu yamādiṣu prathamaṁ yamā vyākhyāyante-
[uttare ca yamāḥ] satyādayaḥ
[brāhmaṇo yathā yathā bahūni vratāni samāditsate tathā tathā pramādakṛtebhyo hiṁsānidānebhyaḥ] hiṁsāmūlebhyaḥ hiṁsākāraṇebhyaḥ

satyaṁ yathārthe vāṅmanase। yathā dṛṣṭaṁ yathā'numitaṁ tathā vāṅmanaśceti। paratra svabodhasaṁkrāntaye vāguktā, sā yadi na vañcitā bhrāntā vā pratipattivandhyā vā bhavediti। eṣā sarvabhūtopakārārthaṁ pravṛttā na bhūtopaghātāya। yadi caivamapyabhidhīyamānā bhūtopaghātaparaiva syānna satyaṁ bhavetpāpameva bhavettena puṇyābhāsena puṇyapratirūpakeṇa kaṣṭaṁ tamaḥ prāpnuyāt। tasmātparīkṣya sarvabhūtahitaṁ satyaṁ brūyāt।

vivaraṇam
uktaṁ ca – satyaṁ brūyāt priyaṁ brūyānna brūyāt satyamapriyam । priyaṁ ca nānṛtaṁ brūyādeṣa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ ॥ ” iti ।

steyamaśāstrapūrvakaṁ dravyāṇāṁ parataḥ svīkaraṇaṁ, tatpratiṣedhaḥ punaraspṛhārūpamasteyamiti। brahmacaryaṁ guptendriyasyopasthasya saṁyamaḥ। viṣayāṇāmarjanarakṣaṇakṣayasaṅgahiṁsādoṣadarśanādasvīkaraṇamaparigraha ityete yamāḥ ॥ 30 ॥

vivaraṇam
[steyaṁ aśāsrapūrvaṁ dravyāṇāṁ parataḥ svīkaraṇaṁ] spṛhānimittam । yat steyaṁ
[brahmacaryaṁ guptendriyasya] guptānyendriyasya puruṣasya abrahmacaryārthavāṅmanasādivṛttiśūnyasya
[viṣayāṇāmārjanarakṣaṇakṣayasaṅgahiṁsādoṣadarśanādasvīkaraṇam] anupādānaṁ
te tu –
jātideśakālasamayānavacchinnāḥ sārvabhaumā mahāvratam ॥ 31 ॥

tatrāhiṁsā jātyavacchinnā matsyavadhakasya matsyeṣveva nānyatra hiṁsā। saiva deśāvacchinnā na tīrthe haniṣyāmīti। saiva kālāvacchinnā na caturdaśyāṁ na puṇye'hani haniṣyāmīti। saiva tribhiruparatasya samayāvacchinnā devabrāhmaṇārthe nānyathā haniṣyāmīti। yathā ca kṣatriyāṇāṁ yuddha eva hiṁsā nānyatreti। ebhirjāti deśakālasamayairanavacchinnā ahiṁsādayaḥ sarvathaiva paripālanīyāḥ। sarvabhūmiṣu sarvaviṣayeṣu sarvathaivāviditavyabhicārāḥ sārvabhaumā mahāvratamityucyante ॥ 31 ॥

vivaraṇam
[ete tviti । ete] tvahiṁsādayo mahāvratasaṁjñāḥ saṁnyāsavatāmanuṣṭhānīyāḥ । kīdṛśāste mahāvratanāmāna iti-
[tatra ahiṁsā jātyavacchinnā matsyabandhakasya matsyeṣveva nānyatra matsyajāterhiṁsā ।] sā ca matsyajātyavacchinnā matsyabhūmemanaśnuvānā vartata iti asārvabhaumyeva ॥
[saivāhiṁsā deśāvacchinnā] katham?
[saiva ca kālāvacchinnā] yathā –
[tribhiḥ] api jātideśakālaiḥ
[jātideśakālasamayairanavacchinnā ahiṁsādayaḥ, te sarvathaiva paripālanīyāḥ sarvabhūmiṣu] jātyādiṣu
śaucasaṁtoṣatapaḥsvādhyāyeśvarapraṇidhānāni niyamāḥ ॥ 32 ॥

tatra śaucaṁ mṛjjalādijanitaṁ medhyābhyavaharaṇādi ca bāhyam। ābhyantaraṁ cittamalānāmākṣālanam। saṁtoṣaḥ saṁnihitasādhanādadhikasyānupāditsā। tapo dvaṁdvasahanam। dvaṁdvāśca jighatsāpipāse śītoṣṇe sthānāsane kāṣṭhamaunākāramaune ca। vratāni caiṣāṁ yathāyogaṁ kṛcchracāndrāyaṇasāṁtapanādīni। svādhyāyo mokṣaśāstrāṇāmadhyayanaṁ praṇavajapo vā। īśvarapraṇidhānaṁ tasminparamagurau sarvakarmārpaṇam। śayyāsanastho'tha pathi vrajanvā svasthaḥ parikṣīṇavitarkajālaḥ। saṁsārabījakṣayamīkṣamāṇaḥ syānnityayukto'mṛtabhogabhāgī ॥ yatredamuktaṁ tataḥ pratyakcetanādhigamo'pyantarāyābhāvaśceti ॥ 32 ॥

vivaraṇam
[śaucasantoṣatapassvādhyāyeśvaraprāṇadhānāni niyamāḥ । tatra śaucaṁ mṛdādijanitam] ādiśabdādudakaṁ ca ।
[ābhyantarama] dhunocyate -
[santoṣaḥ sanni.āhatasādhanāśvāsāt] sannihitādāśvāsīnamittāt
[tapo dvandvasahanam । dvandvaśca jighatsāpipāse ।] jighatsā attumicchā । pātumicchā pipāsā । jighatsāpipāsāsahanaṁ tapaḥ । [svarūpeṇaiva [vā] te jighatsāpipāse] alpīyaḥ pānāśananimitte tapaḥ ।
[vratāni caiṣāṁ] yogināṁ
[‘gomūtraṁ gomayaṁ kṣīraṁ dadhi sarpiḥ kuśodakam ।] 
[ekarātropavāsaśca kṛcchraḥ sāntapanaḥ smṛtaḥ ॥] 
[svādhyāyo mokṣaśāstrādhyayanam] upaniṣadādyadhyayanaṁ praṇavajapo vā ।
eteṣāṁ yamaniyamānām –
vitarkabādhane pratipakṣabhāvanam ॥ 33 ॥

yadā'sya brāhmaṇasya hiṁsādayo vitarkā jāyeranhaniṣyāmyahamapakāriṇamanṛtamapi vakṣyāmi krayamapyasya svīkariṣyāmi dāreṣu cāsya vyavāyī bhaviṣyāmi parigraheṣu cāsya svāmī bhaviṣyāmīti। evamunmārgapravaṇavitarkajvareṇātidīptena bādhyamānastatpratipakṣānbhāvayet। ghoreṣu saṁsārāṅgāreṣu pacyamānena mayā śaraṇamupāgataḥ sarvabhūtābhayapradānena yogadharmaḥ। sa khalvahaṁ tyaktvā vitarkānpunastānādadānastulyaḥ śvavṛtteneti bhāvayet।

vivaraṇam
[yamaniyamānāṁ] viruddhāstarkāḥ
[yadā asya brāhmaṇasya vitarkā hiṁsādayo jāyeran ।] tatrāhiṁsādivitarkā ye vā hiṁsādayaste vitarkāḥ kīdṛśā iti ? tatrāhiṁsāyā vitarkaḥ hiṁsā
[dravyamasya svīkariṣyāmīti] paradravyasyātmasaṁbandhakaraṇam ।
[itthamunmārgahāriṇā vitarkajvareṇa dīptena bādhyamānastatpratipakṣān bhāvayet ॥] 
[ghoreṣu saṁsārāṅgāreṣu pacyamānena mayā । śaraṇamabhyupagataḥ sarvabhūtābhayapradānena yogadharmaḥ । sa khalvahaṁ tyaktvā vitarkān hiṁsādīn punastānādadānastulyaḥ śvavṛtteneti ।] śuna iva vṛttaṁ yasya saḥ śvavṛttaḥ । śvavadvā vṛttaḥ śvavṛttaḥ । tena tulya iti
yathā śvā vāntāvalehī tathā tyaktasya punarādadāna iti mādi sūtrāntareṣvapi yojyam ॥ 33 ॥

vivaraṇam
[yathā śvā vāntāvalehī tathā tyaktasya punarādānaṁ kurvan] ityupaskāraḥ । tena puruṣeṇa tulyo'hamiti । tathā kathamahaṁ bhaveyaṁ, na yuktametaditi bhāvayet ॥
[ityevamādi sūtrāntare'pi] niyamasūtre'pi
vitarkā hiṁsādayaḥ kṛtakāritānumoditā lobhakrodhamohapūrvakā mṛdumadhyādhimātrā duḥkhājñānānantaphalā iti pratipakṣabhāvanam ॥ 34 ॥

tatra hiṁsā tāvat – kṛtā kāritā'numoditeti tridhā। ekaikā punastridhā lobhena māṁsacarmārthena krodhenāpakṛtamaneneti mohena dharmo me bhaviṣyatīti। lobhakrodhamohāḥ punastrividhā mṛdumadhyādhimātrā iti। evaṁ saptaviṁśatirbhedā bhavanti hiṁsāyāḥ। mṛdumadhyādhimātrāḥ punastridhā - mṛdumṛdurmadhyamṛdustīvramṛduriti। tathā mṛdumadhyo madhyamadhyastīvramadhya iti। tathā mṛdutīvro madhyatīvro'dhimātratīvra iti। evamekāśītibhedā hiṁsā bhavati। sā punarniyamavikalpasamuccayabhedādasaṁkhyeyā, prāṇabhṛdbhedasyāparisaṁkhyeyatvāditi। evamanṛtādiṣvapi yojyam।

vivaraṇam
[vitarkā hiṁsādaya] iti svarūpam ।
[tatra hiṁsaiva] ekā udāhriyate sarveṣāṁ pradarśanāya । sā
[ekaikā punastridhā ।] katham ?
[niyogāvikalpasamucayabhedāt] asaṅkhyeyā । yathā niyogabhedaḥ kaścinniyuktaḥ sannanyaṁ niyuṅke ; yathā rājñaḥ । sa cāpi niyuktaḥ param, sa cāpi paramiti । te ca sarve niyuktāḥ samuccayena vikalpena vā hiṁsanti । tathā mūlaniyoktāpi niyojyaiḥ saṁhatya vikalpaya ca hiṁsāmanutiṣṭhatīti । vadhyaghātakādi

te khalvamī vitarkā duḥkhājñānānantaphalā iti pratipakṣabhāvanam। duḥkhamajñānaṁ cānantaṁ phalaṁ yeṣāmiti pratipakṣabhāvanam। tathā ca hiṁsakastāvatprathamaṁ vadhyasya vīryamākṣipati। tataśca śastrādinipātena duḥkhayati। tato jīvitādapi mocayati। tato vīryākṣepādasya cetanācetanamupakaraṇaṁ kṣīṇavīryaṁ bhavati। duḥkhotpādānnarakatiryakpretādiṣu duḥkhamanubhavati, jīvitavyaparopaṇātpratikṣaṇaṁ ca jīvitātyaye vartamāno maraṇamicchannapi duḥkhavipākasya niyatavipākavedanīyatvātkathaṁcidevocchvasiti। yadi ca kathaṁcitpuṇyāvāpagatā hiṁsā bhavettatra sukhaprāptau bhavedalpāyuriti। evamanṛtādiṣvapi yojyaṁ yathāsaṁbhavam। evaṁ vitarkāṇāṁ cāmumevānugataṁ vipākamaniṣṭaṁ bhāvayanna vitarkeṣu manaḥ praṇidadhīta ॥ 34 ॥

vivaraṇam
[te khalvamī vitarkā duḥkhājñānānantaphalāḥ ।] duḥkhaṁ cājñānaṁ ca duḥkhājñāne, te evānantaṁ
[tathā ca hiṁsako vadhyasya vīryamākṣipati ।] ghātakarūpāvalokanabhatsainādinā trastasya vīryamākṣipya
[tasya vīryākṣepādasya] hiṁsituḥ
[duḥkhotpādāt] hiṁsāviśeṣāt
[jīvitavyaparopaṇāt pratikṣaṇaṁ ca jīvitātyaye vartamāno] janmamaraṇāntare vartmani pratikṣaṇaṁ
[yadi ca kathaṁcitpuṇyāvagamāt prabhūtapuṇyāvāpagatā] alpīyasī
[itthamanṛtādiṣvapi yathāsaṁbhavaṁ] hiṁsāyāmuktaṁ
pratipakṣabhāvanāddhetorheyā vitarkā yadā'sya syuraprasavadharmāṇastadā tatkṛtamaiśvaryaṁ yoginaḥ siddhisūcakaṁ bhavati। tadyathā –
ahiṁsāpratiṣṭhāyāṁ tatsannidhā vairatyāgaḥ ॥ 35 ॥
sarvaprāṇināṁ bhavati ॥ 35 ॥

vivaraṇam
[pratipakṣabhāvanāheyā vitarkāḥ yadā ca syuraprasavadharmiṇaḥ] aprasavāśca te dharmiṇaścetya
satyapratiṣṭhāyāṁ kriyāphalāśrayatvam ॥ 36 ॥
dhārmiko bhūyā iti bhavati dhārmikaḥ, svargaṁ prāpnuhīti svargaṁ prāpnoti। amoghā'sya vāgbhavati ॥ 36 ॥

vivaraṇam
[satyapratiṣṭhāyāṁ] satyasthairye
asteyapratiṣṭhāyāṁ sarvaratnopasthānam ॥ 37 ॥
sarvadiksthānyasyopatiṣṭhanti ratnāni ॥ 37 ॥

vivaraṇam
[asteyapratiṣṭhāyāṁ] aspṛhāyām । tataḥ kimasya bhavati ?
brahmacaryapratiṣṭhāyāṁ vīryalābhaḥ ॥ 38 ॥
yasya lābhādapratighānguṇānutkarṣayati। siddhaśca vineyeṣu jñānamādhātuṁ samartho bhavatīti ॥ 38 ॥

vivaraṇam
[brahmacaryapratiṣṭhāyāṁ vīryalābhaḥ । brahmacaryalābhādapratighān guṇānutkarṣayati ।] apratibandhānātmana upapādayati । sarvaśubhārthapravṛttiṣvapratibaddhavīryo bhavati । na kenacit pratighātena vivadhyata ityarthaḥ ॥
[vinayeṣu] śiṣyeṣu yogyeṣu vā sādhuṣu
aparigrahasthairye janmakathaṁtāsaṁbodhaḥ ॥ 39 ॥

asya bhavati। ko'hamāsaṁ kathamahamāsaṁ kiṁsvididaṁ kathaṁ svidadaṁ ke vā bhaviṣyāmaḥ kathaṁ vā bhaviṣyāma ityevamasya pūrvāntaparāntamadhyeṣvātmabhāvajijñāsā svarūpeṇopāvartate। etā yamasthairye siddhayaḥ ॥ 39 ॥

vivaraṇam
[aparigrahasthairye janmakathantāsambodhaḥ ।] janmanaḥ kathaṁbhāvabodho'sya
[kiṁsvididaṁ] (sama)mama janmanaḥ kiṁ satattvam,
niyameṣu vakṣyāmaḥ –
śaucātsvāṅgajugupsā parairasaṁsargaḥ ॥ 40 ॥

svāṅge jugupsāyāṁ śaucamārabhamāṇaḥ kāyāvadyadarśī kāyānabhiṣvaṅgī yatirbhavati। kiṁ ca parairasaṁsargaḥ kāyasvabhāvāvalokī svamapi kāyaṁ jihāsurmṛjjalādibhirākṣālayannapi kāyaśuddhimapaśyankathaṁ parakāyairatyantamevāprayataiḥ saṁsṛjyeta ॥ 40 ॥

vivaraṇam
[yameṣu siddhaya uktāḥ । idānīṁ niyameṣu vakṣyāmaḥ – śaucāt svāṅgajugupsā parairasaṁsargaḥ । svāṅgajugupsayā śaucamārabhamāṇaḥ kāyāvadyadarśī] śarīragarhyatvadarśī
kiṁ ca –
sattvaśuddhisaumanasyai​kāgryendriyajayātma​darśanayogyatvāni ca ॥ 41 ॥
bhavantīti vākyaśeṣaḥ। śuceḥ sattvaśuddhistataḥ saumanasyaṁ tata aikāgryaṁ tata indriyajayastataścā''tmadarśanayogyatvaṁ buddhisattvasya bhavatītyetacchaucasthairyādadhigamyata iti ॥ 41 ॥

vivaraṇam
[kiṁ cā] nyadbhavati ।
saṁtoṣādanuttamaḥ sukhalābhaḥ ॥ 42 ॥
tathā coktam – yacca kāmasukhaṁ loke yacca divyaṁ mahatsukham। tṛṣṇākṣayasukhasyaite nārhataḥ ṣoḍaśīṁ kalām ॥ iti ॥ 42 ॥

vivaraṇam
[santoṣādanuttamaḥ sukhalābhaḥ ।] santoṣavitarkānutpattau
[tathā coktam – ''yacca kāmasukhaṁ loke,] yaccaihikam ।
kāyendriyasiddhiraśuddhikṣayāttapasaḥ ॥ 43 ॥
nirvartyamānameva tapo hinastyaśuddhyāvaraṇamalaṁ tadāvaraṇamalāpagamātkāyasiddhiraṇimādyā। tathendriyasiddhirdūrācchravaṇadarśanādyeti ॥ 43 ॥

vivaraṇam
[kāyendriyasiddhiraśuddhikṣayāttapasaḥ । nirvartyamānameva tapo hinastyaśuddhyāvaraṇam] kimaṅga nirvartitamityabhi(mānaḥ)prāyaḥ ॥
[tadāvaraṇamalāpagamāt kāyasiddhiraṇimādyā ।] mātāpitrādisaṁbandhajaṁ kāyamalaṁ baijaṁ gārbhaṁ cāhārādijaṁ ca sarvaṁ tapasā nighātayiṣyate । tataścāṇimādikāyasiddhiḥ ॥
[tathā indriyasiddhirdūrācchravaṇādyā ॥ 43 ॥]
svādhyāyādiṣṭadevatāsaṁprayogaḥ ॥ 44 ॥
devā ṛṣayaḥ siddhāśca svādhyāyaśīlasya darśanaṁ gacchanti,kārye cāsya vartanta iti ॥ 44 ॥

vivaraṇam
[svādhyāyādiṣṭadevatāsamprayogaḥ । devāḥ ṛṣayaḥ siddhāśca ya iṣṭāste svādhyāyaśīlasya darśanaṁ gacchanti kāryeṣu cāsya upadeśādiṣu vartante ॥ 44 ॥]
samādhisidvirīśvarapraṇidhānāt ॥ 45 ॥
īśvarārpitasarvabhāvasya samādhisiddhiryayā sarvamīpsitamavitathaṁ jānāti deśāntare dehāntare kālāntare ca। tato'sya prajñā yathābhūtaṁ prajānātīti ॥ 45 ॥

vivaraṇam
[samādhisiddhirīśvarapraṇidhānāt । īśvarārpitasarvabhāvasya samādhiḥ sidhyati । yayā] samādhisiddhyā
uktāḥ saha siddhibhiryamaniyamāḥ। āsanādīni vakṣyāmaḥ। tatra –
sthirasukhamāsanam ॥ 46 ॥
tadyathā padmāsanaṁ bhadrāsanaṁ svastikaṁ daṇḍāsanaṁ sopāśrayaṁ paryaṅkaṁ krauñcaniṣadanaṁ hastiniṣadanamuṣṭraniṣadanaṁ samasaṁsthānaṁ sthirasukhaṁ yathāsukhaṁ cetyevamādīni ॥ 46 ॥

vivaraṇam
[uktāḥ saha siddhibhiryamānayamāḥ ।] idānīṁ
tatra śucau devanilayagiriguhānadīpulinādau jvalanasalilāsamīpe jantuvivarjite nira(ṅga)śmake śuciḥ samyagācamya, parameśvaramakhilabhuvanaikanāthaṁ abhivandyāṁśca yogeśvarānātmagurūśca praṇipatya, cailājinakuśottaramaduḥkhakaraṁ prāṅmukha udaṅmukho vā viṣṭaramadhiṣṭhāya, anyatamadeṣāmāsanaṁ nirbadhnīyāt ॥
[padmāsanam ॥] 
etacca sarvamanyeṣāmāsanānāmapi tulyam । kaścideva viśeṣaḥ ॥
[bhadrāsanam] । anyat samānam ॥
[vīrāsanam ।] ucyamāna eva viśeṣaḥ sarvatra ॥
[svastikamāsanam ॥] 
[daṇḍāsanam ॥] 
[sopāśrayam ॥] 
[paryaṅkāsanam ॥] 
[krauñcaniṣadanaṁ hastiniṣadanaṁ uṣṭraniṣadanaṁ ca] kauñcādiniṣadanasaṁsthānasādṛśyādeva draṣṭavyam ॥
[samasaṁsthitam ॥] 
[sthitaprasrabdhiḥ ।] anyenāpi prakāreṇa svayamutprekṣya
[yathāsukhaṁ ca] - yena rūpeṇāsīnasya sukhaṁ bhavati tat
prayatnaśaithilyānantasamāpattibhyām ॥ 47 ॥
bhavatīti vākyaśeṣaḥ। prayatnoparamātsidhyatyāsanaṁ yena nāṅgamejayo bhavati। anante vā samāpannaṁ cittamāsanaṁ nirvartayatīti ॥ 47 ॥

vivaraṇam
[prayatnaśaiśilyānantyasamāpattibhyām । bhavatīti vākyaśeṣaḥ ।] āsanaṁ dṛḍhaniṣpannaṁ bhavatītyupaskāraḥ ।
tato dvandvānabhighātaḥ ॥ 48 ॥
śītoṣṇādibhirdvaṁdvairāsanajayānnābhibhūyate ॥ 48 ॥

vivaraṇam
[tato dvandvānabhighātaḥ । tataḥ] āsanasthirībhāvāt । idaṁ dṛṣṭamānuṣāṅgikam । yat
tasminsati śvāsapraśvāsayorgativicchedaḥ prāṇāyāmaḥ ॥ 49 ॥
satyāsanajaye bāhyasya vāyorācamanaṁ śvāsaḥ, kauṣṭhyasya vāyorniḥsāraṇaṁ praśvāsaḥ, tayorgativiccheda ubhayābhāvaḥ prāṇāyāmaḥ ॥ 49 ॥

vivaraṇam
[kiñca] – prāṇāyāmādiyogyatā ca bhavati । katham ? tasmin sati
sa tu –
bāhyābhyantarastambhavṛttirdeśakālasaṁkhyābhiḥ paridṛṣṭo dīrghasūkṣmaḥ ॥ 50 ॥

yatra praśvāsapūrvako gatyabhāvaḥ sa bāhyaḥ। yatra śvāsapūrvako gatyabhāvaḥ sa ābhyantaraḥ। tṛtīyaḥ stambhavṛttiryatrobhayābhāvaḥ sakṛtprayatnādbhavati। yathā tapte nyastamupale jalaṁ sarvataḥ saṁkocamāpadyate tathā dvayoryugapadgatyabhāva iti। trayo'pyete deśena paridṛṣṭā iyānasya viṣayo deśa iti। kālena paridṛṣṭāḥ kṣaṇānāmiyattāvadhāraṇenāvacchinnā ityarthaḥ। saṁkhyābhiḥ paridṛṣṭā etāvadbhiḥ śvāsapraśvāsaiḥ prathama uddhātastadvannigṛhītasyaitāvadbhirdvitīya uddhāta evaṁ tṛtīyaḥ। evaṁ mṛdurevaṁ madhya evaṁ tīvra iti saṁkhyāparidṛṣṭaḥ। sa khalvayamevamabhyasto dīrghasūkṣmaḥ ॥ 50 ॥

vivaraṇam
[sa tu] trividhaḥ
[yatra praśvāsapūrvako gatyabhāvaḥ sa ābhyantaravṛttiḥ ।] ābhyantarasya vāyorbahirnissāraṇaṁ prati vṛttiryasya sa abhyantaravṛttiḥ ।
[tṛtīyastu stambhavṛttiḥ । tatrobhayābhāvaḥ] ācamananiścāraṇayorabhāvaḥ sa tu
[trayo'pyate deśena paridṛṣṭhāḥ iyānasya deśa iti ।] yathā bahirvṛtterantarācamyamānasya nāsikāgraprabhṛtyapādāṅguṣṭhaṁ deśavyāptiḥ । evamantarvṛtterbahirniścāryamāṇasya vāyoḥ pādāṅguṣṭhaprabhṛtyanāsikāgraṁ deśavyāptiḥ । stambhavṛtterāmastakāpādatalavyāptiḥ । athavā bahirapi vitastyādikrameṇa deśavyāptirastyeva ॥
[kālena paridṛṣṭāḥ, kṣaṇānāmiyattāvadhāraṇena] iyantaḥ kṣaṇāḥ prāṇāyāmenātivāhitā iti ॥
[tathā saṅkhyābhiḥ paridṛṣṭāḥ, etāvadbhiḥ śvāsapraśvāsaiḥ] atītaiḥ paridṛṣṭaḥ
[nigṛhītasya vāyoḥ tāvadbhiḥ] praśvāsairatītaiḥ paridṛṣṭo
[tṛtīyaḥ,] etāvadbhiḥ śvāsapraśvāsaiḥ paridṛṣṭaḥ
[sa khalvayamevaṁ] deśakālasaṅkhyāparidṛṣṭo'bhyasto dīrghakālavyāpī bhavati bhūmijayāt । tathā carṣīṇāmanekavarṣavyāpī śrūyate । tataśva
[sūkṣmaṁ] ca bhavati ॥ 50 ॥
bāhyābhyantaraviṣayākṣepī caturthaḥ ॥ 51 ॥

deśakālasaṁkhyābhirbāhyaviṣayaparidṛṣṭa ākṣiptaḥ। tathā''bhyantaraviṣayaparidṛṣṭa ākṣiptaḥ। ubhayathā dīrghasūkṣmaḥ। tatpūrvako bhūmijayātkrameṇobhayorgatyabhāvaścaturthaḥ prāṇāyāmaḥ। tṛtīyastu viṣayānālocito gatyabhāvaḥ sakṛdārabdha eva deśakālasaṁkhyābhiḥ paridṛṣṭo dīrghasūkṣmaḥ। caturthastu śvāsapraśvāsayorviṣayāvadhāraṇātkrameṇa bhūmijayādubhayākṣepapūrvako gatyabhāvaścaturthaḥ prāṇāyāma ityayaṁ viśeṣa iti ॥ 51 ॥

vivaraṇam
[bāhyābhyantaraviṣayākṣepī caturthaḥ] – bāhyasya viṣayāḥ pādāṅguṣṭhādayaḥ । bāhyo hi vāyurācamyamāno'ntardeśān vyāpnoti, ākṣipati । ābhyantarasya viṣayā bhūmyādayaḥ । sa ca bahirniścāryamāṇe bhūmyādīn deśakālasaṅkhyāparidṛṣṭān vyāpnoti, ākṣipati ।
[deśakālasaṅkhyābhirbāhyavastuviṣayaḥ paridṛṣṭa ākṣipto] vyāptaḥ ।
[tatpūrvakaḥ] ubhayaviṣayākṣepapūrvakaḥ ।
[tṛtīyastadviṣayānālocitaḥ sakṛdārabdha eva] gatyabhāvo
tataḥ kṣīyate prakāśāvaraṇam ॥ 52 ॥

prāṇāyāmānabhyasyato'sya yoginaḥ kṣīyate vivekajñānāvaraṇīyaṁ karma। yattadācakṣate – mahāmohamayenendrajālena prakāśaśīlaṁ sattvamāvṛtya tadevākārye niyuṅkta iti। tadasya prakāśāvaraṇaṁ karma saṁsāranibandhanaṁ prāṇāyāmābhyāsāddurbalaṁ bhavati pratikṣaṇaṁ ca kṣīyate। tathā coktam – “tapo na paraṁ prāṇāyāmāttato viśuddhirmalānāṁ dīptiśca jñānasya” iti ॥ 52 ॥

vivaraṇam
[tataḥ kṣīyate prakāśāvaraṇam ।] prakāśa āvriyate yena tat prakāśāvaraṇaṁ karma ।
[tat prāṇāyāmābhyāsādasya prakāśāvaraṇaṁ karma saṁsāranibandhanaṁ durbalaṁ bhavati ।] na kevalaṁ durbalabhāva eva,
[‘na paraṁ prāṇāyāmāttapaḥ’] iti । tasmāt
kiṁ ca –
dhāraṇāsu ca yogyatā manasaḥ ॥ 53 ॥
prāṇāyāmābhyāsādeva। pracchardanavidhāraṇābhyāṁ vā prāṇasya iti vacanāt ॥ 53 ॥

vivaraṇam
[dhāraṇāsu] vakṣyamāṇāsu
atha kaḥ pratyāhāraḥ –
svaviṣayāsaṁprayoge citasvarūpānukāra ivendriyāṇāṁ pratyāhāraḥ ॥ 54 ॥

svaviṣayasaṁprayogābhāve cittasvarūpānukāra iveti, cittanirodhe cittavanniruddhānīndriyāṇi netarendriyajayavadupāyāntaramapekṣante। yathā madhukararājaṁ makṣikā utpatantamanūtpatanti niviśamānamanu niviśante tathendriyāṇi cittanirodhe nītyeṣa pratyāhāraḥ ॥ 54 ॥

vivaraṇam
[atha kaḥ pratyāhāraḥ ?] pratyāhāraviśeṣamabhidhitsamānaḥ praśnenopakramate । svaviṣayādindriyāṇāṁ pratyāharaṇamātraṁ pareṣāṁ pratyāhāraḥ । atra punarviśeṣavānucyate
[svaiḥ svaiśśabdādibhirviṣayaiḥ] indriyāṇāṁ śrotrādīnāṁ
[cittanirodhe cittavanniruddhāni nopāyāntaramapekṣante] jayārtham । cittanirodhādeva tāni nirudhyante ।
tataḥ paramā vaśyatendriyāṇām ॥ 55 ॥

śabdādiṣvavyasanamindriyajaya iti kecit। saktirvyasanaṁ vyasyatyenaṁ śreyasa iti। aviruddhā pratipattirnyāyyā। śabdādisaṁprayogaḥ svecchayetyanye। rāgadveṣābhāve sukhaduḥkhaśūnyaṁ śabdādijñānamindriyajaya iti kecit। cittaikāgryādapratipattireveti jaigīṣavyaḥ। tataśca paramā tviyaṁ vaśyatā yaccittanirodhe niruddhānīndriyāṇi netarendriyajayavatprayatnakṛtamupāyāntaramapekṣante yogina iti ॥ 55 ॥

vivaraṇam
[tataḥ] pratyāhārasthairyāt
[aviruddhā pratipattirvā ।] viruddhānāṁ vā śabdādīnāmapratipattirvaśyateti । tasyaiva vyākhyānaṁ –
[rāgadveṣābhāve sukhaduḥkhaśūnyaṁ] heyopādeyatvavarjitaṁ
[aikāgryāt] cittaikāgratvānuvidhānādindriyāṇāṁ
[paramā tviyaṁ] sarvāsāmuktānāmiyaṁ paramā
iti śrīpātañjale sāṁkhyapravacane yogaśāstre śrīmadvyāsabhāṣye dvitīyaḥ sādhanapādaḥ ॥ 2 ॥
vibhūtipādaḥ
uktāni pañca bahiraṅgāni sādhanāni। dhāraṇāvaktavyā –
deśabandhaścittasya dhāraṇā ॥ 1 ॥
nābhicakre hṛdayapuṇḍarīke mūrdhni jyotiṣi nāsikāgre jihvāgra ityevamādiṣu deśeṣu bāhye vā viṣaye cittasya vṛttimātreṇa bandha iti dhāraṇā ॥ 1 ॥

vivaraṇam
[uktāni pañca bahiraṅgāni sādhanāni] samprajñātasya yogasya । adhunā antaraṅgaṁ dhāraṇādhyānasamādhisamākhyaṁ sādhanatrayaṁ tasyaivābhidhīyate । bahiraṅgāntaraṅgatvabhedādeva hi bahiraṅgasādhanavyākhyānenaiva pādaḥ parisamāpitaḥ । saṁhatyakāritvācca sādhanatrayasya pṛthagvacanam । bahiraṅgasādhanābhidhānānantaraparyupasthāpitāntaraṅgasādhanapratipādanena pādasambandho vyākhyātaḥ । asmiṁśca pāde vibhūtayaḥ prādhānyena pradarśyanta iti ca pṛthak(ktvādā)pādārambhaḥ । etadeva hi samākhyālābhe kāraṇamavādiṣma ॥
[dhāraṇā vaktavyā ।] pratyāhārānantaraṁ kramopanītasānnidhānā dhāraṇā abhidhānīyā ।
[nābhicakre] nābhipradeśaścakramiva । sarve (vāyava)avayavāstatra cakrībhūtā iti nābhicakram ।
[cittasya] ityevamadiṣvapracalitarūpeṇa yā
tatra pratyayaikatānatā dhyānam ॥ 2 ॥
tasmindeśe dhyeyālambanasya pratyayasyaikatānatā sadṛśaḥ pravāhaḥ prattyayāntareṇāparāmṛṣṭo dhyānam ॥ 2 ॥

vivaraṇam
[tatra pratyayaikatānatā dhyānam । tasmin deśe] dhāraṇāvṛttiviṣaye nābhicakrādau ।
dhāraṇā tu tasminneva dhyeye tadavasthasyaiva cittasya tadviṣayavikalpitaiḥ pratyayāntaraiḥ parāmṛṣṭā'pi । yathā sūrye dhāryamāṇasya tadgataparimaṇḍalatīvrataradīdhititvādipratyayeṣvapi dhāraṇaiva । vṛttimātreṇa tatraiva vartamānatvāccittasya । dhyānaṁ punaḥ na tu tathā । bhinnajātīyapratyayāntarāparāmṛṣṭaikapratyayapravāha eva hi dhyānam ॥ 2 ॥
tadevārthamātranirbhāsaṁ svarūpaśūnyamiva samādhiḥ ॥ 3 ॥
dhyānameva dhyeyākāranirbhāsaṁ pratyayātmakena svarūpeṇa śūnyamiva yadā bhavati dhyeyasvabhāvāveśāttadā samādhirityucyate ॥ 3 ॥

vivaraṇam
[tadevāthaimātranirbhāsaṁ svarūpaśūnyamiva samādhiḥ । tadeva dhyānaṁ] tulyapratyaya pravāharūpaṁ svāmekapratyayasantānatāmiva hitvā
nanu ca yogaḥ samādhirityaṅgī pūrvamuktaḥ । ihāṅgo yogasya samādhirityākhyāyate । kaḥ punaratrāṅgāṅginorbheda iti ? ucyate – yogaḥ samādhiriti cittasthitiviśeṣo vivakṣitaḥ । iha tu pratyayasantānasyaiva dhyeyasvabhāvāveśāt dhyeyākāratvamaṅgamiti viśeṣaḥ ॥ 3 ॥
trayamekatra saṁyamaḥ ॥ 4 ॥
tadetaddhāraṇādhyānasamādhitrayamekatra saṁyama। ekaviṣayāṇi trīṇi sādhanāni saṁyama ityucyate। tadasya trayasya tāntrikī paribhāṣā saṁyama iti ॥ 4 ॥

vivaraṇam
[tadetaddhāraṇādhyānasamādhitrayaṁ] yadvyākhyātaṁ tat
[pariṇāmatrayasaṁyamādatītānāgatajñānam ‘, ‘sthūlasvarūpasūkṣmānvayārthavattvasaṁyamādbhūtajayaḥ’ iti ca ॥ 4 ॥]
tajjayātprajñālokaḥ ॥ 5 ॥
tasya saṁyamasya jayātsasamādhiprajñāyā bhavatyāloko yathā yathā saṁyamaḥ sthirapado bhavati tathā tathā samādhiprajñā viśāradī bhavati ॥ 5 ॥

vivaraṇam
[tajjayāt prajñā''lokaḥ । tasya saṁyamasya jayāt] sthiratvāpādanāt abhīpsitārthābhivyañjanasamarthaḥ pradīpālokadeśīyaḥ
[yathā yathā saṁyamaḥ sthirapado bhavati, tathā tathā samādhiprajñā sthirapadī bhavati ।] yena samādhiprajñā''lekena vyavahitaviprakṛṣṭādivastunirbhāsanasamarthena yoginaḥ karatalakalitamivābhimatamarthamavalokayanti ॥ 5 ॥
tasya bhūmiṣu viniyogaḥ ॥ 6 ॥

tasya saṁyamasya jitabhūmeryā'nantarā bhūmistatra viniyogaḥ। na hyajitādharabhūmiranantarabhūmiṁ vilaṅghyaprāntabhūmiṣu saṁyamaṁ labhate। tadabhāvācca kutastasya prajñālokaḥ। īśvaraprasādājjitottarabhūmikasya ca nādharabhūmiṣu paracittajñānādiṣu saṁyamo yuktaḥ। kasmāt, tadarthasyānyata evāvagatatvāt। bhūmerasyā iyamanantarā bhūmirityatra yoga evopādhyāyaḥ। katham। evaṁ hyuktam – yogena yogo jñātavyo yogo yogātpravartate। yo'pramattastu yogena sa yoge ramate ciram ॥ iti ॥ 6 ॥

vivaraṇam
[tasya bhūmiṣu viniyogaḥ । tasya saṁyamasya bhūmiṣu] bāhyādhyātmikeṣu dhyānālambanabhūtāsu vakṣyamāṇāsu pariṇāmatrayādiṣu
[tasya saṁyamasya, jitabhūmeḥ] jitāyā bhūmeḥ, yatra bhūmai yoginaḥ saṁyatāyāṁ saṁyamo labdhaḥ, tasyā jitāyā bhūmeḥ
tadyathā – pṛthivyādīnāṁ sthūlasvarūpasūkṣamānvayārthavattvabhūmiṣu krameṇa jetavyāsu , sthūlāyāṁ bhūmau saṁyamaṁ kṛtvā, tajayānantaraṁ svarūpa evānantare saṁyamo viniyojanīyaḥ ’ । nānantaraṁ svarūpaṁ vyatilaṅghaya sūkṣmādibhūmiṣu saṁvidadhīta ॥
[na hyajitādharabhūmiranantarāṁ bhūmiṁ vilaṅghaya prāntabhūmiṣu] uparitanīṣu bhūmiṣu
[tadalābhācca] saṁyamābhāvācca
[jitottarabhūmikasya] jitottarātmādibhūmikasya yoginaḥ
[arthasya] paracittajñānādeḥ ।
asmin pakṣe ‘adharabhūmiṣu saṁyamo'narthaka' iti vaditavyamabhaviṣyat, na *na yuktaḥ' iti । ‘na yukta' ityetadasamīcīnamiva dṛśyate ॥
[bhūmerasyā iyamanantarā bhūmiḥ] iyamanantaraṁ jayanīyeti kathamavabhotsyata ityāha –
[katham ? evaṁ hyuktam – yogena yogo jñātavyaḥ ।] pūrvasaṁyamalābhena yogena anantaro yogaviṣayaḥ prajñānīyaḥ । sa ca
[tathā yogo yogāt pravartate ॥] 
[apramattastu] yogī
trayamantaraṅgaṁ pūrvebhyaḥ ॥ 7 ॥
tadetaddhāraṇādhyānasamādhitrayamantaraṅgaṁ saṁprajñātasya samādheḥ pūrvebhyo yamādibhyaḥ pañcabhyaḥ sādhanebhya iti ॥ 7 ॥

vivaraṇam
[trayamantaraṅgaṁ pūrvebhyaḥ । dhāraṇādhyānasamādhitrayam antaraṅgaṁ pūrvebhyaḥ pañcabhyaḥ sādhanebhyaḥ yamādibhyaḥ samprajñātasya] yogasya । tatrāntaraṅgagrahaṇaṁ pūrvasādhanāsampattāvapyatra traye ādaraḥ karaṇīya ityevamartham ॥
vināpi hi yamādisādhanapañcatayasampādanena janmāntaravihitasaṁskārāveśavaśādeva videhaprakṛtilayānāmiva dhāraṇāditrayasampatyā yoga upakalpyate । dhāraṇāditrayeṇa vinā na yogaḥ saṁbhavati kasyacit । tabdyāpāranairantarya saṁvādātmakatvāṅddhāraṇāditrayasya । yogasya cittasampattirūpatvāt ॥
[‘sthānāsanavidhānāni ‘] iti pūrvatra ślokadvayam ॥ 7 ॥
tadapi bahiraṅgaṁ nirbījasya ॥ 8 ॥
tadapyantaraṅgaṁ sādhanatrayaṁ nirbījasya yogasya bahiraṅgaṁ bhavati। kasmāt, tadabhāve bhāvāditi ॥ 8 ॥

vivaraṇam
[tadapi bahiraṅgaṁ nirbījasya । tadapi etat antaraṅgamapi] sabījasya yogasya,
[uktaḥ samāhitacittasya yogaḥ । vyutthitacitto'pi kathaṁ yogayuktaḥ syādityata idamārabhyate’] iti । tathā
atha nirodhacittakṣaṇeṣu calaṁ guṇavṛttamiti kīdṛśastadā cittapariṇāmaḥ –
vyutthānanirodhasaṁskārayorabhibhavaprādurbhāvau nirodhakṣaṇacitānvayo nirodhapariṇāmaḥ ॥ 9 ॥

vyutthānasaṁskārāścittadharmā na te pratyayātmakā iti pratyayanirodhe na niruddhā nirodhasaṁskārā api cittadharmāstayorabhibhavaprādurbhāvau vyutthānasaṁskārā hīyante nirodhasaṁskārā ādhīyante। nirodhakṣaṇaṁ cittamanveti tadekasya cittasya pratikṣaṇamidaṁ saṁskārānyathātvaṁ nirodhapariṇāmaḥ। tadā saṁskāraśeṣaṁ cittamiti nirodhasamādhau vyākhyātam ॥ 9 ॥

vivaraṇam
[atha nirodhacittakṣaṇeṣu] nirodhayuktaṁ nirudhyamānaṁ cittaṁ yeṣu' kṣaṇeṣu nirudhyate te nirodhacittakṣaṇāḥ teṣu nirodhakāle ityarthaḥ । kṣaṇeṣviti bahuvacanaṁ atītānāgatavartamānavṛttitvapradarśanārtham ॥
[calaṁ guṇavṛttaṁ] gauṇaṁ cittaṁ guṇavṛttaṁ calam
[vyuthānanirodhasaṁskārayorabhibhavaprādurbhāvau nirodhakṣaṇacittānvayo nirodhapariṇāmaḥ । vyuthānaṁ] vividhamuthānaṁ calanaṁ pratyayākāreṇa cittasya । tadupajanitaḥ
[nirodhajanmā saṁskāraḥ] apralyayātmakaḥ
[abhibhavaprādurbhāvau] bhavataḥ ॥
[vyutthānasaṁskārā hīyante] svakāryakṣamatvamupāśnuvate ।
[tat] etadabhihitaṁ bhavati –
[(tadā)] nirodhyamānaṁ bāhyebhyaḥ pratyayebhyaḥ
kimetena, āha – nirodhāvasānatvāt pratyayābhāvāvasānatayā pariṇāmasya nirodhapariṇāma iti ॥
samprajñātāvasthāyāṁ santo'pi pratyayā na vivakṣitāḥ । kiṁ tu pratikṣaṇasaṁskārānyathātvameva vivakṣyate । 'yathā niruddhabhūmini cetasi vidyamāno'pi samādhiḥ na vivakṣyate । nirodhamātrasya vivakṣitatvāt । tathā sabījāvasthāyāmapi saṁskārānyathātvamāttrameva vivakṣitam । na pratyayāḥ samādhirekāgratā ceti ॥ 9 ॥
tasya praśāntavāhitā saṁskārāt ॥ 10 ॥
nirodhasaṁskārābhyāsapāṭavāpekṣā praśāntavāhitā cittasya bhavati। tatsaṁskāramāndye vyutthānadharmiṇā saṁskāreṇa nirodhadharmasaṁskāro'bhibhūyata iti ॥ 10 ॥

vivaraṇam
[tasya] cittasya nirodhapariṇāmamanugacchataḥ
[taṁ saṁskāraṁ] nirodhasaṁskāraṁ
sarvārthataikāgratayoḥ kṣayodayau cittasya samādhipariṇāmaḥ ॥ 11 ॥

sarvārthatā cittadharmaḥ। ekāgratā'pi cittadharmaḥ। sarvārthatāyāḥ kṣayastirobhāva ityarthaḥ। ekāgratāyā udaya āvirbhāva ityarthaḥ। tayordhamitvenānugataṁ cittaṁ, tadidaṁ cittamapāyopajanayoḥ svātmabhūtayordharmayoranugataṁ samādhīyate sa cittasya samādhipariṇāmaḥ ॥ 11 ॥

vivaraṇam
[sarvārthataikāgratayoḥ kṣayodayau cittasya samādhipariṇāmaḥ । sarvārthatā] bhogāpavargārthayogyatāvicitratā
[dharmitvenānugataṁ] cittam । pūrvasūtrādanvayagrahaṇamihāpi sannidhīyate । sarvārthatāyāḥ kṣayamekāgratāyāścodayaṁ niyamenānvīyamānaṁ citaṁ samādhiprādhānyena pariṇamate । yo'sau cittena sarvārthataikāgratākṣayodayayoranugamaḥ sa samādhipariṇāmaḥ । samādheśca prādhānyamekāgratābhūmau vyākhyātam
[tadidaṁ cittam, apāyopajanau svātmabhūtau] avyatiriktau
tataḥ punaḥ śāntoditau tulyapratyayau cittasyaikāgratāpariṇāmaḥ ॥ 12 ॥
samāhitacittasya pūrvapratyayaḥ śānta uttarastatsadṛśa uditaḥ, samādhicittamubhayoranugataṁ punastathaivā''samādhibhreṣāditi। sa khalvayaṁ dharmiṇaścittasyaikāgratāpariṇāmaḥ ॥ 12 ॥

vivaraṇam
[tatra punaḥ] samādhikāle
[punastathaiva] yathā pratyaya ādyaḥ śānta uttarastatsadṛśa upajātaḥ, sa ca śāntaḥ punaranya uditaḥ, sa śāntaḥ punaścānya uditaḥ, ityevaṁ
[sa khalvayaṁ dharmiṇaḥ cittasya] pratikṣaṇaṁ sadṛśaśāntoditapratyayayoranugamaḥ
tatra yāvat bāhyavṛttinirodhādārabhya cittasya saṁskārapaśeṣatā, tāvat nirodhapariṇāmaḥ ॥
tathā bāhyapratyayanirodhāt prabhṛti ā prāk aśeṣapratyayanirodhāt, aśeṣapratyayanirodhottarakālaṁ ca ekāgratodayābhāvāt, tāvat samādhipariṇāmaḥ ॥
tathā samādhipariṇāmakāla eva śāntoditayostulyayoḥ saṁbhavādekāgratāpariṇāmaḥ । pūrvapariṇā(māna)manāntarīyakatvamuttarottarapariṇāmasyeti krameṇa trayo'pi pariṇāmā vyākhyātāḥ ॥
kimanena pariṇāmānvākhyānena prayojanam ? ucyate – calaṁ guṇavṛttaṁ, gauṇaṁ ca samastaṁ pariṇāmadharmakamanavasthitamiti vairāgyabhāvanārtham । tathā pariṇāmatrayasaṁyamādatītānāgatajñānārthaṁ ca etadanvākhyānam ॥ 12 ॥
etena bhūtendriyeṣu dharmalakṣaṇāvasthāpariṇāmā vyākhyātāḥ ॥ 13 ॥

etena pūrvoktena cittapariṇāmena dharmalakṣaṇāvasthārūpeṇa bhūtendriyeṣu dharmapariṇāmo lakṣaṇapariṇāmo'vasthāpariṇāmaścokto veditavyaḥ। tatra vyutthānanirodhayordharmayorabhibhavaprādurbhāvau dharmiṇi dharmapariṇāmaḥ। lakṣaṇapariṇāmaśca। nirodhastrilakṣaṇastribhiradhvabhiryuktaḥ। sa khalvanāgatalakṣaṇamadhvānaṁ prathamaṁ hitvā dharmatvamanatikrānto vartamānalakṣaṇaṁ pratipannaḥ। yatrāsya svarūpeṇābhivyaktiḥ। eṣo'sya dvitīyo'dhvā। na cātītānāgatābhyāṁ lakṣaṇābhyāṁ viyuktaḥ।

vivaraṇam
[etena bhūtendriyeṣu dharmalakṣaṇāvasthāpariṇāmā vyākhyātāḥ । etena pūrvoktena cittapariṇāmena ।] kiṁviśiṣṭena ?
cittasyānavasthitatvena gamyamānena pariṇāmena bhūtendriyāṇāṁ pariṇāmasya prakāratrayayoginaḥ cittapariṇativat asuvijñānatvāt atideśaḥ kriyate ॥
[tatra vyutthānanirodhayoḥ] dharmayoḥ
etasmāddhi dharmabhedavacanāt dharmabhedamavādiṣma । tayośca dharmapariṇāmayayoḥ vyutthānanirodhayorabhibhavaprādurbhavavacanāt lakṣṇāvasthāpariṇāmāvapi ca avādiṣmaiva ॥
[lakṣaṇapariṇāmo nirodhastrilakṣaṇa] iti ॥
citte lakṣaṇapariṇāmaḥ trilakṣaṇatvena tribhiradhvabhiḥ atītānāgatavartamānaiḥ yuktaḥ pratipādyate pariṇāmino hyekaikasya trayo'pyadhvāna ete'vaśyaṁbhāvinaḥ । yasya tvete na santi so'pariṇāmī kūṭastha ityucyate ॥
[sa khalu] nirodhaḥ
yadā tu vyutthānaṁ vartamānaṁ lakṣaṇamārokṣyati, tadā nirodho'tītalakṣaṇamadhvānaṁ tṛtīyaṁ prāpsyatīti sa tṛtīyo'dhvā bhaviṣyatyeva ।
[na cātītānāgatābhyāṁ lakṣaṇābhyāṁ viyuktaḥ ।] kutaḥ ? yena sa evānāgato vartamāno'tītaśceti ॥

tathā vyutthānaṁ trilakṣaṇaṁ tribhiradhvabhiryuktaṁ vartamānalakṣaṇaṁ hitvā dharmatvamanatikrāntamatītalakṣaṇaṁ pratipannam। eṣo'sya tṛtīyo'dhvā। na cānāgatavartamānābhyāṁ lakṣaṇābhyāṁ viyuktam। evaṁ punarvyutthānamupasaṁpadyamānamanāgatalakṣaṇaṁ hitvā dharmatvamanatikrāntaṁ vartamānalakṣaṇaṁ pratipannam। yatrāsya svarūpābhivyaktau satyāṁ vyāpāraḥ। eṣo'sya dvitīyo'dhvā। na cātītānāgatābhyāṁ lakṣaṇābhyāṁ viyuktamiti। evaṁ punarnirodha evaṁ punarvyutthānamiti। tathā'vasthāpariṇāmaḥ। tatra nirodhakṣaṇeṣu nirodhasaṁskārā balavanto bhavanti durbalā vyutthānasaṁskārā iti। eṣa dharmāṇāmavasthāpariṇāmaḥ। tatra dharmiṇo dharmaiḥ pariṇāmo dharmāṇāṁ tryadhvanāṁ lakṣaṇaiḥ pariṇāmo lakṣaṇānāmapyavasthābhiḥ pariṇāma iti। evaṁ dharmalakṣaṇāvasthāpariṇāmaiḥ śūnyaṁ na kṣaṇamapi guṇavṛttamavatiṣṭhate। calaṁ ca guṇavṛttam। guṇasvābhāvyaṁ tu pravṛttikāraṇamuktaṁ guṇānāmiti। etena bhūtendriyeṣu dharmadharmibhedāttrividhaḥ pariṇāmo veditavyaḥ।

vivaraṇam
[tathā vyutthānaṁ trilakṣaṇaṁ tribhiradhvabhiḥ] atītānāgatavartamānaiḥ
[eṣo'sya] vyutthānasya vartamānaṁ prathamamadhvānamabhisamīkṣya
[punarvyutthānaṁ] nirodhasaṁskoraṇa
[evaṁ punarnirodhaḥ evaṁ punaḥ vyutthānamiti] eṣa lakṣaṇapariṇāmaścittadharmayorvyutthānanirodhayoḥ ॥
[tathā avasthāpariṇāmaḥ] paridṛśyate ।
[dharmiṇo dharmaiḥ pariṇāmaḥ ।] yathā cittasya dharmiṇo nirodhavyutthānādidharmaiḥ ।
[calaṁ guṇavṛtam ।] etadeva tu

paramārthatastveka eva pariṇāmaḥ। dharmisvarūpamātro hi dharmo dharmivikriyaivaiṣā dharmadvārā prapañcyata iti। tatra dharmasya dharmiṇi vartamānasyaivādhvasvatītānāgatavartamāneṣu bhāvānyathātvaṁ bhavati natu dravyānyathātvam। yathā suvarṇabhājanasya bhittvā'nyathākriyamāṇasya bhāvānyathātvaṁ bhavati na suvarṇānyathātvamiti।

vivaraṇam
[paramārthatastveka eva pariṇāmaḥ ।] katham ?
[tatra dharmasya] ghaṭādeḥ
[yathā suvarṇabhājanasya bhittvā anyathā] kuṇḍalādibhāvena

apara āha – dharmānabhyadhiko dharmī pūrvatattvānatikramāt। pūrvāparāvasthābhedamanupatitaḥ kauṭasthyenaiva parivarteta yadyanvayī syāditi। ayamadoṣaḥ। kasmāt। ekāntatānabhyupagamāt। tadetattrailokyaṁ vyakterapaiti nityatvapratiṣedhāt। apetamapyasti vināśapratiṣedhāt। saṁsargāccāsya saukṣmyaṁ, saukṣmyāccānupalabdhiriti।

vivaraṇam
[apara āha] asatkāryasamārambhābhimānī –
[yadyanvayī] dharmānabhyadhiko dharmāvyatiriktaḥ
[ayamadoṣaḥ । kasmāt ? ekāntānabhyupagamāt] atyantakauṭasthyavināśayoḥ dharmiṇo'nabhyupagamāt । yadyatyantaṁ kūṭastho dharmī syāt ātmavat, tataśca asmāddharmiṇo dharmāṇāmabhedāt kauṭasthyaṁ prasajyeteti doṣaḥ syāt । na tu dharmiṇāṁ guṇānāmatyantakauṭasthyamabhyupagamyate । pariṇāminityatvaṁ hi guṇānāṁ vadiṣyati ॥
[ekānta] bhedābhedā
[tadetat trailokyaṁ vyakterapaiti,] na kūṭastham । kasmāt ?
['asau vikāro vyakterapaiti, nityatvapratiṣedhāt , apetamapyasti, vināśapratiṣadhot'] ityatra
katham ? vyaktirātmalābhaḥ, apāyaḥ pracyutiḥ, yadyātmalābhāt pracyuto vikāro'sti, nityatvapratiṣedho nopapadyata । yattu vyakterapetasyāpi vikārasyāstitvaṁ tat khalu nityatvamiti ॥
nityatvapratiṣedho nāma vikārasyātmalābhāt pracyutiḥ । yadātmalābhāt pracyavate tadanityam । yadasti na tadātmalābhāt pracyavate । astitvaṁ ca ātmalābhāt pracyutiśceti viruddhāvetau dharmau saha na sambhavataḥ । so'yaṁ hetuḥ yaṁ siddhāntamāśritya pravartate tameva vyāhantīti viruddho heturiti ॥
nāyaṁ doṣaḥ । vastūnāṁ vyaktāvyaktadharmakatvābhyupagamāt । yathā hi ghaṭādirvidyamāno'pi san agāre nopalabhyate । na ca tāvatā asau nāstīti śakyaṁ pratijñātum । ālokopāyena hi vyajyate । tathā idaṁ trailokyaṁ kāraṇe saṁsṛṣṭaṁ vidyamānameva anabhivyaktātmakaguṇasvabhāvatayā, puruṣārthanimittenāviṣkriyate ॥
tathaiva ca gatisaṁskārakṣaye sthitisaṁskārābhivyaktau kāraṇaṁ prati saṁsṛjyamānaṁ vyakterapaiti । yathā dīpālokatirodhāne vidyamāno'pi ghaṭādiḥ santamasāvaṣṭambhāt vyatterapasarati, tathā atrāpi mahadādayo yamaḥ tryadhvānaḥ saṁsargavisargadharmāṇaḥ, na tu sattvādayo dhārmiṇaḥ ॥
[tadetat trailokyaṁ vyakterapaiti] iti । na punaḥ dharbhisvarūpeṇāpāyaḥ । tathā ca dharmirūpeṇa nityatvāducyate –
tadevaṁ vyaktirūpaśca śaktirūpaścaiko dharmī, vyaktirūpeṇa ca tasyānityatvaṁ, śaktirūpeṇa ca nityatvamiti kathameṣa virodhaḥ syāt । na hi devadattaścalanādivyāpāreṇa sarvadā gṛhyamāṇaścalanādivirāme viraṁsyati । calanameva hi tirodhīyate । tasmādavyatāvasthāyāmapyasti dharmī, vyaktāvasthāyāmupalabhyamānatvāt, andhatamasāvasthitaghaṭādivat ॥
vyaktirapi svakīyadharmāntarasamīkṣayā dharmiṇī । sā ca dharmirūpeṇa nityā, dharmarūpeṇānityā abhyupeyate । evaṁ vikāreṣu dharmadharmibhedo'navasthita ityanavasthā'pi iṣyata eva ॥
[vyakterapaiti] ityanena na virudhyate,
[nityatvapratiṣedhāt] ityayaṁ nityatvena virodhamāliṅgatīti । na – anabhyupagamāt । na hi vyakternityatvamabhyupagacchema, tasyā eva nityatvaṁ pratiṣedhema । śaktivyaktidharmakatvābhyupagamāditi hi pratipāditam ॥
tadetadanirjñāya parābhiprāyaṁ virodhodāharaṇatvāpādānam andhadarpaṇīyavṛttāntamudbhāvayati । yathā kila kaścidandhaḥ svāṁ adarśaśaktiṁ anavadhārya svārthamādarśamupārjayati tadvadetadābhāti ॥
[apeto'pyasti] iti
athāpi nityatvapratiṣedho nāma ātmalābhāt pracyutiriti vika(lpasya)lpya vāvadyethāḥ – evamapi śabdabhedamātra(trāt) nārthabhedaḥ । ātmalābhāt pracyutiḥ, anityatvaṁ, ityeko'rthaḥ ॥
[nityatvapratiṣedhāt] ityayaṁ śabdaḥ (ekasyāṁ śuktikāyāṁ) nityatvopapattyabhāvādityasyārthasya [a]vācakaḥ ॥
athāpi vācaka ityāropya pratibhāṣeta – evamapi śaktivyaktidharmadharmibhe(darūpeṇa)de na nityatvamanityatvaṁ(tyarūpaṁ) cetyuktameva samādhānam ॥
[apeto'pyasti, vināśapratiṣedhāt] iti virodhodbhāvanaṁ pratyākhyātam ॥
evamavasthite vyakterapetasya pratyakṣeṇānupalabhyamānasya kathamastitvam ? yāvatā, nāsti, anupalabhyamānatvāt, nabhaḥkusumavat iti ॥
atrocyate – anupalabdhirasiddho hetuḥ । anumānāgamābhyāmupalabdheḥ । yadetat vyaktaṁ etat prāgutpatterapyasti, yata utpadyate । asaccennotpadyeta, śaśaviṣāṇavadeva ॥
kiṁ ca – asataḥ sattve sataścāsattve sarvatra na āśvasyuḥ । kiṁ ca – anupalabdheścedasattvaṁ muktātmakāraṇādīnāṁ ca prāgupalambhādūrdhvaṁ ca astitvaṁ kena labhyate ? tathā-
[“nāsato vidyate bhāvo nābhāvo vidyate sataḥ । ”] 
[saṁsargādasya saukṣmyam, ato'nupalabdhiḥ ।] na asatvāt ॥

lakṣaṇapariṇāmo dharmo'dhvasu vartamāno'tīto'tītalakṣaṇayukto'nāgatavartamānābhyāṁ lakṣaṇābhyāmaviyuktaḥ। tathā'nāgato'nāgatalakṣaṇayukto vartamānātītābhyāṁ lakṣaṇābhyāmaviyuktaḥ। tathā vartamāno vartamānalakṣaṇayukto'tītānāgatābhyāṁ lakṣaṇābhyāmaviyukta iti। yathā puruṣa ekasyāṁ striyāṁ rakto na śeṣāsu virakto bhavatīti।

vivaraṇam
[lakṣaṇapariṇāmo dharmo] yathā mṛdo ghaṭādiḥ adhvasu atītādiṣu
[tathā anāgataḥ anāgatalakṣaṇayuktaḥ, vartamānātītābhyāṁ lakṣaṇābhyāmaviyuktaḥ] atītānāgatalakṣaṇayoḥ mṛdātmakatvāt ghaṭasya vyavahitenāpyatītalakṣaṇenāviyogaḥ ॥
[yathā puruṣa ekasyāṁ striyāṁ rakto na śeṣāsu virakto bhavati ।] śeṣāsu tu bhūtabhaviṣyallakṣaṇayukto rāgaḥ । sataścāvinanāśādasataścānutpatteriti hi pratipāditam ॥

atra lakṣaṇapariṇāme sarvasya sarvalakṣaṇayogādadhvasaṁkaraḥ prāpnotīti parairdoṣaścodyata iti। tasya parihāraḥ – dharmāṇāṁ dharmatvamaprasādhyam। sati ca dharmatve lakṣaṇabhedo'pi vācyo na vartamānasamaya evāsya dharmatvam। evaṁ, hi na cittaṁ rāgadharmakaṁ syātkrodhakāle rāgasyāsamudācārāditi।

vivaraṇam
na hi krodhakāle rāgaḥ svakāla iva samudācarati । krodhakāle hi rāgaḥ atīto'nāgato vā । tathā krodho'pi rāgakāle । yadi hi vartamānasamaya evaikaṁ lakṣaṇaṁ abhaviṣyat, krodhakāle'pi rāgaḥ samudācariṣyat । nāpi vā । samudācariṣyat । nāpi krodhakāle nāsti ॥

kiṁca trayāṇāṁ lakṣaṇānāṁ yugapadekasyāṁ vyaktau nāsti saṁbhavaḥ। krameṇa tu svavyañjakāñjanasya bhāvo bhavediti। uktaṁ ca rūpātiśayā vṛttyatiśayāśca virudhyante, sāmānyāni tvatiśayaiḥ saha pravartante। tasmādasaṁkaraḥ। yathā rāgasyaiva kvacitsamudācāra iti na tadānīmanyatrābhāvaḥ kiṁtu kevalaṁ sāmānyena samanvāgata ityasti tadā tatra tasya bhāvaḥ। tathā lakṣaṇasyeti।

vivaraṇam
[kiṁ ca – trayāṇāṁ lakṣaṇānāṁ yugapadekasyāṁ] lakṣaṇasya
[uktaṁ ca – rūpātiśayāḥ vṛttyatiśayāśca virudhyante ।] vartamānarūpavṛttyatiśayairyukte ghaṭe ca piṇḍādivyaktirūpātiśayā virodhāt na saṁbhavanti । ata eva atītānāgatarūpā dharmisāmānyānugatatvenāvirodhāt
[tasmāt] adhvanām

na dharmī tryadhvā dharmāstu tryadhvānaste lakṣitā alakṣitāstatra lakṣitāstāṁ tāmavasthāṁ prāpnuvanto'nyatvena pratinirdiśyante'vasthāntarato na dravyāntarataḥ। yathaikā rekhā śatasthāne śataṁ daśasthāne daśaikā caikasthāne। yathā caikatve'pi strī mātā cocyate duhitā ca svasā ceti।

vivaraṇam
[– na dharmī tryadhvā ।] mṛdākhyo hi dharmī piṇḍakapālātītānāgatatvena nātīto'nāgato vā । sarvadharmeṣu mṛdabhijñānānu(pra)vṛtteḥ । kiṁ tarhi ?
[lakṣitāḥ] piṇḍādayaḥ tryadhvatvenābhilakṣitāḥ
[yathā ekā rekhā śatasthāne] śūnyadvayena tṛtīyasthāne śataṁ bhavati । saiva ca
[yathā vā ekatve'pi strī mātā cocyate duhitā ca,] saiva anyāpekṣayā

avasthāparaṇāme kauṭasthyaprasaṅgadoṣaḥ kaiściduktam। katham। adhvano vyāpāreṇa vyavahitatvāt। yadā dharmaḥ svavyāpāraṁ na karoti tadā'nāgato yadā karoti tadā vartamāno yadā kṛtvā nivṛttastadā'tīta ityevaṁ dharmadharmiṇorlakṣaṇānāmavasthānāṁ ca kauṭasthyaṁ prāpnotīti parairdoṣa ucyate।

vivaraṇam
[avasthāpariṇāme] tṛtīye'smin

nāsau doṣaḥ। kasmāt। guṇinityatve'pi guṇānāṁ vimardavaicitryāt। yathā saṁsthānamādimaddharmamātraṁ śabdādīnāṁ guṇānāṁ vināśyavināśināmevaṁ liṅgamādimaddharmamātraṁ sattvādīnāṁ guṇānāṁ vināśyavināśināṁ tasminvikārasaṁjñeti।

vivaraṇam
[nāsau doṣaḥ । kasmāt ? guṇinityatve'pi guṇānāṁ vimardavaicitryāt] udbhavābhibhavatvavicitratayā puruṣavadekāntakūṭasthatā neṣyate guṇānām । pariṇāmābhyupagamāt । na cānavaratapariṇatīnāmapi parasparavimardātirekeṇa dravyāntarabhāvāpattiriti na kauṭasthyam ॥
[yathā saṁsthānaṁ] śarīrādikaṁ [ādi]mat kāraṇavat

tatredamudāharaṇaṁ mṛddharmī piṇḍākārāddharmāddharmāntaramupasaṁpadyamāno dharmataḥ pariṇamate ghaṭākāra iti। ghaṭākāro'nāgataṁ lakṣaṇaṁ hitvā vartamānalakṣaṇaṁ pratipadyata iti lakṣaṇataḥ pariṇamate। ghaṭo navapurāṇatāṁ pratikṣaṇamanubhavannavasthāpariṇāmaṁ pratipadyata iti। dharbhiṇo'pi dharmāntaramavasthā dharmasyāpi lakṣaṇāntaramavasthetyeka eva dravyapariṇāmo bhedenopadarśita iti। evaṁ padārthāntareṣvapi yojyamiti। ta ete dharmalakṣaṇāvasthāpariṇāmā dharmisvarūpamanatikrāntā ityeka eva pariṇāmaḥ sarvānamūnviśeṣānabhiplavate। atha ko'yaṁ pariṇāmaḥ। avasthitasya dravyasya pūrvadharmanivṛttau dharmāntarotpattiḥ paraṇāma iti ॥ 13 ॥

vivaraṇam
[tatrodāharaṇam-mṛt dharmī] piṇḍākārā
[[ghaṭākāro'nāgataṁ lakṣaṇaṁ hitvā vartamānalakṣaṇaṁ pratipadyata iti lakṣaṇataḥ pariṇamate ॥ ]] 
[ghaṭo navapurāṇatāṁ pratikṣaṇamanubhavan avasthāpariṇāmaṁ pratipadyata iti । dharmiṇo'pi] mṛdādeḥ
[dharmasyāpi] ghaṭādeḥ
[eka eva pariṇāmo bhedenopadarśita iti । evaṁ padārthāntareṣvapi] mṛdaḥ anyeṣaavapi śarīrendriyādiṣu
tatra –
śāntoditāvyapadeśyadharmānupātī dharmī ॥ 14 ॥

yogyatāvacchinnā dharmiṇaḥ śaktireva dharmaḥ। sa ca phalaprasavabhedānumita ekasyānyo'nyaśca paridṛṣṭaḥ। tatra vartamānaḥ svavyāpāramanubhavandharmī dharmāntarebhyaḥ śāntebhyaścāvyapadeśyebhyaśca bhidyate। yadā tu sāmānyena samanvāgato bhavati tadā dharmisvarūpamātratvātko'sau kena bhidyeta। tatra ye khalu dharmiṇo dharmāḥ śāntā uditā avyapadeśyā śceti, tatra śāntā ye kṛtvā vyāpārānuparatāḥ savyāpārā uditāste cānāgatasya lakṣaṇasya samanantarā vartamānasyānantarā atītāḥ। kimarthamatītasyānantarā na bhavanti vartamānāḥ, pūrvapaścimatāyā abhāvāt। yathā'nāgatavartamānayoḥ pūrvapaścimatā naivamatītasya। tasmānnātītasyāsti samanantaraḥ। tadanāgata eva samanantaro bhavati vartamānasyeti।

vivaraṇam
[tatra śāntoditāvyapadeśyadharmānupātī dharmī ।] śāntoditān avyapadaśyāṁśca dharmānanupatituṁ śīlaṁ yasya so'nvayī bhinneṣvabhinnātmā dharmīti vyapadiśyate ।
[sa ca] avyakto'pi san dharmiṇi
[yo dṛṣṭaḥ sa vartamānaḥ svaṁ vyāpāra] mudakāharaṇādikam
[yadā tu sāmānyena] dharmirūpeṇa
[te khalu dharmiṇo dharmāḥ śāntāḥ ye kṛtvā vyāpāramuparatāḥ । savyāpārā uditāḥ । te cānāgatalakṣaṇasya samanantarāḥ ।] tathā
[tadanāgata eva samanantarībhavati vartamānasya] iti, na tasya prakṛtena sambandhaḥ । tasmā

athāvyapadeśyāḥ ke। sarvaṁ sarvātmakamiti। yatroktam – jalabhūmyoḥ pāriṇāmikaṁ rasādivaiśvarūpyaṁ sthāvareṣu dṛṣṭam। tathā sthāvarāṇāṁ jaṅgameṣu jaṅgamānāṁ sthāvareṣvityevaṁ jātyanucchedena sarvaṁ sarvātmakamiti।

vivaraṇam
[atha avyapadeśyā] : ke? tadavyapadeśyābhipradarśanārthamāha – sarvaṁ sarvātmakam iti । katham?
[ityevaṁ jātyanucchedana] sattvādyavināśena

deśakālākāranimittāpabandhānna khalu samānakālamātmanāmabhivyaktiriti। ya eteṣvabhivyaktānabhivyakteṣu dharmeṣvanupātī sāmānyaviśeṣātmā so'nvayī dharmī। yasya tu dharmamātramevedaṁ niranvayaṁ tasya bhogābhāvaḥ। kasmāt, anyena vijñānena kṛtasya karmaṇo'nyatkathaṁ bhoktṛtvenādhikriyeta। tatsmṛtyabhāvaśca nānyadṛṣṭasya smaraṇamanyasyāstīti। vastupratyabhijñānācca sthito'nvayī dharmī yo dharmānyathātvamabhyupagataḥ pratyabhijñāyate। tasmānnedaṁ dharmamātraṁ niranvayamiti ॥ 14 ॥

vivaraṇam
[deśakālākāranimittāpabandhāt] deśādīnāmapabandhaḥ avavandhaḥ tasmāt,
[abhivyaktānabhivyakteṣu dharmeṣu anupātī sāmānyaviśeṣātmā] sattvādiśabdādirūpeṇa
[kasmāt? anyena vijñānena kṛtasya karmaṇo'nyat vijñānamakartṛ] bhaviṣyat
[smṛtyabhāvaśca ।] kṛtakaraṇīyādiviṣayasmṛtyabhāvaśca ।
kramānyatvaṁ pariṇāmānyatve hetuḥ ॥ 15 ॥

ekasya dharmiṇa eka eva pariṇāma iti prasakte kramānyatvaṁ pariṇāmānyatve heturbhavatīti। tadyathā cūrṇamṛtpiṇḍamṛdghaṭamṛtkapālamṛtkaṇamṛditi ca kramaḥ। yo yasya dharmasya samanantaro dharmaḥ sa tasya kramaḥ। piṇḍaḥ pracyavate ghaṭa upajāyata iti dharmapariṇāmakramaḥ। lakṣaṇapariṇāmakramo ghaṭasyānāgatabhāvādvartamānabhāvaḥ kramaḥ। tathā piṇḍasya vartamānabhāvādatītabhāvaḥ kramaḥ। nātītasyāsti kramaḥ। kasmāt। pūrvaparatāyāṁ satyāṁ samanantaratvaṁ, sā tu nāstyatītasya। tasmāddvayoreva lakṣaṇayoḥ kramaḥ। tathā'vasthāpariṇāmakramo'pi ghaṭasyābhinavasya prānte purāṇatā dṛśyate। sā ca kṣaṇaparamparānupātinā krameṇābhivyajyamānā parāṁ vyaktimāpadyata iti। dharmalakṣaṇābhyāṁ ca viśiṣṭo'yaṁ tṛtīyaḥ pariṇāma iti।

vivaraṇam
[kramānyatvaṁ pariṇāmānyatve hetuḥ । ekasya dharmiṇaḥ cittādeḥ eka eva pariṇāma iti prasakteḥ] dharmādīnāṁ dharmyabhedāditi, pariṇāmabhedasiddhaye hetureṣa ucyate –
[anyatvehetuḥ ॥] 
[tadyathā] mṛtdharmī
[cūrṇamṛt, piṇḍamṛt, ghaṭamṛt, kapālamṛt, kaṇamṛt, iti kramaḥ,] dharmāntarasyakramaḥ । na lakṣaṇaṁ, nāpyavasthā । yathā–
dharmapariṇāmaśca dvividhaḥ, tulyapariṇāmaścātulyapariṇāmaśca । yathā piṇḍo ghaṭa upajāyata ityatulyapiṇḍasya, ghaṭādidharmairmṛdākhyo dharmī pariṇamate, saḥ atulyadharmapariṇāmaḥ । yāvacca ghaṭasya janmanaḥ prabhṛti ākapālāpatteḥ tāvatghaṭarūpeṇaiva pariṇamate mṛditi sa tulyadharmapariṇāmaḥ ।
[dharmapariṇāmakrama] uktaḥ ॥
[lakṣaṇapariṇāmakrama: ghaṭasyānāgatātlakṣaṇātvavartamānabhāvaḥ । tathā piṇḍasya] virodhidharmodaye
[kasmāt? pūrvāparatāyāṁ hi satyāṁ samanantaratvam । sā cātītasya nāsti । tasmāt dvayoreva] anāgatavartamānayoḥ
[tathā avasthāpariṇāmakramaḥ ghaṭasyābhinavasya prānte] avasānāvasthāyāṁ
[“kṣaṇapratiyāgī pariṇāmāparāntaniryāhyaḥ kramaḥ”] iti । tasmāt dharmalakṣaṇakramābhyāmavasthākramasyānyatvāt

ta ete kramā dharmadharmibhede sati pratilabdhasvarūpāḥ। dharmo'pi dharmī bhavatyanyadharmasvarūpāpekṣayeti। yadā tu paramārthato dharmiṇyabhedopacārastaddvāreṇa sa evābhidhīyate dharmastadā'yamekatvenaiva kramaḥ pratyavabhāsate।

vivaraṇam
[ta ete kramādharmadharmibhede sati pratilabdhasvarūpāḥ ।] vivakṣitetudharmadharmiṇorabhede tatra kramabhedo na labhyate ।

cittasya dvaye dharmāḥ paridṛṣṭāścāparidṛṣṭāśca। tatra pratyayātmakāḥ paridṛṣṭā vastumātrātmakā aparidṛṣṭāḥ। te ca saptaiva bhavantyanumānena prāpitavastumātrasadbhāvāḥ । nirodhadharmasaṁskārāḥ pariṇāmo'tha jīvanam । ceṣṭā śaktiśca cittasya dharmā darśanavarjitāḥ ॥ iti ॥ 15 ॥

vivaraṇam
[cittasya dvaye] dvividhāḥ
[nirodhadharmasaṁskārāḥ । nirodhaḥ] uktaḥ ।
ato yogina upāttasarvasādhanasya bubhutsitārthapratipattaye saṁyamasya viṣaya upakṣipyate –
pariṇāmatrayasaṁyamādatītānāgatajñānam ॥ 16 ॥
dharmalakṣaṇāvasthāpariṇāmeṣu saṁyamādyogināṁ bhavatyatītānāgatajñānam। dhāraṇādhyānasamādhitrayamekatra saṁyama uktaḥ। tena pariṇāmatrayaṁ sākṣātkriyamāṇamatītānāgatajñānaṁ teṣu saṁpādayati ॥ 16 ॥

vivaraṇam
[ete] trayaḥ pariṇāmādharmalakṣaṇāvasthārūpāḥ
[pariṇāmatrayasaṁyamādatītānāgatajñānam ।] pariṇāmatraye tāvatsaṁyamaḥ karaṇīyaḥ, yāvatsamādhiprajñā''lokaḥ । sa cayadviṣaya upasthitaḥ, taṁ viṣayaṁ yathābhūtapratyakṣatāmāpādayati । sūkṣmaṁ vyavahitamatītamanāgataṁ viprakṛṣṭaṁ vā yamuddiśya prāpaṇābhiprāyeṇa sūkṣmādiṣu saṁyamaḥ kriyate, tadā so'rthovaśyatāṁ yogina upayāti ।
śabdārtha​pratyayānāmitaretarādhyāsātsaṁkara​statpravibhāgasaṁyamātsarva​bhūtarutajñānam ॥ 17 ॥
tatra vāgvarṇeṣvevārthavatī। śrotraṁ ca dhavanipariṇāmamātraviṣayam। padaṁ punarnādānusaṁhārabuddhinirgrāhyamiti।

vivaraṇam
[śabdārthapratyayānāmitaretarādhyāsāt saṁkaraḥ tatpravibhāgasaṁyamāt sarvabhūtarutajñānaṁ] sampadyate । tatra kaḥ śabdaḥ, ko vā arthaḥ, pratyayo vā, saṁkaraśca kinnimittaḥ, kathaṁ ca teṣāṁ pravibhāgaḥ? iti ॥
[tatra] kiṁ vāguccāryaḥ śrotragrāhyaḥ (sa) śabdaḥ, utārthāntaraṁ, kiṁ vāgeva, tadvadatirito vā, iti tāvadvicāryate– vāktāvannaśabdaḥ । kasmāt? vāk
[śrotraṁ ca] na svayaṁ śabdaḥ, nāpi śabdaviṣayam । kasmāt?
[padam । tatpunarnādānusaṁhārabuddhinirgrāhyaṁ] nādānāṁ dhvanīnāṁ śrotraviṣayabhūtānāṁ pratyekaṁ pratyayinisaṁskāramādhāya nivartamānānām antyena dhvanināyāsamupasthāpitābuddhiḥ sā nādānusaṁhārabuddhiḥ prathamadhvanikramānusaṁhārāsāditasaṁskārasya pratyayinaścittasya jāyate, tayaikayā buddhyā ayaṁ nirgṛhyate । tatpadam । tacca pratyakṣatvādrūpādivannānyapramāṇāpekṣam ॥
[“gakāraukāravisarjanīyāḥ”] itibhagavānupavarṣaḥ । tanna – avācakatvāt । katham? samudāyāsambhavāt । samudāyāsambhavaśca
yathaiva varṇānāṁ yugapatsamayānavasthānam, evaṁ saṁskārāṇāṁ smṛtīnāṁ ca tajjanitānāmayugapatkālatvādavācakatvam । smṛtyupayogārthatvācca saṁskārasyānubhūtaviṣaya evopayogāt, pratyākhyasya cāpūrvatvāt ॥
['śabdādarthapratipatiḥ' 'pūrvīparībhūtaṁ bhāvamākhyātenācaṣṭe’ ‘dharmasya śabdamūlatvādaśabdamanapekṣyaṁ syāt’] iti prasiddhirapahūyeta ॥
athāpivarṇabhāvabhāvitvena smṛtisaṁskārayorapiśabdatvamupacaryeta । naitadapi—tadbhāvabhāvitvaṁ nāmatasminneva sati bhavatyasatyabhāva eva yatra, tatra syāt । (na ca) tacca varṇānāṁ śabdatve siddhe bhavet । lokastu śarīrādāvātmābhimānādavivekādatasminnapi tadbuddhiṁ karotīti na sarvatra vastunirṇaye heturbhavati ॥
api ca, vākśrotravyāpāra eva satyarthapratipattiriti tasyāvyabhicārāttadbhāvabhāvitveśabdatvaṁ prāpnoti । tasmādantyovarṇo na vācakaḥ, varṇatvāt ādyavarṇavat । tathā, tatsmṛtisaṁskārānavācakāḥ, smṛtisaṁskāratvāt, ādyavarṇasmṛtisaṁskāravat ॥
yadi cāntyo varṇaḥ pūrvavarṇajanitasaṁskārasahitaḥ vācaka ityucyate-- naitadevam । kasmāt? antyavarṇoccāraṇamātrādevārthapratyayaprasaṅgāt । katham? atītadivasoccaritagakārādivarṇāhitasaṁskāro hi samastaḥ śrotā । tatrāntyavārṇoccāraṇamātrādartha: pratīyeta । athāpi niyamārthamādyāvarṇoccāraṇamiti cet – na – pūrvavarṇānāṁ paścimavarṇenātulyakālatvātsāhāyakābhāve niyamānupapatiḥ ॥
tavāpivarṇānāṁpadavyañjakatveniyamārthaṁpūrvavarṇāucārayitavyāitidoṣaeveti, padavyañjakatvakalpanāto varṇānāmeva vācakatvaṁ yuktamiticet, na – varṇanāṁ buddhau svakīyasaṁskārādhānamātrābhyupagamāt । uccaritapradhvaṁsamānavarṇasaṁskāraparaṁ paropacitāyāṁ hi buddhau padaṁ nirbhāsate । etadeva hi varṇānāṁ padavyañjakatvam । na padaṁ prati dīpavatsākṣātpravartate ॥
na buddhau dhārmidvāreṇa saṁskārāṇāmekāśrayāvasthānādanyonyopakāryopakārakabhāvaḥ samīcīnataraḥ । iṣṭāniṣṭaviṣayopalabdhismṛtīcchādveṣādivat । na kadācidanyena varṇena pūrvavarṇānāṁ tadīyasmṛtisaṁskārāṇāṁ vā sambandha upakalpate ॥
atha mamāpiniyatakramavarṇasampādi saṅskāraparamparopacitabuddhyutpādakatyenaiva varṇānāṁ vācakatvamiti cet – na – abhyupetaparivarjanāt । yadi tāvadvarṇānekasaṁskāraviśiṣṭābuddhiḥ arthaviṣayavāpadaviṣayā vā? yadyarthaviṣayā, saiva śabdaḥ prāpnoti । arthapratyāyakatvāt । atha padaviṣayā, tathā'pi padādarthapratipattiriti bādhyeta ॥
tasmādekabuddhiviṣayo varṇavyatiriktaḥ śabdo'bhyupagantavyaḥ । tena pūrvavarṇajanitasaṁskārasahito'ntyo varṇaḥ, tatsmṛtiḥ, saṁskāro vā, na vācakaḥ । saṁskārasāhāyakāpekṣatvāt, buddhivat ॥
varṇā ekasamayāsaṁbhavitvātparasparaniranugrahātmānaste padamasaṁspṛśyānupasthāpyā''virbhūtā-stirobhūtāśceti pratyekamapadasvarūpā ucyante।

vivaraṇam
[varṇāḥ ekasamayāsambhavitvāt ।] ekakālāsambhavitvaṁ ca vācaḥ kramavartitvāt । ataḥ

varṇaḥ punarekaikaḥ padātmā sarvābhidhānaśaktipracitaḥsahakārivarṇāntara-pratiyogitvādvaiśvarūpyamivā''pannaḥ pūrvaścottareṇottaraśca pūrveṇa viśeṣe'vasthāpita ityevaṁ bahavo varṇāḥ kramānurodhino'rthasaṁketenāvacchinnā iyanta ete sarvābhidhānaśaktiparivṛtā gakāraukāravisarjanīyāḥ sāsnādimantamarthaṁ dyotayantīti।

vivaraṇam
[varṇaḥ punarekaikaḥ sarvābhidhānaśaktipracitaḥ ।] abhidhīyateyaiḥ tānyabhidhānānipadāni, teṣāṁ sarveṣāmabhidhānānāṁ padānāmabhivyañjikābhiḥ śakti.ābhiḥ pracitaḥ, arāṇāmekaika iva nābhau । tadyathā—gakāraḥ govargāgnigaganādisarvapadābhidyotanasāmarthyapracitaḥ ॥
[sahakārivarṇāntarapratiyogitvāt ।] yathā gauriti gakaraikāravisarjanīyasahakārisavyapekṣaḥ agniritīkārapratiyogī । tasmāda
[evaṁ bahavo varṇāḥ kramānurodhinaḥ] viśiṣṭakramam, ānupūrvīm anurudhyamānāḥ ॥
[arthasaṅketena] amī asminnarthe etatkramāvalambinaḥ iyanta iti saṅketaḥ samayaḥ, tena athaisaṅketena
[iyanta ete varṇāḥ sarvābhidhānaśaktiparicyutāḥ] viśiṣṭasāsnādimadarthapratipādakāsādhāraṇapadāvabhāsanavyāpāraparatvādeva aparapadāntarapratipādakaśaktyantarebhyaḥ paricyutā: nivṛttā: itaretaraviśeṣaviniyogaparavaśāveśādudāsīnapadāntaraprakāśanaśaktayaḥ

tadeteṣāmarthasaṁketenāvacchinnānāmupasaṁhṛtadhvanikramāṇāṁ ya eko buddhinirbhāsastatpadaṁ vācakaṁ vācyasya saṁketyate। tadekaṁ padamekabuddhiviṣaya ekaprayatnākṣiptamabhāgamakramamavarṇaṁ bauddhamantyavarṇapratyayavyāpāropasthāpitaṁ paratra pratipipādayiṣayā varṇairevābhidhīyamānaiḥ śrūyamāṇaiśca śrotṛbhiranādivāgvyavahāravāsanānuviddhayā lokabuddhyā siddhavatsaṁpratipattyā pratīyate।

vivaraṇam
[tadeṣāmarthasaṅketenāvacchinnānām] abhihitena nyāyamārgeṇa
[tat padamekam] ekamapi, yadvastu sāvayavaṁ ghaṭādi tadanekabuddhiviṣayaṁ dṛṣṭaṁ, na tu padaṁ tathā । tat
[ekaprayatnākṣiptaṁ] varṇakramajanmapratyupanītasaṁskāranimittabuddhiparipākābhisamakṣayā paścimabuddhau jhaṭiti parisphuritam,
[paratra] parabuddhipratipipādayiṣayā
tasmāt [padaṁ] varṇavyatiriktam, ekabuddhinirgrāhyatve sati pratyāyakatvāt, pradīpavat । arthapratipattau ca kāraṇatvāt, pradīpavat, buddhivacca । na varṇāḥ padam, ekena kartrā krameṇa prayujyamānatvāt, karaṇatvācca, vāsīvṛkṣādānādivat ॥
[kaścit] āha—
[varṇā vā dhvanayo vāpi spheṭaṁ na padavākyayoḥ ।] 
[vyañjanti vyañjakatvena yathā dīpaprabhādayaḥ ॥] 
[sattvāt ghaṭādivacceti sādhanāni yathāruci ।] 
[laukikavyatirekeṇa kalpite'rthe bhavanti hi ॥] 
[nārthasya vācakaḥ sphoṭo varṇebhyo vyatirekataḥ ।] 
[ghaṭādivanna dṛṣṭena virodho dharmyasiddhitaḥ ॥] 
[pratiṣedhettu yo varṇāstajjñānānantarodbhavāt ।] 
[dṛṣṭabādho bhavettasya śaśicandraniṣedhavat ॥] 
[varṇotthā vā'rthadhīrekṣā tajjñānānantaroddhavā ।] 
[yādṛśī sā tadutthā hi dhūmāderiva vahnidhīḥ ॥] 
[dīpavadvā gakārādergavādeḥ pratipādaka: ।] 
[dhruvaṁ pratīyamānatvāt tatpūrvapratipādanāt ॥ ”] iti ।
atrocyate—varṇā vādhvanayo vā'pispheṭaṁ na padavākyayoḥ iti, padaṁ vākyaṁ vā svatastāvanna prasiddham । tatrāsativarṇavyatirikte pade vākye vā, padavākyayoḥ sphoṭaṁ na vyañjayantīti kathaṁ cetasvināṁ vacanāvakāśaḥ syāt । evaṁ ca sati, uddiśyapadavākyayoḥ sphoṭaṁ pratiṣedhatāpadaṁ vākyaṁ cābhyupagataṁ bhavet ॥
athāpiparābhaprāyeṇocyeta, tathā'pi siddhasādhyatā । na parasya padavākyayoranyaḥ sphoṭovidyate, yaḥ pratiṣidhyeta । padavākye eva hitasya sphoṭaḥ ॥
athāpi brūyāt – arthāvacchedakāviśiṣṭakramopaniveśino varṇāḥ padaṁ vākyaṁ ca pratiṣidhyate iti । tacca na yuktam, svato virodhāt ॥
athā'pi brūyāt – varṇavyatiriktaṁ padaṁ vākyaṁ vā pratiṣidhyate iti । tathā'pi vyatiriktamuddiśya tasya vyañjanapratiṣedhādvyatiriktapadavākyābhyupagamaḥ prasaktaḥ ॥
athā'pi parakalpitapadavākyapratiṣedhaḥ, evamapi vyañjakatvādityasiddho hetuḥ । katham? svātmavyātiriktasya vā padasya vyañjakatvaṁ, avyatiriktasya vā vyañjakatvaṁ, arthasya vā vyañjakatvaṁ varṇānāmiti trayīvikalpanā । yadi vyatiriktasya vyañjakatvaṁ, tadā svato'siddhaḥsyāt ॥
athāvyātiriktasya, tathā'pi parasyāsiddhaḥ । kiṁca, vyañjakatvāccavyatiriktasyaiva vyañjakatvaṁ, nāvyātiriktasya, pradīpāderiva । anyavyañjanārthaṁ hi vyañjakaḥ pradīpādirupādīyate, na svātmavyañjanāya । svātmavyaktyartho cedupādāsyate, januṣā'ndhasyāpi vyajyeta ॥
atha vyatiriktavyañjakatve siddhe, padasya vyañjakā bhaveyuḥ, arthasya vā । tatrānekasādhyaṁ yathā śibikodvahanādi, tat anyatamena na śakyam anuṣṭhātu, evamanyatamena varṇānāmarthasya pratipādanamanekasādhyatvādaśakyamiti pratipāditam ॥
na ca kūpakhānakanyāyenāpi kaṁcitkañcidvyaṅgye saṁskāramādhāyavarṇānivartante iti śakyaṁ vaktum । abhidheyasyaikabuddhiviṣayatvāt ॥
yathā ca sugatakṛtānte pradhvaṁsamānaṁ vijñānamutpatsyamānasya vijñānasya saṁskāramādhātumaparyāptaṁ, sthitasya dharmiṇaḥ kasyacidabhāvāt । evamanyonyasaṁbandhābhāvādayugapatsamayajanmanāṁ varṇānāṁ pūrvasya pūrvasya vinaśyata uttarasyottarasya copajaniṣyamāṇasya balādhānānupapattiriti nārthasya vyañjakā varṇāḥ ॥
pariśeṣātpadasyaiva vyatiriktasyābhivyañjitāraḥ iti sthitadharmaḥ । asmākaṁ tu sthiterdharmiṇiścetasi pūrvapūrvavarṇapratyupasthitasaṁskāraparamparāparipākaviśārade paścimavarṇajanmavelāyāṁ niravayavamekabuddhinirgrāhyabuddhinirbhasātmakajhaṭitisamunmiṣatīti na saṁskārādhānāsāmarthyadoṣaprasaṅgaḥ ॥
kiṁca, yadyapi varṇāḥ svabuddhiṁ vyañjayanti । sā buddhirarthapratītiṁ prati karaṇabhūtaivābhivyajyate, na tu phalaṁ prati varṇāḥ karaṇatvena vyāpriyante । karaṇabhūtabuddhyutpādanopakṣayatvāt । buddhereva hi phalaṁ prati vyāpāraḥ । yasya hi phalaṁ prati vyāpāraḥ tatpramāṇaṁ, sa śabdaḥ । tataśca arthapratītiṁ prati kāraṇabhūtabuddhivyavahitatvānnavarṇānāṁ vācakatvam । paramparayātupadaṁpratyupāyatvaṁ na varṇānāṁ pratiṣidhyate ॥
tasmādevamayaṁ ślokaḥ paṭhitavyaḥ–
[varṇā vā dhvanayo vā'pi bhinnamevārthamātmanaḥ ॥] 
[vyañjanti vyañjakatvena yathā dīpaprabhādayaḥ ॥] 
tathā, ghaṭādīnāmapyarthontarapratyupasthānamātratvamabhyupagamyata eva । ghaṭādayo hi darśanamātreṇa pacanāharaṇadhāraṇādiyogyatābuddhim anyadvā kiṁcit upasthāpayantyeva । tathā varṇānāṁ pāramparyeṇa ātmavyatiriktapadapratyupasthāpakatvaṁ sattvātghaṭādivadiṣyata eveti tulyametadapi ॥
[satvādghaṭādivacceti sādhanāni yathāruci ।] 
[laukikavyatirekeṇa kalpite'rthe bhavanti hi ॥] 
sarvathājātirvā buddhirvā bhavatu, yato vā kutaścit uccāritapradhvastavarṇānasaṁbhavino varṇavyatiriktāt arthapratipattiḥ, sasphoṭaḥ । sa ca avaśyaṁ varṇāsaṁbhāvitvātkāryasyābhyupagamanīyaḥ । tathā ca—
[‘nārthasya vācakaḥ sphoṭo varṇebhyo vyatirekataḥ'] 
[varṇebhyo vyatirekataḥ] ityanyatarā siddhaḥ । svato vyatirekesyāsiddhatvāt ॥
kiṁca, nāmākhyātopasargānipātapadajāticatuṣṭayamabhyupagacchatā jātivyañjakaṁ varṇavyatiriktam anyadabhyupagantavyam । na varṇāḥ padajātimabhivyañjitumutsahante । varṇā hi varṇajātimabhivyañjayanti । na cāvayaveṣu bhinnakālajanmavināśeṣvavayavijātivyañjanamupapadyate । vyavasthiteṣvapi nāmatāvadavayaveṣu na pāṇipādādayaḥ śarīrādṛte śarīratvamabhivyañjayanti । kiṁ punaranavasthiteṣu ॥
kiṁca, aśvaḥ ayātamayātamakṣaḥ bhavati, tena mama vāyurvāyuḥ, ityādiṣu tulyasvarūpeṣu nāmatvākhyātatve parasparaviruddhajātīyenaika eva varṇo'bhivyanakti ॥
yadi vā aśvaḥ iti nāmajātyā abhivyañjakāḥ akāraśakāravakārākāravisarjanīyāḥ ākhyātajātyabhivyañjakebhyo bhinnā bhaveyuḥ, tadā upapadyate bhinnānāṁ bhinnajātyabhivyañjakatvam । tadekatvenopapadyate ॥
yadyapi arthaprakaraṇaśabdāntarasannidhānādibhiḥ idaṁ nāma idamākhyātam itiparikalpyeta, tathā'pi nāmākhyātajātyabhivyaktim arthaprakaraṇādibhireka eva varṇo na śaknoti kartum । na hi brāhmaṇa eva brāhmaṇatvaṁ kṣatriyatvaṁ cābhivyanakti ॥
tasmāt bhinnā akārāḥ śakārāvakārādayaśca bahava eṣitavyāḥ । evaṁ gośabdādayo'pi bhinnā eva । tathā gośabdatvamaśvaśabdavaṁ ca siddham । evaṁ matvamātvamitvamītvaṁ ca siddham । evaṁ ca sati akārādayo varṇā atvādīnyeva sāmānyānyabhivyañjayanti । nāśvādīnnāmākhyātajātibhedānita ॥
tasmāt varṇavyatiriktaṁ padatvasāmānyābhivyañjakaṁ padamabhyupagantavyam । evaṁ ca satyeṣa śloka evaṁ paṭhitavya:-
[pratiṣedhettu yaḥ sphoṭaṁ varṇadhīsamanantaram ।] 
[dṛṣṭabādho bhavettasya śaśicandraniṣedhavat ॥] 
[vaṇotthā'varṇadhīreṣā tajjñānānantarodbhavā ॥] iti ॥
karaṇabuddhivyavahitatvādanantarodbhavatvamasiddham । pāramparyoṇa cetsiddhasādhyatā । dhūmasyāpi na vahnidhiyaṁ prati kāraṇatvam । dhūmadhiyaḥ kāraṇatvāt । dhūmādīnāṁ pāramparyavatvarṇādīnāmapi pāramparyeṇopakārakatvamiṣyata ityuktam ॥
tasmādayamapi śleka evaṁ paṭhitavyaḥ---
[varṇotthā nārthadhīreṣā tajjñānānantarodbhavā ।] 
[yedṛśī sā tadutthānadhūmodariva vahnidhīḥ ॥] 
na ca dīpavatsannipatyagakāraukārausāsnādimadarthavyañjakau । arthavyaktikālānavasthānādanaye.ārdṛṣṭo vyabhicāra: visarjanīyaviṣaye'pi samunnīyate niravasthānādi । varṇānārthavyaktisamānakālāvasthāyinaḥ, pradīpastu vyaṅgyakālena tulyakālāvasthānaḥ kāraṇatvaṁ pratilabhate ॥
tasmādayamapyevaṁ ślekaḥ paṭhitavyaḥ–
[dīpavadvā gakārādirgavādīnāmavācaka: ।] 
[dhruvaṁ pratīyamānatvāttatpūrve pratipādanāt ॥] 
pramāṇaṁ cātra bhavati – arthasya na vācakāḥ, nāpyarthaṁ pratipramāṇaṁ varṇāḥ, sākṣātsaṅketāpekṣatvāt, aṅkapratimādivat । yathā śatādyaṅkāviṣṇupratimāśca saṅketāpekṣāgamamevāvadyotayanti । na viṣṇuśatādyarthaṁ prati pramāṇatvamupayānti ॥
yattu nāpekṣate saṅketaṁ, tatpramāṇam, yathā vākyaṁ, dīpādijātyantaraṁ ca । na tathā varṇā iti pratimāvadeṣā aprāmāṇyamāpātatam । tathā, varṇā arthapratipādakamātmavyatiriktamabhivyañjayanti, sākṣātsaṅketāpekṣatvāt, aṅkaviṣṇupratimādivat । sphoṭaḥ tatsaṅketena sākṣādapekṣate ityavādiṣma ॥
tasmādevam anekayuktiparivārapratyupānītabalādhānaṁ kaḥ sphoṭam apākartuṁ śaknoti ॥

tasya saṁketabuddhitaḥ pravibhāga etāvatāmevaṁ jātīyako'nusaṁhāra ekasyārthasya vācaka iti। saṁketastu padapadārthayoritaretarādhyāsarūpaḥ smṛtyātmako yo'yaṁ śabdaḥ so'yamartho yo'yamarthaḥ so'yaṁ śabda iti। evamitaretarādhyāsarūpaḥ saṁketo bhavatīti। evamete śabdārthapratyayā itaretarādhyāsātsaṁkīrṇā gauriti śabdo gaurityartho gauriti jñānam। ya eṣāṁ pravibhāgajñaḥ sa sarvavit।

vivaraṇam
[tasya padasya saṅgītabudvitaḥ pravibhāgaḥ ।] śabdārthajñānavyatibhinnarūpā hi saṅketabuddhiḥ । tasyāḥ sakāśātpadasya
[etāvatāṁ] varṇānām
[saṁketastu padapadārthayoritaretarādhyāsarūpaḥ smṛtyātmā,] na pramāṇabhūtaḥ । yathāvipṇureṣā pratimā, eṣa eva caturbhuja iti, tathā pratyaya ubhayamidam ubhayaṁ nu pratyaya ityanyonyādhyastarūpāviṣṇupratimāpratyayāḥ ॥
[yo'yaṁśabdaḥ so'yamarthaḥ, yo'yamarthaḥ saśabdaḥ, yaścapratyayaḥ so'rthaḥ śabdaśceti, evamitaretarādhyāsarūpaḥ saṁketo bhavati । evameteśabdārthapratyayā itaretarādhyāsātsaṁkīrṇāḥ ।] tadyathā
[ya eṣāṁ] śabdārthapratyayānāṁ

sarvapadeṣu cāsti vākyaśaktirvṛkṣa ityukte'stīti gamyate। na sattāṁ padārtho vyabhicaratīti। tathā na hyasādhanā kriyā'stīti। tathāca pacatītyukte sarvakārakāṇāmākṣepo niyamārtho'nuvādaḥ kartṛkaraṇakarmaṇāṁ caitrāgnitaṇḍulānāmiti। dṛṣṭaṁ ca vākyārthe padaracanaṁ śrotriyaśchando'dhīte, jīvati prāṇāndhārayati। tatra vākye padārthābhivyaktistataḥ padaṁ pravibhajya vyākaraṇīyaṁ kriyāvācakaṁ vā kārakavācakaṁ vā। anyathā bhavatyaśvo'jāpaya ityevamādiṣu nāmākhyātasārūpyādanirjñātaṁ kathaṁ kriyāyāṁ kārake vā vyākriyeteti।

vivaraṇam
[sarvapadeṣu cāsti vākyaśaktiḥ । vṛkṣa ityukte astīti gamyate । na sattāṁ padārtho vyayabhicaratīti ॥] 
kimarthametaducyate? iha sarvabhūtarutajñānopāyaḥ pratipipādayiṣitaḥ । sarvabhūtarutaṁ ca vākyārthaviṣayameva, na padārthaviṣayam । padānāṁ kevalānāṁ varṇānāmivānarthakatvāt, saṁvyavahārābhāvācca । yathaiva varṇanāṁ varṇāntarābhisamīkṣayāpadāvadyotanaprayojanavattvam, evaṁ padānāmapipadāntarāpekṣayāvākyopasthāpanopāyatvam । evaṁ sativākyasyaiva prāmāṇyaṁ, kevalapadaprayoge'rthāpratīteḥ ॥
kiṁca, kevalaṁ padamapramāṇaṁ, tāvatā nirṇayābhāvāt, ekaikavarṇavat । nāpi padaṁ vācakam, saṅketārthāpekṣatvāt, śatādyaṅkavat । nāmākhyāte kevalena vācake, kevalāprayogāt, upasargavat । yatrāpi kevalaṁ padaṁ prayuyukṣite tatrāpyavaśyam, asti tiṣṭhati devadatta ityādi padaṁ buddhau viparivartata iti na kevalāprayogasiddhiḥ ॥
[tathā na hyasāvanā kriyā asti ।] kevalakarmaprayoge kimapi sādhanaṁ dravryaṁ guṇo vāvagamyate ॥
kiṁca, prakṛtipratyayānāmanavasthitāvadhikatvātvyabhicārādavācakatvam । tadyathā-daridrātiḥkeṣāñciddravyamātra eva paṭhyate । daridraśabdastu nipātopasargasthānīyaḥ punarāgacchati, drati, nidrāti, daridrāti, iti । tatra kā prakṛtiriti vaktavyam । kiṁ (drāktridaṁ) drā, iti, kiṁvā daridreti । keṣāñcittu daridretyetāvatpaṭhyate । tathā drāśabdo'pi pṛthagāmnāyate ॥
evamasti sakāramātraṁ paṭhanti । vīticapratyayekāramāgamaṁ kurvanti । kecittu sahakāreṇa paṭhitvā (aviti) vīticapratyaye lopamakārasyakurvanti । tatra kā prakṛtiriti vaktavyam । na nirjñāyate । prakṛtyavadhaupratyayāvadhauvāprakṛtipratyayārthau śakyau vivektum ॥
kvacidupasargo'pi ‘asaṁgrāmayataśūra' ityādiṣuprakṛtyekadeśatāmāpannaḥ । tathā, ataternaḥ, aḥ, asyāpatyamiḥ, iyān, adhunā, ityādikaḥ prakṛtyarthabhāgam asatyāṁ prakṛtau brūyāt । agnicit, somasut, bhidā, chidā, atho, kati, amā, paca, paṭha, ityādiṣu pratyayārthamasatipratyayekībrūyāt ॥
evamādiṣu lakṣitāpacārāṇāṁ prakṛtipratyayanāṁ kaḥ śaknuyādarthavattvaṁ kalpayitum । atrabhavatu nānyatreti nārdhajaratīyaṁ labhyam । uddālakapuṣpabhañjikāpāraṁ na puṣpapracāyikā, ityatra kaḥ pūrvapadottarapadārthaḥ? prajñaḥ, saṁjña, ityādiṣu pratyanvayo'pi nāstīti kasya ko'rthaḥ? iti ॥
ṛṣabho, vṛṣabho, vṛṣaḥ, udakam, udakumbhaḥ, kṣīrodaḥ, yāvo, yāvakaḥ, kūpaḥ, sūpaḥ, yūpaḥ, ityādiṣu kasya ko'rtho iti vaktavyam । dadhyaśāna, madhvatra, ityādiṣu, kimavadhi kiṁ padaṁ vācakam? ॥
tasmātsarvatra dṛṣṭāpacārāṇāṁ varṇaprakṛtipratyayapadānām anarthakānāmadṛṣṭāpacāraniravayavavākyopāyatvameva । tāni niḥsandhibandhanānniravayavātmithyābhūtavarṇapadadhvaniṣkṛtacitrībhāvādvākyādapoddhṛtya vyākaraṇīyāni ॥
tāni ca vākyasyānavayavabhūtāni, upāyatvādvyākyāvayavavadavabhāsamānāni, yāvatphalam asattvātśatādyaṅkavadevamithyābhūtāni, anuccāryamāṇavākyāvadyotanārthakaraṇasannipāte viśeṣeṇopādāyaparihīyamāṇāni, svakīyakramaniṣpattivinivṛttikālādibhedavicitratayā vākyātmānaṁ kramavantamiva, niṣpadyamānamiva, nivartamānamava, drāghīyāṁsamiva, kālavantamiva,bhedavantamiva, vicitrākāratāmāpādayanti ॥
evaṁ ca sati, yaducyate śaśaviṣāṇādapoddhṛtyakharaviṣāṇasya, kiṁtaditi etadalīkaṁ, yathaiva mṛgatṛṣṇikāteyamalīkamapi satyādūṣarādapoddhiyate, yathā ca sthāṇoḥ puruṣaḥ, puruṣācca sthāṇuḥ, śuktikātaśca rajatamapoddhriyate, yathaiva ca mṛgatoyādayo yathābhūteṣu rādivastupratipattihetavaḥ, tathā varṇapadaprakṛtipratyayāyathābhūtavākyārthapratipātakāraṇetatpratipattau cāpoddhriyante ॥
kvacidarthaprāptamapoddhriyate, yathā mṛgatoyādikam । kañcittu prayojanatvena vivakṣitaṁ, yathāśatādisaṅkhyātaḥ śatādyaṅkāpoddhāraḥ kriyate, yathā ca lipyakṣarāṇi saḍretāpekṣatvātakṛtasamayarūpāṇī akārādivarṇādapoddhriyante । atha ca sarvāṇyatāniyathābhūtārthapratipādanopāyatvaṁ pratipadyante । na ca tāvatā mithyātvameṣāṁ nāsti । tathāpadādanyapi ॥
yo hi prakṛttipratyayapadavarṇānāṁ saṁketadvareṇānyopāyānāṁ mithyābhūtalipyakṣarakalpānāṁ svayamapisvasaṁketena vākyārthapratipatyupāyamanekadhānirmāyavyavaharamāṇaḥ satyatvameṣāṁ manyate, nūnamasāvabhre candrāsaṁdidṛśyamāṇaḥ candradarśanopāyabhūtamabhramapi candratvena pratipadyata iti ॥
yathā ca vākyameva satyaṁ, tathā vākyārthasyaiva satyatvaṁ, na padāni, padārthā vā kevalāḥ, satyatvamupayānti । sarvamevasāmānyāviśeṣātmakaṁ vastu । na hi sāmānyavyāvṛtto viśeṣa:, viśeṣavyāvṛttaṁ vā sāmānyamasti । gauriyukte astīti gamyate । tena kevalapadaprayoge'pyantarnītapadāntarārtho vākyārtha eva pratīyate, na kevalapadārtha: ॥
evaṁ ca sati
[padārthā gamayantyetaṁ pratyekaṁ saṁśaye sati ॥] 
[sāmasye nirṇayotpadātsthāṇurmūrdhasthakākavat ॥] 
ityasiddhamasmākam । na hi sthāṇurnāma vākyārthaḥ pṛthakpadārthavenaprasiddhaḥ । yasmātvṛkṣaḥ sansthāṇuḥ sanmūrdhā sankākaḥ sanmūrdhani sthāṇoḥ ityantarnītapratīyamānapadāntarāsthānapekṣayāṁ sthāṇumūrdhatthakākabuddhirevanasyāt । satsvapi teṣu sadbuddhisamutpateḥ satpadārthāntarabuddhiravaśyaṁbhāvinī ॥
tasmātvākyārtha eva pratyekamapi saṁśayātmaka iti kutaḥ padārthāḥ pratyekamasanto vākyārthaṁ gamayeyuḥ । tasmādevamayaṁ ślokaḥ paṭhitavyaḥ---
[vākyaṁ tu gamayatyenaṁ pratyekaṁ saṁśaye sati ॥] 
[sāmasye nirṇayotpādātsthāṇumūrdhasthakākavat ॥] 
evam---
[vākyenaivocyate tasmādvākyārtho'nyairarūpaṇāt ।] 
[ante cāstīti bodhācca vṛkṣeṇaiva ca vṛkṣatā ॥] 
yattu palāśaśabdena vṛkṣatā nocyate iti, sasyamevametat । na hi palāśavākyena vṛkṣavākyārthasyābhidhānam । bhinnaviṣayatvāt । anyo hi palāśavākyārthaiḥ palāśo'sti tiṣṭhatīti vā । anyovṛkṣavākyārthaḥ । yadā ca padavaṇīnāṁ niravayavānāṁ pṛthagastitvamabhyupagamyate, tadā niravayavavarṇapadopādānaṁ vākyaṁ sāvayavaṁ kathamavakalpeta । na hi kriyākāśādibhiḥ sāvayavaṁ śakyamārabdhum । atha sāvayavatvamabhyupāyiṣyate, tatrāpi doṣa eva prasajyeta ॥
[sadbhāvepadavarṇānāṁ bhedīyaḥ paramāṇuvat ।] 
[sarvā bhāvastataśceti seyaṁ bālavibhīṣikā ॥] 
paramāṇūnāṁ satvādidharmamātratvābhyupagamatvivṛtyasuṣṭhubhāṣāmahe – seyaṁ vṛddhavibhīṣaketi ॥
[niyamārtho'nuvādaḥ kartṛkaraṇakarmaṇāṁ caitrāgnitaṇḍulānāṁ] kriyāvavacanātsādhanāni vidyanta ityarthaprāptānāṁ niyamaḥ, caitra eva kartā, agninaiva karaṇena, taṇḍulāneva karma, iti ॥
[dṛṣṭaṁ ca vākyārthe kevalaṁ padam ।] yathā
[tataḥ] vākyāt
[anyathā] yadi vākyātpravibhajyanavyākriyeta, tadā tato bhavatya
aśvaścaratīti jātivācakam । aścastvaṁ grāmamityaśvayaterluṅantasya madhyamapuruṣaikavacanāntasya prayogaḥ । ajāpayaḥ pīyatāmitināmapadam । ajāpayastvaṁ rājānamiti japatorṇijantasya laṅmadhyamapuruṣaikavacanāntasya rūpam ॥

teṣāṁ śabdārthapratyayānāṁ pravibhāgaḥ। tadyathā śvetate prāsāda iti kriyārthaḥ, śvetaḥ prāsāda iti kārakārthaḥ śabdaḥ, kriyākārakātmā tadarthaḥ pratyayaśca। kasmāt। so'yamityabhisaṁbandhādekākāra eva pratyayaḥ saṁketa iti।

vivaraṇam
[teṣāṁ śabdārthapratyayānāṁ] saṅkaraṁ pradarśya
[kriyākārakātmā,] yaḥ śvetaḥ sa śvetateyaḥ śvetatesaśvetaḥ ityevaṁ kriyākārakāvyatiriktaḥ ekaḥ śabdaḥ, tathā arthaḥ tadvācyaḥ kriyākārakātmā । tathā tadviṣayaḥ pratyayaḥ kriyākārakātmā । tathā arthaḥ śabdapratyayātmā । pratyayo'pi śabdārthātmā । kasmāt?

yastu śveto'rthaḥ sa śabdapratyayayorālambanībhūtaḥ। sa hi svābhiravasthābhirvikriyamāṇo na śabdasahagato na buddhisahagataḥ। evaṁ śabda evaṁ pratyayo netaretarasahagata ityanyathā śabdo'nyathā'rtho'nyathā pratyaya iti vibhāgaḥ। evaṁ tatpravibhāgasaṁyamādyoginaḥ sarvabhūtarutajñānaṁ saṁpadyata iti ॥ 17 ॥

vivaraṇam
[yastu śveto'rthaḥ] śvetaguṇaḥ prāsādādirarthaḥ
saṁskārasākṣātkaraṇātpūrvajātijñānam ॥ 18 ॥

dvaye khalvamī saṁskārāḥ smṛtikleśahetavo vāsanārūpā vipākahetavo dharmādharmarūpāḥ। te pūrvabhavābhisaṁskṛtāḥ pariṇāmaceṣṭānirodhaśaktijīvanadharmavadaparidṛṣṭāścittadharmāḥ। teṣu saṁyamaḥ saṁskārasākṣātkriyāyai samarthaḥ। na ca deśakālanimittānubhavairvinā teṣāmasti sākṣātkaraṇam। taditthaṁ saṁskārasākṣātkaraṇātpūrvajātijñānaputpadyate yoginaḥ। paratrāpyevameva saṁskārasākṣātkaraṇātparajāti-saṁvedanam।

vivaraṇam
[saṁskārasākṣātkaraṇāt pūrvajātijñānam । dvaye khalvamī saṁskārāḥ vāsanā'bhidhānāḥ] paridṛṣṭāḥ aparidṛṣṭāśca smṛtikleśahetavaḥ । paridṛṣṭāḥ (ubhaye'pi) kleśakarmavipākānubhavanirvartitāḥ
[na ca] (te)
[taditthaṁ saṁskārasākṣātkaraṇāt pūrvajātijñānamutpadyate yoginaḥ । paratrāpi prāṇiṣu evameva] yeṣāṁ jātiṁ bubhutsate tadīyasaṁskāreṣu saṁyamāt

atredamākhyānaṁ śrūyate – bhagavato jaigīṣavyasya saṁskārasākṣātkaraṇāddaśasu mahāsargeṣu janmapariṇāmakramamanupaśyato vivekajaṁ jñānaṁ prādurabhūt। atha bhagavānāvaṭyastanudharastamuvāca – daśasu mahāsargeṣu bhavyatvādanabhibhūtabuddhisattvena tvayā narakatiryaggarbhasaṁbhavaṁ duḥkhaṁ saṁpaśyatā devamanuṣyeṣu punaḥpunarutpadyamānena sukhaduḥkhayoḥ kimadhikamupalabdhamiti। bhagavantamāvaṭyaṁ jaigīṣavya uvāca – daśasu mahāsargeṣu bhavyatvādanabhibhūtabuddhisattvena mayā narakatiryagbhavaṁ duḥkhaṁ saṁpaśyatā devamanuṣyeṣu punaḥpunarutpadyamānena yatkiṁcidanubhūtaṁ tatsarvaṁ duḥkhameva pratyavaimi। bhagavānāvaṭya uvāca - yadidamāyuṣmataḥ pradhānavaśitvamanuttamaṁ ca saṁtoṣasukhaṁ kimidamapi duḥkhapakṣe nikṣiptamiti। bhagavāñjaigīṣavya uvāca – viṣayasukhāpekṣayaivedamanuttamaṁ saṁtoṣasukhamuktam। kaivalyasukhāpekṣayā duḥkhameva। buddhisattvasyāyaṁ dharmastriguṇastriguṇaśca pratyayo heyapakṣe nyasta iti। duḥkharūpastṛṣṇātantuḥ। tṛṣṇāduḥkhasaṁtāpāpagamāttu prasannamabādhaṁ sarvānukūlaṁ sukhamidamuktamiti ॥ 18 ॥

vivaraṇam
[bhagavato jaigīṣavyasya saṁskārasākṣātkaraṇāt daśasu mahāsargeṣu janmapariṇāmam anupaśyato vivekajaṁ vairāgyānimittaṁ jñānaṁ prādurabhūt ॥] 
[athabhagavān āvaṭayaḥ tantradharaḥ tamuvāca – daśasu mahāsargeṣu [bhavyatvāt] anabhibhūtabuddhisatvena tvayā narakatiryaggamanaduḥkhamanupaśyatā devamanuṣyeṣu punaḥ punaḥ utpadyamānena sukhaduḥkhayoḥ kimupalabdhamadhikamiti ॥] 
[bhagavantamāvaṣṭyaṁjaigīṣavyauvāca–daśasu mahāsargeṣu bhavyatvāt anabhibhūtabuddhisatvena mayā narakatiryaggamanamanupaśyatā devamanuṣyeṣu punaḥ punaḥ utpadyamānena yatkiñcit anubhūtaṁ tatsarvaṁ duḥkhamiti [] duḥkhameva
[bhagavānāvaṭya uvāca – yadidamāyuṣmataḥ pradhānavaśitvamanuttamaṁ ca santoṣasukhaṁ [kimidamapi du:khapakṣe nikṣitamiti । bhagavān jaigīṣavya uvāca—viṣayasukhāpekṣayaivedamanuttamaṁ santoṣasukhaṁ [pradhānavaśitvasukhaṁ ca] uttam । kaivalyasukhāpekṣayā duḥkhameva । buddhisattvasyāyaṁ dharmaḥ triguṇaḥ ॥ ] ‘triguṇaśca pratyayo heyapakṣe nyasta iti ।] kimapekṣayā punaretaddvayaṁ sukhaṁ bhavatītyāha –
pratyayasya paracittajñānam ॥ 19 ॥
pratyaye saṁyamātpratyayasya sākṣātkaraṇāttataḥ paracittajñānam ॥ 19 ॥

vivaraṇam
[pratyayasya parācittajñānam ।] para
na ca tatsālambanaṁ tasyāviṣayībhūtatvāt ॥ 20 ॥
raktaṁ pratyaya jānātyamuṣminnālambane raktamiti na jānāti। parapratyayasya yadālambanaṁ tadyogicittena nā''lambanīkṛtaṁ parapratyayamātraṁ tu yogicittasyā''lambanībhūtamiti ॥ 20 ॥

vivaraṇam
[na ca sālambanaṁ tasya aviṣayībhūtatvāt । raktaṁ pratyayaṁ jānāti] yogī । parasya amuṣmin
[parapratyayamātraṁ tu yogicittasyālambanībhūtam ॥ 20 ॥]
kāyarūpasaṁyamāttadgrāhyaśaktistambhe cakṣuṣprakāśāsaṁprayoge'ntardhānam ॥ 21 ॥
kāyasya rūpe saṁyamādrūpasya yā grāhyā śaktistāṁ pratiṣṭabhrāti। grāhyaśaktistambhe sati cakṣuṣprakāśāsaṁprayoge'ntardhānamutpadyate yoginaḥ। etena śabdādyantardhānamuktaṁ veditavyam ॥ 21 ॥

vivaraṇam
[kāyarūpasaṁyamāttadgrāhyaśaktistambhe cakṣuḥ prakāśāsamprayoge antadhānam ।] yāgina ātmīyasya
sopakramaṁ nirupakramaṁ ca karma tatsaṁyamādaparāntajñānamariṣṭebhyo vā ॥ 22 ॥

āyurvipākaṁ karma dvividhaṁ sopakramaṁ nirupakramaṁ ca। tatra yathā''rdraṁ vastraṁ vitānitaṁ laghīyasā kālena śuṣyettathā sopakramam। yathā ca tadeva saṁpiṇḍitaṁ cireṇa saṁśuṣyedevaṁ nirupakramam। yathā vā'gniḥ śuṣke kakṣe mukto vātena samantato yuktaḥ kṣepīyasā kālena dahettathā sopakramam। yathā vā sa evāgnistṛṇarāśau kramaśo'vayaveṣu nyastaścireṇa dahettathā nirupakramam। tadaikabhavikamāyuṣkaraṁ karma dvividhaṁ sopakramaṁ nirupakramaṁ ca। tatsaṁyamādaparāntasya prāyaṇasya jñānam।

vivaraṇam
[sopakramaṁ nirupakramaṁ ca karma tatsaṁyamādaparāntajñānamāriṣṭebhyo vā । āyurvipākaṁ karma dvidhā ।] katham? tvaritaṁ nimittamādāya phalapradaṁ
[yathā ārdraṁ vastraṁ vitānitaṁ] vistāritaṁ
[tadeva vastraṁ sampiṇḍitam] avitānitaṁ
[yathā vā agniḥ śuṣke kakṣe yuktavāte] anukūlamātariśvani
[sa evāgniḥ tṛṇarāśau krameṇa nyastaścireṇa dahet, tathā nirupakrarmakarma ॥] 
[dvividham aikabhavikamāyuṣkaraṁ karma ।] tatsaṁyamādaparāntajñānam ।

ariṣṭebhyo veti। trividhamariṣṭamādhyātmikamādhibhautikamādhidaivikaṁ ceti। tatrā''dhyātmikaṁ ghoṣaṁ svadehe pihitakarṇo na śṛṇoti, jyotirvā netre'vaṣṭabdhe na paśyati। tathā''dhibhautikaṁ yamapuruṣānpaśyati, pitṝnatītānakasmātpaśyati। tathā''dhidaivikaṁ svargamakasmātsiddhānvā paśyati। viparītaṁ vā sarvamiti। anena vā jānātyaparāntamupasthitamiti ॥ 22 ॥

vivaraṇam
[ariṣṭebhyo vā] prāyaṇajñānam ।
[tathā ādhibhautikaṁ–yamapuruṣānpaśyati । pitṝnatītānāgatānakasmādvetti । adhidaivikam—akasmādeva siddhādīnpaśyati । viparītaṁ vā sarvaṁ] paśyati karoti ca । tatrāriṣṭamiti laukikī vācāyutiḥ । evaṁ hyāha--viparītadarśanaṁ mamāsīdariṣṭāṁmati ॥ 23 ॥
maitryādiṣu balāni ॥ 23 ॥

maitrī karuṇā muditeti tisro bhāvanāstatra bhūteṣu sukhiteṣu maitrīṁ bhāvayitvā maitrībalaṁ labhate। duḥkhiteṣu karuṇāṁ bhāvayitvā karuṇābalaṁ labhate। puṇyaśīleṣu muditāṁ bhāvayitvā muditābalaṁ labhate। bhāvanātaḥ samādhiryaḥ sa saṁyamastato balānyavandhyavīryāṇi jāyante। pāpaśīleṣūpekṣā na tu bhāvanā। tataśca tasyāṁ nāsti samādhirityato na balamupekṣātastatra saṁyamābhāvāditi ॥ 23 ॥

vivaraṇam
[maitryādiṣu balāni । maitrīkaruṇāmuditeti tisro bhāvanāḥ । tatra bhūteṣu sukhiteṣu maitrīṁ bhāvayitvā maitrībalaṁ labhate । du:khiteṣu karuṇāṁ bhāvayitvā karuṇābalaṁ labhate । puṇyaśīleṣu muditāṁ bhāvayitvā muditābalaṁ labhate ॥] 
[bhāvanātaḥ] maitryādibhāvanātaḥ
[pāpaśīleṣu tu asya upekṣā, na tu bhāvanā ॥ tataśca] bhāvanāyā abhāvāt
baleṣu hastibalādīni ॥ 24 ॥
hastibale saṁyamāddhastibalo bhavati। vainateyabale saṁyamādvainateyabalo bhavati। vāyubale saṁyamādvāyubalo bhavatītyevamādi ॥ 24 ॥

vivaraṇam
[baleṣu hastibalādīni ।] etairmaitryādinimittairbalairbalavānyogīhastyādīnabaleṣu saṁyamaṁkṛtvāhastyādibalo bhavati ॥ 24 ॥
pravṛttyālokanyāsātsūkṣmavyavahitaviprakṛṣṭajñānam ॥ 25 ॥
jyotiṣmatī pravṛttiruktā manasastasyā ya ālokastaṁ yogī sūkṣme vā vyavahite vā viprakṛṣṭe vā'rthe vinyasya tamarthamadhigacchati ॥ 25 ॥

vivaraṇam
[pravṛttyālokanyāsāt sūkṣmavyavahitaviprakṛṣṭajñānam ।] yā asau
bhuvanajñānaṁ sūrye saṁyamāt ॥ 26 ॥

tatprastāraḥ sapta lokāḥ। tatrāvīceḥ prabhṛti merupṛṣṭhaṁ yāvadityevaṁ bhūrlokaḥ। merupṛṣṭhādārabhya ādhruvādgrahanakṣatratārāvicitro'ntarikṣalokaḥ। tataḥ paraḥ svarlokaḥ pañcavidho māhendrastṛtīyo lokaḥ। caturthaḥ prājāpatyo maharlokaḥ। trividho brāhmaḥ। tadyathā – janalokastapolokaḥ satyaloka iti। brāhmastribhūmiko lokaḥ prājāpatyastato mahān। māhendraśca svarityukto divi tārā bhuvi prajāḥ ॥ iti saṁgrahaślokaḥ।

vivaraṇam
[bhuvanajñānaṁ sūrye saṁyamāt ।] sūrye saṁyamaṁ kṛtvā samastaṁ bhuvanaprastāraṁ pratyakṣākurvīta । bhāṣyaṁ tu gatārthaṁ, sarvapurāṇaprasiddhatvāta ॥ 26 ॥

tatrāvīceruparyupari niviṣṭāḥ ṣaṇmahānarakabhūmayo ghanasalilānalānilākāśatamaḥpratiṣṭhā mahākālāmbarīṣarauravamahārauravamahārauravakālasūtrāndhatāmisrāḥ। yatra svakarmopārjitaduḥkhavedanāḥ prāṇinaḥ kaṣṭamāyurdīrghamākṣipya jāyante। tato mahātalarasātalātalasutalavitalatalātalapātālākhyāni sapta pātālāni। bhūmiriyamaṣṭamī saptadvīpā vasumatī, yasyāḥ sumerurmadhye parvatarājaḥ kāñcanaḥ। tasya rājatavaidūryasphaṭikahemamaṇimayāni śṛṅgāṇi। tatra vaidūryaprabhānurāgānnīlotpalapatraśyāmo nabhaso dakṣiṇo bhāgaḥ, śvetaḥ pūrvaḥ, svacchaḥ paścimaḥ, kuraṇṭakābha uttaraḥ। dakṣiṇapārśve cāsya jambūryato'yaṁ jambūdvīpaḥ। tasya sūryapracārādrātriṁ divaṁ lagnamiva vartate। tasya nīlaśvetaśṛṅgavanta udīcīnāstrayaḥ parvatā dvisāhasrāyāmāḥ। tadantareṣu trīṇi varṣāṇi nava nava yojanasāhasrāṇi ramaṇakaṁ hiraṇmayamuttarāḥ kurava iti। niṣadhahemakūṭahimaśailā dakṣiṇato dvisāhasrāyāmāḥ। tadantareṣu trīṇi varṣāṇi nava nava yojanasāhasrāṇi harivarṣa kiṁpuruṣaṁ bhāratamiti। sumeroḥ prācīnā bhadrāśvamālyavatsīmānaḥ pratīcīnāḥ ketumālā gandhamādanasīmānaḥ। madhye varṣamilāvṛtam। tadetadyojanaśatasāhasraṁ sumerordiśi diśi tadardhena vyūḍham।

sa khalvayaṁ śatasāhasrāyāmo jambūdvīpastato dviguṇena lavaṇodadhinā valayākṛtinā veṣṭitaḥ। tataśca dviguṇā dviguṇāḥ śākakuśakrauñcaśālmalagomedha(plakṣa)puṣkaradvīpāḥ, samudrāśca sarṣaparāśikalpāḥ savicitraśailāvataṁsā ikṣurasasurāsarpirdadhimaṇḍakṣīrasvādūdakāḥ। sapta samudrapariveṣṭitā valayākṛtayo lokālokaparvataparivārāḥ pañcāśadyojanakoṭiparisaṁkhyātāḥ। tadetatsarvaṁ supratiṣṭhitasaṁsthānamaṇḍamadhye vyūḍham। aṇḍaṁ ca pradhānasyāṇurayavayavo yathā''kāśe khadyota iti।

tatra pātāle jaladhau parvateṣveteṣu devanikāyā asuragandharvakinnarakiṁpuruṣayakṣarākṣasabhūtapreta-piśācāpasmārakāpsarobrahmarākṣasakūṣmāṇḍavināyakāḥ prativasanti। sarveṣu dvīpeṣu puṇyātmāno devamanuṣyāḥ।

sumerustridaśānāmudyānabhūmiḥ। tatra miśravanaṁ nandanaṁ caitrarathaṁ sumānasamityudyānāni। sudharmā devasabhā। sudarśanaṁ puram। vaijayantaḥ prāsādaḥ। grahanakṣatratārakāstu dhruve nibaddhā vāyuvikṣepaniyamenopalakṣitapracārāḥ sumeroruparyupari sanniviṣṭā divi viparivartante।
